1004w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px\" /></a></div><div class=\"td-post-content\">\n<div id=\"td_uid_1_5f0887a6386b9\" class=\"tdc-row\">\n<div class=\"vc_row td_uid_13_5f0887a638709_rand wpb_row td-pb-row\">\n<div class=\"vc_column td_uid_14_5f0887a638e85_rand wpb_column vc_column_container tdc-column td-pb-span12\">\n<div class=\"wpb_wrapper\">\n<div class=\"wpb_wrapper wpb_text_column td_block_wrap td_block_wrap vc_column_text td_uid_15_5f0887a639135_rand td-pb-border-top td_block_template_2\" data-td-block-uid=\"td_uid_15_5f0887a639135\">\n<div class=\"td-fix-index\">\n<p>Technology is part of every product and aspect of our lives. It has even changed how we go camping. The case in point is that the tents made by <a href=\"https://www.heimplanet.com/shop/Backdoor-cairo-camo-3-Season-Tent_1\">Heimplanet</a>. I recently purchased their Backdoor tent model to try out these inflatable, pole-less tents, which are so different from those that my family used when we would go on summer camping trips.</p>\n<h2>About the Backdoor Tent</h2>\n<p>The Backdoor is a four-person inflatable tent. It has a ventilation system and an inner tent with two layout options, making it suitable for summer and winter camping.</p>\n<p>The biggest difference is that this tent moves away from the pole and canvas style tents that have dominated nearly the whole history of the tent. This pole doesn&#8217;t require hard poles that are often difficult to work with. I remember how it took hours just to get the tents set up. Heimplanet&#8217;s tent sets up so quickly because it uses inflatable support pillars that still give it support and form but without the hassle.</p>\n<p><img class=\"aligncenter wp-image-174341 size-large\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/HeimplanetBackdoorTent-719x719.jpg\" alt=\"\" width=\"719\" height=\"719\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/HeimplanetBackdoorTent-719x719.jpg 719w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/HeimplanetBackdoorTent-300x300.jpg 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/HeimplanetBackdoorTent-160x160.jpg 160w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/HeimplanetBackdoorTent-1536x1536.jpg 1536w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/HeimplanetBackdoorTent.jpg 1600w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 719px) 100vw, 719px\" /></p>\n<figure class=\"wp-block-image\"></figure>\n<p>The airframe for this tent is made of recycled material while the inner layer consists of flexible thermoplastic polyurethane and the flysheet is 66D 210T Ripstop with PU lamination.</p>\n<p>There is also a groundsheet made from 100% nylon taffeta 70D 210T also with PU lamination.</p>\n<p>The overall height of the tent is five feet while the inner tent section is just over four feet high. The inside of the tent measures about 97 square feet.</p>\n<h2>Other Notable Features</h2>\n<p><span class=\"a-list-item\">Setting up this tent involves connecting the airframe, inner tent, and outer tent once before the first time you use it. From then on, the tent can simply be rolled out like a sleeping bag, pumped up, and secured with pegs. When you are ready to pack up again, all you need to do is open one of the valves. The simple opening of a valve will deflate the airframe. After that, you simply roll up the tent and put it back in the pack-sack. </span></p>\n<p>The tent uses a one pump system. The frame&#8217;s<span class=\"a-list-item\"> air chambers are connected. That way, the entire tent can be pitched by only using one valve.<br />\n</span></p>\n<p>Heimplanet notes that the tent has been tested and has withstood wind speeds of up to 110 miles per hour. The ripstop nylon fabric also provides a way to keep the wind out and protect those inside the tent from the elements.</p>\n<p><img class=\"aligncenter wp-image-174342 size-large\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/HeimplanetBackdoorTentInterior-900x675.jpg\" alt=\"\" width=\"900\" height=\"675\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/HeimplanetBackdoorTentInterior-900x675.jpg 900w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/HeimplanetBackdoorTentInterior-300x225.jpg 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/HeimplanetBackdoorTentInterior-213x160.jpg 213w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/HeimplanetBackdoorTentInterior.jpg 1200w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 900px) 100vw, 900px\" /></p>\n<h2>Pros and Cons</h2>\n<p>There are many things to like about this innovative tent. Besides the year-round versatility, it has a wide entrance and spacious feel. There are numerous storage compartments that make organizing your camping gear easy.</p>\n<p>I particularly like the storage in the ceiling that has a place to store your valuables as well as mounts to attach lamps. Plus, there is a second entrance and exit at the rear of the tent.</p>\n<p>The biggest advantage &#8211; again &#8211; is technology and design. <em>This tent looks cool</em>. Although this tent can handle all types of weather conditions, it is lightweight and doesn&#8217;t weigh-a-ton like many traditional tents.</p>\n<p>While a lightweight tent is convenient for everyone, it is especially appreciated by those of us that like to hike and camp in more remote destinations. Carrying less weight on your back means an easier journey.</p>\n<p>Another plus is that the tent comes with a full four-year warranty, which is rare considering that tents can be put in some pretty harsh conditions.</p>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"td-pb-span4 td-main-sidebar\" role=\"complementary\">\n<div class=\"td-ss-main-sidebar\">\n<aside class=\"td_block_template_2 widget widget_sib_subscribe_form\">\n<div class=\"aawp-product__content\">\n<div class=\"aawp-product__description\">\n<p>The only con that I can find with this tent is the price. It retails for $989. For what it offers, it&#8217;s an excellent value, especially when it&#8217;s made to last and has such an exceptional warranty. It&#8217;s just a bit of a shock to convince yourself to pay that much money for a tent.</p>\n<h2>In the Box</h2>\n<p>The tent comes with pegs, a repair kit, guy lines, packsack, gear loft, and pump adapter.</p>\n<h2>Where to Buy</h2>\n<p>You can purchase this tent through Amazon.</p>\n<h2>Overall Thoughts</h2>\n</div>\n</div>\n</aside>\n<div class=\"clearfix\">Since the Heimplanet tent is on the expensive side, I would recommend this tent for the serious outdoor person who goes camping often. It&#8217;s also ideal for those more rugged trips of exploring into unchartered areas and during more extreme weather conditions.</div>\n<div></div>\n<div class=\"clearfix\">The once-in-awhile camper may want to consider a much lower cost basic tent investment &#8212; but then again, lower cost tents are usually too heavy to take along on a hike.</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<p>The post <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/07/11/heimplanet-backdoor-inflatable-tent/\">Heimplanet Backdoor Inflatable Tent</a> appeared first on <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com\">ReadWrite</a>.</p>\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Sat, 11 Jul 2020 18:01:09 +0000","feedId":271,"bgimg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/HeimplanetBackdoor4PersonTent-300x300.jpg","linkMd5":"3340bd36ab12b239ecdc69c94567307d","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx16/cdn61@2020_3/2020/08/23/15-18-07-797_a7f4049836668799.webp","destWidth":300,"destHeight":300,"sourceBytes":15434,"destBytes":16478,"author":"Brad Anderson","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/HeimplanetBackdoor4PersonTent-300x300.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx16/cdn61@2020_3/2020/08/23/15-18-07-797_a7f4049836668799.webp","https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/HeimplanetBackdoorTent-719x719.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx19/cdn43@2020_5/2020/08/23/15-18-16-744_5849cd44832ef129.webp","https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/HeimplanetBackdoorTentInterior-900x675.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx2/cdn52@2020_6/2020/08/23/15-18-28-535_81e7bdb46cf17886.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598195872203},{"createdTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:56","updatedTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:56","title":"How COVID-19 is Driving Us into a Cloud-Based Future","link":"https://readwrite.com/?p=172277","description":"<div><a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/06/08/how-covid-19-is-driving-us-into-a-cloud-based-future/\" title=\"How COVID-19 is Driving Us into a Cloud-Based Future\"><img width=\"300\" height=\"185\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/How-COVID-19-is-Driving-Us-into-a-Cloud-Based-Future-300x185.jpg\" class=\"attachment-medium size-medium wp-post-image\" alt=\"cloud-based future\" style=\"margin-bottom: 15px;\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/How-COVID-19-is-Driving-Us-into-a-Cloud-Based-Future-300x185.jpg 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/How-COVID-19-is-Driving-Us-into-a-Cloud-Based-Future-260x160.jpg 260w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/How-COVID-19-is-Driving-Us-into-a-Cloud-Based-Future.jpg 825w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px\" /></a></div><p>With the advent of the <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/05/22/how-smart-cities-can-help-build-a-better-post-pandemic-world/\">COVID-19 global pandemic</a>, many organizations have had to re-adjust the way they operate. Remote working is now a reality for large sections of the workforce. Remote collaboration through cloud-based platforms is an accepted part of most workdays. But the utility of cloud-based technology does not end there. Here is how COVID-19 is driving us into a cloud-based future.</p>\n<p>A recent report indicates that in the next two years <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/05/15/latest-accounting-trends-transforming-the-retail-industry/\">the cloud computing industry</a> will grow at a compound annual growth rate of 12.5%. Already a strongly-emerging technology, cloud-based solutions are proving to be invaluable during a global health crisis where people can no longer work at a fixed site. The extent to which cloud-based technologies are driving us into the future are as follows:</p>\n<h2>Supporting Remote Work and the Freelance Economy</h2>\n<p>Continued productivity is vital as organizations <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/04/04/cyber-security-modern-technology-and-business-threats/\">shift to remote models of working</a>. This is as important to corporate organizations as it is to schools and colleges. During COVID-19, many working and learning programs have continued with high levels of efficiency, thanks to highly-flexible, scalable, and efficient cloud-based solutions.</p>\n<p>The seamlessness with which business has continued means that every responsible organization should have a <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/05/28/introducing-the-technologies-set-to-redefine-cloud-computing/\">cloud migration solution</a>.</p>\n<p><a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/03/26/the-modern-workplace-demands-better-visibility/\">Demand for collaboration tools</a> has seen unprecedented growth in platforms like Zoom and Slack. More entrenched office productivity tools such as Microsoft 365 also sees high demand. These tools are all cloud-based and their excellent conferencing, and productivity suites all enjoy the multiple benefits of the cloud.</p>\n<p>When the pandemic eventually subsides, people will have to go back to work. But an increasing number of workers will not. The freelance economy has seen continued growth in recent years, with over 60 million Americans doing freelance work of some sort. <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/07/04/digital-twin-from-automation-to-autonomy/\">Cloud computing is an invaluable tool</a> that has allowed the freelance economy to take hold and thrive.</p>\n<h2>A boom in E-Commerce and the Fade of Brick and Mortar</h2>\n<p>As people have been stuck at home, the <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/04/01/driving-cloud-transformation-through-iot-solutions/\">demand for e-commerce services</a> has risen sharply. Retailers were already migrating away from brick and mortar into the online space before the global pandemic arrived.</p>\n<p>Retail companies know that as e-commerce adoption rises, any cloud investment costs will be recouped through <strong>cloud cost reduction</strong>. This applies to cloud solutions also being responsible for overall reduced IT costs by obliterating the need for most traditional hardware such as servers.</p>\n<p>The ways in which <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/04/08/global-immigration-market-is-shaped-by-ai-tech-careers/\">global supply chains</a> have become embedded in e-commerce fulfillment points to an inevitable future internet of things. Service provider collaboration and integration happens at the level of the cloud between retailers and logistics service providers, resulting in a smooth and highly-efficient delivery system.</p>\n<p>Through the <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2018/11/06/going-to-cloud-storage-practical-strategies-to-match-your-iot-business-needs/\">robust scalability of the cloud</a> and its forever switched-on nature, global supply chains can support the wants and whims of consumers everywhere. This has been shown during COVID-19, with online purchases spiking a staggering 146%, and supply chains barely breaking a sweat to deliver.</p>\n<h2>Growth of the Cloud in the Government Sector</h2>\n<p>Healthcare has come <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/04/30/iot-and-healthcare-technologies-converge-for-better-patient-care/\">to prominence during the pandemic</a>. It has benefited greatly from access to a scalable and secure cloud infrastructure. This has been necessary to manage patient information. With millions of people laid low by the virus, it has taken the need for efficient and accurate computing to a new level of importance.</p>\n<p>The prominence of the cloud during the pandemic goes beyond patient records. Collaboration between various private and governmental agencies has risen to unprecedented levels. Virus development projects are being shared by many countries and institutions.</p>\n<p>Additionally, virus contingency management information is being shared by nations across the world. All these efforts are underpinned by highly scalable and collaborative cloud-based tools.</p>\n<p>It is for moments like these that governments were already moving towards a cloud-based future at great speed. Until recently, almost half of all government agencies in the US were actively using cloud services.</p>\n<p>These agencies understand the power and versatility of private cloud networks, with benefits such as deep security and information sovereignty being crucial. Cloud adoption within government circles will only continue to rise.</p>\n<h2>Content Platforms Enjoying a Surge</h2>\n<p>Binge-consumption of TV and audio content has been a feature of the pandemic. Video-streaming services have reported a strong surge in new subscriptions since the enactment of lockdown orders in many countries.</p>\n<p>Not to be outdone, music services and many podcasts and audiobook services have also reported large jumps in membership. The gaming industry has also reported large spikes in usage times. Support services such as mobile networks and internet service providers have benefited from these enforced behavior changes.</p>\n<h2>Cloud-Dependent Industries on the Rise</h2>\n<p>The SaaS segment was already a growth area, and its <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/01/06/4-unique-growth-tactics-for-2020/\">continued importance and growth potential</a> has been revealed during COVID-19. Due to the many daily applications and tools driven by this service, the industry in its entirety is in the limelight.</p>\n<p>Service desks, accounting packages, <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/04/19/create-symbiotic-relationships-with-ai-in-business/\">customer relationship management</a>, human resource management, and enterprise resource planning all rely on the SaaS model. Infrastructure as a service, platform as a service, and desktop as a service are all part of the cloud family and are all showing continued growth.</p>\n<p>The new model of remote working depends on the streamlined continuation of business-critical services such as <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/05/08/ai-based-framework-for-agile-project-management/\">human resource management</a>. Cloud service providers have been able to remotely manage and secure underlying infrastructure, allowing organizations to continue to function within their constraints. This versatility has been perfect during the pandemic and will continue to be perfect for the business of the future.</p>\n<h2>Robust and Sustainable Is the Way of the Future</h2>\n<p>If anything, the virus has taught us the danger of having all your data tied to office sites and fixed hardware installations. There has always been the danger of data loss through disasters on site. Data loss has been mitigated by on-site security, but cloud services offer a better way.</p>\n<p>The <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/04/11/3-surprising-benefits-of-the-cloud-in-iot/\">better way of cloud services</a> is because hardware inevitably deteriorates, can be stolen, corrupted, or become obsolete. When your data is simply inaccessible, as it has been during the pandemic, a better solution must be found.</p>\n<p>There is also the <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/03/18/3-strategies-chris-dyer-uses-to-overhaul-struggling-company-cultures/\">matter of sustainability</a>. Large organizations can collect vast amounts of hardware to house their information. It is the responsible thing to do to cut down your environmental footprint by putting everything in the cloud.</p>\n<p>There are also downstream issues like energy efficiency and reduced building usage. Other sustainability wins come with the reduced need for workers to commute to the place where the information is held. These wins have come into sharp focus during the virus as many measures have revealed a cleaner planet, even if just temporarily.</p>\n<h3>Conclusion</h3>\n<p>The global pandemic has revealed that cloud services will <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/11/05/the-cloud-is-the-future-of-software-delivery/\">continue to provide strategic flexibility</a> and scalability for a number of organizations. The virus response would likely have been a lot less effective in a time before cloud services.</p>\n<p>It is totally imaginable that habits like social distancing would have been impossible to achieve if people needed to be on-site to manage and control business-critical systems.</p>\n<p>At this moment in time, cloud services may heavily favor <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/03/22/from-polarization-to-open-learning-how-technology-can-help-us-beyond-covid-19/\">sectors which are useful during a pandemic</a>, but future prospects are robust across all sectors. There are also no geographical boundaries, with cloud services projected to increase in adoption across the world.</p>\n<p>New cloud technologies like cloud direct connect, where private networks can join the cloud, will allow more and more types of organizations and networks to take part. Cloud computing is truly taking center stage in driving us into the future.</p>\n<p>The post <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/06/08/how-covid-19-is-driving-us-into-a-cloud-based-future/\">How COVID-19 is Driving Us into a Cloud-Based Future</a> appeared first on <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com\">ReadWrite</a>.</p>\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Mon, 08 Jun 2020 15:00:23 +0000","feedId":271,"bgimg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/How-COVID-19-is-Driving-Us-into-a-Cloud-Based-Future.jpg","linkMd5":"ad31bde5508861e6ae13669586f09c0d","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx33/cdn100@2020_3/2020/08/23/15-18-24-747_72e094a87b4d8417.webp","metaImg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/How-COVID-19-is-Driving-Us-into-a-Cloud-Based-Future.jpg","destWidth":825,"destHeight":510,"sourceBytes":98056,"destBytes":99550,"author":"Paul Cooney","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/How-COVID-19-is-Driving-Us-into-a-Cloud-Based-Future-300x185.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx21/cdn7@2020_3/2020/08/23/15-18-18-534_2d8ec6d2506418f2.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598195876036},{"createdTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:48","updatedTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:48","title":"Price Intelligence for Startups: What Is It? Why Do You Need It? How to Get Started?","link":"https://readwrite.com/?p=173127","description":"<div><a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/08/05/price-intelligence-for-startups-what-is-it-why-do-you-need-it-how-to-get-started/\" title=\"Price Intelligence for Startups: What Is It? Why Do You Need It? How to Get Started?\"><img width=\"300\" height=\"185\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/Price-Intelligence-for-Startups-300x185.jpg\" class=\"attachment-medium size-medium wp-post-image\" alt=\"price intelligence startups\" style=\"margin-bottom: 15px;\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/Price-Intelligence-for-Startups-300x185.jpg 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/Price-Intelligence-for-Startups-260x160.jpg 260w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/Price-Intelligence-for-Startups.jpg 825w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px\" /></a></div><p>Finding a sweet spot between “too low” and “too high” prices can be quite tricky. That’s why price intelligence exists: It can help retailers come up with the correct pricing strategy to beat the competition and build value for their products. Here is price intelligence for startups. What is price intelligence? Do you need it? How to get started with your price intelligence.</p>\n<p>In this article, we will take a look at this marketing approach and how you can develop a pricing intelligence system.</p>\n<h2>What is price intelligence?</h2>\n<p>Price intelligence is a marketing approach that includes gathering, tracking, and analyzing the prices of competitors to gain a better understanding of a current situation on the market and make data-based decisions on prices.</p>\n<p>It is also a crucial part of the startup’s overall <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/08/30/everything-you-need-to-know-about-finances-for-your-startup/\">financial strategy</a>. As retailers often change prices on their products and services, monitoring and analysis of these prices become a constant activity.</p>\n<h2>Why do you need price intelligence?</h2>\n<p>If your competitor lowers the prices, it doesn’t mean you should follow this example. So what’s the point in monitoring this activity then? The answer is, to understand how to act. For example, you can create a special offer or implement temporary discounts to get your customers excited and, perhaps, entice some of your competitor’s customers to switch to your offers.</p>\n<p>So first of all, pricing intelligence will let you come up with a dynamic and efficient pricing strategy that will let you improve your reputation and attract more buyers. Wrong pricing has significant consequences.</p>\n<p>Wrong pricing means prices that are too low will make your clients underestimate the products you offer, and too high prices will scare everyone away. Therefore, it’s vital to find the sweet spot between the two extremes.</p>\n<p>Also, price intelligence will provide you with useful insights that will let you understand the plans of your competitors. Moreover, you will be able to predict certain trends as you begin noticing patterns.</p>\n<h2>How to create a sustainable price intelligence strategy</h2>\n<p>It’s not enough to just gather information about prices. You need to understand your goals, competitors, and target audience first. And only then you can start monitoring prices and making decisions based on the data you acquire.</p>\n<h3>Outline the goals</h3>\n<p>The aim of every business is self-evident — to make more money. However, it’s not as simple as it seems. This overall goal should consist of more feasible smaller sub-goals that will define your strategy. For instance, you can aim for:</p>\n<ul>\n<li><strong>Improving</strong> the cash flow,</li>\n<li><strong>Obtaining </strong>a larger market share,</li>\n<li><strong>Beating</strong> the competition,</li>\n<li><strong>Introducing</strong> a new product,</li>\n<li><strong>Increasing</strong> revenue per buyer,</li>\n<li><strong>Improving</strong> your market penetration,</li>\n<li><strong>Reaching</strong> a new segment, and more.</li>\n</ul>\n<p>By doing this, you will make bringing your retail business to success easier for yourself and your team. Once you have a clear picture, you can move to the next step.</p>\n<h3>Understand your target market</h3>\n<p>Obviously, to succeed in retail you need to <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/07/29/5-reasons-why-you-should-absolutely-embrace-social-media-marketing/\">know your target market</a>. But when it comes to price intelligence, you also need to know how your customers will react to the change in prices &#8212; their price sensitivity. To figure it out, you need to research:</p>\n<ul>\n<li>The ability of your <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/01/05/marketing-automation-and-customer-service-how-are-they-connected/\">clients to search for alternatives</a>. How easy it is for them to find another option and compare prices? And are there products similar to yours that are cheaper? If yes, will the customers switch to it?</li>\n<li>Is the buyer the one who will use the product? For example, you’re selling toys for kids. Even if a child likes the toy, parents might not buy it because of the price. Or some of your buyers resell your products.</li>\n<li>What’s the <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/02/13/startup-essentials-stop-overcomplicating-your-processes/\">customers’ view of competition</a>? Do they only focus on the price, so they’ll buy from you simply because it’s cheaper? Or do they have some other criteria that make them choose you or your competitor? Perhaps, they value your fast delivery, for example, and they will buy from you even if your prices are higher than those of your competitors.</li>\n</ul>\n<h3>Who are your competitors?</h3>\n<p>Knowing your competitors is at the core of pricing intelligence: You can’t monitor the prices correctly if you aren’t aware of your rivals. Being an online retailer, you have both pros and cons of your position when it comes to studying your competitors.</p>\n<p>The advantage is that you can easily find all the <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/08/05/6-strategies-for-ecommerce-stores-to-reduce-fraud/\">other online stores that sell the same product</a> as you — just search for this item on Google.</p>\n<p>However, there is a complication — the number of your rivals might be quite large as there are a lot of online retailers, and you should also consider offline stores. But it might be hard to gather the prices of brick-and-mortar stores if they don’t have a website.</p>\n<p>If you’re selling, for example, printed t-shirts, your rivals are:</p>\n<ul>\n<li>Other stores that sell printed t-shirts</li>\n<li>Stores that sell some other kinds of t-shirts</li>\n<li>Clothing stores</li>\n<li>Printing centers that offer printing on t-shirts</li>\n</ul>\n<p>Once you <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/07/25/how-to-turn-your-sales-to-absolutely-what-you-want/\">gather all the competitors you find</a>, you can proceed to the next step.</p>\n<h2>Automate the pricing intelligence process</h2>\n<p>When we were talking about competitors, you might have thought, “How am I supposed to gather prices from so many shops?” The answer lies in <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/tag/automation/\">automation</a>. In this section, we will introduce you to web scraping and proxies that will become your reliable tools in building a sustainable price intelligence strategy.</p>\n<p>With automation, price intelligence becomes more advanced and can be considered a feat of the best <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/05/23/secrets-of-financial-applications-traits-of-fintech-apps/\">FinTech</a> products.</p>\n<h3>What is web scraping?</h3>\n<p>Web scraping (also known as <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/tag/data-scraping/\">data scraping</a>) is a process of gathering data from the Internet. As this industry evolves, scrapers become simpler &#8212; and today you can find truly straightforward tools that will be easy for you to use even if you never had experience in data gathering. But, of course, it’s better to trust this process to professionals.</p>\n<p>A scraper will go through websites you provide it with and gather the price data. Then this tool will process, structurize, and return it to you in a convenient format. That’s how price intelligence is made easy &#8212; by automating the data gathering and processing.</p>\n<h3>What are proxies and why do you need them?</h3>\n<p>Proxies are remote servers or devices to which you can connect to reroute your traffic through them. As you do so, you pick up the IP address of a proxy masking your real one with it. Therefore, you can remain anonymous, pretend that you’re located in a different place, and avoid restrictions.</p>\n<p>You will need proxies for data gathering because e-commerce websites don’t want anyone to scrape their content. You can understand why: Their owners don’t want their competitors to easily access prices and other valuable information that can be used for gaining a competitive edge.</p>\n<p>That’s why they implement different anti-scraping techniques on their sites. Such protection can detect bot-like behavior and block the IP address where the bot-like traffic comes from.</p>\n<p>Scrapers gather data by sending requests to the website. And such activity looks very suspicious to the anti-scraping protection. By default, a scraper sends all the requests from the same IP address. But you’ll fool the anti-scraping system easily by applying proxies to your scraper.</p>\n<p>Residential proxies, (infatica dot io) are the best choice for scraping as they’re harder to detect, and you can rotate them to prevent getting blocked. Infatica offers flexible pricing plans so that you can get what you need without overpaying. You can also ask us to create a unique plan that fits your needs.</p>\n<h3>Create your pricing strategy</h3>\n<p>Now that you’ve acquired price data, you can begin building your pricing strategy. The pricing intelligence you’ve gathered will let you see the strategies of your competitors. As you will spot certain patterns and trends, it will be quite easy for you to <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/08/01/how-can-a-startup-compete-with-big-companies/\">come up with the strategy</a> that will let you reach the goals you’ve determined in the first step.</p>\n<p>Remember to always stick to your unique aim — don’t just blindly copy the strategy of your competitors. Even if several e-commerce websites sell the same product, they’re still different when it comes to certain details. If you know your <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/05/24/5-advantages-artificial-intelligence-can-give-your-sme/\">target audience well</a>, you’ll understand how to tailor the pricing strategy to its expectations and needs.</p>\n<p>Pricing intelligence became much easier with scrapers and proxies that allows retailers to automate this effort-demanding process. Although <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/08/04/best-competency-with-artificial-intelligence-is-by-having-intelligent-experience/\">the setup process</a> will require some time and energy, the payoff will be absolutely worth it.</p>\n<p>The post <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/08/05/price-intelligence-for-startups-what-is-it-why-do-you-need-it-how-to-get-started/\">Price Intelligence for Startups: What Is It? Why Do You Need It? How to Get Started?</a> appeared first on <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com\">ReadWrite</a>.</p>\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Wed, 05 Aug 2020 19:32:57 +0000","feedId":271,"bgimg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/Price-Intelligence-for-Startups.jpg","linkMd5":"db23a56cda2d3774b7e02be1238b7af5","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx3/cdn83@2020_2/2020/08/23/15-18-24-671_262c1c671698df4a.webp","metaImg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/Price-Intelligence-for-Startups.jpg","destWidth":825,"destHeight":510,"sourceBytes":32874,"destBytes":21014,"author":"Denis Kryukov","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/Price-Intelligence-for-Startups-300x185.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx29/cdn60@2020_2/2020/08/23/15-18-10-630_68247b2929fa3059.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598195868945},{"createdTime":"2020-08-23 23:18:00","updatedTime":"2020-08-23 23:18:00","title":"A Look at What’s Fueling Startup Investments in Colombia","link":"https://readwrite.com/?p=164883","description":"<div><a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/02/19/a-look-at-whats-fueling-startup-investments-in-colombia/\" title=\"A Look at What&#8217;s Fueling Startup Investments in Colombia\"><img width=\"300\" height=\"185\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/A-Look-at-Whats-Fueling-Startup-Investments-in-Colombia-300x185.jpeg\" class=\"attachment-medium size-medium wp-post-image\" alt=\"investments in Colombia\" style=\"margin-bottom: 15px;\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/A-Look-at-Whats-Fueling-Startup-Investments-in-Colombia-300x185.jpeg 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/A-Look-at-Whats-Fueling-Startup-Investments-in-Colombia-260x160.jpeg 260w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/A-Look-at-Whats-Fueling-Startup-Investments-in-Colombia.jpeg 825w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px\" /></a></div><p>The Latin American startup scene is attracting more and more attention and investments. In 2018, venture capital investments in Latin America doubled for the second consecutive year, according to LAVCA&#8217;s Annual Review of Tech Investment in Latin America. Looking at the major markets in Latin America in 2018, most show increases in VC investment in keeping with the regional average. These markets have brought us to 2020 &#8212; outpacing them all &#8212; is Colombia. Here&#8217;s a look at what&#8217;s fueling startup investments in Colombia.</p>\n<p>Colombia is <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/11/05/how-to-avoid-being-part-of-90-of-failed-companies/\">not new to the startup scene</a>, but it is beginning to garner increased attention from foreign VCs. Here’s a look at three factors fueling investor interest in Colombia’s technology startups.</p>\n<h2>A growing, increasingly connected consumer base</h2>\n<p>Colombia is an <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2018/07/09/how-latin-america-is-drawing-in-global-tech-giants/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">attractive market for technology companies</a>. In addition to the work done by both private and public entities to foster entrepreneurial development, Colombia has several unique characteristics that give it immense potential for growth and disruptive transformation.</p>\n<h4><b>Market size.</b></h4>\n<p>– Colombia is the 29th biggest country in the world with a population of nearly <a href=\"https://www.worldometers.info/world-population/colombia-population/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">50 million</a>. Since the early 2000s, the Colombian middle class has more than doubled, significantly increasing the consumer potential of the Colombian market.</p>\n<h4><b></b><b>Increased connectivity.</b></h4>\n<p>– Over <a href=\"https://www.gsmaintelligence.com/research/?file=26d3b58c5ef4fa27930c973feff2d9ff&#38;download\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">50%</a> of Colombians are already smartphone users. This number is predicted to reach 75% in the coming years, which, combined with a relatively fast and ubiquitous Internet connection, creates an increasingly large market for technology-based ventures.</p>\n<h4><b>Shift towards online consumption.</b></h4>\n<p>– In addition to a growing connected population, a <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/04/23/changing-e-commerce-landscape-global-trends-for-2019-and-beyond/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">shift in consumer habits</a> is driving eCommerce. The eCommerce industry is growing steadily, with a 24% increase in the number of digital transactions from 2016 to 2017.</p>\n<h4><b>Industry gaps.</b></h4>\n<p>– Colombia has a few industries with massive potential for <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2018/12/04/building-an-iot-ecosystem-that-fuels-business-transformation/\">disruptive transformation</a>, in particular, health and finance. Colombian public healthcare is decentralized with the lowest-earning tier of the population receiving free, government-subsidized services, and the rest of the population receiving health services administered by various private companies. The <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/08/21/3-ways-to-create-cross-functional-data-science-teams/\">data sharing gap</a> that exists between health providers begs for innovative solutions.</p>\n<p>On the financial side, banks are investing heavily in fintech services and pushing the transition toward digital banking. Money transfer services and online bill pay are already available, but, according to the World Bank, only <a href=\"https://globalfindex.worldbank.org/sites/globalfindex/files/chapters/2017%20Findex%20full%20report_chapter2.pdf\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">38%</a> of adults have bank accounts, making this a <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/06/26/why-latin-america-is-ready-for-iot-growth/\">prime market for expansion</a>.</p>\n<h2>A solid foundation of government support</h2>\n<p>Colombia suffered decades of violence, instability, and corruption. However, the 2016 <a href=\"https://www.nytimes.com/2016/09/27/world/americas/colombia-farc-peace-agreement.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Peace Deal with the FARC</a>, among other efforts, changed its international reputation, leading to a 300% increase in foreign visitors since 2006. As part of the national improvement efforts, and in anticipation of this shift in perception and <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/02/25/top-outsourcing-destinations-in-latin-america-for-2019/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">increased foreign interest</a>, the Colombian government laid the groundwork for a <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/08/19/the-evolution-of-startups-in-india-the-story-up-until-now/\">startup-friendly environment </a>years ago.</p>\n<p>Colombia&#8217;s second-largest city, Medellín, is probably best known for this accomplishment, with a reputation for supporting enterprise innovation and a <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/04/08/standardizing-tribal-knowledge-its-time-for-your-company-to-grow-up/\">growing knowledge economy</a>. In 2002, the city established Medellín ACI at (Medillín ACI.org), is the Agency for Investment and Cooperation.</p>\n<h4>Companies promote international relations.</h4>\n<p>The company fosters development by promoting <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/04/23/changing-e-commerce-landscape-global-trends-for-2019-and-beyond/\">strategic international relations</a> and foreign investment in the city. Ruta N.com, a public-joint venture established in 2009, also helped the city earn significant attention by providing landing services, office space, and incubation for startups.</p>\n<h4>The government creates programs to help entrepreneurs.</h4>\n<p>In 2012, the national government created the programs iNNpulsa and apps.co, both <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/01/21/fintech-is-transforming-the-finance-industry/\">promote innovation</a>, business, and <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/06/14/iot-developments-and-its-effects-on-the-job-market/\">technological developments</a> in Colombia by providing funds and <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/03/02/the-real-key-metrics-and-magic-numbers-behind-successful-b2b-sales-outreach/\">coaching programs</a> to promising entrepreneurs.</p>\n<p>Earlier this year, the Colombian government further demonstrated its <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/04/17/top-10-latin-american-iot-startups-to-watch/\">commitment to promoting and funding</a> innovative developments with the creation of the Ministry of Science, Technology, and Innovation, (rcnradio.com).</p>\n<h4>Innovative incubators are being set up by companies and supported by government.</h4>\n<p>In addition to these government programs, there are <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/03/13/nearshoring-basics-for-software-development/\">numerous incubators and accelerators</a> throughout Colombia. Parque del Emprendimiento, Cluster CreaTIC, ParqueSoft, Macondo Lab, Socialatom Group and Creame are a few of the more established organizations. New groups, such as <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/02/06/coding-boot-camps-produce-talent-but-leave-many-on-the-sidelines/\">technology boot camps</a>, and programs are regularly popping up.</p>\n<h2>Increased foreign investment</h2>\n<p>Recent foreign investment is helping to put Colombia in the spotlight. Colombia received <a href=\"https://lavca.org/industry-data/inside-another-record-breaking-year-lavcas-annual-review-of-tech-investment-in-latin-america/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">$334M</a> of investment in 2018, a nearly 5x increase in venture capital from the year before. Most recently, Softbank Group Corp invested $1B in the Colombian unicorn, Rappi, founded by Felipe Villamarin, Sebastian Mejia, and Simon Borrero.</p>\n<p>With over $1.4B in disclosed funding, Rappi is now one of the highest-funded Latin American startups.</p>\n<h4><strong>The investment from Softbank Group Corp is the type of attention that creates a positive cycle.</strong></h4>\n<p>When international accelerators and VCs turn to Colombia, investment amounts increase, leading to more attention, then more funding, and creating a fertile environment for the creation of more startups and more investment opportunities for VCs.</p>\n<p><strong>Many Colombian Startups that have earned recent attention from foreign investors. </strong></p>\n<p><strong>Included here are companies and the</strong><strong> individuals who have brought it all together. These companies and each individual listed here has a personal listing on Crunchbase.</strong></p>\n<h4><a href=\"https://merqueo.com/bogota/domicilios-super-ahorro\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\"><b>Merqueo</b></a></h4>\n<p>– This online supermarket platform founded by <a href=\"https://www.crunchbase.com/person/miguel-mc-allister-2\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Miguel Mc Allister</a> and<a href=\"https://www.crunchbase.com/person/sebastian-noguera-escallon\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\"> Sebastian Noguera Escallón</a> recently joined the Colombian eCommerce scene. They’ve raised $14M from US-based VCs Portland Private Equity and Endeavor.</p>\n<h4><a href=\"https://www.frubana.com/co\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\"><b>Frubana</b></a></h4>\n<p>– Founded by Rappi&#8217;s former Expansion Leader, <a href=\"https://www.crunchbase.com/person/fabian-gomez-gutierrez\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Fabian Gomez Gutierrez</a>, Frubana simplifies the supply chain for the food industry, allowing restaurants to deal directly with producers. In two rounds, they raised $12M from several VC firms, including Y-Combinator and Kairos.</p>\n<h4><a href=\"https://www.kushkipagos.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\"><b>Kushki</b></a></h4>\n<p>– Founded by <a href=\"https://www.crunchbase.com/person/aron-schwarzkopf#section-overview\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Aron Schwarzkopf</a> and <a href=\"https://www.crunchbase.com/person/sebastin-castro#section-overview\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Sebastian Castro</a>, Kushki is improving payment systems in Latin America by facilitating currency conversions and international transfers across the region. Kushki recently raised a Series A round from dev labs and Magma Partners at the end of 2018.</p>\n<h4><a href=\"https://www.truora.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\"><b>Truora</b></a></h4>\n<p>– Founded by <a href=\"https://www.crunchbase.com/person/cesar-pino-80c8\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Cesar Pino</a>, <a href=\"https://www.crunchbase.com/person/daniel-bilbao\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Daniel Bilbao</a>, and <a href=\"https://www.crunchbase.com/person/maite-muniz-telleria\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Maite Muniz Telleria</a> in 2018, Truora is tackling identity theft and fraud in Latin America. Its platform supports over 10,000 checks per hour and was part of the Winter 2019 Y-Combinator class. Though still in early funding stages, Truora left Y-Combinator with regional investors Magma Partners and Kaszek Ventures, and foreign investors Y-Combinator and Accel.</p>\n<h4><a href=\"https://www.addi.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\"><b>ADDI</b></a></h4>\n<p>– <a href=\"https://www.crunchbase.com/person/elmer-ortega\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Elmer Ortega</a>’s Bogotá-based fintech company offers credit and digital financial services and raised $14M this year with lead investor Andreessen Horowitz.</p>\n<h4><a href=\"https://ayendarooms.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\"><b>Ayenda Rooms</b></a></h4>\n<p>– <a href=\"https://www.crunchbase.com/person/andr%C3%A9s-sarrazola\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Andrés Sarrazola</a> founded Ayenda Rooms with the goal of becoming Colombia&#8217;s biggest hotel chain. Ayenda Rooms offers an online reservation platform with a growing number of franchised hotels. The startup recently received a $1.2M investment from SoftBank, and still undisclosed investments from GE32 Capital and Kairos.</p>\n<h4><a href=\"https://omnibnk.com\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\"><b>Omnibnk</b></a></h4>\n<p>– Founded by <a href=\"https://www.crunchbase.com/person/diego-caicedo\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Diego Caicedo</a> and <a href=\"https://www.linkedin.com/in/andres-abumohor-8635361?originalSubdomain=cl\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Andres Abumohor,</a> Omnibnk is one of the first neobanks in Latin America to provide quick loans to SMEs of up to $1M &#8212; based on a company’s electronic invoices. Truly innovative.</p>\n<h4>Conclusion</h4>\n<h3>These Colombian startups received significant investments already in 2020, and it&#8217;s no wonder.</h3>\n<ol>\n<li>With increased government-backed support for investment and innovation.</li>\n<li>A growing and increasingly connected middle-class market.</li>\n<li>Growing investment from foreign VCs.</li>\n</ol>\n<p>Colombia is receiving more and more international attention and is becoming known as one of the hottest countries in Latin America for startups and investment.</p>\n<p><em>Image Source unsplash.com</em></p>\n<p>The post <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/02/19/a-look-at-whats-fueling-startup-investments-in-colombia/\">A Look at What&#8217;s Fueling Startup Investments in Colombia</a> appeared first on <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com\">ReadWrite</a>.</p>\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Wed, 19 Feb 2020 19:00:49 +0000","feedId":271,"bgimg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/A-Look-at-Whats-Fueling-Startup-Investments-in-Colombia.jpeg","linkMd5":"be817b9141756fdd18794aaf02320792","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx29/cdn32@2020_3/2020/08/23/15-18-23-640_d56833f92c132401.webp","metaImg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/A-Look-at-Whats-Fueling-Startup-Investments-in-Colombia.jpeg","destWidth":825,"destHeight":510,"sourceBytes":87731,"destBytes":93808,"author":"Nathan Lustig","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/A-Look-at-Whats-Fueling-Startup-Investments-in-Colombia-300x185.jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx31/cdn11@2020_4/2020/08/23/15-18-18-555_99c7a765e31c285e.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598195880415},{"createdTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:50","updatedTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:50","title":"The Death of Meetings: How New Forms of Collaboration Are Taking Over","link":"https://readwrite.com/?p=175410","description":"<div><a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/08/07/death-of-meetings-how-new-forms-of-collaboration-are-taking-over/\" title=\"The Death of Meetings: How New Forms of Collaboration Are Taking Over\"><img width=\"300\" height=\"200\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/death-of-meetings-300x200.jpg\" class=\"attachment-medium size-medium wp-post-image\" alt=\"\" style=\"margin-bottom: 15px;\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/death-of-meetings-300x200.jpg 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/death-of-meetings-900x600.jpg 900w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/death-of-meetings-240x160.jpg 240w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/death-of-meetings-1536x1025.jpg 1536w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/death-of-meetings.jpg 1920w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px\" /></a></div><p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">If you’ve ever been stuck in a two-hour meeting with nothing to contribute and nothing to learn, you’ve felt the pain of inefficient meetings—and you’ll be happy to hear that these days of </span><a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2010/10/26/businesses-waste-time-scheduling-meetings/\"><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">wasted time</span></a><span style=\"font-weight: 400\"> and mismanaged resources may soon be over. </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">It’s not quite accurate to say that meetings are dead, or even that they’re dying, since even if they decline in public favor for the foreseeable future, they’ll never completely go away. But we are seeing a massive reduction in the number of meetings held, the length of those meetings, and the number of participants included—and public attitudes about meetings are drastically changing. </span></p>\n<p><b>Meetings and Time Waste</b></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Meetings waste time in almost every scenario, for one reason or another, and Americans are starting to wake up to this reality. </span><a href=\"https://www.cnbc.com/2019/11/17/67percent-of-workers-say-spending-too-much-time-in-meetings-distracts-them.html\"><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">More than two-thirds of American workers</span></a><span style=\"font-weight: 400\"> claim that too much time in meetings is distracting, preventing them from accomplishing their core responsibilities. And participants in meetings feel that as much as a </span><a href=\"http://attentiv.com/america-meets-a-lot/\"><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">third of all meeting time is a total waste</span></a><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">, exacerbated by the fact that 63 percent of meetings are held without a pre-planned agenda. </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">This problem of time waste is compounded by several factors. First, the sheer number of meetings held; there are more than 11 million meetings per day, and in many organizations, meetings are held for even the smallest matters. Each meeting includes multiple participants, multiplying the man-hours necessary to carry it out, and in many cases those participants are unnecessary. And of course, extra-long meetings multiply all these factors even further. </span></p>\n<p><a href=\"https://www.readytalk.com/meeting-resources/infographics/true-cost-meetings-infographic\"><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">See this math in action</span></a><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">; if your company has 100 employees making $60,000 per year with 60 meetings per month, the total cost of meetings per year is $2.25 million. Is that really worth the insights you glean from daily updates? </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">For the last several years, executives have been waking up to this reality and curtailing their meeting habits, but an even more powerful force is influencing meeting norms. </span></p>\n<p><b>The Last Nail in the Coffin </b></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">The </span><a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/04/09/digital-marketing-coronavirus/\"><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">COVID-19 pandemic</span></a><span style=\"font-weight: 400\"> forced businesses all over the country to </span><a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/06/25/remote-work-in-the-time-of-covid-19/\"><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">rapidly deploy a remote work strategy</span></a><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">. Initially, most of those businesses attempted to simply copy and paste their traditional work processes into a virtual environment, with minimal changes—for the sake of simplicity, speed, and adherence to tradition. However, this meant dealing with lag, interruptions, limited body language, and excessive participants in video chats. </span></p>\n<p>Furthermore, remote meetings tend to allow for a more lax atmosphere, allowing participants to multi-task (or worse, multi-lax) while other participants take the lead and drive the organization forward.</p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">As more business owners and team leaders are realizing, traditional meetings are borderline untenable in these circumstances, reserved only for very specific types of discussions. And once they realize that meetings can be replaced with better alternatives, there may not be a reason to ever go back—even if they return to the traditional office. </span></p>\n<p><b>New Types of Meetings</b></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">In some ways, meetings are evolving, rather than dying. Increasingly, they’re benefiting from strategies like: </span></p>\n<ul>\n<li style=\"font-weight: 400\"><b>Better proactive planning. </b><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Team leaders must be organized and have a vision if they’re going to hold a successful meeting. That means starting each meeting with a clear agenda and a list of goals to accomplish. </span></li>\n<li style=\"font-weight: 400\"><b>Limited participation.</b><span style=\"font-weight: 400\"> Adding more people to a meeting typically increases its complexity, and multiplies the amount of time it wastes. Accordingly, many teams are transitioning to include fewer participants. </span></li>\n<li style=\"font-weight: 400\"><b>Limited timing and frequency.</b><span style=\"font-weight: 400\"> And in one of the most straightforward changes, meetings are beginning to grow shorter, less frequent and are ultimately becoming </span><a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/06/23/future-of-custom-software-development/\"><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">more customized</span></a><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">.  </span></li>\n</ul>\n<p><b>What Could Replace Meetings? </b></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Meetings are at the core of successful companies. They have been around since time immemorial. And yet, many meetings remain inefficient and time-wasting. At best, meetings need improvement. Any meetings that can’t be truncated or improved must be replaced. But what could replace the interactive potential of a traditional meeting? </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">There are a few potential models: </span></p>\n<ul>\n<li style=\"font-weight: 400\"><b>Trust and autonomy. </b><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">An easy way to eliminate many meetings is to give your employees more trust and autonomy. If they have the power to make their own decisions and accomplish their own goals, they won’t need to check in with a boss twice a day. In many cases, team huddle and daily check-in style meetings can easily be replaced with a <a href=\"https://seo.co/email-marketing/#subject\">simple email with a punchy subject</a> at the beginning (or pointed call to action at the end) of the day.</span></li>\n<li style=\"font-weight: 400\"><b>Chat channels. </b><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Thread-based and group-based instant messaging channels have many advantages over meetings; they’re recorded (so transcripts are permanent), they’re less urgent (and less distracting), and they can occur in the background throughout the day. Businesses are catching onto this; Slack, for example, has </span><a href=\"https://www.statista.com/statistics/652779/worldwide-slack-users-total-vs-paid/\"><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">more than 12 million daily active users</span></a><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">. </span></li>\n<li style=\"font-weight: 400\"><b>Social/blogging hybrids.</b><span style=\"font-weight: 400\"> Some companies are beginning to decrease their reliance on email, meetings, and other forms of traditional office communication in favor of social and </span><a href=\"https://www.podbean.com/media/share/dir-6tkcq-8a7955c?utm_campaign=w_share_ep&#38;utm_medium=dlink&#38;utm_source=w_share\"><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">blog-based communication channels</span></a><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">. For example, Automattic (the parent company of WordPress) is known for pioneering a system of communication that revolves around </span><a href=\"https://wordpress.com/p2/\"><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">signature blogs known as P2</span></a><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">. These allow conversations to occur both publicly and privately, with real-time commentary from coworkers and an intuitive system of organization. </span></li>\n<li><strong>Keep it Short Stupid</strong>. Jeff Bezos of Amazon fame is known for his &#8220;one page&#8221; approach to meetings wherein the organizer or presenter in a meeting is not allowed to present in a slide deck, but must keep the meeting agenda on a single piece of paper.</li>\n</ul>\n<p>Ultimately, the new work from home normal really only works when teams are made up of responsible adults who are able to work autonomously on their own. While this might be true for many workers, the Melissa Meyer approach to location-based working is really to police the shirkers, not just to attempt to create a better working relationship among various coworkers.</p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">In the next several years, you’ll likely start enjoying the benefits of reduced meetings and more efficient forms of communication. And if you’re in charge of organizing meetings for your team, consider jumping on this trend. Now is the perfect time to overhaul your communication strategy, and take advantage of more efficient collaboration channels. </span></p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<p>The post <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/08/07/death-of-meetings-how-new-forms-of-collaboration-are-taking-over/\">The Death of Meetings: How New Forms of Collaboration Are Taking Over</a> appeared first on <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com\">ReadWrite</a>.</p>\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Fri, 07 Aug 2020 15:37:23 work from home and want to make sure we have the best working and living environment for ourselves and family. The latest one I picked up to try for my home was the Okaysou AirMax 8L medical grade air purifier because it noted it was efficient at eliminating pet hair.</p>\n<p>There are so many air filters out there with specific benefits or that fit certain room sizes. Here&#8217;s what I found when I put the Okaysou AirMax 8L to the test.</p>\n<h2>About the Okaysou AirMax 8L</h2>\n<p>The <a href=\"https://www.okaysou.com/collections/home-amp-kitchen/products/okaysou-airmax8l-air-purifier\">Okaysou AirMax 8L</a> is an air purifier that includes a HEPA filter designed to capture and remove 99.97% of the air pollutants from the air around you. It uses two different filters, including the HEPA filter and a carbon filter.</p>\n<p><img class=\"aligncenter wp-image-175652 size-full\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/OkaysouAirMax8LPurifier.jpg\" alt=\"\" width=\"201\" height=\"251\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/OkaysouAirMax8LPurifier.jpg 201w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/OkaysouAirMax8LPurifier-128x160.jpg 128w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 201px) 100vw, 201px\" /></p>\n<h2>Features and Specifications</h2>\n<p>The unit has three fan speeds, a sleep mode, and child-lock function. Other features include a timer function so you can run the unit for one hour, two hours, four hours, or even eight hours. There is an indicator light that also tells you when it&#8217;s time to replace the filters.</p>\n<p>The air purifier is designed to circulate air in a room or area that measures up to 800 square feet. It has a noise level of less than 59 dB.</p>\n<h2>Pros and Cons</h2>\n<p>The pros include a thoughtful design, which includes a handle that makes it easy to move around. It&#8217;s also lightweight so I had no problem picking it up and moving it to a different part of the house.</p>\n<p>I also like how easy it is to get into the unit for filter replacement. The buttons are all easy to understand and use. There is a low-light display, which means it didn&#8217;t create a distraction at night by giving off too much light.</p>\n<p>Finally, it does a phenomenal job of filtering the air because it makes the air smell fresh.</p>\n<p>The cons were that this is the loudest air purifier I&#8217;ve owned. That doesn&#8217;t mean it&#8217;s so loud it&#8217;s distracting, but I do notice it more. It does mean turning up the television louder if it&#8217;s in the same room. Other than that, it is an effective air purifier.</p>\n<p><img class=\"aligncenter wp-image-175651 size-medium\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/OkaysouAirMax8L-300x240.jpg\" alt=\"\" width=\"300\" height=\"240\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/OkaysouAirMax8L-300x240.jpg 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/OkaysouAirMax8L-900x719.jpg 900w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/OkaysouAirMax8L-200x160.jpg 200w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/OkaysouAirMax8L.jpg 1000w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px\" /></p>\n<h2>In the Box</h2>\n<p>The AirMax 8L Air Purifier comes loaded with the two filters so you don&#8217;t have to install these. In the box, you&#8217;ll also find a user manual, product review card, and five-year warranty card. You can use this to register your unit and provide feedback on the air purifier.</p>\n<h2>Where to Buy</h2>\n<p>Priced at a reasonable $118, you can buy the air purifier from the Okaysou website. Other places you can purchase it include Amazon and Walmart.</p>\n<h2>Final Thoughts</h2>\n<p>The Okaysou AirMax 8L did a great job in removing pet hair and dander from the air along with dust and other air pollutants. It is priced fairly for its ability to clean a larger area and does better than so many air purifiers that are at the same price point.</p>\n<p>I would recommend this air purifier but suggest that you keep it for areas where you may not be working or sleeping. For example, we used the air purifier in the bedroom before going to bed and then turned it off so the fan and light wouldn&#8217;t interrupt our sleep.</p>\n<p>But I want fresh air &#8212; so &#8212; I stuck on a slumber mask and opted to sleep in fresh, clean air.</p>\n<p>The post <a rel=\"nofollow\"
