appeared first on <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com\">ReadWrite</a>.</p>\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Thu, 13 Aug 2020 18:01:02 +0000","feedId":271,"bgimg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/OkaysouAirPurifier.jpg","linkMd5":"2915d14f75643367faad7eee504b1452","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx16/cdn83@2020_5/2020/08/23/15-18-25-441_3d974dffbf6bb099.webp","metaImg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/OkaysouAirPurifier.jpg","destWidth":1489,"destHeight":1119,"sourceBytes":190383,"destBytes":95488,"author":"Deanna Ritchie","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/OkaysouAirPurifier-300x225.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx23/cdn56@2020_5/2020/08/23/15-18-16-678_ccff51faa9adda12.webp","https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/OkaysouAirMax8LPurifier.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn52@2020_6/2020/08/23/15-18-12-862_131e7ba1f4047930.webp","https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/OkaysouAirMax8L-300x240.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx32/cdn92@2020_4/2020/08/23/15-18-14-584_60a39d7bb2495e22.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598195871971},{"createdTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:55","updatedTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:55","title":"The Value of AI-Based Visual Inspection in 2020","link":"https://readwrite.com/?p=170087","description":"<div><a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/07/02/the-value-of-ai-based-visual-inspection-in-2020/\" title=\"The Value of AI-Based Visual Inspection in 2020\"><img width=\"300\" height=\"185\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/The-Value-of-AI-Based-Visual-Inspection-in-2020-300x185.jpg\" class=\"attachment-medium size-medium wp-post-image\" alt=\"ai visual inspection\" style=\"margin-bottom: 15px;\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/The-Value-of-AI-Based-Visual-Inspection-in-2020-300x185.jpg 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/The-Value-of-AI-Based-Visual-Inspection-in-2020-260x160.jpg 260w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/The-Value-of-AI-Based-Visual-Inspection-in-2020.jpg 825w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px\" /></a></div><p>For over a decade, manufacturers have turned to automated solutions to improve their bottom line. Automation and <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/02/03/machine-vision-is-key-to-industry-4-0-and-iot/\">machine vision</a> are now being augmented and even replaced by AI. Here is the value of AI-based visual inspection in 2020.</p>\n<h2>Value of AI-Based visual inspection</h2>\n<p>Being replaced by AI is especially true when it comes to visual inspection. The use of AI-based visual inspection technology is transforming manufacturing’s ability to improve business operations.</p>\n<p>AI-based visual inspection relies on two of AI’s main strengths: <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/tag/computer-vision/\">computer vision</a> and <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/03/04/3-areas-of-your-business-where-deep-learning-can-make-a-difference/\">deep learning</a>. Every AI system is built with the core capacity to perceive its environment (computer vision) and act on those perceptions (deep-learning).</p>\n<p>As a result of deep-learning, <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/11/18/ai-is-the-fourth-industrial-revolution-technology/\">AI adapts to a range of environments</a>, making it useful across a multitude of industries. It has unlimited potential and can be developed rapidly to meet a manufacturer&#8217;s needs.</p>\n<h2>Concept of AI-based visual inspection</h2>\n<p>Well-trained human eyes can detect defects. A well-trained AI-based vision system can do the same &#8212; but with greater efficiency. Like a human eye, AI-based vision systems capture an image and send it to a central “brain” for processing.</p>\n<h4>Like a human brain, an AI “brain” makes detailed meaning from the image by contrasting it against its existing knowledge.</h4>\n<p>AI-based vision systems are made of two integrated components. A sensing device acts as an “eye,” while a deep learning algorithm acts as a “brain.” The integrated system successfully mimics the human eye-brain ability to interpret images.</p>\n<p><strong>AI-based vision systems are more efficient than human eyes because the AI “brain” stores greater amounts of information.</strong></p>\n<p>Robust <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/01/29/computing-power-suppliers-are-shifting-gears-for-ai/\">computational power</a> can parse through available data at rapid speeds. The system can classify objects in both photos and videos and perform complex visual perception tasks.</p>\n<p>AI-based vision systems can search images and captions, detect objects, and classify multi-media.</p>\n<p>Thanks to deep learning-based visual processing, AI-based visual inspection systems can <a href=\"https://mobidev.biz/blog/ai-visual-inspection-deep-learning-computer-vision-defect-detection?utm_source=readwrite&#38;utm_medium=visual&#38;utm_campaign=visual\">perceive cosmetic flaws and detect defects</a> across general or conceptual surfaces (mobidev dot biz).</p>\n<h2>Benefits of AI-based visual inspection</h2>\n<h3>1. Fast Implementation</h3>\n<p>Decades-old automated systems depend on defect libraries, lists of exceptions and complicated filters. The time it takes to accrue this information, clean it for accuracy, and re-implement it decreases its efficacy. It also wastes labor.</p>\n<p>AI and deep learning do not require prolonged programming or tediously lengthy algorithms. AI-based visual inspection systems might be constructed by several quality engineers and a dataset of training images. The system learns rapidly and is integrated over several weeks.</p>\n<h3>2. Improved Analytics and Quality Control</h3>\n<p>Manufacturers can use AI to document inspection results and to assess product quality. Some overall process improvement initiative metrics that can be successfully tracked and correlated with concrete vision data include:</p>\n<ul>\n<li>process recipes</li>\n<li>equipment differences</li>\n<li>component suppliers</li>\n<li>factory location</li>\n</ul>\n<p>In addition, inspection images and results can also be tracked and documented. These initiatives prevent future failure, which saves time and additional production costs. Applying deep learning-based machine vision across all initiatives and inspections helps manufacturers recognize and address defects early.</p>\n<h3>3. Labor Costs Reduction</h3>\n<p>AI solutions have higher rates of consistency than most expert human inspectors. Human inspectors must be trained and are only able to maintain a high degree of focus for 15-20 minutes at a time. Labor costs are incurred yearly and staff turn-over is an issue. For these reasons, AI-based vision inspections are more cost-effective than manual labor.</p>\n<h2>Use Cases</h2>\n<p>AI is increasing the <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/03/06/why-automation-is-the-only-path-forward-for-manufacturing/\">competitiveness of manufacturers across every industry</a>. Here are recent use cases from the aviation industry, semi-conductor manufacturing sector, and bio-science.</p>\n<p>Alibaba has risen to meet <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/03/13/ai-moving-into-healthcare-regulatory-challenges-await/\">healthcare challenges</a> created by the coronavirus. Alibaba’s deep-learning-based visual recognition system is capable of detecting the coronavirus in chest CT scans at a 96% accuracy rate. The system accessed 5,000 COVID-19 cases and can provide a diagnosis within 20 seconds. Moreover, the system can differentiate between images of viral pneumonia and images of coronavirus.</p>\n<p>Fujitsu Laboratories implemented an Image Recognition System at Fujitsu&#8217;s Oyama factory. The system ensures that parts are produced at optimal quality levels by supervising the assembly process. The system was so successful that Fujitsu implemented it across the entirety of the company’s production sites.</p>\n<p>Airbus introduced an automated, drone-based aircraft inspection system in 2018. The system has improved the quality of inspections and reduced aircraft downtime.</p>\n<p>GlobalFoundries is a leader in semiconductor manufacturing. The company designed a visual inspection <a href=\"https://cloud.google.com/blog/products/ai-machine-learning/ai-and-machine-learning-improve-manufacturing-visual-inspection-process\">system</a> that detects defects in a scanning electron microscope (SEM) images. The system detects defects in a wafer map which then helps to determine the semiconductor device’s performance.</p>\n<p>The use cases listed above reveal the extent to which <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/04/01/11-artificial-intelligence-trends-every-business-in-2019-must-know/\">AI is capable of automating</a> many aspects of our lives. Although AI vision will never replicate human vision, the technology continues to classify information and <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/03/27/future-of-artificial-intelligence-for-2020/\">advance in ways human eyes and brains cannot</a>. And only humans might consider how to use this technology to get advantages.</p>\n<p>The post <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/07/02/the-value-of-ai-based-visual-inspection-in-2020/\">The Value of AI-Based Visual Inspection in 2020</a> appeared first on <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com\">ReadWrite</a>.</p>\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Fri, 03 Jul 2020 00:23:15 +0000","feedId":271,"bgimg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/The-Value-of-AI-Based-Visual-Inspection-in-2020.jpg","linkMd5":"8d4e502129ff6b497698c649571e3326","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx24/cdn28@2020_1/2020/08/23/15-18-25-878_716161484abf48e3.webp","metaImg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/The-Value-of-AI-Based-Visual-Inspection-in-2020.jpg","destWidth":825,"destHeight":510,"sourceBytes":39802,"destBytes":36516,"author":"Serhii Maksymenko","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/The-Value-of-AI-Based-Visual-Inspection-in-2020-300x185.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx23/cdn88@2020_4/2020/08/23/15-18-11-545_31e7d64025a2fbc9.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598195875033},{"createdTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:59","updatedTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:59","title":"New Privacy and Security Laws of States Explained – How to Get Your Business Ready","link":"https://readwrite.com/?p=166955","description":"<div><a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/03/27/new-privacy-and-security-laws-of-states-explained-how-to-get-your-business-ready/\" title=\"New Privacy and Security Laws of States Explained – How to Get Your Business Ready\"><img width=\"300\" height=\"185\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/w-Privacy-and-Security-Laws-of-States-Explained-300x185.jpg\" class=\"attachment-medium size-medium wp-post-image\" alt=\"security and privacy laws\" style=\"margin-bottom: 15px;\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/w-Privacy-and-Security-Laws-of-States-Explained-300x185.jpg 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/w-Privacy-and-Security-Laws-of-States-Explained-260x160.jpg 260w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/w-Privacy-and-Security-Laws-of-States-Explained.jpg 825w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px\" /></a></div><p>In the United States, from California all the way to Maine, there have been new laws enacted with regards to cybersecurity, privacy, as well as data security and breaches. But is your business prepared? Here are the new privacy and security laws of the states explained and how to get your business ready.</p>\n<p><b>The California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA)</b></p>\n<p>It’s easy to see that federal legislation regarding issues such as security and privacy are always delayed. This time, many states are now pushing through some bills while waiting for federal level legislation.</p>\n<p>Currently sweeping the headlines happens to be the <a href=\"https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/California_Consumer_Privacy_Act\">California Consumer Privacy Act</a> (CCPA) of which its signing took place in June 2018.</p>\n<p>It is believed that its inspiration is gotten from the European Union’s General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), and its objective is to ensure that consumers can regulate the way their data is retrieved and used by companies.</p>\n<p>The bill was set to be fully effective in January 2020.</p>\n<p>Let&#8217;s take more look at some other moves by state legislation regarding issues of privacy and cybersecurity.</p>\n<p><b>Nevada Senate Bill 220 Online Privacy Law</b></p>\n<p>Even if most of the attention was directed towards the CCPA, the <a href=\"https://legiscan.com/NV/bill/SB220/2019\">online privacy regulations of Nevada state</a> signed in May 2019 seems to be harsher.</p>\n<p>This bill is an amendment to the already existing law in the state of Nevada, which stipulates that businesses must give its clients the opportunity to stop their personal data from being sold.</p>\n<p>The bill was set to be fully effective on October 1, 2019. There are no new notice stipulations on the part of web operators. However, they are required to release some privacy policy info to the public. Most of that has to do with the information collected and how that data is distributed or shared.</p>\n<p>Violating the regulations will see defaulters penalized as much as $5000 for every violation. There is also the possibility of injunctions being incurred.</p>\n<p><b>Maine Act to Protect the Privacy of Online Consumer Information</b></p>\n<p>This <a href=\"http://www.mainelegislature.org/legis/bills/getPDF.asp?paper=SP0275&#38;item=1&#38;snum=129\">bill</a> was signed into law in June 2019 as a way of protecting consumer information in virtual space, and it was set to be fully effective in July 2020.</p>\n<p>Companies that provide broadband internet services are not allowed to use, disclose, sell, or allow the personal data of consumers to be accessed without the permission of the consumer.</p>\n<p>There are just a few exceptions. Providers of broadband internet are also not allowed to deny their services to customers or victimize customers by making them pay more simply because of a denied permission.</p>\n<p><b>Other Laws have been Enacted</b></p>\n<p>In the same vein, other laws that have to do with <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/02/25/iot-can-put-your-data-at-risk-heres-how/\">cyber and data security</a> have been enacted across other States which include New York, Massachusetts, New Jersey, Maryland, Oregon, Texas, and Washington.</p>\n<p><b>What this Means for Your Business</b></p>\n<p>Although it seems like there is some time to spare pending the full activation of these regulations, they are coming! It would be wrong for you to wait until they are here before taking action.</p>\n<p>It is essential that you begin now to analyze your security levels, not only with respect to how you can respond to incidents or <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/02/03/tackling-the-challenge-of-iot-software-updates/\">how many patches you&#8217;ve got installed</a>. Businesses must carry out security analysis based on processes dedicated to ensuring that vulnerabilities with respect to privacy and cybersecurity are avoided.</p>\n<p>What this implies is that time will prove to be a vital element in keeping data secure. Measurements of security levels must be carried out by taking into consideration the amount of time dedicated to carrying out software tests, as well as the amount of time used in the maintenance of deployed software.</p>\n<p><b>How to Ensure that Your Business is Ready</b></p>\n<p>If your company is involved in the business of software creation or distribution, here are two key strategies that can help you prepare your business for the future &#8211;</p>\n<p><b>1. Concentrate effort on security processes</b></p>\n<p>When designing and deploying software, efforts should be concentrated on incorporating security processes early enough and regularly where possible.</p>\n<p>A wide range of techniques can be used to do this. So many software developers are already threading on this path through the insertion of security personnel once the process starts.</p>\n<p>If your business is involved in software buying, consistently monitor attack surfaces, and make sure that you&#8217;ve got a team that constantly probes your networks.</p>\n<p><b>2. Maintain a balance between available resources and data to be protected</b></p>\n<p>Companies must ensure that there is a connection between the resources invested in security and privacy, and how complex and voluminous the code to be protected is.</p>\n<p>With the growth in the code of software or with expansions in user bases, it is imperative that firms multiply every effort invested to ensure that their users are secured and that their privacy is protected.</p>\n<p><b>The Way Forward for Businesses</b></p>\n<p>Regardless of the processes you choose to adopt, your company needs to show that it is a proactive player when it comes to <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/11/14/a-look-at-how-convenience-is-driving-connected-devices/\">controlling security and privacy</a>. It should be treated as a core necessity and not a process that comes up as an afterthought.</p>\n<p>This means that your company needs to carry out and ensure the <a href=\"https://www.indusface.com/blog/8-cybersecurity-kpis-track/\">tracking of valuable resources</a> as well as time expended in software tests and security processes.</p>\n<p>It’s important to secure the entire company network. Securing the company network can be done by <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2011/07/30/a-review-of-browser-anti-phish/\">conducting regular security awareness</a> training for the employees and also by ensuring every <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/02/07/how-to-avoid-becoming-the-next-victim-of-a-data-breach/\">employee is well-equipped</a> with the best security tools. That way, you do not leave a footprint that can be traced back to you.</p>\n<p>As we invest more and more of <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/01/24/cybersecurity-best-practices-7-ways-to-secure-your-data-in-2020/\">our time utilizing systems</a> that are based on software, we all must come together to promote the security of these systems.</p>\n<p>That way, there will be dedicated personnel investing time and valuable resources to <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/02/06/its-time-to-truly-consider-the-privacy-implications-of-iot/\">keep software safe</a> at all times.</p>\n<p>The post <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/03/27/new-privacy-and-security-laws-of-states-explained-how-to-get-your-business-ready/\">New Privacy and Security Laws of States Explained – How to Get Your Business Ready</a> appeared first on <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com\">ReadWrite</a>.</p>\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Fri, 27 Mar 2020 18:00:25 +0000","feedId":271,"bgimg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/w-Privacy-and-Security-Laws-of-States-Explained.jpg","linkMd5":"4e9542c43914780f47dbad31cbe90822","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn7@2020_3/2020/08/23/15-18-09-857_1e694ee254697343.webp","metaImg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/w-Privacy-and-Security-Laws-of-States-Explained.jpg","destWidth":825,"destHeight":510,"sourceBytes":38019,"destBytes":25420,"author":"Joseph Chukwube","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/w-Privacy-and-Security-Laws-of-States-Explained-300x185.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx19/cdn75@2020_2/2020/08/23/15-18-11-338_415fa1aefb2c41fe.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598195879096},{"createdTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:52","updatedTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:52","title":"How Face AR Brings Confidence to Video Conferencing","link":"https://readwrite.com/?p=172261","description":"<div><a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/07/16/how-face-ar-brings-confidence-to-video-conferencing/\" title=\"How Face AR Brings Confidence to Video Conferencing\"><img width=\"300\" height=\"185\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/How-Face-AR-Brings-Confidence-to-Video-Conferencing-1-300x185.jpeg\" class=\"attachment-medium size-medium wp-post-image\" alt=\"face ar\" style=\"margin-bottom: 15px;\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/How-Face-AR-Brings-Confidence-to-Video-Conferencing-1-300x185.jpeg 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/How-Face-AR-Brings-Confidence-to-Video-Conferencing-1-260x160.jpeg 260w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/How-Face-AR-Brings-Confidence-to-Video-Conferencing-1.jpeg 825w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px\" /></a></div><p>We’re all different and we’re all human beings, individuals locked in a body. The only way we can understand each other is by communicating. If only it were that simple. It’s hard enough in real life, but even more difficult with digital communication, especially the <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/07/03/8-tech-trends-to-watch-out-for-in-2019/\">near-ubiquitous video conferencing</a>. Face AR technology can help us.</p>\n<p>We struggle to work out whether we trust someone when we’ve met them a few minutes earlier on a screen. We wonder whether the person enthusiastically talking to the camera thousands of miles away is pitching an idea they know very well is utter rubbish. Whether their poor performance in a job interview is a result of nerves. Whether our view of them and what they say is clouded by our deep prejudices.</p>\n<p>There is fear and embarrassment when<a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/06/09/5-post-pandemic-changes-to-expect-in-the-workplace/\"> we turn on video conferencing</a>. Trust and empathy are harder to achieve. What is true; what is a lie? These contradictions make video conferencing an awkward chore rather than a useful tool to do business and hire talent. Yet video is essential to modern business when companies are spread over the globe.</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_172266\" aria-describedby=\"caption-attachment-172266\" style=\"width: 714px\" class=\"wp-caption aligncenter\"><a href=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/pexels-photo-3762940.jpeg\"><img class=\"wp-image-172266\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/pexels-photo-3762940-900x600.jpeg\" alt=\"Feeling Confident During Your Video Calls With Face AR Technology.\" width=\"714\" height=\"476\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/pexels-photo-3762940-900x600.jpeg 900w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/pexels-photo-3762940-300x200.jpeg 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/pexels-photo-3762940-240x160.jpeg 240w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/pexels-photo-3762940-1536x1024.jpeg 1536w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/pexels-photo-3762940.jpeg 1920w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 714px) 100vw, 714px\" /></a><figcaption id=\"caption-attachment-172266\" class=\"wp-caption-text\">Feeling Confident During Your Video Calls With Face AR Technology. <em>Image source: pexels.com</em></figcaption></figure></p>\n<p>Pressure on time, budgets and the planet mean traveling is harder to justify. That means making decisions, planning strategy, pitching for business, and hiring staff has to be done remotely. And it is not working.</p>\n<p>That, I believe, is about to change. <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/tag/augmented-reality/\">Augmented Reality</a> (AR) may well provide the answers. But beware. In the future, you will probably get hired through AR. You can also get fired by it.</p>\n<h2><b>Never ready for our close-up</b></h2>\n<p>With all the pressure described above, it’s hardly surprising that the seemingly innocuous sentence, “So shall we switch video conferencing on?” makes even the most hard-bitten executives wince.</p>\n<p>For all of us, bar the least self-aware and the most annoyingly attractive, audio-only seems the sensible solution for long-distance conferencing.</p>\n<p>But why are we coy about video calls? The answer is a bitter experience. First, the cameras present us in harsh, bright light, at unusual angles, blown up on a PC screen.</p>\n<p>Second, people can see the background &#8212; not good if you haven&#8217;t tidied your desk/home office/spare bedroom. Not to mention children, cats and dogs stumbling into view.</p>\n<p>We might have chuckled at the plight of Professor Robert Kelly, whose BBC interview was famously interrupted by an inquisitive toddler, but what made it car-crash viewing was knowing how easily a similar calamity could happen to us.</p>\n<p>Concerns about <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/03/23/live-long-and-prosper-tech-can-ensure-we-do/\">how we present ourselves</a> make us so nervous that we don&#8217;t articulate our thoughts as fluently and accurately as we might. It’s hard enough if you have a job with the company. What if this is your job interview? Multinationals hire around the world and applicants can expect to be interviewed by people in multiple international locations.</p>\n<h2><b>Looking good for the 9 am thanks to Face AR</b></h2>\n<p>Banuba labs, the company of which I am a Managing Director, has devoted much research to solving these problems. And they are eminently fixable. For most people, the key issue is controlled. If they can present themselves digitally in <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/03/26/the-modern-workplace-demands-better-visibility/\">the way they want to be perceived</a>, rather than be a slave to the idiosyncrasies of the camera, they will be relaxed and engaging.</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_172264\" aria-describedby=\"caption-attachment-172264\" style=\"width: 714px\" class=\"wp-caption aligncenter\"><a href=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/Looking_good_in_front_of_the_camera.jpeg\"><img class=\"wp-image-172264\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/Looking_good_in_front_of_the_camera-900x600.jpeg\" alt=\"Looking_good_in_front_of_the_camera\" width=\"714\" height=\"476\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/Looking_good_in_front_of_the_camera-900x600.jpeg 900w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/Looking_good_in_front_of_the_camera-300x200.jpeg 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/Looking_good_in_front_of_the_camera-240x160.jpeg 240w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/Looking_good_in_front_of_the_camera-1536x1024.jpeg 1536w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/Looking_good_in_front_of_the_camera.jpeg 1920w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 714px) 100vw, 714px\" /></a><figcaption id=\"caption-attachment-172264\" class=\"wp-caption-text\">Looking good in front of the camera. Image source: pexels.com</figcaption></figure></p>\n<p>Here is where Face AR, an augmented-reality technology that enables its users to finesse their image via a camera, can prove to be a lifesaver. Video Face Beautification technology can tweak video-conference participants’ images in sophisticated ways.</p>\n<p>On a basic level, this can be by adjusting the lighting and slight face enhancements. It is useful for everyone. From people who need to make video calls but don’t have the time to apply make-up, to those of us who just want a shinier, smarter version of ourselves.</p>\n<p>As for the background of your room – by using video background changer technology you can now easily hide it for privacy purposes or change it for entertainment.</p>\n<h2><b>Make it avatar to avatar with Face AR</b></h2>\n<p>If you are still not convinced, then how about replicating yourself in an avatar? You can talk to an avatar (who is a real person) and be an avatar yourself, and feel both comfortable and human.</p>\n<p>What about the customary handshakes that open and close<a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2018/02/27/modern-day-sales/\"> all business conversations or interviews</a>? AR representations of people’s tracked hands could act as a personal way to make first impressions or end on a high after a lengthy discussion. Even if the technology isn’t quite there to feel someone’s touch via this type of software, it will surely function as a good icebreaker before commencing a conversation.</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_172267\" aria-describedby=\"caption-attachment-172267\" style=\"width: 271px\" class=\"wp-caption aligncenter\"><a href=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/face_ar_avatar.gif\"><img class=\"wp-image-172267\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/face_ar_avatar-198x300.gif\" alt=\"Creating your own avatar with Face AR.\" width=\"271\" height=\"411\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/face_ar_avatar-198x300.gif 198w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/face_ar_avatar-106x160.gif 106w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 271px) 100vw, 271px\" /></a><figcaption id=\"caption-attachment-172267\" class=\"wp-caption-text\">Creating your avatar with Face AR. Image source: banuba.com</figcaption></figure></p>\n<h2><b>Pity the poor job applicant</b></h2>\n<p>The fear and awkwardness engendered by the current generation of video conferencing are bad enough for staff, but it is much worse for job applicants. Even the greatest technology companies admit they have hiring problems.</p>\n<p>Google has made huge efforts to change its staff demographics, but the numbers remain steadfastly in favor of Caucasian men, with nearly 70 percent male and 53 percent white, according to its 2018 diversity report. One Google staffer notoriously claimed in an internal memo that the lack of female engineers was down to biological differences rather than discrimination.</p>\n<p>Google is not alone. If we are honest, we would all admit that we tend to hire in our image. We find it easier to empathize with people like us. We also tend to hire people who are outgoing, confident and speak well. Clever introverts miss out.</p>\n<p>Again, Face AR has a solution. And it is one that is not possible with face-to-face interviews. Face AR can remove or disguise all background information. That could include race, age, gender, voice, general facial expression and nervous ticks. It would truly be a blind interview.</p>\n<p>Only then would it be possible to hire purely based on talent, imagination, intelligence and character. It might sound an extreme approach, but it is clear that diversity policies are failing to change the demographics of our great companies.</p>\n<p>If brands are to be truly representative of their <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/02/16/8-best-digital-marketing-strategies-small-businesses-should-implement/\">global audiences</a>, then they must start again. Technology makes that possible.</p>\n<p>So you really can be hired by augmented reality. But get it wrong and you could be fired by augmented reality, too.</p>\n<p>The post <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/07/16/how-face-ar-brings-confidence-to-video-conferencing/\">How Face AR Brings Confidence to Video Conferencing</a> appeared first on <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com\">ReadWrite</a>.</p>\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Thu, 16 Jul 2020 18:01:08 +0000","feedId":271,"bgimg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/How-Face-AR-Brings-Confidence-to-Video-Conferencing-1.jpeg","linkMd5":"60ed08339fe2b495954a6ce31a9c1048","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn44@2020_5/2020/08/23/15-18-19-514_52179433ca98b853.webp","metaImg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/How-Face-AR-Brings-Confidence-to-Video-Conferencing-1.jpeg","destWidth":825,"destHeight":510,"sourceBytes":59574,"destBytes":50474,"author":"Vadim now make it easy to find something unique to thank a client or colleague as well as recognize a talented individual on your team. One gift company that is attracting more attention is Giftsuite for its uniquely curated and themed gift boxes.</p>\n<p>To introduce the company, I want to share one of its exclusive special edition boxes with you.</p>\n<h2>About GiftSuite</h2>\n<p>GiftSuite is a minority/Black-owned, female-led, and LGBTQIA-friendly company that was launched to help support similar socially conscious small businesses. The gift boxes focus on items that reflect what&#8217;s on-trend or even ahead of the curve.</p>\n<p>The companies featured in the curated boxes are considered tech-forward and socially conscious. The GiftSuite team spends time doing comprehensive research to identify start-ups, small businesses, and artisans that have the best products.</p>\n<p><img class=\"aligncenter wp-image-173593\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/Screen-Shot-2020-06-29-at-12.12.51-PM-300x260.png\" alt=\"\" width=\"600\" height=\"520\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/Screen-Shot-2020-06-29-at-12.12.51-PM-300x260.png 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/Screen-Shot-2020-06-29-at-12.12.51-PM-830x719.png 830w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/Screen-Shot-2020-06-29-at-12.12.51-PM-185x160.png 185w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/Screen-Shot-2020-06-29-at-12.12.51-PM.png 1062w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 600px) 100vw, 600px\" /></p>\n<h2>How it Works</h2>\n<p>It&#8217;s an easy process to order and personalize your gift box. First, you select the GiftSuite Box you want to get. Then, you upload your company logo (extra charge), which will get added to a gift tag or card (extra charge). You can include a personal message as well as choose the shipping date. The box comes with a complimentary ribbon.</p>\n<p>The company also makes it simple if you want to order more than one gift box during the same order, allowing you to include multiple messages, shipping dates, and shipping addresses. The shipping cost for domestic delivery only is a flat $10 per gift box. The company does not accept returns due to the customization of each gift box.</p>\n<h2>Gift Collections</h2>\n<p>Prices range from $40 to upwards of hundreds of dollars based on the gift collection you select and how you personalize it. The signature gift collection features kids&#8217; themes as well as gift boxes made for returning to work, working from home, taking a coffee break, and more.</p>\n<h2 class=\"product-single__title\">The Limited Edition Inner Calm Box</h2>\n<div>\n<p class=\"product-single__price product-single__price-\"><span class=\"visually-hidden\">One of their most luxurious options is their <a href=\"https://giftsuite.com/products/exercise-your-inner-calm-limited-special-edition-box?_pos=2&#38;_sid=3d31f20e7&#38;_ss=r\">Inner Calm Box</a>. It uses BioSelf technology and sits on your chest for 10 minutes. During that time, it plays soothing music from the Sensate mobile app to relax and unwind.</p>\n<p>Beyond the tech gift, there are many delicious gifts designed with health in mind. Priced at $164.50, it includes three products from Shiftcam (pro-wide-angle lens, portable tripod and selfie stick, and universal adapter).</p>\n<p><b></b><span
