https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/Absolutely-Embrace-Social-Media-Marketing.jpg 1280w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px\" /></a></div><p>Are you technologically challenged? In a world of rapid change where social media, online platforms, and virtual reality are transforming the very essence of civilization; any person or business falling short of the requirements to survive in the digital age is basically technologically challenged. But there is hope. Here are five reasons why you should absolutely embrace social media marketing.</p>\n<h3><strong>Be a notable landmark in the digital world</strong></h3>\n<p>In 2013, “selfie” was nominated by Oxford Dictionaries as the word of the year. What others perceived as the mere initiation of a technologically savvy term into the mainstream discourse soon became more than just a trend.</p>\n<p>The &#8220;selfie&#8221; set precedence to the modern world’s increasing dependence on the internet and the variety of tools to access its power.</p>\n<p>The simple selfie event is a milestone in the history of digital evolution and how it has revolutionized the very language of how we think, act and connect. The social media buzzword took center-stage in the lexicon of modern humanity. The selfie and what resulted from it relayed the impact of social media and the rising importance of technology in our day to day lives.</p>\n<p><strong>Few have been able to reap the benefits of this game-changer and many refuse to accept the law of the digital jungle. </strong></p>\n<p>Businesses delaying the integration of <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/10/18/how-libra-will-change-social-media-marketing/\">social media marketing</a> to their present strategy are incurring huge losses. What’s more, the tendency to neglect upgrading existent business plans with the latest digital marketing trends can also impede your business success.</p>\n<p>The survival of any business in modern times is largely dependent on how they overcome old prejudices and attain healthy adaptability to technological change.</p>\n<p>If you find it hard to accept the changes in thinking and <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/06/19/how-technology-plays-a-vital-role-in-small-business-growth/\">conducting business</a> that has been wrought by social media &#8212; then it is high time you modify your thinking and transform your business plans to achieve optimum benefits.</p>\n<p>Here’s a list of 5 important reasons why you should definitely embrace social media marketing:</p>\n<h3><strong>1)    </strong><strong>Promote Your Brand</strong></h3>\n<p>Social media is the best place to grow your brand. Your main objective should be to put your <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/07/05/7-content-marketing-trends-to-watch-out-for-in-2020/\">brand out there and promote it</a> as well as you can.</p>\n<p>Start with a plan, research your market, and wisely put up your content on LinkedIn, Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, etc.</p>\n<p>Your clients are spending quality time on the internet and social media, surfing for things they like or are interested in. Having your brand present in these spaces gives you valuable visibility.</p>\n<p>With the advent of modern technology, the masses have started relying on social media for more and more information. Today everything from what the <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/04/23/changing-e-commerce-landscape-global-trends-for-2019-and-beyond/\">latest trends in fashion</a> are, to which café is nearest to your location can be found with a few clicks on your phone.</p>\n<p>Not having a social media presence can prove lethal for your brand value and push you to obscurity. When people are following you on social media and engaging with your content, it ultimately boosts your brand awareness and gives you the ability to focus on other aspects of your business.</p>\n<h3><strong>2)    </strong><strong>Enhance Lead Generation</strong></h3>\n<p>The main target of any business is to <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2018/07/22/how-crm-software-generates-leads-which-converts/\">generate as many leads as possible</a>. Marketers have been proclaiming the importance of social media marketing for some time now and have actually ranked it as the most effective tactic used for improving lead generation.</p>\n<p>Social media is the apex method when it comes to interacting with brands and researching new products or services for those countless people who spend their time on the internet. The simple trick to get more leads is to establish a social media presence and then continue to nurture your marketing strategy with only a little effort.</p>\n<p>Do not forget to <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/02/05/optimize-marketing-strategy-for-cross-channel-conversions/\">optimize your profile</a>, create user-friendly and personalized content and most importantly build great offers and incentives to convert those leads.</p>\n<p>Social media is one of the defining factors in how people purchase products. It is extremely difficult to achieve maximum lead generation by ignoring the benefits of social media.</p>\n<p>Today, when more than 4.5 billion people are using the internet at the start of this year, it will definitely determine the success of your brand’s marketing strategy.</p>\n<h3><strong>3)    </strong><strong>Build Community Relationships</strong></h3>\n<p><a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/01/31/customer-loyalty-is-key-heres-how-to-make-it-happen/\">Customer loyalty</a> is the key to the success of any business. With social media, businesses are able to speak directly to their customers and connect on an intimate level. When a business is able to engage with its customers in a constructive manner, ensuring better services and products becomes an easy task.</p>\n<p>The best aspect of communicating through social media is the plethora of creative methods one can use to have a conversation or other forms of interaction. From conducting contests to stream live videos, sharing stories, informing updates, and much more.</p>\n<p>Social media is where a marketer can let her imagination run wild.</p>\n<p>However, it is important to keep in mind internet protocols and analyze the kind of reaction you get from your audience. By closely studying audience reaction, set up a channel of personalized communication through a variety of social media handles for your products and services.</p>\n<p>Businesses should also utilize the ability to respond as soon as possible whenever their customers search for necessary information. With this, maximizing the satisfaction of customers and addressing their grievances becomes more efficient.</p>\n<p>The satisfied customer will ultimately help improve the loyalty of your customers exponentially.</p>\n<p>Traditional mass media is slowly becoming less relevant with every passing day. To have a personal one to one engagement with customers is nearly impossible to hold, using the old formats of business communication.</p>\n<p>Social media fills this gap in the market by creating a platform for businesses to build communities around their brands using the latest technology and digital innovation.</p>\n<h3><strong>4)    </strong><strong>Promote Multi-channel Campaigns</strong></h3>\n<p>Businesses these days have the opportunity to tap into a generation of shoppers, who are consuming quality content through multiple platforms. Social media has enabled consumers to effortlessly move quickly between channels.</p>\n<p>Your customers can roam freely from websites to social media, from email or messenger, and retrace their steps back to social media again. Every channel becomes a host to whatever campaign you run. In other words, for the same amount of effort you put on every campaign, you can get double, triple, or manifold profits.</p>\n<p>Be sure to <a href=\"https://www.digitalpolo.com/can-your-facebook-cover-photo-increase-your-sales/\">make your social media marketing strategy more powerful</a> by making multi-channel marketing an integrated part of your business initiatives and strategy. Using these cutting-edge tricks, <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/07/21/how-can-publishers-grow-traffic-after-the-latest-google-update/\">you can boost website traffic<strong>, </strong></a>by luring inbound traffic to your site.</p>\n<p>Each and every social media handle is that you have is a potential key to unlock your website. Each post is a new door to provide content. Therefore, show visitors and followers why they should visit your website through social media marketing.</p>\n<h3><strong>5)    </strong><strong>Nurture Your Networks</strong></h3>\n<p>A research conducted by Crowdtap on 3,000 people illustrates that 64% of those surveyed use social media to find ideas and inspiration for shopping. Look around yourself and examine the number of people relying on online shopping through social media. You will definitely see a rise in the numbers that have kept on increasing in the last decade and reached its peak this year.</p>\n<p>You already recognize social media as an impactful marketing tool on its own. All these benefits are additionally complimented by social media direct messages. They personally support and reinforce your branding on many channels simultaneously, by providing you with the opportunity to reach your audience at any time and any place.</p>\n<p>Stringent <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/05/02/how-to-turn-customer-satisfaction-survey-results-into-action/\">focus on customer feedback</a> is a must-have to succeed in any business; the same is applicable to social media marketing. Traditional methods of networking and feedback procedure are only <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/09/20/how-to-meet-demands-socially-conscious-consumers/\">enhanced by social medi</a>a.</p>\n<p>The ideal deal for community management is organic campaigning. However, paid campaigns can also be used for that added extra audience reach. Use customer data generated by all the active users on social media and engage with your followers.</p>\n<p>When you engage with your followers, you can learn more about who is your target your customers, and reach out to them to know more about each other.</p>\n<p>You will also gain insight into what they like to spend their time on and what interests them. Don&#8217;t forget to keep <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/06/24/5-product-discovery-tips-for-building-solutions-customers-will-buy/\">close eyes on your competitors</a> and industry peers. What your competitors are doing can dramatically improve the effectiveness of your content, advertising, and messaging. <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/05/20/complete-guide-to-influencer-marketing-in-2020/\">Copy or improve upon what they are doing</a>.</p>\n<h2><strong>Social Media Marketing is a no-brainer</strong></h2>\n<p>Staying aloof from the wonders of technology and focusing only on its ill-effects will get you nowhere.</p>\n<p>With every passing day, your business will find it hard to survive in this highly competitive world, where social media presence is the new currency. Those who are slow in the uptake to embrace technology in business continue to suffer. T</p>\n<p>o thrive in this digital era it&#8217;s imperative that you utilize <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/05/28/how-to-tap-into-the-power-of-organic-marketing/\">the power of social media marketing</a>.</p>\n<p>In order to keep up with the changing world, stop being technologically challenged and proactively enrich your business commitments with a seamless social media strategy</p>\n<p>Learn as much as you can about<a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/07/25/how-to-turn-your-sales-to-absolutely-what-you-want/\"> social media management and advertisement</a> and keep up with modern times.</p>\n<p><em>Image Credit: Andrea Piacquadio; Pexels</em></p>\n<p>The post <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/07/29/5-reasons-why-you-should-absolutely-embrace-social-media-marketing/\">5 Reasons Why You Should Absolutely Embrace Social Media Marketing</a> appeared first on <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com\">ReadWrite</a>.</p>\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Wed, 29 Jul 2020 15:00:53 +0000","feedId":271,"bgimg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/Absolutely-Embrace-Social-Media-Marketing.jpg","linkMd5":"c7a7ec150dccbd4609dcb4d5d73bca7f","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx23/cdn72@2020_5/2020/08/23/15-18-26-064_dbcd17ca2470854d.webp","metaImg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/Absolutely-Embrace-Social-Media-Marketing.jpg","destWidth":1280,"destHeight":959,"sourceBytes":153431,"destBytes":75736,"author":"Aditya Kathotia","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/Absolutely-Embrace-Social-Media-Marketing-300x225.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx1/cdn75@2020_3/2020/08/23/15-18-21-457_54c7185da1e096c6.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598195871120},{"createdTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:55","updatedTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:55","title":"Real Estate Tech that Will Endure in a Post COVID World","link":"https://readwrite.com/?p=172042","description":"<div><a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/06/05/real-estate-tech-that-will-endure-in-a-post-covid-world/\" title=\"Real Estate Tech that Will Endure in a Post COVID World\"><img width=\"300\" height=\"185\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Real-Estate-Tech-that-Will-Endure-in-a-Post-COVID-World-300x185.jpg\" class=\"attachment-medium size-medium wp-post-image\" alt=\"real estate tech\" style=\"margin-bottom: 15px;\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Real-Estate-Tech-that-Will-Endure-in-a-Post-COVID-World-300x185.jpg 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Real-Estate-Tech-that-Will-Endure-in-a-Post-COVID-World-260x160.jpg 260w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Real-Estate-Tech-that-Will-Endure-in-a-Post-COVID-World.jpg 825w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px\" /></a></div><p><span style=\"font-weight: 400;\">The work of real estate agents has changed significantly in recent years as a <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/03/06/real-estate-vs-stocks-which-has-a-better-return/\">result of new technologies.</a> Many home buyers now start their search online, and new tools help buyers and agents connect and streamline the buying process. </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400;\">With the arrival of Covid-19, the need to employ real estate tech is even greater. Social distancing and shelter-at-home policies are in place in over 40 states, and businesses need to go digital to survive. </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400;\">As agents look to real estate tech to keep them in business during the pandemic, many are adjusting their processes and implementing new tools. Making changes such as this signifies a shift in the real estate industry towards the digital sphere that will remain even after Covid-19 is no longer a threat. </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400;\">Here’s a look at how real estate tech can help agents increase their sales now and post-COVID. </span></p>\n<h2><span style=\"font-weight: 400;\">Organize communications<br />\n</span></h2>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400;\">In response to social distancing requirements, agents have been forced to rely exclusively on digital communication tools to connect with their clients. One great way to increase client touchpoints and help generate leads is to use <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/05/21/prodigious-customer-service-live-chat-vs-chatbots/\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">chatbots.</a> </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400;\">Chatbots are available 24/7, opening up communications with clients beyond the hours that an agent can work. They can answer straightforward questions and provide information like square footage or the number of bedrooms in a listed property. </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400;\">When clients have this information ahead of time, agents can jump straight into more complex questions and nuanced requests, thus streamlining the buying process. </span><span style=\"font-weight: 400;\"> </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400;\"><strong>Many agents are also using tools to manage properties, consolidate client communications, schedule meetings, and share information.</strong> </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400;\">Tools like BackAgent, for example, centralizes team communications into one place to help manage transactions and keep everyone on the same page. </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400;\">Skyslope is a document management app that creates a digital log of all communications between agents and clients. All of these apps are a necessity now. But continuing to store, track, and analyze interactions using tools like these will help agents better inform clients and fast track their selling timeline after COVID. </span></p>\n<h2><span style=\"font-weight: 400;\">Automate homes to minimize social contact</span></h2>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400;\">In some places, in-person showings are still permitted, and many buyers want to see a property before purchasing it. For agents holding in-person walk-throughs, it is important to take safety precautions. </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400;\">One way to minimize social contact is to use a <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/05/06/non-device-industries-that-are-going-to-be-ruled-by-iot/\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">smart lock system</a> to allow clients to see a property without an agent present. Companies like Sentrilock and Prempoint offer networked smart locks that can be opened using Bluetooth. </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400;\">Using smart lock systems, agents can create one-day codes, track entries and exits, and define “open house” times to control access. </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400;\">These systems can increase the number of possible showings and add value to the house, making them a worthwhile investment now and in the future. </span></p>\n<h2><span style=\"font-weight: 400;\">Virtually show properties</span></h2>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400;\">Many agents are holding open houses and walkthroughs <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/05/07/this-real-estate-brokerage-is-changing-its-industry-heres-what-your-business-can-learn-from-it/\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">virtually</a>, in compliance with local social distancing and shelter-at-home measures. <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2018/05/24/will-artificial-intelligence-ai-replace-real-estate-agents/\">Virtual reality tools</a> like EyeSpy360 allows agents to create free virtual tours for a full understanding of the property. Using virtual reality, agents can even show properties that aren’t finished with construction yet. </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400;\">The SmarterListings platform offers an AI-powered guide that stands in for the agent, taking clients on a virtual tour of the property, pointing out key features, and recording questions and commentary. Using SmarterListings, agents can increase the number of showings and follow up with clients after the walkthrough for the next steps. </span></p>\n<h2><span style=\"font-weight: 400;\">Generate leads</span></h2>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400;\">With so many people stuck at home, time spent on social media has increased by </span><a href=\"https://www.socialmediatoday.com/news/people-are-spending-20-more-time-in-apps-during-the-covid-19-lockdowns-re/575403/\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\"><span style=\"font-weight: 400;\">20%</span></a><span style=\"font-weight: 400;\">. Marketing and <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/04/20/4-technology-trends-shaping-property-portals/\">advertising tools</a> can help agents get in front of their target audience and generate more leads. </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400;\">CRMs</span><span style=\"font-weight: 400;\">, for example, gathers contact <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/08/08/the-connected-life-the-fabulous-and-fantastical-era-of-iot/\">information and track activity</a> to <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/04/17/12-best-sales-engagement-solutions-for-2020/\">provide agents with lead insights</a>. By automating tasks like tracking and scheduling follow-ups, agents have more time to cultivate relationships with potential clients. Data insights also help agents understand the buyer journey and lead profiles so they can improve their processes and better serve their clients. </span></p>\n<h2><span style=\"font-weight: 400;\">Process deals online </span></h2>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400;\">Whether working in person or online, <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/03/27/new-privacy-and-security-laws-of-states-explained-how-to-get-your-business-ready/\">privacy is essential</a> when handling contracts and payments. It is vital that agents use tools with the appropriate encryption and security measures in place to handle contracts and payments digitally during COVID times. </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400;\">To control data and manage contracts, <a href=\"http://docusign.com\">DocuSign</a> is a popular digital option used in millions of real estate transactions. With DocuSign, agents send buyers a link to the contract, which they can open on any device. The client then follows the instructions provided to create an <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/01/02/the-challenges-and-opportunities-for-automation-in-the-real-estate-industry/\">electronic signature and sign</a> the document. Once they’ve finished, the agent can also access the saved signed version. </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400;\">To track the entire settlement process, tools like Qualia come in handy. This software lets buyers, agents, and lenders monitor closing status and investments, making the closing process more transparent, streamlined, and secure. </span></p>\n<h2><span style=\"font-weight: 400;\">Adapting to digital-first interactions</span></h2>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400;\">COVID-19 has caused companies across industries to adapt quickly to a <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/03/22/from-polarization-to-open-learning-how-technology-can-help-us-beyond-covid-19/\">new business environment</a>. In particular, this rapid shift has forced businesses to become more digital, and </span><a href=\"https://fortune.com/2020/04/19/coronavirus-going-back-to-work-from-home-commercial-real-estate-offices/\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\"><span style=\"font-weight: 400;\">experts predict</span></a><span style=\"font-weight: 400;\"> that post-COVID many will continue distributed operations on a large scale. </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400;\">For real estate agents, <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/11/21/best-data-visualization-tools-for-2020-reviewed/\">new technology is helping them stay afloat</a> in the short term as well as automate tasks, increase their output, and generate sales in the long term.</span></p>\n<p><em>Image Credit: Francesca Tosolini on Unsplash</em></p>\n<p>The post <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/06/05/real-estate-tech-that-will-endure-in-a-post-covid-world/\">Real Estate Tech that Will Endure in a Post COVID World</a> appeared first on <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com\">ReadWrite</a>.</p>\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Fri, 05 Jun 2020 15:00:55 +0000","feedId":271,"bgimg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Real-Estate-Tech-that-Will-Endure-in-a-Post-COVID-World.jpg","linkMd5":"539f2f23215fae44bce7918c7f8c3cfb","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn63@2020_4/2020/08/23/15-18-25-888_a2b2083eab2a3b75.webp","metaImg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Real-Estate-Tech-that-Will-Endure-in-a-Post-COVID-World.jpg","destWidth":825,"destHeight":510,"sourceBytes":44789,"destBytes":37596,"author":"Adrian Fisher","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Real-Estate-Tech-that-Will-Endure-in-a-Post-COVID-World-300x185.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx1/cdn95@2020_3/2020/08/23/15-18-15-759_0d6fc836cdf4c8ad.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598195875657},{"createdTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:58","updatedTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:58","title":"Digital Thread: 5 Ways to Drive Value in Industrial Enterprise","link":"https://readwrite.com/?p=166854","description":"<div><a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/04/13/digital-thread-5-ways-to-drive-value-in-industrial-enterprise/\" title=\"Digital Thread: 5 Ways to Drive Value in Industrial Enterprise\"><img width=\"300\" height=\"185\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/Digital-Thread-5-Ways-to-Drive-Value-in-Industrial-Enterprise-300x185.jpg\" class=\"attachment-medium size-medium wp-post-image\" alt=\"digital thread value industrial\" style=\"margin-bottom: 15px;\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/Digital-Thread-5-Ways-to-Drive-Value-in-Industrial-Enterprise-300x185.jpg 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/Digital-Thread-5-Ways-to-Drive-Value-in-Industrial-Enterprise-260x160.jpg 260w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/Digital-Thread-5-Ways-to-Drive-Value-in-Industrial-Enterprise.jpg 825w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px\" /></a></div><p>In the industrial market place, the prevalence of connected devices through the <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/01/09/a-deep-dive-inside-industrial-iot/\">Industrial Internet of Things (IIoT)</a> is expanding the possibilities of the digital thread. Streamlining and democratizing this information to specific functions drives attainable value from engineering through <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2018/02/27/modern-day-sales/\">sales and marketing</a>.</p>\n<h3>What is a digital thread?</h3>\n<p>A digital thread is a single source of data truth, creating consistency, collaboration, and alignment across functions. It does this by enabling real-time data synchronization of related upstream and downstream derivative information.</p>\n<p>The scalable, common set of democratized data enables enterprise-wide accessibility and creates continuity across functions in the value chain.</p>\n<p>Below we dissect five ways the digital thread is driving value across the industrial enterprise.</p>\n<h3><b>1. </b><b>Designing with 360-view of product-lifecycle.</b></h3>\n<p>Much of the digital thread value recognized is derived from the democratization of the digital product definition and its derivative information. By bringing relevant product data downstream to manufacturing processes, business are able to develop higher-quality products and increase throughput.</p>\n<p>On the opposite end, engineering excellence can be achieved as an <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/10/10/is-artificial-intelligence-the-ultimate-university-stimulus/\">input of other functional data</a>. By creating a closed feedback loop and enabling products with IoT, engineers equipped with real-world performance and usage data can replace assumptions with facts.</p>\n<p>Previously black-boxed data can do three things: inform engineers and product designers with design implications for future product iterations, <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/01/06/successful-scaling-how-to-grow-without-tumbling-back-down/\">expedite time-to-market</a>, and <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/04/10/how-iot-reshapes-industry-4-0-and-the-effects-of-iot-on-smes/\">introduce new products faster</a>.</p>\n<h3><b>2. Differentiating product and service with increased flexibility.</b></h3>\n<p>Creating and enhancing business models as well as differentiating product &#38; service offerings (25% of Forrester business decision-makers cite this as a DX driver) are sought-after outcomes of industrial digital transformation.</p>\n<p>Using the digital thread to synchronize product lifecycle information across processes enables mass customization &#8211; an increasingly important capability for manufacturers.</p>\n<p>For example, Volvo’s engines (<em>full disclosure: Volvo is a customer of my employer, PTC</em>) can have 4,500 different information variants to choose from within a single plant. When performing timely quality assurance, its definition data must be easily accessible by QA operators.</p>\n<p>By implementing a digital thread that connects two very different parts of the business, Volvo has been able to quickly adjust to shifting customer requirements and increase new product introduction (NPI) cycle times.</p>\n<h3><b>3. Driving manufacturing efficiency by connecting disparate systems.</b></h3>\n<p>Digitized and non-digitized information resides in manufacturing facilities, and both are critical to daily production. The digital thread provides the means to both connect disparate digitized information sources (including ERP systems and IoT-enabled machines). They <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/01/07/achieving-paperless-operations-and-document-automation-with-ai-and-ml/\">can deliver traditionally paper-based information</a> (such as work instructions) to relevant personnel.</p>\n<p>Real-time <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/01/04/why-you-need-to-consider-iot-in-improving-customer-experience/\">operational visibility</a> across production lines, assets, capacity, and other systems are required to drive operational efficiencies. 451 Research cites 53% of <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/02/27/adding-cellular-connectivity-to-your-iot-device/\">manufacturing respondents</a> currently use or will use digital thread for faster access to cross plant instrumentation and status.</p>\n<p>Properly equipping this instrumentation through technologies and then streamlining it through the digital thread can drive these critical manufacturing KPIs.</p>\n<p>For delivering the digital thread, democratizing manufacturing data to various factory roles can improve worker productivity and efficiencies by offering previously hidden insights.</p>\n<h3><b>4. Identifying new ways to deliver service.</b></h3>\n<p>Service networks and lifecycles are increasingly complex, coinciding with the rise in product complexity. Customized products may benefit top-line revenue but become a cost center downstream if the service component is improperly managed.</p>\n<p>The digital thread alleviates this complexity by giving the <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/04/08/big-data-in-the-telecommunications-ecosystem/\">service technician</a> the deployed assets definition data traditionally solely residing in the engineering department. <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/08/13/augmented-reality-transforming-training-with-immersive-experiences/\">Augmented reality</a> is increasingly the emerging technology to link the digital thread to the physical world and improve <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/12/03/few-industries-will-not-be-transformed-by-ar-and-vr/\">technician effectiveness</a> and critical KPIs, including mean-time-to-repair and first-time-fix-rate.</p>\n<p>PTC customer Howden [Howden.com] is driving added-value to its customers through its connected field maintenance program, Uptime. This ‘self-service’ module gives service technicians step-by-step service instructions on a deployed asset almost immediately, circumventing product complexity challenges.</p>\n<h3><b>5. Enriching the sales and marketing experience.</b></h3>\n<p>Customer-facing personnel are constantly looking for new methods of engagement and ways to provide novel opportunities for new sales and upselling. The possibilities include both knowing the customer’s current usage of products and demonstrating the <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/03/31/trends-that-will-characterize-the-ecommerce-industry-in-2020-and-beyond/\">potential use of future products</a>. The digital thread provides an avenue for both.</p>\n<p>Through IIoT, sales and marketing teams can determine the exact usage of their smart connected products, pre-formulate their potential pain points, and identify opportunities.</p>\n<p>Through the <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/06/11/manufacturers-aspire-to-digital-twinning-and-virtual-commissioning/\">digital thread and augmented reality</a>, sales teams can demonstrate product configurations in real-time to drive revenue opportunities. More immersive experiences for customers to visualize and learn about the products drive engagement and enhances customer experience.</p>\n<h2><b>Digital Thread: Pervasive Across the Value Chain</b></h2>\n<p>These five outcomes occur as <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/02/11/will-companies-embrace-digital-transformation/\">digital thread value</a>, and its pervasiveness extends throughout the value chain. However, while a long-term vision is advisable, short-term digital thread wins in specific domains for industrial organizations are achievable today.</p>\n<p>These digital threads wins will gain momentum as additional stakeholders recognize compounding value.</p>\n<p>The post <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/04/13/digital-thread-5-ways-to-drive-value-in-industrial-enterprise/\">Digital Thread: 5 Ways to Drive Value in Industrial Enterprise</a> appeared first on <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com\">ReadWrite</a>.</p>\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Mon, 13 Apr 2020 18:00:55 +0000","feedId":271,"bgimg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/Digital-Thread-5-Ways-to-Drive-Value-in-Industrial-Enterprise.jpg","linkMd5":"1737061591e0bf2552d67d2faa291327","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx1/cdn51@2020_2/2020/08/23/15-18-19-568_7bd09a3d8ea31fad.webp","metaImg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/Digital-Thread-5-Ways-to-Drive-Value-in-Industrial-Enterprise.jpg","destWidth":825,"destHeight":510,"sourceBytes":33887,"destBytes":24052,"author":"David Immerman","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/Digital-Thread-5-Ways-to-Drive-Value-in-Industrial-Enterprise-300x185.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx24/cdn12@2020_2/2020/08/23/15-18-17-020_63627d39056057a9.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598195878426},{"createdTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:59","updatedTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:59","title":"The Future of Charging in Public Spaces","link":"https://readwrite.com/?p=166735","description":"<div><a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/03/20/the-future-of-charging-in-public-spaces/\" title=\"The Future of Charging in Public Spaces\"><img width=\"300\" height=\"200\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/The-Future-of-Charging-in-Public-Spaces-300x200.jpg\" class=\"attachment-medium size-medium wp-post-image\" alt=\"charging in public spaces\" style=\"margin-bottom: 15px;\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/The-Future-of-Charging-in-Public-Spaces-300x200.jpg 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/The-Future-of-Charging-in-Public-Spaces-900x600.jpg 900w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/The-Future-of-Charging-in-Public-Spaces-240x160.jpg 240w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/The-Future-of-Charging-in-Public-Spaces-1536x1024.jpg 1536w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/The-Future-of-Charging-in-Public-Spaces.jpg 1920w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px\" /></a></div><p>If you feel a bit worried when the <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/02/27/adding-cellular-connectivity-to-your-iot-device/\">battery of your mobile phone</a> runs low, you are not alone. A recent City University study shows that battery life has a significant impact on people’s anxiety level and their behavior.</p>\n<p>A Wired <a href=\"https://www.wired.com/story/diagnosing-and-dealing-with-your-low-battery-anxiety/\">article</a> summarizes this well: “when smartphones start dying, people get weird: they head home immediately, swipe cables from coworkers’ desks, demand chargers from random strangers or places of business.” Given how reliant we are on our devices, these types of responses come as no surprise.</p>\n<h2>People faced with a dying battery.</h2>\n<p>What do you do when you are faced with a dying battery? Many people will pop into a coffee shop, a restaurant or scour <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2018/12/11/will-uncertainty-in-us-5g-deployments-affect-iot-development/\">wherever they happen to be for an outlet</a>. Public spaces often have outlets or have installed charging solutions like USB outlets.</p>\n<p>Major chains like Starbucks and McDonald&#8217;s have made free Wi-Fi and the ability to charge an integral part of their customer experience. Yet, what’s currently available <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/02/10/wifi-range-hacks-2020/\">still leaves plenty of room for improvement</a>.</p>\n<h4>Traditional power outlets require charging cables.</h4>\n<p>To charge, you must be near an outlet and must remember to bring the right cable with you. This limits where people can sit. Some places simply don’t have easily accessible outlets, or the outlets that they have are not in desirable spots. Sometimes the shape of a charger can make it impossible to put two into a socket side-by-side.</p>\n<h3>Has the line to charge your devices been a simple numbers game?</h3>\n<p>In a crowded McDonald&#8217;s or airport, you must compete with everyone else for the available outlets. If you get one, it may leave you huddled uncomfortably close to a bunch of other people around a charging pod. In addition, using USB charging ports presents a potential risk.</p>\n<h4>USB doesn’t just transmit power.</h4>\n<p>A USB sends data &#8212; which means that a port could try to access your personal information or upload malware onto your device. These <a href=\"https://www.howtogeek.com/166497/htg-explains-what-is-juice-jacking-and-how-worried-should-you-be/\">types of attacks</a> may not be widespread, but they can happen. Another charging solution is wireless contact pads.</p>\n<p>The most popular of these wireless contact pads are based on an inductive charging method referred to as Qi. Qi charging allows for wireless charging over very short distances, is supported by major players like Apple, Samsung and Google.</p>\n<h4>Who wants to put their phone on a dirty charging spot?</h4>\n<p>However, the pad itself still needs an electrical connection, and a consumer attitudes report by Zogby Analytics shows that many people are not sold on Qi charging. The report cites issues like charging speed, the need to align the device perfectly, and availability as key problems.</p>\n<p>A thick phone case could prevent the phone from charging, and Qi spots in public spaces are sometimes broken or dirty. Who wants to put their phone on a dirty charging spot?</p>\n<h4>Long-range wireless power.</h4>\n<p>Long-range wireless power &#8211; the ability to deliver power from a distance without wires or charging pads &#8211; solves these problems. Long-range <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/11/05/people-power-company-humanizing-the-internet-of-things/\">wireless power frees people</a> to sit where they like and not vie with others for a limited number of outlets.</p>\n<p>There are many approaches to long-range wireless charging such as Ultrasound and radio frequency, to name a few. These technologies vary in the amount of energy they can safely deliver as well as in their efficiency.</p>\n<p>A new and very promising approach is infrared light, which can safely and efficiently provide enough energy to charge a phone. From the user’s perspective, the benefit of having wireless charging in a variety of public venues is readily apparent. In addition, there are significant benefits that extend to the businesses themselves.</p>\n<h3><strong>Wireless charging for businesses.</strong></h3>\n<p>Wireless charging is a simple and inexpensive way for <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/06/28/electronic-design-is-utilizing-ai-enabled-solutions-to-render-top-grade-service/\">business owners to elevate their customer experience.</a> It provides a way to differentiate themselves, to delight their customers and ultimately &#8212; to make their establishments a more comfortable place to spend time.</p>\n<h4>Aesthetic and renovation efforts for WiFi power in the office.</h4>\n<p>The alternative &#8211; providing power outlets near tables &#8211; can be a major renovation effort. It can be an aesthetic concern, as well. A cocktail bar in LA or a diner in NY may value the sleek appearance of their countertops. Having to accommodate outlets or Qi pads near every seat can be a blemish on an otherwise flawless decor.</p>\n<p>Another useful way to think about this is to consider the evolution of free Wi-Fi. In the early days, not everyone offered it, but those that did had an edge, offering their customers a little something extra, a reason to linger.</p>\n<h4>Forward-thinking business owners understand that small gestures like providing easy plugin access can go a long way.</h4>\n<p>For example, a few years ago, Domino&#8217;s debuted a service where people could order a pizza by simply texting an emoji. Thirty minutes later, pizza. Domino&#8217;s was letting people do what they already liked to do, text and use emojis.</p>\n<p>The result was a 10% boost in sales and 1.5 billion <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/02/26/10-facebook-conversion-rate-strategies-for-online-sales/\">social media impressions</a>. Similarly, <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/01/25/how-iot-fixtures-will-power-the-bathroom-of-the-future/\">wireless charging</a> is another way of giving people what they want — a fully charged phone and unlimited connectivity. Examples like Domino&#8217;s are common. Restaurants are using mobile apps, streamlined delivery services and decision logic technology — anything and everything to further enhance customer experiences.</p>\n<p>Restaurants have transitioned to portable point of sale terminals, like the ones made by Ziosk. Olive Garden, TGI Fridays, and other big chains have embraced this trend which makes ordering another drink or paying the bill much easier &#8211; right from the table.</p>\n<p>However, keeping these terminals charged requires batteries or a hardwire. Batteries need to be removed daily and charged overnight, which means extra work before opening and at closing. Wiring these devices from the wall comes with the limitations already discussed above.</p>\n<h3>Integrating the wireless charging receiver.</h3>\n<p>By integrating a wireless charging receiver with the point of sale table-side terminal, the device could always remain on without requiring a wire or additional maintenance. Not to mention that vendors could also use their wireless power to let patrons comfortably charge their phones.</p>\n<p><strong>Final thoughts</strong></p>\n<p>A fast-food restaurant, cafe or public library with long-range <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2017/06/26/samsung-wireless-charging-case-dl1/\">wireless charging</a> represents a fundamentally improved experience. In the mobile age, people expect everything to be quick, easy and intuitive. The speed at which something goes from a novelty to an expectation has increased.</p>\n<p>Yesterday WiFi was something new, and today it’s essentially unthinkable that any restaurant or cafe would not have it. Long-range wireless charging is primed to follow a similar trajectory.</p>\n<p>The post <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/03/20/the-future-of-charging-in-public-spaces/\">The Future of Charging in Public Spaces</a> appeared first on <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com\">ReadWrite</a>.</p>\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Fri, 20 Mar 2020 15:00:35 +0000","feedId":271,"bgimg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/The-Future-of-Charging-in-Public-Spaces.jpg","linkMd5":"88e39a8f67ad1712564ba8cff14be0d4","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx29/cdn68@2020_2/2020/08/23/15-18-26-225_15c9b3bb3ad1ba3f.webp","metaImg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/The-Future-of-Charging-in-Public-Spaces.jpg","destWidth":1920,"destHeight":1280,"sourceBytes":415629,"destBytes":382050,"author":"Yuval Boger","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/The-Future-of-Charging-in-Public-Spaces-300x200.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx1/cdn83@2020_2/2020/08/23/15-18-14-436_552abea1e63bfe2e.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598195879902},{"createdTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:58","updatedTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:58","title":"When the COVID is Past – Let’s go to Naples Florida","link":"https://readwrite.com/?p=167947","description":"<div><a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/04/22/when-covid-is-past-lets-go-to-naples-florida/\" title=\"When the COVID is Past &#8211; Let&#8217;s go to Naples Florida\"><img width=\"300\" height=\"185\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/When-the-COVID-is-Past-Lets-go-to-Naples-Florida--300x185.jpg\" class=\"attachment-medium size-medium wp-post-image\" alt=\"naples florida\" style=\"margin-bottom: 15px;\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/When-the-COVID-is-Past-Lets-go-to-Naples-Florida--300x185.jpg 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/When-the-COVID-is-Past-Lets-go-to-Naples-Florida--260x160.jpg 260w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/When-the-COVID-is-Past-Lets-go-to-Naples-Florida-.jpg 825w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px\" /></a></div><p>When the COVID is past &#8212; you&#8217;ll need a break. No need to look further than Naples, Florida. If you are on the lookout for a perfect location to golf, fish, or for <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/10/17/4-effective-ways-to-manage-work-stress/\">relaxation,</a> search no further. The beautiful coastline of the Gulf has everything you are looking for. The picturesque waterfront of the Gulf Coast is unique anywhere in the world. The sunsets here are out of this world, and the beach landscape seems endless.</p>\n<p><b>The city of Naples, Florida,</b> is home to such wonders, and if you are looking forward to spending your next summer vacation in a coastline destination then, Naples is for you. Judging from the title of the article, what exactly makes Naples, so special? What are the things that attract so many tourists to the Gulf Coast of Florida? Here are a couple of things to do in Naples, Florida, that will make you want to come back.</p>\n<h3>Spend a day in Delnor-Wiggins Pass State Park</h3>\n<p>Since we already talk about the unique beaches that are located in Naples, we will start by presenting one of the best ones around. Located about 12 miles north of Old Naples, alongside serene and clear waters, this place covers about 166 acres of land. You will need a whole day to explore and enjoy all the beauties of this wonderful Park.</p>\n<p>There are low admission fees collected at the entrance of the park. This fee is $6.00 per vehicle, limited to 2-8 people per vehicle, $4.00 single-occupant vehicle, and $2.00 for pedestrians, bicyclists as well as extra passengers.</p>\n<p>Facilities include bathrooms, plenty of parking lots, food stands, picnic spots, and beach rental equipment. You can enjoy a relaxing picnic day at the picnic spot, or you can choose to go snorkeling since there are common spots for that in the area. The sand, according to visitors, is covered with shells, but you can still find plenty of soft spots to lay down.</p>\n<p>If you love wildlife, you also have the opportunity to enjoy the flora and fauna through guided tours frequently held by Park Rangers. Time your vacation correctly, and you might be able to see the loggerhead turtles nesting season. Also, there are many colorful birds around the area that will catch your eye. If you’re around, make sure you put this place at the top of your list of things to do in Naples, Florida.</p>\n<h3>Experience the panoramic view from Naples Pier</h3>\n<p>We are still on the beachside of Naples, Florida, and there is a unique place at Naples Municipal Beach that you have to go to. The Naples Pier is an expansive boardwalk that stretches for 1,000 feet into the Gulf of Mexico, making it hard to miss. Naples Pier is known for the stunning panoramic view along with the most amazing orange sunsets that Naples is renowned for. The picture-worthy scene is the ideal place for <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/05/12/how-these-apps-will-make-you-a-better-photographer/\">shoots and photos,</a> and the best part is it’s free. There are no fees to enter the Pier.</p>\n<p>The firework shows held in the city can be enjoyed at their fullest from here. It is also, a preferred spot for fishing since it offers plenty of space to cast the fishing lines. A fishing license is not required, therefore cleaning stations, as well as fishing gear stands, are conveniently placed along the pier.</p>\n<h3>Visit Naples Botanical Garden</h3>\n<p>Located 4 miles southeast of downtown Naples, the Botanical Garden holds a variety of flora that nature-lovers will absolutely love. Stretching for about 170-acres, this nature sanctuary holds more than 1,000 species of plants spread over nine tropical-themed gardens. If you want to learn more about the plant collections at Naples Botanical Garden, then ask for more information regarding their daily tours.</p>\n<p>In terms of admission fees, you will have to pay $19.95 for adults and $9.95 for children between the age of 4 to 14. Entrance is free for members and children under the age of 4. The Botanical Garden also allows for dogs, but there are a few restrictions. The admission fee for dogs is $9.95 for non-members, and it is free for members. Dogs need to be up-to-date on all vaccinations and remain on their leash at all times. There are also areas where dogs are not allowed, so be aware of that as well.</p>\n<p>Kids are also, more than welcome since the Garden holds educational activities for them every month in the Smith Children’s Garden. It is recommended that you set aside a couple of hours if you plan to visit the Botanical Garden of Naples. This is a major attraction in Naples and definitely deserves a place on our list of things to do in Naples.</p>\n<h3>Visit Naples Zoo</h3>\n<p>Since we had the opportunity to witness the rich flora at the Botanical Garden, now it is time to see the fauna showcased at the Naples Zoo. If you love the movie “Madagascar,” you will probably recognize some of the inhabitants featured in Petrog’s Primate Pavilion exhibit. Another Madagascar native that is held within the Zoo’s exhibit is the lemur.</p>\n<p>Admission fees are $22.95 for adults (ages 13 &#8211; 64), $21.95 for seniors (ages 65 and up), $14.95 for children (ages 3 &#8211; 12), 17.95 for military adults (valid military ID). Children under the age of 2, as well as Naples Zoo members, have free entrance as well as free parking. Every first Saturday of every month, residents of Collier County have free entrance and discounts for family members.</p>\n<p>Get to see the rare Indochinese tigers along with other mammals such as hyenas, leopards, and lions. The Zoo also organizes live shows where the zookeepers present some of the zoo’s animals for a more up close and educational experience.</p>\n<h3>Visit the Bakers Museum</h3>\n<p>This museum holds about 15 galleries that make this place known for having one of the best art collections in southwest Florida. That’s why we have included this museum on our list of things to do in Naples, Florida. The museum has a 14-foot-tall entrance covered with art, which offers a dramatic entrance toward the fascinating pieces held within the perimeter of the museum.</p>\n<p>Colorful chandeliers will fill you with amazement. Also, glass installations by Dale Chihuly, a renowned American glass sculptor, are a spectacular sight. The permanent collection also includes modern American works in rooms with ceilings that have an ocean-themed decor.</p>\n<h3>Conclusion</h3>\n<p>The beautiful city of Naples holds plenty of beach activities, but also inland attractions. If you are around, you can experience some of the unique natural landscapes provided by the cities parks, or you can enjoy some of the best beach experiences on the Gulf Coast. Work your way around Naples with these five exciting things to do in Naples, Florida.</p>\n<p>If you consider making your visit a more permanent thing in this beautiful city, then reach out to the real estate agents in Naples (realestateagent dot com/naples florida) to help you with some great home deals.</p>\n<p>Let everyone know what a great time you had in Naples.</p>\n<p>The post <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/04/22/when-covid-is-past-lets-go-to-naples-florida/\">When the COVID is Past &#8211; Let&#8217;s go to Naples Florida</a> appeared first on <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com\">ReadWrite</a>.</p>\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Wed, 22 Apr 2020 17:00:29 +0000","feedId":271,"bgimg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/When-the-COVID-is-Past-Lets-go-to-Naples-Florida-.jpg","linkMd5":"08dcd95e6e70d406103ab11537c36d04","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx33/cdn32@2020_4/2020/08/23/15-18-27-449_48fca41aa171e78e.webp","metaImg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/When-the-COVID-is-Past-Lets-go-to-Naples-Florida-.jpg","destWidth":825,"destHeight":510,"sourceBytes":77907,"destBytes":71552,"author":"Theresa Hus","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/When-the-COVID-is-Past-Lets-go-to-Naples-Florida--300x185.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx2/cdn72@2020_2/2020/08/23/15-18-22-322_11ee8d1ac3ae302e.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598195878478},{"createdTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:53","updatedTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:53","title":"Top COVID-19 Cybersecurity Scams to Watch For — and How to Mitigate Them","link":"https://readwrite.com/?p=174229","description":"<div><a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/07/09/top-covid-19-cybersecurity-scams-to-watch-for-and-how-to-mitigate-them/\" title=\"Top COVID-19 Cybersecurity Scams to Watch For &#8212; and How to Mitigate Them\"><img width=\"300\" height=\"185\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/Cybersecurity-Scams-to-Watch-For-and-How-to-Mitigate-Them-300x185.jpg\" class=\"attachment-medium size-medium wp-post-image\" alt=\"cybersecurity\" style=\"margin-bottom: 15px;\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/Cybersecurity-Scams-to-Watch-For-and-How-to-Mitigate-Them-300x185.jpg 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/Cybersecurity-Scams-to-Watch-For-and-How-to-Mitigate-Them-260x160.jpg 260w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/Cybersecurity-Scams-to-Watch-For-and-How-to-Mitigate-Them.jpg 825w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px\" /></a></div><p>When companies first started implementing BYOD policies in the workplace in the early 2000s, CIOs and other executives were compelled to consider the implications of company data accessed from personal devices. If BYOD <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/05/24/the-key-to-improving-global-cybersecurity-is-data-science/\">warmed cybersecurity teams</a> up to blurring the lines between business and personal &#8212; today’s remote workforce challenge is the main event. Here are the top COVID-19 cybersecurity scams to watch for, and how to mitigate them.</p>\n<h2>Main Event Today &#8211; Cybersecurity (be like Nike) Just Do It</h2>\n<p>IT teams are now tasked with eliminating the boundaries between our work and personal technologies and communicating new priorities to employees across lines of business.</p>\n<p>The COVID-19 pandemic exponentially increased the surface area of digital threat landscapes across organizations. Now, as remote work potentially disconnects IT teams and disrupts cybersecurity processes, hackers are taking advantage of the opportunity to use the coronavirus as a weapon in cyberattacks.</p>\n<h2>Cybersecurity Schemes Working Right Now. Is this you?</h2>\n<p>New phishing schemes tell email users to register their names and social security numbers to receive free COVID testing or click links to websites with a variation of “corona map” in the URL and navigate to sites scraped from the CDC or Johns Hopkins.</p>\n<p>Citizens today are increasingly vulnerable to <a href=\"https://www.scmagazineuk.com/threat-group-dons-covid-guise-cyber-attack/article/1677278\">requests for personally identifiable information (PII).</a> Your personal information creates a unique opportunity for cybercriminals to access personal — and ultimately your company — data.</p>\n<p><strong>There is Money Sitting on the Couch and the Window is Open</strong></p>\n<p>With the government on the brink of paying out two trillion dollars in checks to U.S. citizens as part of the stimulus package, expect the hackers. These hackers are just waiting to pounce on confused and scrambling recipients, resulting in even more fraud and spam over the coming months. Seriously, you don&#8217;t have to be afraid &#8212; just get prepared.</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_174235\" aria-describedby=\"caption-attachment-174235\" style=\"width: 300px\" class=\"wp-caption aligncenter\"><a href=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/man-in-red-crew-neck-sweatshirt-photography-941693.jpg\"><img class=\"wp-image-174235 size-medium\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/man-in-red-crew-neck-sweatshirt-photography-941693-300x260.jpg\" alt=\"cybersecurity\" width=\"300\" height=\"260\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/man-in-red-crew-neck-sweatshirt-photography-941693-300x260.jpg 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/man-in-red-crew-neck-sweatshirt-photography-941693-831x719.jpg 831w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/man-in-red-crew-neck-sweatshirt-photography-941693-185x160.jpg 185w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/man-in-red-crew-neck-sweatshirt-photography-941693-1536x1329.jpg 1536w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/man-in-red-crew-neck-sweatshirt-photography-941693.jpg 1920w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px\" /></a><figcaption id=\"caption-attachment-174235\" class=\"wp-caption-text\"><em>You don&#8217;t have to be afraid &#8212; just get prepared</em></figcaption></figure></p>\n<h4>Business and Site Security</h4>\n<p>Businesses that haven’t proactively built out sophisticated cloud backup systems and implemented disaster recovery plans are at risk.</p>\n<p>In a landscape where threat vectors are dispersed across the personal and business devices of every employee in your organization, getting hacked is no longer a possibility — it is an expectation.</p>\n<p>Since most companies take <a href=\"https://www.zdnet.com/article/businesses-take-over-six-months-to-detect-data-breaches/\">nearly six months to detect a data breach</a>, many organizations’ data may already be compromised. But a few simple tweaks to your processes can help your organization better detect, prevent and recover from an inevitable breach.</p>\n<h2><b>What’s different about COVID scamming?</b></h2>\n<p>Responding to COVID-19 <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/11/22/how-intelligent-data-addresses-the-chasm-in-cloud/\">cybersecurity threats is a novel challenge</a> in its own right.</p>\n<p>Fortunately, we’re not seeing significantly different types of scams: Email phishing, Trojan malware and spoofed sites continue to dominate the threat landscape. If your company has developed a sophisticated strategy to prevent these types of breaches, you’re already headed in the right direction.</p>\n<h4>Why are cybersecurity problems different right now?</h4>\n<p>These threats, however, have never converged with world events and conditional factors such as newly remote workforces and public health standards. While managed service providers (MSPs) are typically successful at securing the physical perimeter defined by office space, IT professionals typically lack oversight into individual employees’ behaviors at home.</p>\n<h4>Home Environment &#8212; the fam.</h4>\n<p>Even with visibility into employee processes via work computers, <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/06/22/how-to-ensure-data-privacy-in-the-time-of-coronavirus/\">you can’t monitor family behavior</a> — a kid downloading a game using home internet, for example, can leave other devices vulnerable to an attack.</p>\n<p>In addition, employees access work email from mobile phones now more than ever, and March saw a 300% <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/coronavirus-iphone-app-downloads-impact-work-education-increase-travel-decreases-2020-3#around-the-same-time-educational-apps-also-jumped-up-as-schools-across-the-country-turned-to-online-learning-2\">spike in business app downloads</a> as consumers flocked to productivity apps related to remote or teleworking, fitness and education.</p>\n<p>With the increased dependency on mobile apps for collaboration and communication, attackers have latched onto this new vector by embedding trojans into apps posing as free video conferencing providers.</p>\n<p>Your cybersecurity may come from <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/06/08/how-covid-19-is-driving-us-into-a-cloud-based-future/\">video conferencing</a> where a hacker can access user data through backdoor channels like search history, passwords and email addresses. With users flipping between various news sources throughout the day, supplying employees with an understanding of safe apps to download is critical.</p>\n<p><strong>Unprepared companies must simultaneously create and implement response plans, often doing so after a security event has already occurred.</strong></p>\n<p>Even Google algorithms struggle with delays in <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2018/10/18/five-best-open-source-antivirus-for-carefree-cyber-threat-protection/\">email antivirus protection</a>. Antivirus software relies on real-time machine learning.  For example, an algorithm can quickly flag a sketchy email directing a user to sign in to eBay — but they don’t have the legacy data to differentiate which of the COVID emails flooding our inboxes are legitimate and which are not.</p>\n<h4>What About Domains and Certificates?</h4>\n<p>Hackers can easily create hundreds of domain names and obtain SSL certificates for spoofed websites within a few minutes. Assuming thousands of hackers are doing this at the same time, it may take Google — and the rest of us — a while to catch up.</p>\n<p>Given the <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/06/22/best-business-intelligence-software-and-business-operating-system-options-for-2020/\">reality that business data is more vulnerable</a> than ever, what precautions should all companies be taking to mitigate these unique risks?</p>\n<h2><b>Focus areas for safeguarding company data.</b></h2>\n<p>COVID-19 has forced an essential point: If cybersecurity wasn’t a 2020 business priority before, it needs to be now. With the average cost of a data breach, this year set to <a href=\"https://www.scasecurity.com/cost-of-a-data-breach/\">exceed $150 million</a>, avoiding a damaging breach &#8212; hinges on your ability to navigate new security concerns.</p>\n<p><strong>Even in a stressed environment, your security protocols don’t need to change dramatically.</strong></p>\n<p>If you’re missing any of these critical cybersecurity elements, you need to take action now to mitigate the risk of a breach going forward:</p>\n<ul>\n<li><strong>Focus on the basics.</strong>Though the number of attempted attacks will continue to increase, the main attack vectors remain the same. Protecting your employees from phishing emails that compromise their credentials should be your top concern.All cloud applications should be bolstered by secure multi-factor authentication (MFA) tools. As much as possible, enable MFA for employees by default and opt for apps that offer single sign-on (SSO) capabilities.</li>\n<li><strong>Start deploying password management tools</strong>Insist on the deployment of password management tools for both personal and business apps. In the same way <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/06/24/the-biggest-advantages-and-disadvantages-of-iot/\">that your essential security capabilities</a> should include MFA and SSO tools, your bare-minimum toolkit must include password management capabilities.When your organization requires passwords that are both complex and changed frequently, you’re much less likely to experience credential stuffing. Credential stuffing is a tactic in which attackers gain credentials by purchasing records for sale on the Dark Web.\n<p>Research on compromised credentials on the Dark Web by <a href=\"https://www.idagent.com/resources/password-education-package-campaign/\">Kaseya company ID Agent</a> found that disturbingly, names are the <i>most common types</i> of password, with “George” ringing in as the most popular name password. (Ya know, just don&#8217;t!)</li>\n<li><strong>Change and reinforce &#8220;best&#8221; employee cybersecurity behavior as much as possible.</strong>While the first phase of COVID response largely required forced change management — teams had a day or week to adapt and adjust policies. The next phase of response must reinforce and reward good cybersecurity practices as the new normal.For your organization to prepare for and respond to an attack, employees across your organization need upskilling through quality training programs.\n<p>Your best training programs will include phishing simulations, incident response training and safe internet habits.</p>\n<p>Remember, employee security training doesn’t need to be lengthy and tedious to be effective: Keep training concise, brief, and focused. Then focus on rewarding good behavior.</li>\n</ul>\n<h4>Conclusion</h4>\n<p>Effective cybersecurity scams rely on fear and a lack of information to succeed. As humans, we’re driven by our innate desire to click links that promise more information or safety.</p>\n<p>More than ever, company leadership has a<a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/06/17/how-to-invest-in-yourself-during-lockdown/\"> responsibility to educate their workforce</a> about how to succeed outside the office. Arm employees with tools and policies that address pain points.</p>\n<p>With basic defenses, effective communication, and behavior modification, even companies without advanced threat detection systems can greatly reduce their chances of attack, and set themselves up for success today and down the line.</p>\n<p>The post <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/07/09/top-covid-19-cybersecurity-scams-to-watch-for-and-how-to-mitigate-them/\">Top COVID-19 Cybersecurity Scams to Watch For &#8212; and How to Mitigate Them</a> appeared first on <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com\">ReadWrite</a>.</p>\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Thu, 09 Jul 2020 21:01:06 +0000","feedId":271,"bgimg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/Cybersecurity-Scams-to-Watch-For-and-How-to-Mitigate-Them.jpg","linkMd5":"a194cc2c9a25d0e64eefaa5dbf33767f","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx12/cdn100@2020_6/2020/08/23/15-18-20-089_a2e31c9c4cef5801.webp","metaImg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/Cybersecurity-Scams-to-Watch-For-and-How-to-Mitigate-Them.jpg","destWidth":825,"destHeight":510,"sourceBytes":43615,"destBytes":34884,"author":"Kevin
