style=\"margin-bottom: 15px;\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/Impact-of-COVID-19-in-the-Crypto-Market.jpeg 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/Impact-of-COVID-19-in-the-Crypto-Market-240x160.jpeg 240w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px\" /></a></div><p>In less than three months, the novel coronavirus (nCOVID -19) transformed from just one of the regular virus outbreaks in recent memories into a global pandemic, threatening to cause severe and drastic changes in the world&#8217;s most significant issues as we know it.</p>\n<p>Many have already termed the latest pandemic as the not so anticipated &#8220;<a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2013/02/05/world-war-iii-is-already-here-and-were-losing/\">World War III</a>,&#8221; as it continues to spread across countries and continents. However, there have been specific actions taken. These actions were to curb the aggravating situation and ensuring the globe doesn&#8217;t come to an impending halt in virtually every sector.</p>\n<h2><strong>Impact of Covid-19 on World Economies.</strong></h2>\n<p>Educational institutions, travel industry to public events, almost everything is either postponed or in limbo, which is inevitably going to affect businesses at every turn. Thousands of cases and deaths have already been recorded globally, and with the mere thought of <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2005/10/18/web_20_worm_pan/\">this pandemic not going</a> away anytime soon, stock markets began to take many hits in terms of new lows.</p>\n<p>The S&#38;P 500 index hit a new low since 2008 when the world plunged into a financial crisis. The crypto market has even become more volatile and has also experienced one of the worst sudden declines in its history. By the end of March 2020, there was a 6% loss in price, which occurred in the space of 24 hours.</p>\n<p>Being one of the most affected nations by the coronavirus, and also one of the largest crypto markets in the world, the United States had its treasury experience a new low. Investors drastically moved from &#8220;risky&#8221; assets to much &#8220;safer&#8221; assets like gold and oil, which have experienced a spike since the pandemic outbreak.</p>\n<h2><strong>Impact of Covid-19 on Crypto-mining. </strong></h2>\n<p>With China and South Korea owning more than 70% of the mining power of bitcoins (the most <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2018/11/13/crypto-feels-like-the-wild-west-but-really-big-tech-holds-the-puppet-strings/\">substantial cryptocurrency</a>), it is easy to say that the massive effect was expected as soon as the virus began to take its toll on the Asian continent, much less the world.</p>\n<p>Over the past years, <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2018/10/15/cryptocurrency-fraud-is-the-exception-not-the-rule/\">numerous cryptocurrency mining</a> equipment has been devised, and with prices currently suffering, these pieces of equipment are exposed to certain inefficiencies. For balancing the new algorithms, mining farms became more and more critical than these pieces of equipment, which have been rendered ineffective.</p>\n<p>Isolation and quarantine became the major causes of this because there is lesser movement into mining farms, despite the notion that investors term cryptocurrencies as &#8220;safe assets,&#8221; especially in times like this. The prices continue to suffer at the expense of the initial expectations. With an overall 15% drop at the end of March, it is expected that the number will increase even further when Q1 of 2020 is complete.</p>\n<h4><strong>The Positives</strong></h4>\n<p>Despite all the negatives emerging from all business sectors of the world due to the coronavirus outbreak, it is still safe to say that many markets <a href=\"https://www.independent.co.uk/life-style/gadgets-and-tech/news/coronavirus-bitcoin-price-cryptocurrency-market-currency-usd-latest-a9411806.html\">are able to survive</a> these <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/02/03/what-it-really-means-to-be-forward-thinking/\">trying times and even benefit</a> from it.</p>\n<p>There are no doubts that the possibility of a global recession and capital authoritarianism lurks in the shadows of these dark times as governments of the world are prepared to induce capitalism as a way of solving these problems.</p>\n<p>Initially, the crypto-currency market might not be affected by these impending changes, but that doesn&#8217;t mean it isn&#8217;t safe from it, especially in the foreseeable future. This is because the world is very much prepared to use all available measures to fight back the pandemic using communication and medical technology to suppress the speed at which it spreads.</p>\n<p>Return of investment is one of the significant keys of business, and the imposed lockdown in many countries of the world is an opportunity to utilize prices in trading according to <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/08/16/10-crypto-gurus-you-have-to-follow/\">financial experts</a>. There have also been updated features of auto-software in tracking useful information for crypto trading such as charts, prices, and analysis.</p>\n<p>Conclusion</p>\n<p>The fear of bitcoin halving continues to linger in the minds of investors where prices will have to be cut in half to reduce its supply in the crypto market. Investors and experts have found this halving policy to be an interesting analysis in terms of balancing the books.</p>\n<p><a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/01/15/top-25-blockchain-and-cryptocurrency-speakers/\">While many futurists</a> have described the crypto-currency market as &#8220;beyond safe,&#8221; they have also stressed that it can also be identified as a good option in long term investments as the value continues to grow.</p>\n<p>These <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/02/19/when-will-you-be-able-to-use-cryptocurrency-to-buy-a-pack-of-gum/\">analyses are also predicted</a> to materialize in the coming months and will no doubt affect future prices in the future. The future remains the only place where we can be able to find the right answers. As the coronavirus (COVID-19) pandemic continues to record more cases &#8212; arriving in the future will be the only way to tell us how all things will eventually turn out.</p>\n<p><em>Image Credit: Pexels</em></p>\n<p>The post <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/04/24/impact-of-covid-19-in-the-crypto-market/\">Impact of COVID-19 in the Crypto Market</a> appeared first on <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com\">ReadWrite</a>.</p>\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Fri, 24 Apr 2020 20:00:07 +0000","feedId":271,"bgimg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/Impact-of-COVID-19-in-the-Crypto-Market.jpeg","linkMd5":"080786efe0ebe70a4f0037787033b45b","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx32/cdn6@2020_3/2020/08/23/15-18-07-828_5c6f3871ce7f6770.webp","metaImg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/Impact-of-COVID-19-in-the-Crypto-Market.jpeg","destWidth":300,"destHeight":200,"sourceBytes":9599,"destBytes":9648,"author":"Adedeji Adewale","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/Impact-of-COVID-19-in-the-Crypto-Market.jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx32/cdn6@2020_3/2020/08/23/15-18-07-828_5c6f3871ce7f6770.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598195877927},{"createdTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:55","updatedTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:55","title":"Legacies Evolve; Promises Don’t: Pathstone’s Approach to Multigenerational Financial Stewardship","link":"https://readwrite.com/?p=172994","description":"<div><a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/06/22/legacies-evolve-promises-dont-pathstones-approach-to-multigenerational-financial-stewardship/\" title=\"Legacies Evolve; Promises Don’t: Pathstone’s Approach to Multigenerational Financial Stewardship\"><img width=\"300\" height=\"200\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/Screen-Shot-2020-06-16-at-11.14.22-AM-300x200.png\" class=\"attachment-medium size-medium wp-post-image\" alt=\"\" style=\"margin-bottom: 15px;\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/Screen-Shot-2020-06-16-at-11.14.22-AM-300x200.png 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/Screen-Shot-2020-06-16-at-11.14.22-AM-240x160.png 240w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/Screen-Shot-2020-06-16-at-11.14.22-AM.png 882w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px\" /></a></div><p>In life, we all run our own race. But where we start, as well as where we wind up, depends in part on the generations that came before us. </p>\n<p>Coaching families through those choices are family offices like <a href=\"http://pathstone.com\">Pathstone</a>. To the families and foundations it serves, Pathstone makes a promise: to uphold the family’s legacy across generations.</p>\n<p>Pathstone thinks about each family’s legacy like a relay race: The first runner runs a portion of the race in a way that satisfies her. That first generation then passes the baton, while in the lead, to the second runner. The second runner runs the race he wants — while still respecting where he began — before passing the baton again. Each generation extends the lead while choosing its own path.</p>\n<p>Pathstone’s role in the race? Marking the course, training the team, and providing support from start to finish. </p>\n<h2><strong>Many Races, One Constant</strong></h2>\n<p>Just as there are different kinds of races, there are many types of legacies. No one is more meaningful or valuable than the others, per se, but Pathstone knows they need different kinds of support. </p>\n<p>Some family leaders turn to entrepreneurship. When it’s time to exit the company, Pathstone ensures a smooth handoff. In addition to rewarding entrepreneurs financially, Pathstone’s Steve Braverman, co-CEO, <a href=\"https://www.forbes.com/sites/serenitygibbons/2020/06/02/what-to-do-after-your-last-entrepreneurial-exit/#1ba19f553804\">explains in Forbes</a> that exits must be done in a way that ensures the remaining team can build on their vision and legacy. </p>\n<p>For others, <a href=\"https://www.pathstone.com/service/philantropy/\">philanthropy</a> is the finish line. Pathstone helps families not just choose charities to support, but also maximize their tax deductions, structure their contributions, and manage associated funds. Its emphasis on environmental, social, and governance (ESG) investments distinguishes Pathstone among family offices.</p>\n<p>Multigenerational financial stewardship is, to still others, what matters most. Pathstone takes an “all of the above” approach. Financial planning, estate planning, and tax planning make sure the next generation is set up to succeed, while insurance and risk management guard against downside risks to the family’s future.</p>\n<p>Many, of course, want a blend. That’s where Pathstone’s customizable, unbundled financial support comes in. Someone who wants to live well while giving back, for instance, may be interested in advisory services, ESG investments, and financial reporting. An aging entrepreneur focused on wealth preservation might need help with property management and estate planning.</p>\n<p>Those priorities may change across generations. What’s constant is Pathstone’s promise: to ensure the legacy lives on, in whatever form its families choose. </p>\n<h2><strong>Ready, Set, Run</strong></h2>\n<p>To light the way on each family’s legacy, Pathstone has developed a series of initiatives, or paths. Like legacies themselves, they can be mixed and matched according to the family’s needs.</p>\n<p>A favorite among Pathstone clients is <a href=\"https://www.pathstone.com/future-path/\">FuturePath</a>, which works to empower the next generation to be active, responsible stewards of the family’s legacy. FuturePath uses interactive events, peer engagement, and educational resources to ensure the younger generation understands its role in preserving and building the family’s wealth.</p>\n<p>For female family leaders, Pathstone has developed <a href=\"https://www.pathstone.com/her-path/\">HerPath</a>. To help women take control of their financial situation, HerPath creates a space where they can connect over shared challenges and opportunities. HerPath’s nonjudgmental environment is key: Women can freely ask questions about wealth management, forge mentor-mentee relationships, and talk about their plans.</p>\n<p>Supporting philanthropic legacies is <a href=\"https://www.pathstone.com/service/esg-and-impact/\">Pathstone Impact</a>, which helps families align their investments with their mission and values. Using ESG criteria, Pathstone Impact aims to deliver the best of both worlds: strong returns that make a difference.</p>\n<p>To fulfill its promise, however, Pathstone knows its clients can’t be the only ones on the path. For the firm and its employees, it has laid out two additional paths.</p>\n<h2><strong>Every Step of the Way</strong></h2>\n<p>Pathstone’s own legacy mirrors that of its clients: As the generations turn, Pathstone knows its services may need to change, but its core promise must be kept. Its final two paths reflect that.</p>\n<p><a href=\"https://www.pathstone.com/careers/\">CareerPath</a> cultivates Pathstone leaders with diverse backgrounds and perspectives. With the company’s core values — caring, openness, passion, excellence, humility, teamwork, proactivity, innovation, and experience — in mind, CareerPath helps Pathstone stay true to its mission. </p>\n<p>CareerPath’s robust benefits program promotes commitment to the team, which is critical for fulfilling its multigenerational promise. By encouraging employees to make Pathstone their lifelong career, it builds trust and familiarity with the families it serves. </p>\n<p>Because its team members, like its clients, are looking for more than financial support, Pathstone launched Path4Impact in 2019. This initiative falls under the Impact Committee, which produces the <a href=\"https://www.pathstone.com/app/uploads/2020/05/2019-Annual-Impact-Report-Executive-Summary.pdf\">Annual Impact Report</a>. Through this initiative, firm actions, and events, Pathstone works to build a community of which its team can be proud. FitPath, part of the Path4Impact initiative, encourages employees to lead fit, healthy lives with interoffice challenges. </p>\n<p>For itself and its clients, Pathstone recognizes building a legacy takes a lifetime. Upholding it across generations, however, takes even more: a promise, a committed team, and a family that appreciates the gift it&#8217;s been given. </p>\n<p>The post <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/06/22/legacies-evolve-promises-dont-pathstones-approach-to-multigenerational-financial-stewardship/\">Legacies Evolve; Promises Don’t: Pathstone’s Approach to Multigenerational Financial Stewardship</a> appeared first on <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com\">ReadWrite</a>.</p>\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Mon, 22 Jun 2020 14:01:04 +0000","feedId":271,"bgimg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/Screen-Shot-2020-06-16-at-11.14.22-AM.png","linkMd5":"3d6e3a10707fdccc8a3961ecc0a33541","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn87@2020_5/2020/08/23/15-18-26-356_f7c0d932507a6062.webp","metaImg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/Screen-Shot-2020-06-16-at-11.14.22-AM.png","destWidth":882,"destHeight":588,"sourceBytes":799977,"destBytes":41054,"author":"Brad Anderson","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/Screen-Shot-2020-06-16-at-11.14.22-AM-300x200.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx32/cdn36@2020_2/2020/08/23/15-18-17-973_86737c4123fa5a62.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598195875287},{"createdTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:56","updatedTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:56","title":"Why PewDiePie Sees New Opportunities in Live Video’s New Features","link":"https://readwrite.com/?p=171301","description":"<div>\n <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/06/10/why-pewdiepie-sees-new-opportunities-in-live-videos-new-features/\" title=\"Why PewDiePie Sees New Opportunities in Live Video’s New Features\"><img width=\"300\" height=\"185\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Why-PewDiePie-Sees-New-Opportunities-300x185.png\" class=\"attachment-medium size-medium wp-post-image\" alt=\"PewDiePie live video\" style=\"margin-bottom: 15px;\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Why-PewDiePie-Sees-New-Opportunities-300x185.png 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Why-PewDiePie-Sees-New-Opportunities-260x160.png 260w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Why-PewDiePie-Sees-New-Opportunities.png 825w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px\" /></a>\n</div>\n<p>PewDiePie is coming back to YouTube. The Swedish video star, whose real name is Felix Kjellberg, was once the platform’s biggest creator. He left in 2019, taking his live videos to rival upstart <a href=\"https://dlive.tv/m/home/\">DLive</a>. Here is why PewDiePie sees new opportunities in live video’s new features.</p> \n<h3>PewDiePie has had a volatile relationship with Google’s video property.</h3> \n<p>Accusations of anti-Semitism and racism in his video content led to an advertiser backlash, prompting YouTube to temporarily remove ads from his channel. Dlive, a blockchain-powered video site, had promised him a fairer payment system and higher rewards.</p> \n<p>So what brought him back? Why would one of the world’s biggest influencers leave a platform that now gives him complete freedom and a full 75 percent revenue-share? Why would he go back exclusively to a site that’s shown a willingness to exert control and even cut off ad revenues if it doesn’t like his jokes?</p> \n<h3>The simple answer is likely to be that YouTube will give him more money.</h3> \n<p>On Dlive, PewDiePie had attracted <a href=\"https://www.bbc.com/news/technology-52540437\">822,000 followers</a>. On YouTube, his account had more than 102 million subscribers. Even with a higher revenue share, PewDiePie would have been earning much less on the blockchain site than he could make on YouTube.</p> \n<p>But money wasn’t the reason that PewDiePie cited. Instead, he argued that both he and YouTube were putting more investments in live streaming. “Live-streaming is something I’m focusing a lot on in 2020 and beyond,” he said, “so to be able to partner with YouTube and be at the forefront of new product features is special and exciting for the future.”</p> \n<h3>Live streaming offers a number of benefits that aren’t available to recorded video.</h3> \n<p>Live streaming has an urgency — a live video is only live once. It’s interactive: viewers can ask questions and make comments that the broadcaster can answer during the stream. And it’s a format that platforms like Netflix and Hulu just can’t offer. Brands, even personal brands like PewDiePie, can use live streaming to attract an engaged audience and interact with it in real-time.</p> \n<p><strong>YouTube is now in the process of rolling out new features that will help live video streamers.</strong></p> \n<p>Content creators can separate audience figures, allowing them to see how many people watched a video live and how many saw it after the recording was uploaded. Smart replies, like suggested responses in Gmail, let broadcasters shoot back thanks to compliments in the comment stream while they broadcast.</p> \n<p>The <a href=\"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ok3qM3ecWJU\">Live Control Room</a>, which launched officially late last year, makes it easy for streamers to create highlight reels and track viewer activity.</p> \n<p>All of those features are useful but when it comes to live video, YouTube isn’t the only game in town, and even those new features won’t give it an edge.</p> \n<h4>Viewers are more accustomed to interacting with others on social media platforms than they are on a video platform like YouTube.</h4> \n<p>Since the start of the coronavirus pandemic, Facebook has seen a <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/?p=171301/searchenginejournal\">50 percent increase</a> in live video audiences as people stuck at home look for real-time interaction. The company will soon let people watch live videos without a Facebook account. The options will include automatic closed captioning and digital tipping, and provide toll-free phone numbers for charity streams.</p> \n<h3>There’s more in Live Video!</h3> \n<p>Other companies have gone even further — to everyone’s delight. <a href=\"https://be.live/\">Be.Live</a>, a third-party provider, lets streamers on both Facebook and YouTube brand their broadcasts. You can highlight comments and questions on the screen, and even promote specific products. Think: complete with pictures, description, and price — and you have a general idea.</p> \n<h3>Live streaming has always had a value that recorded video just can’t match.</h3> \n<p>No other format lets audiences interact with broadcasters in real-time, ask questions, influence content, and engage with creators. At a time when live concerts are out of bounds, live videos are the closest audiences can currently get to a real-time event.</p> \n<p>It’s no wonder that both YouTube and Facebook are investing in this format — and it’s no wonder that PewDiePie is looking for the platform that will give him the biggest live audience.</p> \n<p>The post <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/06/10/why-pewdiepie-sees-new-opportunities-in-live-videos-new-features/\">Why PewDiePie Sees New Opportunities in Live Video’s New Features</a> appeared first on <a 400;\">COVID-19 has turned the business world on its head, and it&#8217;s difficult to know exactly what’s coming next. As talks of new stimulus packages come and go, the reality that businesses and people may have to face this crisis mostly on their own is beginning to set in. </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400;\">One of the biggest challenges facing companies is <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/04/06/how-technology-can-replace-the-watercooler-and-connect-employees/\">knowing which platforms and services to invest in</a>. While something may be effective now, there’s a chance it will lose value once the crisis is over. Businesses need to make investments that have value, both today and in the future. </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400;\">Thankfully, more businesses are offering products that can help, regardless of the timeline. Take a look at these tech companies making waves:</span></p>\n<h2><b>1. <a href=\"https://www.easyredir.com/\">EasyRedir</a></b></h2>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400;\">As things grow more uncertain, businesses need to be assured that their customers can get to the pages they need without confusion. Companies are updating their onsite content and design at unprecedented rates to respond to the crisis; more than a few pages can get lost in the shuffle. </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400;\">EasyRedir makes URL and redirection management simple. With a platform that non-tech workers can use, EasyRedir allows any member of your organization to take over URL management. This lets you maximize SEO, engage in heavy-duty redesign, and move around content on your site without worrying about security warnings or SSL certificates. If you want users to always be able to find the pages they need, EasyRedir is the platform you need to weather this storm. Beyond, it will help you continue communicating at your best with customers. </span></p>\n<h2><b>2. </b><a href=\"https://zoom.us/\"><b>Zoom</b></a></h2>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400;\">Zoom has already made a major impact on businesses that have sent workers home, but its value will extend far beyond the COVID-19 crisis. The platform enables simple, effective video chats across any distance. Its audio features allow for streamlined communication, even when internet connections are poor. </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400;\">Businesses can benefit from adopting more liberal work-from-home policies after their offices reopen. By allowing more workers to operate from their homes, companies can reduce their overhead on office supplies, travel, and rent. Zoom’s efficacy and reliability make it a serious option for businesses looking to cut expenses without cutting staff. </span></p>\n<h2><b>3. </b><a href=\"https://www.defendify.io/\"><b>Defendify</b></a></h2>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400;\">Shelter-in-place orders may have moved your business online, but that’s where it was headed, anyway. The digital revolution had already forced nearly every company to take some aspects of its business to the internet. This crisis is simply speeding up the process.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400;\">As your company becomes more digital, the risks it faces become greater as well. Most small businesses don&#8217;t have a fully equipped cybersecurity team ready to combat the threats they may face. That makes platforms like Defendify increasingly necessary options. Defendify offers an all-in-one service that makes it easy to protect your business from digital attacks. Its pricing is tailored to small businesses, making it an affordable way to keep your company safe, both today and tomorrow.</span></p>\n<h2><strong>4.</strong> <a href=\"https://asana.com/\"><b></b><b>Asana</b></a></h2>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400;\">If your business doesn’t have functional project management software, it needs some — now. Spread-out teams and digital communication are particularly nasty beasts for managers, but the right platform can alleviate some of the issues that come with them. </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400;\">While each business will need different things from its project management platform, Asana is one of the best. By striking the perfect balance between depth and functionality, Asana works for projects both big and small. Of particular note is its recent incorporation of automation into its platform. This can streamline workflows and correct for errors automatically, saving you time and money in the process. </span></p>\n<h2><strong>5.</strong> <a href=\"https://quickbooks.intuit.com/\"><b></b><b>QuickBooks</b></a></h2>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400;\">Never has it been more important to account for every last dollar. Businesses need financial software that works, but they&#8217;re hesitant to make the investment — many of the best platforms are major expenses in their own right. However, even in uncertain times, it’s important to invest in software that can last in the long run and not just be a temporary fix. </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400;\">QuickBooks offers an entire suite of accounting, invoicing, payment, project tracking, and payroll tools. By incorporating deep functionality within simple design, the platform makes it easy for anyone to get a handle on company finances. That prevents you from wasting time crunching numbers when you should be focusing on your business’s essential operations. There are different plans to choose from, so making the initial step during uncertain times can lead to a great long-term investment as your company grows. You can upgrade your plan without losing your financial history.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400;\">Your business needs platforms it can rely on, ones that aren’t simply short-term investments. By checking out the options on this list, you can protect yourself against the current economic fallout while promoting your company’s success well into the future. </span></p>\n<p>The post <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com\">ReadWrite</a>.</p>\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Tue, 14 Apr 2020 07:00:11 +0000","feedId":271,"bgimg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/Screen-Shot-2020-04-08-at-9.12.39-AM.png","linkMd5":"b03d05d815779509a6e7596ea12e10d6","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx14/cdn51@2020_4/2020/08/23/15-18-24-475_9072c05a152c9dc8.webp","metaImg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/Screen-Shot-2020-04-08-at-9.12.39-AM.png","destWidth":790,"destHeight":591,"sourceBytes":760686,"destBytes":72294,"author":"Brad Anderson","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/Screen-Shot-2020-04-08-at-9.12.39-AM-300x224.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx1/cdn15@2020_2/2020/08/23/15-18-17-055_09c0ba057f373ca8.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598195878762},{"createdTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:58","updatedTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:58","title":"12 Lesser-Known IoT Protocols You Wished You Knew About Earlier","link":"https://readwrite.com/?p=168375","description":"<div><a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/04/29/12-lesser-known-iot-protocols-you-wished-you-knew-about-earlier/\" title=\"12 Lesser-Known IoT Protocols You Wished You Knew About Earlier\"><img width=\"300\" height=\"185\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/12-Lesser-Known-IoT-Protocols-You-Wished-You-Knew-About-Earlier-1-300x185.png\" class=\"attachment-medium size-medium wp-post-image\" alt=\"iot protocol\" style=\"margin-bottom: 15px;\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/12-Lesser-Known-IoT-Protocols-You-Wished-You-Knew-About-Earlier-1-300x185.png 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/12-Lesser-Known-IoT-Protocols-You-Wished-You-Knew-About-Earlier-1-260x160.png 260w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/12-Lesser-Known-IoT-Protocols-You-Wished-You-Knew-About-Earlier-1.png 825w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px\" /></a></div><p>According to a Gartner <u><a href=\"https://www.gartner.com/en/newsroom/press-releases/2018-11-07-gartner-identifies-top-10-strategic-iot-technologies-and-trends\">prediction</a></u>, there will be <strong>25 billion</strong> connected devices by 2021, which is significantly higher than their previous estimate of <strong>20.4 billion</strong> devices in 2020. IDC <u><a href=\"https://idc-cema.com/dwn/SF_177701/driving_the_digital_agenda_requires_strategic_architecture_rosen_idc.pdf\">data</a></u> shows that <strong>152,000</strong> IoT devices will connect to the internet every minute by 2025. Yes, you read that right, 152,000 devices per minute. These statistics clearly show exponential growth in the number of connected devices.</p>\n<p>Just like any other technology, IoT also has its fair share of challenges, which could hamper its wider adoption. The good news is that <u><a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/05/19/what-to-expect-from-a-modern-iot-platform-in-2019/\">modern IoT platforms</a></u> are evolving to deal with future challenges. <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/04/04/cyber-security-modern-technology-and-business-threats/\">Security and privacy</a> have always been the Achilles heels of IoT devices. The lack of standards and protocols complicates matters even more. Thankfully, this issue has been resolved after the introduction of many new IoT protocols.  Unfortunately, a small <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/01/04/why-you-need-to-consider-iot-in-improving-customer-experience/\">percentage of enterprises</a> know about these IoT protocols, let alone implement them.</p>\n<p>In this article, you will learn about <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/02/25/iot-can-put-your-data-at-risk-heres-how/\">IoT communication protocols</a> and standards that no one told you before.</p>\n<h2>1.      ZigBee</h2>\n<p>Initially designed to fulfill industrial needs instead of consumer needs, ZigBee is an ideal choice for industrial sites where data needs to transfer in small quantities between different buildings or homes. It operates at a frequency of <strong>2.4 GHz</strong>. Famous for supporting low powered, scalable, and secure solutions, ZigBee 3.0 has converted the protocol into a single standard while making it easy to implement at the same time.</p>\n<h2>2.      MQTT IoT</h2>\n<p>MQTT stands for <strong>Message Queue Telemetry Transport</strong>. Developed way back in 1999 by Arlen Nipper from Arcom and Andy Stanford Clark of IBM, it is basically a messaging protocol that enables device communication and helps users monitor their IoT devices from a remote location. MQTT has long been used for collecting data from electrical devices.</p>\n<p>MQTT protocol has three key components:</p>\n<ul>\n<li>Subscriber</li>\n<li>Publisher</li>\n<li>Broker</li>\n</ul>\n<p>Publisher generates data and sends that data to the subscriber with the help of a broker. Brokers serve as a middleman whose responsibility is to ensure security and privacy of data being transmitted between publishers and subscribers. To make this possible, it authorizes and authenticates both subscribers and publishers.</p>\n<h2>3.      CoAP</h2>\n<p>CoAP stands for <strong>Constrained Application Protocols</strong>. Primarily designed for restricted smart devices, CoAP is the best option for devices that has a restricted community. What makes it stand out is its ability to work well even with HTTP protocols. In fact, it shares a lot of similarities and a few differences with HTTP protocols.</p>\n<p>For instance, it is based on the same restful architecture that HTTP uses. Secondly, both HTTP and CoAP take advantage of UDP for smaller data transmission. One of the main differences between HTTP and CoAP is in terms of ambiguity. CoAP eliminates the ambiguity associated with HTTP get, put up, delete commands.</p>\n<h2>4.      DDS</h2>\n<p>DDS stands for <strong>Data Distribution Service</strong>. Facilitating machine to machine communication, this protocol is capable of handling high performance, real-time communication between machines.</p>\n<p>DDS comprises of two main layers:</p>\n<ul>\n<li>Data-Centric Publish-Subscribe (DSPs)</li>\n<li>Data Local Reconstruction Layer (DLRL)</li>\n</ul>\n<p>The job of Data-Centric Publish-Subscribe is to deliver information to subscribers while the role of the data local reconstruction layer is to facilitate this process by offering an interface to Data-Centric Publish-Subscribe. What makes DDS unique is its ability to transfer data to both low footprint devices and cloud. This protocol was developed by Object Management Group in 2004.</p>\n<h2>5.      AMQP</h2>\n<p>AMQP stands for <strong>Advanced Messaging Queuing Protocol</strong>. It is an application layer protocol that is primarily designed for middleware and is message-oriented in nature. What makes AMQP special is the fact that it is considered as a globally standardized IoT messaging protocol.</p>\n<p>AMQP protocol has three key elements:</p>\n<ul>\n<li>Exchange</li>\n<li>Message Queue</li>\n<li>Binding</li>\n</ul>\n<p>The exchange role is to put the message together and arrange it in a queue while the message queue is responsible for storing the message. As the name suggests, the binding element acts as a bridge between the exchange component and message queue components.</p>\n<h2>6.      LoRaWAN</h2>\n<p>LoRaWAN stands for <strong>Long Range Wide Area Network</strong>. Made for <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/08/22/how-companies-can-leverage-data-protection-to-restore-trust-in-iot/\">supporting vast networks with millions</a> of low powered devices, it is one of the best IoT protocols for <u><a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/11/22/how-iot-will-play-an-important-role-in-traffic-management-for-smart-cities/\">smart cities</a></u>. In addition to this, it is also being used to secure two-way communication.</p>\n<p>It’s <strong>15 km</strong> long range in suburban areas distinguishes it from other IoT protocols.  In urban areas, the range stays between <strong>2 to 5 km</strong>. Even though the frequency might vary from network to network, it’s ability to communicate over long distances makes it a great IoT protocol.</p>\n<h2>7.      Z-Wave</h2>\n<p>Z-Wave IoT protocol focuses on low powered radio frequency communication. This protocol can come in handy in <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/12/26/iot-and-home-automation-is-it-the-future/\">home automation applications</a>. Unlike wireless network technologies such as Wi-Fi, it offers much better protection, low latency and other features. Since it works in <strong>sub-1 GHz band</strong>. The range is anywhere from <strong>30 to 100 meters</strong>. Data transfer rate is from <strong>40 to 100 kilobits per second</strong>. Z-wave can give you cloud access and acts as a bridge that connects different components from one another.</p>\n<h2>8.      SigFox</h2>\n<p>Operating in the middle of Wi-Fi and cellular, Sigfox takes advantage of ISM bands. Since these bands are free to use that is why you don’t even need to buy licenses to use this IoT protocol. Sigfox offers low data transfer speeds and consumes low power by using a technology called Ultra Narrow Band.</p>\n<p>One of the biggest downsides of using this IoT protocol is that you are only allowed to transmit data on a narrow spectrum but more than makes up for it with its low power consumption. All this makes it <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/02/06/its-time-to-truly-consider-the-privacy-implications-of-iot/\">one of the best IoT protocols</a> for machine-to-machine communication.</p>\n<p>We are already seeing its applications in smart meters, streetlights, security devices, patient monitors and environment, and agriculture-based sensors across Europe. In rural environments, this protocol can work in the <strong>30-50 km</strong> range and <strong>3-10 km</strong> in urban environments.</p>\n<h2>9.      Thread</h2>\n<p>Designed by inventor of Nest, famous <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/02/17/the-diminishing-returns-of-outsourcing-and-the-fallacy-of-automation/\">home automation solution</a> provider, Thread is the new entrant in the IoT protocol game, but it has shown immense promise. It is basically an IPv6 based networking protocol that is based on 6LowPAN. Initially developed to complement Wi-Fi networks in a home environment, it has expanded its applications substantially since then.  Capable of handling <strong>250 nodes</strong> with authentication and encryption, the thread works at a frequency of <strong>2.4 GHz </strong>and has a range of <strong>10 to 30 meters</strong>. Moreover, it can also support mesh networking within radio transceivers.</p>\n<h2>10. EnOcean</h2>\n<p>By far, the most innovative IoT protocol, EnOcean takes a completely different approach to IoT connectivity. Instead of following the traditional pattern, it leverages energy harvesting and <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/12/26/iot-and-home-automation-is-it-the-future/\">wireless sensing capabilities</a>. This makes it a perfect choice for devices that have to alert users based on changing situations. For instance, notify device owners about changes in temperature and ligating conditions.</p>\n<p>Even though its applications are fairly limited to home automation, logistics, transportation and industrial automation but we might see its applications grow in different industries in the future. Covering a range of <strong>300 meters</strong> in outdoor environment and <strong>30 meters</strong> in indoor setup, this IoT protocol works on the frequency of <strong>315 MHz, 868 MHz and 902 MHz.</strong></p>\n<h2>11. 6LowPAN</h2>\n<p>LowPAN stands for <strong>Low Power Personal Area Network</strong>. 6LowPAN is basically a network protocol that uses its own header compression and encapsulation mechanism. The physical layer this protocol works on and the frequency band it uses makes it compatible with multiple communication platforms such as Wi-Fi, sub-1 GHz ISM, and Ethernet.</p>\n<p>Since this protocol is based on IPv6, it can easily handle millions of IoT devices. That is not all, each IoT device can have their unique IP address, which makes it easy for device owners to track devices and <u><a href=\"https://hostnoc.com/how-businesses-beef-up-cybersecurity/\">improve their security</a></u>. With IPv6 offering transportation systems for <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/03/09/is-the-iot-nothing-more-than-a-sophisticated-spy-network/\">sophisticated control systems</a> and allowing businesses to communicate with devices too by consuming less power and costing your less money, we might see its popularity grow in future.</p>\n<h2>12. Neul</h2>\n<p>Just like Sigfox, Neul also uses a sub-1 GHz band. It uses different frequencies ranging from <strong>470 MHz to 900 MHz</strong> to create low power, high coverage, and <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2018/09/07/why-small-businesses-need-to-be-vigilant-about-iot-security-too/\">low-cost wireless networks</a>.  It uses Weightless communication technology, which is a new wireless wide area network technology designed to replace existing communication technologies such as GPRS, CDMA, 3G, and 4G LTE for IoT devices. IoT devices that use this protocol consume anywhere from <strong>20 to 30</strong> mA of power and can transmit data at a rate anywhere from <strong>100 bits per second to 100 kilobits per second</strong>.</p>\n<p>Which IoT protocols and standards do you <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/12/12/why-iot-apps-are-eating-device-interfaces/\">use for communications</a>? Share it with us in the comments section below.</p>\n<p>The post <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/04/29/12-lesser-known-iot-protocols-you-wished-you-knew-about-earlier/\">12 Lesser-Known IoT Protocols You Wished You Knew About Earlier</a> appeared first on <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com\">ReadWrite</a>.</p>\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Wed, 29 Apr 2020 20:00:03 +0000","feedId":271,"bgimg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/12-Lesser-Known-IoT-Protocols-You-Wished-You-Knew-About-Earlier-1.png","linkMd5":"e3b8ef0035ad26713db2ef3b360984d9","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx1/cdn19@2020_3/2020/08/23/15-18-24-861_391c207a3f58471f.webp","metaImg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/12-Lesser-Known-IoT-Protocols-You-Wished-You-Knew-About-Earlier-1.png","destWidth":825,"destHeight":510,"sourceBytes":720049,"destBytes":64716,"author":"Syed Hassan","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/12-Lesser-Known-IoT-Protocols-You-Wished-You-Knew-About-Earlier-1-300x185.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx18/cdn31@2020_6/2020/08/23/15-18-18-723_825d89ea2d159412.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598195878276},{"createdTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:54","updatedTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:54","title":"New Niches for Startups Created by the COVID-19 Pandemic","link":"https://readwrite.com/?p=171899","description":"<div><a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/06/12/new-niches-for-startups-created-by-the-covid-19-pandemic/\" title=\"New Niches for Startups Created by the COVID-19 Pandemic\"><img width=\"300\" height=\"234\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/New-Niches-for-Startups-Created-by-the-COVID-19-Pandemic-300x234.png\" class=\"attachment-medium size-medium wp-post-image\" alt=\"niches startups created by covid\" style=\"margin-bottom: 15px;\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/New-Niches-for-Startups-Created-by-the-COVID-19-Pandemic-300x234.png 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/New-Niches-for-Startups-Created-by-the-COVID-19-Pandemic-205x160.png 205w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/New-Niches-for-Startups-Created-by-the-COVID-19-Pandemic.png 666w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px\" /></a></div><p>Remote work and social distancing. These two approaches will define our lives behind 2020. The COVID-19 pandemic has put everyone into a new reality. The transition from our traditional lifestyle to isolation mode was anything but smooth. The whole world had to learn how to work and learn remotely and organize their leisure without leaving their homes. But the lockdown has also created a few niches for startups that no one could think of before.</p>\n<p>A few months ago, we couldn’t imagine the world without public transport and traffic jams, busy restaurants and shopping malls, crowded parties and concerts. Now it is here. Governments shut down the long-awaited innovation programs to invest in <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2018/12/19/healthcare-is-booming-hand-in-hand-with-the-technology-industry/\">healthcare technology</a> &#8211; the industry that is getting the most attention nowadays. And for millions of people around the world, real-life has gone online &#8211; with <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/01/08/how-online-shopping-is-evolving-with-the-times/\">evolving online shopping</a>, online classes, and even online parties.</p>\n<p>Despite restrictions easing in the vast majority of countries, no one can say when the lockdown will be completely over. Do we return to our normal lives this summer? Or the coming two years will be shaped by social distancing due to possible pandemic comeback?</p>\n<p>One thing is already clear: we are in the <a href=\"https://blogs.imf.org/2020/04/14/the-great-lockdown-worst-economic-downturn-since-the-great-depression/\">worst economic downturn since the Great Depression</a>. The <a href=\"https://www.weforum.org/agenda/2020/05/coronavirus-unemployment-jobs-work-impact-g7-pandemic/\">unemployment rate</a> has increased drastically. Many small businesses shut down; great economies enter the recession. This doesn&#8217;t sound optimistic, right?</p>\n<p>But things are not that bad. The crisis opens many possibilities, as well. Here we discuss four industries that are experiencing a hard upgrade right now. If you want your company to be at the edge of improvements &#8211; hurry up and discover the potential startup niches!</p>\n<h2>Remote interaction &#8211; the new reality for private communication</h2>\n<p>For years, Zoom was a niche solution for online conferences and video calls. Since February 2020, it is the number one platform for all kinds of events: from birthday parties and blind dates to university classes and even city council meetings.</p>\n<p>Currently, this is a forced measure, but experts predict that virtual meetings will become a substantial part of our reality even after the pandemic is over. Generation Z (also called Zoomers &#8211; what a coincidence!) prefer online communication to personal meetings. But the tools currently available still can&#8217;t provide the whole spectrum of features the young users are searching for. And this is one of the niches for a startup founder to investigate.</p>\n<p>What do the myriad of online communication tools miss? User orientation, social features, and entertainment.</p>\n<p>Zoom and the alike were built exclusively for business needs. Companies that couldn’t afford a <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/01/18/why-your-business-needs-custom-internal-communication/\">custom internal communication system</a> opted for a cost-effective SaaS solution. Their functionality fits the conference room, but not a virtual family lunch or a coffee-break. <a href=\"https://www.cnet.com/news/zoom-security-issues-zoombombings-continue-include-racist-language-and-child-abuse/\">Zoom security issues</a> are also a reason to look for alternatives.</p>\n<p>Some of the tools start to play with enabling masks or changing backgrounds, but the complex solution for entertaining group calls is about to arrive.</p>\n<p>There&#8217;s still the gap. And this is one of the potential startup niches to hit with a new app, right?</p>\n<p>First of all, analyze the apps popular among Zoomers right now. What features make them so unique? Filters, instant reactions, microformats, geolocation, augmented reality or interactive 3D models, built-in mini-games, group film streaming, etc. &#8211; any idea could be the game-changer.</p>\n<h2>To the door delivery &#8211; eliminating the need for traditional shopping</h2>\n<p>E-commerce was developing gradually, but it seemed like the full transition to online shopping was still a few decades away. Some buyers were not ready to decide on the product without having seen it with their own eyes; some others didn&#8217;t trust the seller they can&#8217;t personally talk to.</p>\n<p>And now we are here. The only type of shopping that is available during the lockdown is online shopping. And it turns out that basically everything can be delivered to the door: food, cosmetics, consumer electronics, furniture, gardening tools, and pet care products. Now that everyone was forced to try e-commerce, they could evaluate the convenience of the process and a chance to save much time. And after taking this first step, many won&#8217;t even return to classical shopping.</p>\n<p>We already watch <a href=\"https://www.nytimes.com/interactive/2020/04/11/business/economy/coronavirus-us-economy-spending.html\">online commerce making a great leap ahead</a>. And when speaking of <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/04/23/changing-e-commerce-landscape-global-trends-for-2019-and-beyond/\">global e-commerce trends</a>, to-the-door delivery is definitely one of the strongest ones. So we expect a growing number of P2P logistics services. This seems like one of the solid startup niches, right?</p>\n<p>The international companies of on-demand delivery like Uber Eats, DoorDash, Glovo focused on food delivery from restaurants first. Now they expand their services and are ready to bring anything to the door of their clients. However, high-quality delivery is still not available in the majority of smaller cities all around the globe. This means millions of people are waiting for a local company to satisfy their needs.</p>\n<p>Until such a solution appears, local businesses hire carriers or cooperate with taxi companies to deliver their products while clients choose to stay home.</p>\n<p>For many small businesses, the COVID-19 pandemic was an impulse to go beyond their physical shops and start selling online. E-commerce is booming, so do related services like delivery.</p>\n<h2>Education erasing the borders</h2>\n<p>If this crisis happened twenty or even ten years ago, millions of teachers and tutors, music and art instructors, fitness trainers would become unemployed in the blink of an eye. The lockdown would make their further work impossible as such.</p>\n<p>However, the technologies we have in 2020 make education, art, and sport accessible to everyone at home. And what is even more important &#8211; online classes have no geographical limits. You can have an online session with a trainer from the gym on the opposite side of the street, or join the online training held by the Olympics champion.</p>\n<p>Just as online shopping, e-learning was available for years. However, only a few of us have tried learning remotely. The reasons? Some complain about the lack of personal contact and instant feedback from the instructor; the others question their motivation and the ability to do their best while not being observed by a teacher.</p>\n<p>But the lockdown happened, and thousands of people were at home without the possibility of visiting schools and universities, art classes, language courses, and sports sections. They have a lot of free time, and they are bored with four walls. However, they have the internet. So the time for online classes and training sessions comes. Many users have tried remote learning for the first time, and they are likely to keep the tradition after the quarantine is over.</p>\n<h3>Online education as one of the prospective startup niches.</h3>\n<p>What does this mean for the teachers, artists, fitness instructors, etc.? The geographical limits are down. Even living in a village, you can have hundreds of clients from any part of the country or even abroad.</p>\n<p>Learning centers, language schools, fitness centers, and art clubs have the needed resources for a great leap. Adopt e-learning to expand to new markets.</p>\n<p>There are many platforms for online classes on the market; none of them is perfect, though. Consider it as one of the possible startup niches. You can build a software tool to make remote classes even more effective, or provide a marketplace platform for individual tutors. This type of application will be of great importance in the next few years.</p>\n<p>On the other hand, think of the perspectives of the academic year 2020-2021. The chances are that it may be interrupted by the new wave of coronavirus. And this time, schools and universities want to be ready for this. Now they are working on the programs of remote classes and experimenting with different technical solutions.</p>\n<p>Some renowned universities can afford the development of custom learning platforms. The rest of the educational facilities is looking for a ready solution to fit the needs of both professors and students. If you have deep experience in this domain, developing a Software as a Service platform for universities and colleagues may be a chance you shouldn&#8217;t miss.</p>\n<h2>Entertainment has gone online</h2>\n<p>The COVID-19 lockdown has taken work and education to online. The same happened to the entertainment industry. Now when cinemas are closed, we want to watch movies online. When a so awaited music festival is canceled, we want to listen to our favorite band online.</p>\n<p>Our Italian vacation was postponed, but we still want to enjoy the wine and pizza while watching an online excursion around Venice.</p>\n<p>When we can&#8217;t hang out with friends, we are looking for new fascinating things we can do together online. Something like an online game or a simultaneous cooking session?</p>\n<p>The online entertainment is getting huge benefits from the coronavirus crisis. Basically, the industry got rid of all the competition overnight. No more hard choices like &#8220;Should I go out with friends tonight, or would I better watch another season of that hot show.&#8221; Everyone chooses the show now. And there is no clear evidence that the situation will change soon. Startup niches in the entertainment industry look especially attractive now.</p>\n<p>Streaming services, games, and other types of online entertainment are booming. Will this remain the same after the lockdown when (or if?) the competition with offline events is back? Everything depends. At this time, new habits are born. If the new service manages to become a routine for a particular group of users &#8211; the exam is passed, it will still be popular after we are again allowed to enjoy our lives to the fullest.</p>\n<h3>How to hook your users?</h3>\n<p>Analyze the new gaps that appeared in everyday life.</p>\n<p>One day we used to go to the cinema with friends, eat popcorn, whisper funny comments to your neighbor, and discuss the movie with all the group afterward. This option is definitely missed now. And Netflix has it covered with its new service <a href=\"https://www.netflixparty.com/\">Netflix Party</a>. It enables you to share the watch the link to a movie or TV show with your friends, watch it simultaneously and exchange reactions, comments, or screenshots in real-time. More than 1,000,000 people already use Netflix Party, and the number will keep increasing during (and most likely after) the lockdown.</p>\n<p>This is an example of how a simple solution has covered the needs of thousands of people.</p>\n<p>It is much easier to enter the online entertainment industry now than it was a few months ago. This is a once in a lifetime opportunity, so don&#8217;t miss it.</p>\n<h2>What to expect from 2020 and beyond?</h2>\n<p>Unfortunately, many businesses won&#8217;t survive the coronavirus crisis. But a few of them will adjust to the new reality. Those who are brave and wise will quickly innovate. We watch companies and individuals seeking ideas to make social distancing more comfortable and enjoyable for everyone.</p>\n<p>These innovators will succeed.</p>\n<p><em>Image Credit: Elly Fairytale; Pexels</em></p>\n<p>The post <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/06/12/new-niches-for-startups-created-by-the-covid-19-pandemic/\">New Niches for Startups Created by the COVID-19 Pandemic</a> appeared first on <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com\">ReadWrite</a>.</p>\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Fri, 12 Jun 2020 15:00:36 +0000","feedId":271,"bgimg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/New-Niches-for-Startups-Created-by-the-COVID-19-Pandemic-300x234.png","linkMd5":"324f13f597ccd7934b3fd8f051e837e3","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx8/cdn22@2020_6/2020/08/23/15-18-07-813_76d9dc87905f78c0.webp","destWidth":300,"destHeight":234,"sourceBytes":104336,"destBytes":8454,"author":"Sofiya Merenych","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/New-Niches-for-Startups-Created-by-the-COVID-19-Pandemic-300x234.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx8/cdn22@2020_6/2020/08/23/15-18-07-813_76d9dc87905f78c0.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598195874872},{"createdTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:58","updatedTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:58","title":"How to Become an Expert Copywriter 8 Tricks to Learn","link":"https://readwrite.com/?p=167288","description":"<div><a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/04/04/how-to-become-an-expert-copywriter-8-tricks-to-learn/\" title=\"How to Become an Expert Copywriter 8 Tricks to Learn\"><img width=\"300\" height=\"200\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/How-to-Become-an-Expert-Copywriter-8-Tricks-to-Learn-300x200.jpg\" class=\"attachment-medium size-medium wp-post-image\" alt=\"copywriter\" style=\"margin-bottom: 15px;\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/How-to-Become-an-Expert-Copywriter-8-Tricks-to-Learn-300x200.jpg 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/How-to-Become-an-Expert-Copywriter-8-Tricks-to-Learn-900x600.jpg 900w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/How-to-Become-an-Expert-Copywriter-8-Tricks-to-Learn-240x160.jpg 240w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/How-to-Become-an-Expert-Copywriter-8-Tricks-to-Learn-1536x1024.jpg 1536w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/How-to-Become-an-Expert-Copywriter-8-Tricks-to-Learn.jpg 1920w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px\" /></a></div><p>Content has claimed its place in the most significant approaches. The changing Google algorithm updates emphasize the use of best SEO practices, which demands quality content. Therefore, the importance of a good copywriter increase in the market, and simultaneously, surging demand for experienced copywriters is created. Here is how to become an expert copywriter and eight tricks to learn.</p>\n<p>And if you are inclined towards <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2018/10/19/if-you-arent-using-sms-in-your-business-nows-the-time-to-start/\">crafting the best support using words</a>, this field can help you earn benefits and a good paycheck with the right tips and tricks followed.</p>\n<h2>Becoming a Copywriter: Skills Required</h2>\n<p>A copywriter is required to <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2018/08/07/how-to-use-cornerstone-content-to-kick-start-automatic-seo/\">craft quality content to kickstart automatic SEO</a> and also need to complete it within the given deadline to produce the best results. Hence, the requirement for speed and command over the language is very high to generate user-centric content. Apart from this, copywriters are expected to perform several other duties along with writing, engaging content- proofreading, editing, researching, and more.</p>\n<p>But to become an expert copywriter, you need to find out what your strengths are and focus on them to provide the best results and grow your career.</p>\n<h2>8 Tips to Become an Expert Copywriter</h2>\n<p>The signs of an expert writer are enough to alarm a company of their skills. However, to become the next great writer in this competitive market, there are many more constraints to look for and consider to lead your bright and successful career.</p>\n<h4>#1. Know What You Are Doing.</h4>\n<p>Understand and know your market. Irrespective of the domain you are hired for, it is necessary to keep your senses working all the time to find out the trends of your niche. An expert copywriter is expected to perform thorough research of the market to find out the <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/12/23/how-to-validate-your-startup-idea/\">best ideas</a> to write for startups and even business giants.</p>\n<p>Relevant content is one of the <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/08/19/small-business-marketing-strategies-that-will-work-for-you/\">best marketing strategies</a> which can help the key to rank high in Google, and ultimately it magnifies the efforts of SEO to produce the best results. The characteristics of quality content are: it is relevant and engaging while remaining reader-centric at the same time.</p>\n<p>If you can find your best pace of writing with current events of your niche, this works in your favor to score a good number of reads and keep your content SEO-oriented as well.</p>\n<h4>#2. Find Your Type, Match the Vibe.</h4>\n<p>There is a multitude of <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/02/11/outsource-or-automate-how-to-strategically-take-tasks-off-your-plate/\">copywriter jobs available in the market</a>. You have to decide on a particular field or niche where your interest lies. Whether you prefer writing press releases, creating exciting and creative social media posts, branding and advertising, writing articles for blogs, and more- these all belong to different niches. But the ultimate decision depends upon you.</p>\n<p>You can choose the field where your comfort zone is or can take up a challenge to shape up your resume with a plethora of skills. However, if you are a beginner in this field, you can take up any and become an expert with hard work.</p>\n<p><strong>P.S</strong>.: The <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/12/26/blockchain-marketing-6-effective-ways-to-boost-your-seo-in-2020/\">demand for SEO-oriented</a> content is rising, and it is an excellent field to enter for beginners. But the one to decide your field should be you. Observe what you are best at performing and get your creative juices flowing by generating right and required content for your organization.</p>\n<h4>#3. Understand Reality.</h4>\n<p>The world of a copywriter is highly dynamic. With the changing market scenarios, it becomes crucial to keep up with updates of the industry. However, the false promises of higher pay grade from the beginning are an urban myth of this industry. No copywriter can earn more without prior experience and expertise.</p>\n<p>It asks for thorough practices and complete focus upon what&#8217;s best for the industry to keep your pay scales as per your preference. To make your dream of earning a good sum through quality content come true, a lot of hard work and skill development practices is required. You can use your own blog to demonstrate your excellent writing skills, but without prior experience of working in the same field, the salary and packages offered might not match your imagined ones.</p>\n<h4>#4. Experience Limits, They Do Great.</h4>\n<p>If you want to improve your career as a copywriter, it is best to place limits on how you promote yourself. Placing a limit doesn&#8217;t include limiting your package and salary expectations, but it does impact the marketing of your content that you do to promote your efforts.</p>\n<p>As stated earlier, earning expertise in any one particular skill helps you more than adding a plethora of skills in your resume that you don&#8217;t know about.</p>\n<p>Recruiters understand their candidates and applicants well, and an applicant adding up more skills that are difficult to develop in a shorter time gets exit from their list of suitable applicants. Therefore, be realistic and be specific of the skillset you possess.</p>\n<h4>#5. Grammar is Very Important.</h4>\n<p>Grammar makes or breaks your game. Whether you are writing for your current employer or finishing up your own profile, <a href=\"https://hackersof.com/write-good-seo-content-inspires-readers/\">make sure your content is grammatically correct to impress your audience</a>. The spelling errors, punctuation mistakes, sentence formation errors, and more get highlighted when a reader starts reading the article and leaves a negative impression of the writer.</p>\n<p>If you are not comfortable with the use of heavy jargon, then don&#8217;t use them. Ensure to keep your content straightforward and easy to read. For example, if you are crafting content around a keyword clone, then do not use excess jargon or difficult words in your content. A quality content constructed with good use of grammar and thorough knowledge of the topic selected gets a good boost and support from readers.</p>\n<h4>#6. Social Media to the Rescue.</h4>\n<p><a href=\"https://www.statista.com/statistics/278414/number-of-worldwide-social-network-users/\">The number of social media users is hiking by leaps and bounds</a>. These social media platforms have become one of the most significant resources to hire developers for developing mobile apps, for candidates to seek various job opportunities, and also for numerous people to connect with their loved ones. You can also make the most out of it and can win the market in no time.</p>\n<p>For copywriters, it is easier to get connected with the brand or the company they wish to work for through social media platforms like Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn, or any other to get highlighted. When you reach the companies through their<a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/03/29/how-to-provide-customer-support-on-social-media-faster/\"> social media channels</a>, this poses a chance of getting connected to their employee (who handles their social media channels) and gets highlighted. This simple trick leads you closer to a company but is often not used by many.</p>\n<h4>#7. Keep in Touch</h4>\n<p>The keep in touch tip applies to all of the <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/03/18/5-ways-artificial-intelligence-is-transforming-recruitment-in-2019/\">candidates searching for their ideal job</a>. The modern world has created a way to pitch a company from any end of the world within seconds. As the vacancies at popular organizations often get taken quickly, many candidates lose their hope of getting selected.</p>\n<p>But the key is to keep in touch. Whether a company selects you or not, the candidate who keeps in touch lands a chance to work at the same organization when any relevant vacancy opens in the future. Therefore, never lose hope and keep trying to maintain your communication alive with the organization you are aiming to work for.</p>\n<h3>#8. Try It Out and Measure Your Productivity.</h3>\n<p>A copywriter has to do the job throughout the day. Professional <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/01/27/how-will-ai-change-the-future-of-seo/\">copywriting and freelance copywriting</a> are entirely different. If you have developed it as your hobby or a fun activity for passing your time, you need to ensure you are happy to do it when it becomes a full day activity for you.</p>\n<p>Therefore, before jumping right in, ensure to check whether you are <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/12/04/how-ar-and-vr-will-enhance-customer-experience-pending/\">comfortable with this role</a> and the responsibilities entitled. Measure your business and employees&#8217; productivity throughout the day and find out if you love your job or not. If copywriting remains a fun activity for you, you can continue and excel at doing the same.</p>\n<p>But if it becomes a burden and starts boring you, you might not be in the right direction. Find out where your interest lies to engage yourself entirely in your work.</p>\n<h5><strong>Conclusion</strong></h5>\n<p>A <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/10/08/19-ppc-mistakes-that-can-demolish-your-business-for-good/\">professional copywriter</a> of today knows to craft engaging content when assigned any work. The digital marketing and media of today demand them to keep working at the best pace without compromising the content quality.</p>\n<p>To become an expert copywriter of the industry, <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/03/26/the-modern-workplace-demands-better-visibility/\">relevant experience and expertise</a> of crafting content is required. As well as the copywriter has to walk with the changing trends. By keeping the required factors in mind, a beginner can learn how to compel posts like a professional copywriter to build a successful career in this dynamic field.</p>\n<p>The post <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/04/04/how-to-become-an-expert-copywriter-8-tricks-to-learn/\">How to Become an Expert Copywriter 8 Tricks to Learn</a> appeared first on <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com\">ReadWrite</a>.</p>\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Sat, 04 Apr 2020 18:00:32 +0000","feedId":271,"bgimg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/How-to-Become-an-Expert-Copywriter-8-Tricks-to-Learn.jpg","linkMd5":"aca895df217436fe877e85f998259c7a","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx/cdn39@2020_2/2020/08/23/15-18-22-049_a8f8a27ebba9ab48.webp","metaImg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/How-to-Become-an-Expert-Copywriter-8-Tricks-to-Learn.jpg","destWidth":1920,"destHeight":1280,"sourceBytes":109713,"destBytes":67804,"author":"Jitendra Dabhi","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/How-to-Become-an-Expert-Copywriter-8-Tricks-to-Learn-300x200.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx29/cdn20@2020_1/2020/08/23/15-18-22-592_98d37511b77c59d7.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598195878905},{"createdTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:58","updatedTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:58","title":"VC Funding in 2020: What Investors Look for in Startups","link":"https://readwrite.com/?p=167167","description":"<div><a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/03/31/vc-funding-in-2020-what-investors-look-for-in-startups/\" title=\"VC Funding in 2020: What Investors Look for in Startups\"><img width=\"300\" height=\"185\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/VC-Funding-in-2020-What-Investors-Look-for-in-Startups-300x185.jpg\" class=\"attachment-medium size-medium wp-post-image\" alt=\"vc funding in startups\" style=\"margin-bottom: 15px;\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/VC-Funding-in-2020-What-Investors-Look-for-in-Startups-300x185.jpg 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/VC-Funding-in-2020-What-Investors-Look-for-in-Startups-260x160.jpg 260w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/VC-Funding-in-2020-What-Investors-Look-for-in-Startups.jpg 825w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px\" /></a></div><p>Venture capital investment is one of the top places startups look out for when seeking funding for their business alongside other popular options like angel investing and crowdfunding. Moreso, there is a lot of competition with investors doing all they can to determine the viability of a business before putting their money into it.</p>\n<p>When anyone asks what investors<a href=\"https://www.forbes.com/sites/alejandrocremades/2019/01/31/here-is-what-startup-investors-look-for-in-entrepreneurs-before-investing/\"> look for in startups</a>, typical answers include an experienced management team, a large market for their product or service, growth potentials, uniqueness. Lately, the word ‘disruption’ has become a cliche with the rise of companies such as Uber and Netflix, among others; Investors continue to look for startups unique enough to upset an industry significantly. In the same vein, various technological innovations such as artificial intelligence have made <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2018/08/16/ai-is-key-to-bias-free-vc/\">VC funding easier and less biased</a>.</p>\n<p>However, things have not been all rosy in the VC market. Every expert agrees that VC investing faced a huge setback last year with the IPO<a href=\"https://observer.com/2019/12/2019-ipo-roundup-stock-uber-lyft-slack-pinterest-beyond-meat-spce/\"> flops of major companies</a> such as WeWork, Uber, Slack, and Lyft as the facts show. Therefore, startups can expect investors to make significant adjustments based on lessons learned last year, which are rather harsh.</p>\n<h3><b>Stricter Business Conditions</b></h3>\n<p><a href=\"https://www.forbes.com/sites/tomtaulli/2019/12/06/what-venture-capitalists-vcs-see-for-2020/#19a96b74196a\">According to Ben Narasin</a>, “in 2020, investors will require firmer governance and oversight structures to safeguard against negative impact and ensure these protections are mandated in their term sheets.”</p>\n<p>One of the fundamental conditions for picking a startup is that they have a stellar management team. It is one of the several measures VCs take to ensure that their money is in the most capable hands and would produce desired results.</p>\n<p>Well, now investors are desiring to have more say in the direct control of the company, particularly its finances and its compliance with corporate regulations (for example, the GDPR, with tech startups).</p>\n<p>Investors would be more strict in their grilling of startup founders and leaders, hoping to expose every hint of “<a href=\"https://go.forrester.com/blogs/predictions-2020-new-tech/\">overpromising and underdelivering</a>.” This may probably drive entrepreneurs to alternative funding options, such as equity crowdfunding. Startup leaders hoping to win a VC fund have to be more diligent in doing their homework, fine-tuning their pitches to perfection, and blazing through the interviews.</p>\n<h3><b>Stability over Speed</b></h3>\n<p>As far back as 2015, Kauffman Foundation had reported that a <a href=\"https://www.kauffman.org/what-we-do/resources/entrepreneurship-policy-digest/the-importance-of-young-firms-for-economic-growth\">whopping two-thirds </a>of the fastest-growing companies go under before attaining self-sustainability. Apparently, just because a company is growing rapidly does not mean it would be sustainable.</p>\n<p>It is not so uncommon among some <a href=\"https://www.entrepreneur.com/article/310166\">companies that grew too quickly</a> to face a downturn of fortunes, usually a result of rash decisions. Therefore, “growing too quickly can be as problematic as growing too slowly.”</p>\n<p>Fast-growing startups like WeWork and Uber have taught us that the speed of growth is not always a good indicator of future performance. Apparently, steady growth is now more desirable even if rather slow. It is easier to assess and determine the potentials of a startup accurately if it is stable.“<a href=\"https://fortune.com/2020/01/22/vc-news-venture-capital-outlook-2020/\">Growth at any cost is not acceptable anymore.</a>”</p>\n<p>What does this mean for startups? When they found their businesses, entrepreneurs are usually filled with dreams of how their idea would ‘shake’ the world and want to speed up as much as possible (instant gratification), so much so that slow but steady growth may seem discouraging. Either way (fast or slow, steady) is great, but the most important thing is to not ignore the fundamentals.</p>\n<h3><b>Impact investing</b></h3>\n<p>The focus of the world is now being directed at critical issues such as global warming, climate change, education, poverty, gender activism &#8212; and of course, COVID-19. Likewise, the investing industry is moving in this direction as well to solve real-world problems.</p>\n<p>Real-world problems are called &#8220;<a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/03/26/10-ways-blockchain-is-impacting-real-estate-investing/\">impact investing</a>&#8221; where investors are not only looking to make huge financial profits but also to make an impression in the world, or at least their immediate communities. Therefore, they are on the lookout for startups who key into this vision. Besides, such companies are incentivized by the government in different ways, including tax cuts.</p>\n<p>One of the insightful<a href=\"https://mitsloan.mit.edu/ideas-made-to-matter/impact-investing-hot-right-now-heres-why\"> facts about impact investing</a> is that it is no longer a small investing niche but has rather grown to be one with opportunities for massive returns just like traditional investing. And there are statistics to back up the fact that impact investments perform well too with at least 66% hitting market-rate returns.</p>\n<p>Startups that show that they are solving a global challenge in a way or the other (for example, green tech) have an edge in the investing market.</p>\n<h4><b>Conclusion</b></h4>\n<p>Startups now realize what they are up against and that they must highly improve their game if they are to win any <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/04/18/ai-driven-predictive-analytics-new-opportunities-for-financial-institutions/\">funding opportunities</a>. The future is not all bleak, but the competition has just become stiffer. This may mean smaller businesses getting pressed out of VC funding opportunities as investors would rather fund companies that have achieved significant growth already.</p>\n<p>Finally, it is apparent that 2019 was a less successful year for VC investing and CrunchBase<a href=\"https://news.crunchbase.com/news/the-q4-eoy-2019-global-vc-report-a-strong-end-to-a-good-but-not-fantastic-year/\"> described it as a</a> &#8220;good, but not a fantastic year,&#8221; based on more <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/03/20/technology-trends-to-follow-in-2020-infographic/\">impressive expectations.</a> A less successful 2019 has caused 2020 to be more unpredictable, though many remain optimistic. [Well, that was before the COVID-19, so we&#8217;ll see what happens now.]</p>\n<p>The post <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/03/31/vc-funding-in-2020-what-investors-look-for-in-startups/\">VC Funding in 2020: What Investors Look for in Startups</a> appeared first on <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com\">ReadWrite</a>.</p>\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Tue, 31 Mar 2020 14:00:04 +0000","feedId":271,"bgimg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/VC-Funding-in-2020-What-Investors-Look-for-in-Startups.jpg","linkMd5":"28acdc6535e8f4cc250907e49577f059","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx21/cdn77@2020_6/2020/08/23/15-18-09-572_70e2fd0b642f5724.webp","metaImg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/VC-Funding-in-2020-What-Investors-Look-for-in-Startups.jpg","destWidth":825,"destHeight":510,"sourceBytes":38132,"destBytes":30990,"author":"Michael Usiagwu","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/VC-Funding-in-2020-What-Investors-Look-for-in-Startups-300x185.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx18/cdn37@2020_5/2020/08/23/15-18-11-076_6a028adb0127aeb2.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598195878950},{"createdTime":"2020-08-23 23:18:00","updatedTime":"2020-08-23 23:18:00","title":"How to Bootstrap Your Startup for Years Without Funding","link":"https://readwrite.com/?p=167046","description":"<div><a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/02/18/how-to-bootstrap-your-startup-for-years-without-funding/\" title=\"How to Bootstrap Your Startup for Years Without Funding\"><img width=\"300\" height=\"199\"
