https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/5-Technologies-a-Trucking-Business-Must-Be-Aware-Of-240x160.jpg 240w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/5-Technologies-a-Trucking-Business-Must-Be-Aware-Of.jpg 1280w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px\" /></a></div><section class=\"elementor-element elementor-element-e066ed5 elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default elementor-section elementor-top-section\" data-id=\"e066ed5\">\n<div class=\"elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default\">\n<div class=\"elementor-row\">\n<div class=\"elementor-element elementor-element-f444e90 elementor-column elementor-col-100 elementor-top-column\" data-id=\"f444e90\">\n<div class=\"elementor-column-wrap elementor-element-populated\">\n<div class=\"elementor-widget-wrap\">\n<div class=\"elementor-element elementor-element-31f3b44 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor\" data-id=\"31f3b44\">\n<div class=\"elementor-widget-container\">\n<div class=\"elementor-text-editor elementor-clearfix\">\n<p>In long-ago-days, the trucking businesses and fleets may have refrained from adopting new technologies because of the inherent resistance to change. However, that attitude has changed drastically &#8212; especially recently. Today, more and more truckers are opening up to the use of technology as an integral part of their work. Here are five technologies a trucking business must be aware of.</p>\n<h3>Are you among the truckers who are using the best technologies?</h3>\n<p>Here are the top 5 technologies for truckers to be aware of. Know more and apply these to your advantage.</p>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</section>\n<section class=\"elementor-element elementor-element-b79d70b elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default elementor-section elementor-top-section\" data-id=\"b79d70b\">\n<div class=\"elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default\">\n<div class=\"elementor-row\">\n<div class=\"elementor-element elementor-element-33f612b elementor-column elementor-col-100 elementor-top-column\" data-id=\"33f612b\">\n<div class=\"elementor-column-wrap elementor-element-populated\">\n<div class=\"elementor-widget-wrap\">\n<div class=\"elementor-element elementor-element-2f37dee elementor-widget elementor-widget-image\" data-id=\"2f37dee\">\n<div class=\"elementor-widget-container\">\n<div class=\"elementor-image\"><img class=\"attachment-large aligncenter\" src=\"https://truckx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/11/5-Technologies-a-Trucking-Business-Must-Be-Aware-of-1024x684.png\" alt=\"\" width=\"1024\" height=\"684\" /></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"elementor-element elementor-element-f64d08e elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor\" data-id=\"f64d08e\">\n<div class=\"elementor-widget-container\">\n<div class=\"elementor-text-editor elementor-clearfix\">\n<h3><b>Electronic Logging Devices (ELD)</b></h3>\n<p>With the deadline for the ELD mandate 2019, 16th December, fast approaching, all truckers are now quite aware of this technology and are working hard to adapt to it. The ELD consists of an electronic logbook to track a driver’s ROD (Record of Duty) status, among other functionalities.</p>\n<p>The advanced technology of the ELDs ensures less chance of tampering besides reducing the costs of fleet management and ensuring 100% compliance. At this point, it’s one of the most important technologies for trucking businesses to be aware of.</p>\n<p>However, before you invest in an<strong> </strong>affordable ELD for owners and operators, make sure that it is in compliance with the FMCSA regulations.</p>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</section>\n<section class=\"elementor-element elementor-element-a685d26 elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default elementor-section elementor-top-section\" data-id=\"a685d26\">\n<div class=\"elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default\">\n<div class=\"elementor-row\">\n<div class=\"elementor-element elementor-element-31e900c elementor-column elementor-col-100 elementor-top-column\" data-id=\"31e900c\">\n<div class=\"elementor-column-wrap elementor-element-populated\">\n<div class=\"elementor-widget-wrap\">\n<div class=\"elementor-element elementor-element-8722e5a elementor-widget elementor-widget-image\" data-id=\"8722e5a\">\n<div class=\"elementor-widget-container\">\n<div class=\"elementor-image\"><img class=\"attachment-large aligncenter\" src=\"https://truckx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/TruckX_gps_tracking-1-1024x637.png\" alt=\"\" width=\"1024\" height=\"637\" /></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"elementor-element elementor-element-6ed445f elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor\" data-id=\"6ed445f\">\n<div class=\"elementor-widget-container\">\n<div class=\"elementor-text-editor elementor-clearfix\">\n<h3><b>Trailer Tracking Systems</b></h3>\n<p>Many trucking companies are increasingly adopting this technology to manage their assets and avert losses, especially in high-theft areas. Besides installing a GPS transponder in your vehicles, you can also take advantage of wireless technology to feed location and other data directly into the fleet management system.</p>\n<p>Be it Blackberry’s radar tracking system or the Asset Manager by MiX Telematics, the trailer tracking technology is here to make asset management hassle-free for the trucking businesses.</p>\n<p>Some ELD solutions also include elements of Fleet Management that could work like a charm for smaller fleets too.</p>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</section>\n<section class=\"elementor-element elementor-element-75ab107 elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default elementor-section elementor-top-section\" data-id=\"75ab107\">\n<div class=\"elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default\">\n<div class=\"elementor-row\">\n<div class=\"elementor-element elementor-element-fbc5225 elementor-column elementor-col-100 elementor-top-column\" data-id=\"fbc5225\">\n<div class=\"elementor-column-wrap elementor-element-populated\">\n<div class=\"elementor-widget-wrap\">\n<div class=\"elementor-element elementor-element-500395b elementor-widget elementor-widget-image\" data-id=\"500395b\">\n<div class=\"elementor-widget-container\">\n<div class=\"elementor-image\"><img class=\"attachment-large aligncenter\" src=\"https://truckx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/11/Artboard-1-1024x667.png\" alt=\"\" width=\"1024\" height=\"667\" /></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"elementor-element elementor-element-f591b0b elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor\" data-id=\"f591b0b\">\n<div class=\"elementor-widget-container\">\n<div class=\"elementor-text-editor elementor-clearfix\">\n<h3><b>Collision Avoidance Technology</b></h3>\n<p>No matter whose fault it is, the consequences of accidents are always severe, causing loss of lives and goods. Hence, trucking businesses should invest in effective collision-avoidance systems to ensure safety on the road.</p>\n<p>This technology aims to inform the driver about any obstacle on the road ahead, as well as prevent possible crashes by taking emergency actions.</p>\n<p>You can opt for a range of efficient collision-avoidance systems like the OnGuard system by Meritor WABCO, Wingman Fusion by Bendix Commercial Vehicle System, and Drivewyze.</p>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</section>\n<section class=\"elementor-element elementor-element-9cc30fd elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default elementor-section elementor-top-section\" data-id=\"9cc30fd\">\n<div class=\"elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default\">\n<div class=\"elementor-row\">\n<div class=\"elementor-element elementor-element-f008cde elementor-column elementor-col-100 elementor-top-column\" data-id=\"f008cde\">\n<div class=\"elementor-column-wrap elementor-element-populated\">\n<div class=\"elementor-widget-wrap\">\n<div class=\"elementor-element elementor-element-43541e5 elementor-widget elementor-widget-image\" data-id=\"43541e5\">\n<div class=\"elementor-widget-container\">\n<div class=\"elementor-image\"><img class=\"attachment-large size-large aligncenter\" src=\"https://truckx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/11/Platooning-Technology-1024x486.png\" alt=\"\" width=\"1024\" height=\"486\" /></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"elementor-element elementor-element-b292f40 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor\" data-id=\"b292f40\">\n<div class=\"elementor-widget-container\">\n<div class=\"elementor-text-editor elementor-clearfix\">\n<h3><b>Platooning Technology</b></h3>\n<p>Truck Platooning is recently gaining a lot of attention in the fleet industry. The process involves installing advanced driving support systems in the trucks and using the same to communicate with each other and move in the form of a platoon.</p>\n<p>This initiative to group vehicles, being driven by smart technologies, not only improves communication and streamlines the transport process but also reduces the chance of accidents with the help of advanced braking and accelerating systems.</p>\n<p>Truck Platooning is also looking to adopt automated driving technologies, and according to the biggies in the transport sector, this will eventually help the industry realize its long-time dream of self-driving vehicles. Thus, it could also resolve the issues caused by the shortage of truckers.</p>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</section>\n<section class=\"elementor-element elementor-element-4aad82f elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default elementor-section elementor-top-section\" data-id=\"4aad82f\">\n<div class=\"elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default\">\n<div class=\"elementor-row\">\n<div class=\"elementor-element elementor-element-c821c8e elementor-column elementor-col-100 elementor-top-column\" data-id=\"c821c8e\">\n<div class=\"elementor-column-wrap elementor-element-populated\">\n<div class=\"elementor-widget-wrap\">\n<div class=\"elementor-element elementor-element-ab06fc5 elementor-widget elementor-widget-image\" data-id=\"ab06fc5\">\n<div class=\"elementor-widget-container\">\n<div class=\"elementor-image\"><img class=\"attachment-large size-large aligncenter\" src=\"https://truckx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/11/Temperature-Tracking-Software-1024x731.png\" alt=\"\" width=\"1024\" height=\"731\" /></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"elementor-element elementor-element-8995abd elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor\" data-id=\"8995abd\">\n<div class=\"elementor-widget-container\">\n<div class=\"elementor-text-editor elementor-clearfix\">\n<h3><b>Temperature Tracking Software</b></h3>\n<p>One of the most interesting <b>trucking technologies</b> that have gained prominence in recent years is temperature tracking and record-keeping for food and beverage transport.</p>\n<p>The Food Safety Modernization Act has mandated that all carriers and suppliers should follow a set of important regulations and proper sanitary requisites while transporting food and related products.</p>\n<p>It has become necessary to maintain appropriate temperature and moisture conditions even inside the trucks to ensure safe delivery and maximum compliance to the regulations. The temperature tracking technology thus helps the fleet management businesses to track and record temperature conditions inside the vehicles and take corrective actions whenever deemed necessary.</p>\n<p>Most of the temperature tracking software in the market aspires not only to fulfill proper temperature requirements in the refrigeration units but also to send the information to the fleet management system tied to its GPS location.</p>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</section>\n<section class=\"elementor-element elementor-element-606e547 elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default elementor-section elementor-top-section\" data-id=\"606e547\">\n<div class=\"elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default\">\n<div class=\"elementor-row\">\n<div class=\"elementor-element elementor-element-4e40f74 elementor-column elementor-col-100 elementor-top-column\" data-id=\"4e40f74\">\n<div class=\"elementor-column-wrap elementor-element-populated\">\n<div class=\"elementor-widget-wrap\">\n<div class=\"elementor-element elementor-element-372c123 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor\" data-id=\"372c123\">\n<div class=\"elementor-widget-container\">\n<div class=\"elementor-text-editor elementor-clearfix\">\n<p>The supply chain and trucking industry are going through a massive change, most of which is caused by their changed attitude towards adopting improved trucking technologies to better the system.  Be it installing ELDs in their vehicles to comply with the ELD mandate 2019 or taking the help of advanced collision-avoidance technology, both business owners, and truckers are leaving no stone unturned to grow and prosper.</p>\n<p>As always, some regions inspire others to follow suit. For instance, owners and owner-operators of mid-sized and small fleets are at the forefront of investing only in the best ELD for trucks in California that are in compliance with the FMCSA standards.</p>\n<p>If you have a trucking business, or even if you are a trucker yourself, staying updated with these technologies will help you drive into a better future. That’s a safe bet.</p>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</section>\n<section class=\"elementor-element elementor-element-eccfd3f elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default elementor-section elementor-top-section\" data-id=\"eccfd3f\">\n<div class=\"elementor-container elementor-column-gap-default\">\n<div elementor-element-populated\">\n<div class=\"elementor-widget-wrap\">\n<div class=\"elementor-element elementor-element-ba5b330 elementor-widget elementor-widget-image\" data-id=\"ba5b330\">\n<div class=\"elementor-widget-container\">\n<div class=\"elementor-image\"><img class=\"attachment-large size-large aligncenter\" src=\"https://truckx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/09/drive-safe-folks-1024x410.png\" alt=\"\" width=\"1024\" height=\"410\" /></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div></div>\n<div class=\"elementor-element Pharate","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/5-Technologies-a-Trucking-Business-Must-Be-Aware-Of-300x200.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx23/cdn76@2020_1/2020/08/23/15-18-10-785_37b38b660e6193c8.webp","https://truckx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/11/5-Technologies-a-Trucking-Business-Must-Be-Aware-of-1024x684.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx/cdn71@2020_6/2020/08/23/15-18-17-177_41c431201da1a4b6.webp","https://truckx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/TruckX_gps_tracking-1-1024x637.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx13/cdn48@2020_4/2020/08/23/15-18-15-038_306703a123159450.webp","https://truckx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/11/Artboard-1-1024x667.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx12/cdn72@2020_2/2020/08/23/15-18-11-234_b331c9488f07a2f8.webp","https://truckx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/11/Platooning-Technology-1024x486.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx33/cdn60@2020_3/2020/08/23/15-18-15-669_7143798eadc341be.webp","https://truckx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/11/Temperature-Tracking-Software-1024x731.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx21/cdn63@2020_6/2020/08/23/15-18-16-631_9b9efccf0f1d18d1.webp","https://truckx.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/09/drive-safe-folks-1024x410.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx19/cdn7@2020_6/2020/08/23/15-18-14-424_e3860aed2ac43c3b.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598195874610},{"createdTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:59","updatedTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:59","title":"How to Successfully Automate Your Approach to Guest Blogger Outreach","link":"https://readwrite.com/?p=168251","description":"<div><a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/03/12/how-to-successfully-automate-your-approach-to-guest-blogger-outreach/\" title=\"How to Successfully Automate Your Approach to Guest Blogger Outreach\"><img width=\"300\" height=\"202\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/automate-guest-blogger-outreach-300x202.jpg\" class=\"attachment-medium size-medium wp-post-image\" alt=\"\" style=\"margin-bottom: 15px;\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/automate-guest-blogger-outreach-300x202.jpg 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/automate-guest-blogger-outreach-900x607.jpg 900w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/automate-guest-blogger-outreach-237x160.jpg 237w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/automate-guest-blogger-outreach-1536x1036.jpg 1536w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/automate-guest-blogger-outreach.jpg 1920w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px\" /></a></div><p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Proactive digital marketing is all about reach, relevancy, and exposure. The only way to be successful is to push beyond your brand-owned channels – like your website and individual social profiles – and to reach people on the outside. Once reached, it’s your goal to magnetize them to the brand. And while there are dozens of useful strategies for doing so, guest blogging remains one of the most effective. </span></p>\n<p><a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/05/20/3-steps-to-get-your-guest-post-pitch-accepted/\"><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">When done well</span></a><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">, guest blogging capitalizes on reach, relevancy, </span><i><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">and</span></i><span style=\"font-weight: 400\"> exposure. The only concern is that it’s traditionally been a cumbersome and time-consuming process. In order to make it work for your business, you have to find a better way. <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/02/26/blockchain-will-forever-change-link-building-and-seo/\">Automating the process through certain tools</a>, services, and partnerships could be the answer.</span></p>\n<p><b>Guest Blogging: The What? and The Why?</b></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Just as a refresher, guest blogging – also commonly referred to as “guest posting” – is the act of writing original content for another company’s website or blog. In return, a guest blogger can usually expect an author byline, brand mention, and/or precious backlinks.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Guest blogging makes sense for a number of reasons, including benefits like:</span></p>\n<ul>\n<li><b><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Generates brand awareness from a new audience</span></b></li>\n</ul>\n<ul>\n<li><a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/10/24/10-radical-ways-iot-will-revamp-your-seo-strategy-in-2020/\"><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Provides SEO benefits</span></a><span style=\"font-weight: 400\"> through backlinks</span></li>\n</ul>\n<ul>\n<li><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Drives traffic back to the website</span></li>\n</ul>\n<ul>\n<li><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Strengthens professional networks</span></li>\n</ul>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Guest blogging has been successfully leveraged as a common content marketing and SEO practice for more than a decade. But as it’s become more commonplace and less white-hat, <a href=\"https://hackernoon.com/tips-on-recovering-from-a-google-penalty-f62l3yq9\">new challenges have emerged</a>.</span></p>\n<p><b>The Problem With Traditional Outreach Models</b></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">The most problematic aspect of guest blogging is how hands-on it is. Every phase of the process requires you to be directly involved. This includes the outreach portion, which is arguably the most frustrating and time-consuming.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">With the traditional approach, you run manual Google searches for blogs and websites that you think are relevant to your audience and/or beneficial to your brand. You find the contact information for all of the responsible bloggers and compile them into a spreadsheet. Next, you go through and send personalized emails to each blogger on this list – perhaps even pitching an idea or piece of sample content to them. </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Then you wait. And wait. And wait some more…</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">If you’re lucky, you might get a response to 10 percent of your emails. And out of those emails, more than half of them are likely to turn you down. Your affirmative response rate is likely going to be below five percent. </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Then you actually have to sit down and write a post, edit it, and send it over. At this point, you cross your fingers and hope that the blogger hasn’t forgotten and/or that they don’t ghost you. (It happens!)</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">That’s all for a single guest blog post!</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">If you want to scale your guest blogging up to a meaningful level, this framework becomes a full-time job. As a result, most brands wave the white flag and move on to some other form of marketing and promotion.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">But is there a better way? </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Guest blogging is clearly valuable – it’s just too time-consuming and demanding. Could streamlining some of the outreach process through strategic automation make this a more practical option for you and your business?</span></p>\n<p><b>Helpful Ways to Automate Guest Blogger Outreach </b></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">When we talk about automation, we aren’t talking about pressing a button and letting a programmed bot take over your <a href=\"https://seo.co/guest-blogging/\">guest blogger outreach</a> on your behalf. As hands-on and personal as this process is, this sort of approach would almost certainly destine you for failure. Rather we’re talking about streamlining the process through the strategic use of tools, services, partnerships, and scalable models that make engaging bloggers on a meaningful level more practical and higher returning. </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Without further ado, let’s dig in and discuss some pragmatic techniques:</span></p>\n<ul>\n<li><b>Outsource to Strategic Partners</b></li>\n</ul>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Let’s start with the best and highest-returning option: </span><a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/05/29/outsourcing-site-content-writing/\"><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Strategic outsourcing</span></a><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">. If you want to completely automate guest blogger outreach without compromising the integrity of your brand, you should find and hire a service to handle it for you. But it has to be </span><i><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">the right</span></i><span style=\"font-weight: 400\"> service!</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">A good strategic partner is a service that has a rich network of </span><i><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">pre-established</span></i><span style=\"font-weight: 400\"> connections. Notice the qualifying phrase. You want to work with an outsourced partner who already has the relationships and simply has to tap them. This speeds up the process and dramatically increases your chances of success. </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">There are only a few services out there that satisfy this requirement. </span><a href=\"https://seo.co\"><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">SEO.co</span></a><span style=\"font-weight: 400\"> is a good white-label link building service that’s known for securing top placement for clients. Do your research and look for partnerships that feel like a good fit.</span></p>\n<ul>\n<li><b>Use MozBar to Discover Opportunities</b></li>\n</ul>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">There are three key phases of guest blogging: (1) Finding opportunities, (2) Reaching out, and (3) Writing/Publishing the post. Step one lays the foundation for steps two and three. If you don’t get this aspect right, everything else will suffer as a result. Thus the process begins with discovering realistic and valuable guest blogging opportunities.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">There are a few different tools available in the marketplace, but </span><a href=\"https://moz.com/products/pro/seo-toolbar\"><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">MozBar</span></a><span style=\"font-weight: 400\"> is arguably one of the best options. It’s the industry’s most popular SEO toolbar (more than 500,000 installs) and provides instant metrics when viewing any SERP or individual website page. Some of the top features include:</span></p>\n<ul>\n<li style=\"font-weight: 400\"><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Craft custom searches by engine or location</span></li>\n</ul>\n<ul>\n<li style=\"font-weight: 400\"><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Get instant access to the metrics that matter most (while viewing SERPs)</span></li>\n</ul>\n<ul>\n<li style=\"font-weight: 400\"><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Find and highlight important keywords and differentiate link results by their type (e.g. follow, no-follow, internal, or external)</span></li>\n</ul>\n<ul>\n<li style=\"font-weight: 400\"><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Expose different page elements like markup and link metrics</span></li>\n</ul>\n<ul>\n<li style=\"font-weight: 400\"><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Immediately assess ranking probability via Domain Authority and Page Authority</span></li>\n</ul>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">In essence, the MozBar is a Chrome plugin that automatically runs in the background every time you conduct a Google search. Beneath each search result, you’ll get custom link analysis that helps you understand whether or not the website could be potentially valuable for your guest blogging and SEO efforts.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">The MozBar isn’t going to tell you whether or not a certain website will accept you as a guest blogger, but it will provide insights on which leads are worth pursuing. This can save you hours of wasted time and frustration.</span></p>\n<ul>\n<li><b>Try LinkAssistant</b></li>\n</ul>\n<p><a href=\"https://www.link-assistant.com/linkassistant/\"><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">LinkAssistant</span></a><span style=\"font-weight: 400\"> is another incredibly powerful tool. And whereas MozBar is designed with big-picture SEO in mind, this tool has been developed with guest blogging outreach and link building at the foundation. Features include:</span></p>\n<ul>\n<li style=\"font-weight: 400\"><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Refine your prospect search method by goal (guest blogging, commenting, reviews, etc.).</span></li>\n</ul>\n<ul>\n<li style=\"font-weight: 400\"><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Get instant access to a variety of important statistics and metrics, including Page Authority, Domain Authority, domain age, link metrics, social media metrics, etc.</span></li>\n</ul>\n<ul>\n<li style=\"font-weight: 400\"><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Instantly reach out to potential connections directly from the platform. It even includes email templates and built-in analytics to track emails sent, replies, and follow-up information.</span></li>\n</ul>\n<ul>\n<li style=\"font-weight: 400\"><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">With a built-in link verification system, you can run periodic checks to ensure your links are still active and that they don’t get switched to no-follow.</span></li>\n</ul>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Though it doesn’t completely remove you from the process, LinkAssistant does a lot of the heavy lifting by making you aware of which guest blogging opportunities are most likely to deliver a high return on investment. It’s definitely a tool worth integrating into your arsenal.</span></p>\n<ul>\n<li><b>Create Powerful Email Templates</b></li>\n</ul>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">It’s unrealistic to draft an original email every time you want to inquire about a guest blogging opportunity. The only way to efficiently send out hundreds or thousands of requests is to rely on email templates that </span><i><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">appear</span></i><span style=\"font-weight: 400\"> to be original and unique. </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">As a general rule of thumb, every email template should follow a similar pattern. Begin by introducing yourself and then dish out a compliment or positive observation about their blog. Continue with a clear and succinct offer/request, followed by a few reasons why they should oblige. Tell the blogger thanks and sign off!</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Here’s one example of an outreach template:</span></p>\n<p><i><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Hey </span></i><i><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Chase</span></i><i><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">,</span></i></p>\n<p><i><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">My name is </span></i><i><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Amy Foster</span></i><i><span style=\"font-weight: 400\"> and I’m an entrepreneur and creative – just like you!</span></i></p>\n<p><i><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">I wanted to shoot you a quick message and let you know how much I enjoy reading your blog. It’s been one of my go-to resources for </span></i><i><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">digital marketing</span></i><i><span style=\"font-weight: 400\"> over the past few months. Your blog post on </span></i><i><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">LinkedIn messaging </span></i><i><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">has been a huge help to me.</span></i></p>\n<p><i><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Quick question: Are you open to accepting guest blog post submissions? I’ve got a pretty good idea for an article that I think would work extremely will with your audience. I’d be happy to reciprocate if you ever wanted to post something on </span></i><i><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">my blog</span></i><i><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">.</span></i></p>\n<p><i><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Thanks for your time, </span></i><i><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Chase</span></i><i><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">! I’m really looking forward to hearing back from you.</span></i></p>\n<p><i><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">All the Best,</span></i></p>\n<p><i><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Amy</span></i></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">You obviously shouldn’t copy and paste this exact template into your own emails, but it at least gives you an idea of how to proceed. </span></p>\n<ul>\n<li><b>Quantity Outreach, Quality Follow-up </b></li>\n</ul>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">When it comes to guest blogging outreach, you have to play the numbers game. By creating powerful email templates, you can really ramp up the quantity of your outreach. (And assuming you’re using one of the aforementioned tools, you can find hundreds or thousands of potential guest blogging opportunities.)</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">But if </span><i><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">quantity </span></i><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">is important in outreach, </span><i><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">quality</span></i><span style=\"font-weight: 400\"> is the operative word in your follow-up contact. Here’s where you dial down the automation and get directly involved. You want to engage people on a personal level and treat each guest posting prospect as the valuable opportunity that it is. </span></p>\n<p><b>Final Thoughts and Takeaways</b></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Guest blogging has played an integral role in digital marketing and SEO over the last decade and <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/01/27/how-will-ai-change-the-future-of-seo/\">will continue to be important in the coming years</a>. The key is to streamline the process through strategic automation – all without removing personalization from the process. </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Hopefully this article has provided you with some keen insights on precisely how you can efficiently scale your efforts and get better results. The time you save can be applied towards focusing on other areas of your business.</span></p>\n<p>The post <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/03/12/how-to-successfully-automate-your-approach-to-guest-blogger-outreach/\">How to Successfully Automate Your Approach to Guest Blogger Outreach</a> appeared first on <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com\">ReadWrite</a>.</p>\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Thu, 12 Mar 2020 12:46:07 +0000","feedId":271,"bgimg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/automate-guest-blogger-outreach.jpg","linkMd5":"c9a5b074891d65dc69eaaa9a91fab044","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx15/cdn91@2020_2/2020/08/23/15-18-26-155_d40f5b6768da70e6.webp","metaImg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/automate-guest-blogger-outreach.jpg","destWidth":1920,"destHeight":1295,"sourceBytes":179732,"destBytes":127546,"author":"Nate Nead","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/automate-guest-blogger-outreach-300x202.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx21/cdn39@2020_3/2020/08/23/15-18-13-339_6ac0bd6635a52a1c.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598195879939},{"createdTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:59","updatedTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:59","title":"Is Content Driving the Online Market? ","link":"https://readwrite.com/?p=167282","description":"<div><a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/04/07/is-content-driving-the-online-market/\" title=\"Is Content Driving the Online Market? \"><img width=\"300\" height=\"200\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/Is-Content-Driving-the-Online-Market--300x200.jpg\" class=\"attachment-medium size-medium wp-post-image\" alt=\"content marketing\" style=\"margin-bottom: 15px;\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/Is-Content-Driving-the-Online-Market--300x200.jpg 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/Is-Content-Driving-the-Online-Market--900x600.jpg 900w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/Is-Content-Driving-the-Online-Market--240x160.jpg 240w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/Is-Content-Driving-the-Online-Market--1536x1024.jpg 1536w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/Is-Content-Driving-the-Online-Market-.jpg 1920w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px\" /></a></div><p style=\"text-align: justify;\">Technology is evolving day by day, and so is everyone connecting to it. Marketing approaches took a sharp turn recently and paved the way to introduce digital marketing to all the online businesses out there. Though every one regarded it as an expensive and complicated approach first, it is slowly becoming a necessity for all the small and big companies.</p>\n<p style=\"text-align: justify;\">Digital marketing comes with a lot of elements, and today we are going to discuss how <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/09/20/how-to-scale-your-content-marketing/\">content marketing</a> is the most crucial among them all. But before getting into further details, let&#8217;s get to the basics.</p>\n<h2 style=\"text-align: justify;\"><b>What Is Content Marketing? </b></h2>\n<p style=\"text-align: justify;\">Traditional marketing is fading away pretty fast, and every marketer is looking forward to finding an effective alternative to enter the era of content marketing.</p>\n<p style=\"text-align: justify;\">&#8220;<b><i>Content Marketing</i></b> is a strategic online approach that aims at creating and distributing relevant, valuable, and compelling content to its readers to gain maximum visitors on its website without being promotional about the company and its services.&#8221;</p>\n<p style=\"text-align: justify;\">Read that definition again and understand the worth of good content. It not only attracts more visitors to your website like a magnet but also keeps them lingering upon your profile in a longer run, thus being the most effective way to drive your online marketing campaigns.</p>\n<p style=\"text-align: justify;\">Content marketing is more of a commitment than a campaign. Below, I have talked about some principal reasons that justify this statement.</p>\n<h3 style=\"text-align: justify;\"><b>1. Slides Your Brand Into the Audiences&#8217; Minds </b></h3>\n<blockquote><p>&#8220;<i>Content is the reason search began in the first place.</i>&#8221;</p>\n<p>&#8211; Lee Odden</p></blockquote>\n<p style=\"text-align: justify;\">You see, it is the beauty of <b><i>content marketing </i></b>&#8211; it grabs the attention of a majority of audiences without even pitching them about the products or services you provide. How? I&#8217;ll explain this with an example.</p>\n<p style=\"text-align: justify;\">Let&#8217;s say, you Google the recipe for egg-less chocolate cake, and notice the blog that popped up at the top out of 83,00,000 search results? You perceive that it has ranked the highest, so it might have the best content.</p>\n<p style=\"text-align: justify;\">Moreover, every time you search for the same recipe, you witness almost the same results, so you prioritize reading the top-most blogs over the others. These blogs may have back-links to their website. You click on them because you find them relatable. As a result, you go through their site and come to know about the services that the marketer provides. Bingo. Great content always wins the audience.</p>\n<h3 style=\"text-align: justify;\"><b>2. Enhances Search Visibility and Website Ranking </b></h3>\n<blockquote><p>&#8220;<i>The best place to hide a dead body is page two of Google.</i>&#8220;</p></blockquote>\n<p style=\"text-align: justify;\">Have you ever read that quote before? Well, now, you did.</p>\n<p style=\"text-align: justify;\">When you search for a product or service, you only read the content available on the first page. You, most probably, don&#8217;t even go past the first five results, forget about clicking on the second page. A website, thus, needs a solid <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/09/10/4-ways-to-optimize-your-site-to-rank-on-google-in-2019/\">SEO</a> to help rank on the first page, and <i>content marketing</i> is one of the most effective ways to do so.</p>\n<p style=\"text-align: justify;\">Every new blog you add on your site becomes a new page for Google to index. High-quality content created with targeted keywords increases perceived expertise, relevance, and trust on a website. It leads to more inbound links from other sources, which, in turn, increases the domain authority. Higher D/A implies higher ranking and higher organic search visibility. Thus, a digital <i>marketer</i> must make sure that they create the highest quality content possible.</p>\n<p style=\"text-align: justify;\">As a matter of fact, even the sites with low DA/PA rank quickly with relatable and valuable content for the masses.</p>\n<h3 style=\"text-align: justify;\"><b>3. Can be Utilized by Literally any Industry </b></h3>\n<p style=\"text-align: justify;\">Is there any topic on which you cannot find information on Google? Of course, there isn&#8217;t. When it comes to crafting content, one can do so for virtually any topic starting from assembling a lego game to building a motorcycle from scratch.</p>\n<p style=\"text-align: justify;\">Your brand becomes more approachable for the viewers if you provide them with insights regarding the topics that you cover in your business. There is nothing that falls into the category of harmful content. You can create content for any niche you want to. You don&#8217;t have to add or come up with anything new. Just rewrite the things that you know in a way that others on the Internet didn&#8217;t do.</p>\n<p style=\"text-align: justify;\"><a href=\"https://twitter.com/pageonepower\"><i>Page One Power</i></a> explains this phenomenon very well with their quote, &#8220;<i>You don&#8217;t have to reinvent the wheel; you just need to share your unique perspective on why the wheel is important.</i>&#8220;</p>\n<h3 style=\"text-align: justify;\"><b>4. Prime Source of Driving Traffic and Engagement </b></h3>\n<blockquote><p>“<i>Traditional marketing talks at people. </i><b><i>Content marketing</i></b><i> talks with them.</i>”<b> </b></p>\n<p>&#8211;<a href=\"https://twitter.com/dougkessler\"><i>Doug Kessler </i></a></p></blockquote>\n<p style=\"text-align: justify;\">Better content generate interest. The more your audience shares your blog, the more new viewers visit your site, and the more your existing customers feel connected to your brand.</p>\n<p style=\"text-align: justify;\">When you have interesting content, your users will have reason to stick around your site, reading further topics and coming across more of the services that you provide. Thus, it becomes more convincing for them to <i>believe</i> in your services. You can also keep your audience engaged in your social media platforms using automation tools like Socinator, Hootsuite, BuzzSumo, etc.</p>\n<p style=\"text-align: justify;\">Another way to effectively channel your creativity into your content is via guest posts. When you provide content to the external publications as a guest, you get the chance to link your website and services there. This way, your site gets exposure among the readers on their site. By doing so on a site with high D/A and good traffic, a marketer can earn thousands of audiences with a single guest post.</p>\n<h3 style=\"text-align: justify;\"><b>5. Assists You in Adapting the Changing Trends </b></h3>\n<p style=\"text-align: justify;\">How would you deliver what your consumers prefer if you don&#8217;t know about it in the first place? So, talk to them through your content, and try to understand what they want based on their response.</p>\n<blockquote><p>“<i>We need to stop interrupting what people are interested in and be what people are interested in.</i>”</p>\n<p>&#8211;<a href=\"https://twitter.com/CraigDavisRuns\"><i>Craig Davis </i></a></p></blockquote>\n<p style=\"text-align: justify;\">The aim of crafting content is not limited to gaining more and more audience. As an online <i>marketer</i>, you need to keep an eye on the changing trends and shape your strategies accordingly. Talk to your audience about anything, in general. Write an article on a recent Instagram update, any upcoming technology, inclination towards a healthy lifestyle, the influence of social media- anything that resonates around your business, yet sounds <i>trendy</i> for the readers.</p>\n<p style=\"text-align: justify;\">Analyze your posts and record everything- audience reach, number of shares, click-through rate, etc. This way, you get to know about the type of posts that your audience likes and talk about the services they want from you.</p>\n<h3 style=\"text-align: justify;\"><b>6. Fills the Gap Between a Buyer and a Seller </b></h3>\n<blockquote><p>&#8220;<b><i>Content marketing</i></b><i> is all the marketing that&#8217;s left.</i>&#8220;<b> </b></p>\n<p>&#8211;<a href=\"https://twitter.com/ThisIsSethsBlog\"><i>Seth Godin </i></a></p></blockquote>\n<p style=\"text-align: justify;\">Let&#8217;s say you build the next big thing in the market. You come up with the best marketing strategies, and now, your brand becomes pretty popular among the potential audience. What next? How will you convince them to buy what they see? How will they know that your product is valuable for them unless you tell them directly about it?<b> </b></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: justify;\">People, these days, want to learn about things before they buy them. Convincing them becomes a lot easier with content, be it on a search engine or a social media site. Content is the only thing that bridges the gap between marketing and sales in the journey of a buyer.<b> </b></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: justify;\">Good content provides answers to the questions that your buyer has regarding how, what, where, and when should they buy your product.<b> </b></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: justify;\">The aim of any advertisement agency remains the same- to convey the right message to the viewers about the products displayed. This process becomes much more effective and seamless with <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/03/26/leveraging-the-benefits-of-marketing-content-collaboration/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">content marketing</a>.</p>\n<h3 style=\"text-align: justify;\"><b>7. Reaches A Myriad Of Audience </b></h3>\n<p style=\"text-align: justify;\">This point is as obvious as the noonday sun. One of the main reasons behind brands going digital from traditional is the amount of exposure that they are going to get with this shift. In the words of <a href=\"https://twitter.com/jowyang\">Jeremiah Owyang</a>, Founder of Crowd Companies-<b> </b></p>\n<blockquote><p>“<i>Google is the new corporate homepage.</i>”<b> </b></p></blockquote>\n<p style=\"text-align: justify;\">Folks of the Internet make things go viral in no time (we all know about the egg that broke the Internet). Your brand can reach thousands of potential leads when marketed correctly.<b> </b></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: justify;\">With <a href=\"https://www.statista.com/statistics/617136/digital-population-worldwide/\">4.48 billion active users</a> there comes a lot of online competition. If your content is relatable, it will grab maximum eyeballs, will make sure that your brand remains on the top of their mind, and will assist you in getting conversions, not just clicks.<b> </b></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: justify;\">As we already discussed above, you get maximum site visits when your content ranks up on the first page of a search engine. It helps build <i>trust</i> in the minds of the readers and increases your brand reliability, thus increasing your revenues exponentially.</p>\n<h2 style=\"text-align: justify;\"><b>Wrapping It Up </b></h2>\n<p style=\"text-align: justify;\">If you think that <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2011/10/19/infographic-why-content-is-kin/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">content is the king</a>, you probably need to expand your vision. It is not the king. It is the whole kingdom. As you might decipher how important it has become in the world of digital marketing, it is pretty safe to say that content drives the online market more than we expect.</p>\n<p style=\"text-align: justify;\">The information we gather from the Internet has become one of the primary sources of knowledge. Folks rely a lot on the online content and find it very credible. Thus, every marketer needs to focus on the type of content they create in order to stand out among the competitors in their audiences&#8217; eyes.</p>\n<p style=\"text-align: justify;\">Content is, indeed, driving the online market, and probably it will keep doing so in the near future.</p>\n<p style=\"text-align: justify;\">Let me know if I missed anything in the comments below.</p>\n<p><em>Image Credit: Toa Heftiba, Pexels</em></p>\n<p>The post <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/04/07/is-content-driving-the-online-market/\">Is Content Driving the Online Market? </a> appeared first on <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com\">ReadWrite</a>.</p>\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Tue, 07 Apr 2020 16:00:00
