homeowners feel more secure about their homes and families whether they are home or away. Now, there is another new WiFi-enabled security camera that incorporates artificial intelligence. This security camera is from EZVIZ, and it&#8217;s known as the C3X. Here is my review after I recently installed it at my home.</p>\n<h2>About the EZVIZ C3X Security Camera</h2>\n<p>The<a href=\"https://www.ezvizlife.com/inter/product/c3x/12359\"> EZVIZ C3X security camera</a> is now available as a way to add extra protection to your home. The camera has a strobe light and siren alert system, customizable voice alerts, and excellent weatherproofing through its metallic enclosure to minimize the impact of dust, water, and even snow.</p>\n<p>Also, the H.265 video compression capability reduces the need for data storage and bandwidth.</p>\n<p>The security camera offers an app where you can designate the zones for the camera to focus on. The app provides alerts as soon as the camera captures suspicious activity.</p>\n<p><img class=\"aligncenter wp-image-173855\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/C3XNightVision-300x169.jpg\" alt=\"\" width=\"600\" height=\"337\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/C3XNightVision-300x169.jpg 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/C3XNightVision-900x506.jpg 900w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/C3XNightVision-260x146.jpg 260w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/C3XNightVision-1536x863.jpg 1536w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/C3XNightVision.jpg 1920w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 600px) 100vw, 600px\" /></p>\n<h2>What Makes this Camera Unique?</h2>\n<p>The EZVIZ C3X security camera has many notable features that set it apart from other security cameras.</p>\n<p>First, it&#8217;s considered to be a commercial-grade security camera. Second, it has dual lenses. The dual-lens technology features one lens that records ambient brightness while the other captures the color information. The images are then merged to present one of the best security camera pictures possible.</p>\n<p>Third, it has built-in artificial intelligence through an algorithm that provides more accurate alerts about people and vehicles. Finally, it gives you nighttime color video. This means you don&#8217;t have to add spotlights to help with night viewing.</p>\n<h2>Cloud Subscription</h2>\n<p>For $5.99 per month or $59.99 per year, you can get seven days of storage for one security camera. A 30-day plan costs $10.99 per month or $109.99 per year. If you have more than one camera, the CloudPlay subscription costs $8.99 per month or $89.99 per year for seven days of storage or $15.99 per month or $159.99 per year for 30 days of storage.</p>\n<p><img class=\"aligncenter wp-image-173854\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/C3XSecurityCamera-300x150.jpg\" alt=\"\" width=\"600\" height=\"300\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/C3XSecurityCamera-300x150.jpg 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/C3XSecurityCamera-900x450.jpg 900w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/C3XSecurityCamera-260x130.jpg 260w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/C3XSecurityCamera.jpg 1200w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 600px) 100vw, 600px\" /></p>\n<h2>Pros and Cons</h2>\n<p>There are many things to love about this security camera. It has some of the best video quality and accurate motion detection I&#8217;ve seen among all the outdoor security cameras. The color night video makes it clear and easy to see what&#8217;s going on outside. Other pluses include a built-in siren and strobe light, straightforward installation, app, and Alexa and Google voice control support.</p>\n<p>However, there are some aspects of the security camera where improvements need to be made. The biggest issue was inconsistent cloud performance, which meant that there wasn&#8217;t necessarily a guarantee that all footage would be stored and secured properly. It was often hard to get into my cloud storage account.</p>\n<p>And, since the subscription plan I had to pay for seemed more than others, I really expected it to be consistent. As an alternative, though, you can save recorded video locally on a microSD card. However, you will have to use your own media to do so.</p>\n<p>Also, it would be good if the security camera also worked with some of the other smart home hubs like HomeKit or IFTTT.</p>\n<h2>In the Box</h2>\n<p>The security camera comes with a drill template, screw kit, waterproof kit, power adapter (nearly five feet long), and a quick start guide.</p>\n<h2>Purchase Options</h2>\n<p>Priced at $149, the security camera is available at retailers. These include <a href=\"https://www.walmart.com/ip/EZVIZ-C3X-1080p-AI-Powered-Outdoor-Smart-Security-Camera-Revolutionary-Dual-Lens-Night-Vision-Technology-Person-Vehicle-Detection-Voice-Alerts-Detect/490112293\">Walmart</a>, Best Buy, and Home Depot. Online, you can buy the camera from sites like Rakuten.com</p>\n<h2>Overall Thoughts</h2>\n<p>The Ezviz C3X outdoor AI-enabled security camera is a high-quality, high-tech weatherproof security solution. It is reasonably priced, delivering clear color video both day and night. However, there is room for improvement because its cloud service had issues.</p>\n<p>If I stay with this security camera, I think two would provide better coverage for me. It&#8217;s a good idea to do some research to see what you think and ask around. Check out many security cameras to see what best fits your own needs. I like this one.</p>\n<p>The post <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/07/03/ezviz-c3x-ai-powered-security-camera/\">EZVIZ C3X AI-Powered Security Camera</a> appeared first on <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com\">ReadWrite</a>.</p>\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Fri, 03 Jul 2020 18:01:10 +0000","feedId":271,"bgimg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/C3X-190313.123-300x300.png","linkMd5":"0f120e50810d696f2d28a5c2335b84b1","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx10/cdn12@2020_3/2020/08/23/15-18-08-006_ba0fda1e5a0f343a.webp","destWidth":300,"destHeight":300,"sourceBytes":22460,"destBytes":8450,"author":"Brad Anderson","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/C3X-190313.123-300x300.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx10/cdn12@2020_3/2020/08/23/15-18-08-006_ba0fda1e5a0f343a.webp","https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/C3XNightVision-300x169.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx32/cdn56@2020_3/2020/08/23/15-18-12-073_7dd719bc525d63a3.webp","https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/C3XSecurityCamera-300x150.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx22/cdn16@2020_5/2020/08/23/15-18-17-763_a648817f1a94fe63.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598195873339},{"createdTime":"2020-08-23 23:18:00","updatedTime":"2020-08-23 23:18:00","title":"The Diminishing Returns of Outsourcing and the Fallacy of Automation","link":"https://readwrite.com/?p=167042","description":"<div><a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/02/17/the-diminishing-returns-of-outsourcing-and-the-fallacy-of-automation/\" title=\"The Diminishing Returns of Outsourcing and the Fallacy of Automation\"><img width=\"300\" height=\"169\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/outsourcing-automation-fallacy-300x169.jpg\" class=\"attachment-medium size-medium wp-post-image\" alt=\"\" style=\"margin-bottom: 15px;\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/outsourcing-automation-fallacy-300x169.jpg 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/outsourcing-automation-fallacy-900x506.jpg 900w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/outsourcing-automation-fallacy-260x146.jpg 260w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/outsourcing-automation-fallacy-1536x864.jpg 1536w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/outsourcing-automation-fallacy.jpg 1920w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px\" /></a></div><p>No clickbait quite compares to a veiled threat like, “These XX Industries are Those Under Greatest Threat of Annihilation by [insert latest technological advance or cheap labor country here].”</p>\n<p>It remains in the corporate incentive structure, particularly for public companies, to create systems, processes and wages that significantly reduce costs to bolster bottom-line cash-flow. Unfortunately, this shortsighted approach is not only disingenuous to net-net long term sustainability, it can frequently be simply untrue.</p>\n<p>Furthermore, today’s technology prognosticators love to use technological outgrowth to make sweeping and often crazy predictions about future events (robot apocalypse, anyone?). Nowhere is this more prevalent when it comes to the threat of jobs (clickbait) or the promise of massive savings in time and financial resources to business owners.</p>\n<p>It is also sometimes used as fodder to justify political ends. Social media went crazy a few years ago when <a href=\"https://www.cnbc.com/2018/06/18/elon-musk-automated-jobs-could-make-ubi-cash-handouts-necessary.html\">Elon Musk used the automation fallacy to justify the eventual need to implement universal basic income</a> (UBI).  Other <a href=\"https://fortune.com/2019/01/10/automation-replace-jobs/\">AI experts have similarly opined the replacement of 40% of jobs in less than 15 years</a> once artificial intelligence is entrenched.</p>\n<h2><strong>Automation and Outsourcing are Not Catch-all Solutions</strong></h2>\n<p>In truth, we are likely farther away from complete workforce obliteration than many experts claim. Additionally, the opportunity for human redundancy removal, at least when it comes to automation and outsourcing, is less-likely felt in some areas over others. Yes, <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/01/21/how-self-driving-cars-can-shape-our-future/\">transportation—a massive part of most economies—will be upended in a major way</a>, but what about other traditionally blue collar jobs? I don’t see plumbers, painters and electricians getting replaced by robots anytime soon. Also, highly-technical work, like code and online content consumed by humans is likely still best produced by humans, at least for the somewhat foreseeable future.</p>\n<p>While somewhat siloed and myopic, our internal data speaks similarly. For instance, roughly <a href=\"https://seo.co/white-label/\">38% of our link building clients are white label SEO agency partners</a>. This underscores the following apparent needs, at least in the content marketing community:</p>\n<ul>\n<li><a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/10/14/outsourcing-automation-future-of-business-scalability/\">Quality is paramount to price</a>, especially when long-term sustainability is desired. Short-termism frequently breeds a push toward lower quality work to save a penny. This is especially true for highly-technical tasks or tasks where the outcome is critical. One example is the complete outsourcing of raising a child. Daycare can only imbue the outcome you want to an extent.</li>\n<li>Scale requires resources. If you want to scale any endeavor, you must reach a critical mass in terms of resources and personnel. Companies without resources are more prone to outsource and more likely to automate. Doing so allows them the flexibility of not having to hire full-time, but keep expenses flexible—a perfect beneficial example of the gig-economy.</li>\n<li>Speed of delivery often requires more resources than what might be immediately available internally. Speed can drive outsourcing.</li>\n<li>Experts can’t all be housed in a single company. <a href=\"https://www.podbean.com/media/share/dir-xs6pv-935f4cd?utm_campaign=w_share_ep&#38;utm_medium=dlink&#38;utm_source=w_share\">Outsourcing allows smaller companies</a> to tap into the expertise of individual consultants whose services would be far more expensive as full-time staff.</li>\n</ul>\n<p>In short, while automation and outsourcing—while beneficial—cannot solve all the issues related to cost, quality and speed. In fact, an organizational assessment of both internal and external costs (to more effectively determine the net-net) will be required in each instance where such solutions may be suggested to replace the status quo.</p>\n<h2><strong>Outsourcing ≠ Offshoring </strong></h2>\n<p>But outsourcing and offshoring are not synonyms.</p>\n<p>If I were to ask, “what’s the first word that comes to mind when I use the phrase: ‘<a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/03/06/why-automation-is-the-only-path-forward-for-manufacturing/\">outsourced manufacturing</a>’?” I’m no mind reader, but I would venture your response would be “China.” What about “outsourced software development”? My next guess: “India.”</p>\n<p>Most would argue, the rising tide floating all boats has a much greater net-net impact, the tendency toward corporate greed and profits shifts the investment to other areas. <a href=\"https://www.forbes.com/sites/warrenshoulberg/2019/10/16/us-finally-succeeds-in-vietnam-as-more-companies-move-sourcing-there/#3afd0d6b4a4e\">It’s not just the trade war that is moving Chinese manufacturing to places like Vietnam</a>. Thanks to already-rising Chinese wages and manufacturing costs, the writing was already on the wall, the trade war simply acted more like a premature catalyst.</p>\n<p>When it comes to outsourcing tasks that are native to a particular culture that may be critical to success, we need to remove the temptation to automate and outsource these functions, especially those that tie most critical to the customer experience. Two viable examples that come to mind are telemarketing outsourcing and online content production.</p>\n<p>When I refer to telemarketing, I’m not referring to support staff you might encounter in India or the Philippines when you call Microsoft or American Express. No, I’m referring to outbound callers, who might be selling a particular product or service. In high volumes, even the blind squirrel picks up a nut now and again. However, when it comes to having the greatest impact in the shortest period, someone from the same culture, accent and communication style is often always</p>\n<p>Secondly, content production is also an area that can be outsourced, but likely not offshored cheaply. What types of content? Long form blogs, written articles on high authority publications, podcasts and commercial-like YouTube videos are all areas that might be easily outsourced, but should never be offshored. These types of customer-facing content experiences need to reflect the culture and style of the desired country in question. In our case, United States companies are best served by outsourcing their content work, but are more likely to experience a massive customer fail when they attempt to offshore it.</p>\n<h2><strong>The Present and Future of Outsourcing </strong></h2>\n<p>As industrialized nations have leveraged less expensive wages overseas, they have seen a highly-diminished return on their initial investment as wages always tend to increase over time. The trend typically continues until the cost to move to the next low wage environment is outstripped by the cost of staying.</p>\n<p>Today’s manufacturers of both code and clothes move from one nation to the next. During the industrial revolution in the early 19<sup>th</sup> century, the United States was the outsourcers mecca. While that has shifted here at home, the fertile “next frontier” for outsourcing opportunities are diminishing as the rising tide of economic growth moves across the world.</p>\n<p>This wave of outsourcing is creating more of an economic benefit to emerging economies, but the inexpensive labor opportunities for large corporations looking to outsource will continue to diminish in the years ahead as we run out of proverbial “frontier.”</p>\n<h2><strong>The Future of Automation </strong></h2>\n<p>If automation does inevitably take over our workforce, the opportunity to fix and provide support to robotics, blockchain, servers and the ancillary services surrounding them are likely to be vast.</p>\n<p>There are also areas that automation and machines are likely going to be difficult to fully touch. Home cleaning services, nannies and other B2C services industries that have a great deal of stock in human-to-human contact will remain existent for many years to come, even if the cars that drive them eventually become autonomous.</p>\n<p>I personally side with <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/more-jobs-created-globally-automation-manpower-report-2019-2\">those who believe automation will produce more jobs, not less</a>.</p>\n<h2><strong>Conclusion </strong></h2>\n<p>There will no doubt be winners and losers on the frontier of both automation and outsourcing, but there is no doubt that the promise of automation may have less of a disjointed disruption effect than what prognosticators predict. Outsourcing, in its own turn, will continue to provide outsized returns for companies looking to save on costs. However, over time, there is no doubt such returns will continue to ebb as outsources truly run out of veritable frontier from which to source newer, cheaper labor. But, <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2018/11/01/never-mind-the-robots-automation-will-lead-to-lower-prices-more-leisure-time/\">most compelling on both fronts is the potential for lower prices and greater time spent in leisure</a>.</p>\n<p>So, the next time you see an article that shows how video is going to somehow kill the radio star, remember many more video stars were created by video than were ever annihilated in radio.</p>\n<p>The post <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/02/17/the-diminishing-returns-of-outsourcing-and-the-fallacy-of-automation/\">The Diminishing Returns of Outsourcing and the Fallacy of Automation</a> appeared first on <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com\">ReadWrite</a>.</p>\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Mon, 17 Feb 2020 22:52:51 +0000","feedId":271,"bgimg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/outsourcing-automation-fallacy.jpg","linkMd5":"8c6cc7a2399505408a90011b6e238054","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx15/cdn7@2020_5/2020/08/23/15-18-20-313_41ac17d1fcbde925.webp","metaImg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/outsourcing-automation-fallacy.jpg","destWidth":1920,"destHeight":1080,"sourceBytes":245675,"destBytes":201790,"author":"Nate Nead","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/outsourcing-automation-fallacy-300x169.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn7@2020_3/2020/08/23/15-18-28-035_ee279ece6d5ff2d4.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598195880986},{"createdTime":"2020-08-23 23:18:01","updatedTime":"2020-08-23 23:18:01","title":"How Blockchain is Revolutionizing the Supply Chain Industry","link":"https://readwrite.com/?p=161633","description":"<div><a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/02/10/how-blockchain-is-revolutionizing-the-supply-chain-industry/\" title=\"How Blockchain is Revolutionizing the Supply Chain Industry\"><img width=\"300\" height=\"185\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/12/How-Blockchain-is-Revolutionizing-the-Supply-Chain-Industry-300x185.png\" class=\"attachment-medium size-medium wp-post-image\" alt=\"blockchain and supply chain industry\" style=\"margin-bottom: 15px;\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/12/How-Blockchain-is-Revolutionizing-the-Supply-Chain-Industry-300x185.png 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/12/How-Blockchain-is-Revolutionizing-the-Supply-Chain-Industry-260x160.png 260w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/12/How-Blockchain-is-Revolutionizing-the-Supply-Chain-Industry.png 825w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px\" /></a></div><p>The Supply chain has transformed, and companies have not updated the underlying technology for managing them in decades. With Blockchain technology, companies can rebuild their approach to supply chain management at the ecosystem level and go from the island of insight to an integrated global view.</p>\n<blockquote><p><strong>“At its most basic level, the core logic of blockchains means that no piece of inventory can exist in the same place twice.”</strong></p>\n<p><cite><strong>-Paul Brody<br />\nEY Global Innovation Blockchain Leader</strong></cite></p></blockquote>\n<h2>Here are some ideas on how Blockchain is revolutionizing the supply chain industry.</h2>\n<blockquote><p><em>Everyone loves to hate middleman, but it turns out they are really useful. Until the advent of bitcoin and blockchain technology, the only way you could get a large number of entities to agree upon a shared, truthful set of data(such as who owns how much money). </em></p>\n<p><em>This was for appointing an impartial intermediary to process and account for all transactions. Blockchain makes it possible for ecosystems of business partners to share and agree upon key pieces of information. <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/10/18/how-libra-will-change-social-media-marketing/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Facebook’s<strong> Libra</strong></a> is also using blockchain technology.</em></p>\n<p><em>Instead of having a central intermediary, blockchains synchronize all data and transactions across the network and each participant verifies the work and calculations of others. This enormous amount of redundancy and crosschecking is why financial solutions like Bitcoin are so secure and reliable. </em></p>\n<p><em>Even as they synchronize hundreds of thousands of transactions across thousands of network nodes every week.</em></p>\n<p class=\"has-background has-medium-font-size has-pale-cyan-blue-background-color\"><em><strong>“The Core logic of blockchain applied to the supply chain”</strong></em></p>\n</blockquote>\n<h2>The radically new approach to supply chain management.</h2>\n<p>Apply the same security and redundancy to something like inventory &#8212; and substitute supply chain partners for banking nodes. You&#8217;ll have the foundation for a radically new approach to supply chain partners for banking nodes. You&#8217;ll also have the foundation for a radically new approach to supply chain management.</p>\n<h4>The use cases for this new way of working are compelling.</h4>\n<p>At its most basic level, the core logic of blockchain means that no piece of inventory can exist in the same place twice. Move a product from finished goods to in-transit, and that transaction status will update for everyone, everywhere, within minutes.</p>\n<h4>With Blockchain you have full traceability back to the point of origin.</h4>\n<p>Before diving into the pool of ” How <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/01/06/6-industries-blockchain-technology-will-revolutionize/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Blockchain is Revolutionizing</a> the Supply Chain Industry” let’s take a brief look at the definition of Supply Chain and Blockchain.</p>\n<h2>Blockchain</h2>\n<figure class=\"wp-block-image\">\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_161634\" aria-describedby=\"caption-attachment-161634\" style=\"width: 1024px\" class=\"wp-caption aligncenter\"><a href=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/blockchain-1024x576-1.png\"><img class=\"wp-image-161634 size-full\" title=\"blockchain process\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/blockchain-1024x576-1.png\" alt=\"blockchain process\" width=\"1024\" height=\"576\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/blockchain-1024x576-1.png 1024w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/blockchain-1024x576-1-260x146.png 260w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/blockchain-1024x576-1-300x169.png 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/blockchain-1024x576-1-900x506.png 900w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 1024px) 100vw, 1024px\" /></a><figcaption id=\"caption-attachment-161634\" class=\"wp-caption-text\"><em><strong>Basic RM Blockchain Process</strong></em></figcaption></figure></figure>\n<h3>Most people have heard the phrase, &#8220;<strong><em>Blockchain is the greatest invention since the Internet</em></strong> ” or ” <strong><em>Everything will be Blockchain in a few years.&#8221;</em></strong></h3>\n<p>These phrases tend to leave people more confused then they were previously. Blockchain is a decentralized, distributed database that holds digital records securely. Furthermore, although all records are transparent and accessible to the public, they are not altered, deleted or edited.</p>\n<p>All data inserted into the blockchain remains impaired permanently. Each transaction or record inserted in the Blockchain registers a different “Block” on the chain.</p>\n<p>Basically, Blockchain provides a method of record-keeping which is highly secure and more efficient for businesses/individuals to work with. BlockChain along with Ai is also helping to shape the future of robotics in various ways.</p>\n<p><a href=\"https://codersera.com/blog/top-programming-languages-for-robotics/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">Robotics Programming Language</a> for robotics uses AI and blockchain together can add efficiency to autonomous cars, or they can help in bitcoin mining.</p>\n<h2>Supply Chain Management (SCM)</h2>\n<figure class=\"wp-block-image alignwide\"><a href=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/scm-1-1.png\"><img class=\"aligncenter wp-image-161635 size-full\" title=\"supply chain management\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/scm-1-1.png\" alt=\"supply chain management\" width=\"500\" height=\"339\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/scm-1-1.png 500w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/scm-1-1-236x160.png 236w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/scm-1-1-300x203.png 300w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 500px) 100vw, 500px\" /></a></figure>\n<p>Nowadays we have the luxury of having ready-made, high-quality products right on our doorstep. It’s easy to go to a store, buy a shirt, and not think of where that shirt came from or how it was manufactured. That shirt came from how it was manufactured.</p>\n<p><strong>For that shirt or product to make it store shelves it must go through plenty of hands stemming all the way from the provider of the raw materials, to the retailer who is giving you the ready-made product.</strong></p>\n<p>The process which links all the parties involved in delivering you the ready-made product is called the <strong>Supply Chain.</strong></p>\n<h2>Logistics is a huge aspect of Supply Chain Management.</h2>\n<p>Products are shipped, stored in warehouses, and go through customs. The entire process is time consuming, costly, and many times complicated. In addition, since global trade involves dealing with foreign organizations, importers and exporters may have to deal with political outcomes, international law, and high tariffs.</p>\n<blockquote><p><strong>“Through blockchains, companies gain a real-time digital ledger of transactions and movements for all participants in their supply chain network. But don’t let the simplicity of the tool overshadow how transformational it is.”</strong></p>\n<p><cite><strong>Paul Brody<br />\nEY Global Innovation Blockchain Leader</strong></cite></p></blockquote>\n<h2>Blockchain Stepping In</h2>\n<p>Some of the most urgent issues facing supply chains can be addressed through blockchain technology, as it provides novel ways to record, transmit, and share data.</p>\n<p>In essence, a blockchain is a unique database system created and maintained by participants in a decentralized network. It offers a secure and reliable architecture for conveying information and transactions ( e.g. the exchange of data and assets among participants in a supply chain), which can be recorded digitally.</p>\n<p>As the distributed ledger is decentralized, each stakeholder maintains a copy, which prevents a single point of failure or data loss. This also means blockchains are highly resistant to altering or tampering. Such accurate and tamper-proof records secure data integrity and can be accessed to make regulatory compliance easier.</p>\n<p>Ultimately, blockchain can increase the efficiency and transparency of supply chains and positively impact everything from warehousing to delivery to payment.</p>\n<h4 class=\"has-background has-medium-font-size has-pale-cyan-blue-background-color\">All parties involved from beginning to end in the supply chain will be aware as the product is transacted and handled from party to party at all times.</h4>\n<p class=\"has-background has-medium-font-size has-pale-cyan-blue-background-color\">Through the implementation of Blockchain technology in the Supply Chain Industry, products can be tracked and traced throughout their entire process.</p>\n<h3>Traceable and Immutable Records</h3>\n<p>Blockchain data is immutable and digital signatures which require to confirm information ownership. If multiple companies work together they can use a blockchain system to record data about the location and ownership of their materials and products.</p>\n<p>The data is stored in the blockchain, which offers a full history of all items in the supply chain. Any member of the supply chain can see what is going on as materials move from company to company. These data records cannot be altered and are highly Traceable.</p>\n<p>In the event of a defective product, the source of the problem can be identified more quickly, which improves the efficiency of product recalls and disruption resolution between stakeholders in the chain.</p>\n<figure class=\"wp-block-image\">\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_161636\" aria-describedby=\"caption-attachment-161636\" style=\"width: 489px\" class=\"wp-caption aligncenter\"><a href=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/blockchain-immutabiity-1.jpg\"><img class=\"wp-image-161636 size-full\" title=\"Traceable and Immutable Records\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/blockchain-immutabiity-1.jpg\" alt=\"Traceable and Immutable Records\" width=\"489\" height=\"209\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/blockchain-immutabiity-1.jpg 489w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/blockchain-immutabiity-1-260x111.jpg 260w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/blockchain-immutabiity-1-300x128.jpg 300w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 489px) 100vw, 489px\" /></a><figcaption id=\"caption-attachment-161636\" class=\"wp-caption-text\"><em><strong>Traceable and Immutable Records</strong></em></figcaption></figure></figure>\n<h4>Having a transparent and complete inventory of product flow help businesses make better decisions.</h4>\n<p>It gives stakeholders and customers more confidence in the products’ quality. The improved transparency is also a tool for fighting fraud and counterfeiting.</p>\n<h3>Cost Savings</h3>\n<p>Inefficiencies in the supply chain create a lot of waste. This is especially prevalent in industries that have perishable goods, such as the food industry.</p>\n<p>The improved tracking and data transparency that blockchain offers can help the business identify. These wasteful inefficiencies so they can implement targeted cost-saving measures.</p>\n<figure class=\"wp-block-image\">\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_161637\" aria-describedby=\"caption-attachment-161637\" style=\"width: 1024px\" class=\"wp-caption aligncenter\"><a href=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/blockchain-1-1-1024x1004-1.png\"><img class=\"wp-image-161637 size-full\" title=\"how block-chain works\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/blockchain-1-1-1024x1004-1.png\" alt=\"how block-chain works\" width=\"1024\" height=\"1004\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/blockchain-1-1-1024x1004-1.png 1024w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/blockchain-1-1-1024x1004-1-163x160.png 163w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/blockchain-1-1-1024x1004-1-300x294.png 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/blockchain-1-1-1024x1004-1-733x719.png 733w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/blockchain-1-1-1024x1004-1-40x40.png 40w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/blockchain-1-1-1024x1004-1-60x60.png 60w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 1024px) 100vw, 1024px\" /></a><figcaption id=\"caption-attachment-161637\" class=\"wp-caption-text\"><em><strong>Blockchain and how it works.</strong></em></figcaption></figure></figure>\n<p>The use of blockchain can also eliminate fees associated with funds passing into and out of various bank accounts and payment processors. Such fees cut into profit margins, so being able to take them out of the equation is significant.</p>\n<h3>Interoperability</h3>\n<figure class=\"wp-block-image\"><a href=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/interoperability-1.jpeg\"><img class=\"alignleft wp-image-161638 size-medium\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/interoperability-1-300x224.jpeg\" alt=\"Interoperability\" width=\"300\" height=\"224\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/interoperability-1-300x224.jpeg 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/interoperability-1-214x160.jpeg 214w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/interoperability-1.jpeg 829w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px\" /></a></figure>\n<h4>One of the problems with current supply chain technology is not being able to integrate data across every partner in the process.</h4>\n<p>In contrast, blockchains are built as distributed systems that maintain a unique and transparent data repository. Each party in the network contributes to adding new data and verifying its integrity.</p>\n<p>This means that all parties involved in the network. So one company can easily verify the information being broadcasted by another.</p>\n<h3>Replacing Electronic Data Interchange Systems</h3>\n<figure class=\"wp-block-image\"><a href=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/EDI-1.gif\"><img class=\"aligncenter wp-image-161639 size-full\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/EDI-1.gif\" alt=\"Replacing Electronic Data Interchange Systems\" width=\"515\" height=\"183\" /></a></figure>\n<p>Many companies rely on <strong>Electronic Data Interchange (EDI)</strong> systems to send information to each other. However, this data goes out in timed batches rather than in real-time.</p>\n<p>If a shipment goes missing or changes in pricing, other participants in the supply chain will get this information by involving parties. Also, read how AI will shape the <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/01/08/how-will-it-shape-up-the-future-of-the-internet/\">future of the internet</a>.</p>\n<h3>Transparency</h3>\n<figure class=\"wp-block-image\"><a href=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/transparancy.png\"><img class=\"aligncenter wp-image-161640 size-full\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/transparancy.png\" alt=\"Transparency\" width=\"624\" height=\"243\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/transparancy.png 624w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/transparancy-260x101.png 260w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/transparancy-300x117.png 300w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 624px) 100vw, 624px\" /></a></figure>\n<h2>The blockchain is a shared database that ensures honest transparency.</h2>\n<p>All partners have the responsibility to upload their information and data about the product. A digital collection of accurate data improves accountability and trust between partners. Blockchain technology can show updates to the product in mere minutes.</p>\n<p>Everyone involved knows exactly where a product stands at all times. You can see exactly where a product is, how it’s being made, and when it will be delivered all in one place.</p>\n<h3>Streamlined</h3>\n<figure class=\"wp-block-image\"><a href=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/stramlined-1.png\"><img class=\"alignnone wp-image-161641 size-full\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/stramlined-1.png\" alt=\"Streamlined\" width=\"820\" height=\"339\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/stramlined-1.png 820w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/stramlined-1-260x107.png 260w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/stramlined-1-300x124.png 300w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 820px) 100vw, 820px\" /></a></figure>\n<h4>All of the logging involved with the digitally done blockchain.</h4>\n<p>This leads to less administrative work and more consistent and speedy data tracking. With the blockchain, you cut out the middleman and sign on to the blockchain to instantly download information. Everything is in one spot, making communication and operations highly streamlined.</p>\n<p>The blockchain is global and scalable. The technology can support worldwide partnerships and communications just as fast as regional partnerships. This makes it the ideal solution for an economy of globalization.</p>\n<h3>Enhanced Analytics</h3>\n<figure class=\"wp-block-image\"><a href=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/analytics-1-1.png\"><img class=\"alignleft wp-image-161642 size-medium\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/analytics-1-1-300x214.png\" alt=\"Enhanced Analytics\" width=\"300\" height=\"214\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/analytics-1-1-300x214.png 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/analytics-1-1-224x160.png 224w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/analytics-1-1.png 821w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px\" /></a></figure>\n<h4>The blockchain offers complex solutions to analyze the uploading data.</h4>\n<p>Blockchain can help create forecasts and predictions based on previous data, and it can allow users to pinpoint legs in the supply chain.</p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<p>These data analytics are proving invaluable to companies who want to minimize supply chain expenditures and grow their businesses.</p>\n<h3>Customer Satisfaction</h3>\n<p>The blockchain technology can also use for boosting customer satisfaction. Business owners can use the blockchain database to see where items are in production and shipment to build a delivery timeline for their customers. It also has a social advantage.</p>\n<p>A clothing brand with a dedication to fighting sweatshops may give their customers access to the blockchain. Showing them a social consciousness approval form, and a labor union sheet.</p>\n<h2><strong>A World of Potential</strong></h2>\n<blockquote><p><em><strong>The Wall Street Journal recently posted an article that exclaimed, “after initial tests, 12 of the world’s biggest companies, including Walmart and Nestle, are building a blockchain to remake how the industry tracks food worldwide.”</strong></em></p></blockquote>\n<p>The blockchain is already revolutionizing the financial world. It&#8217;s only a matter of time until it takes over every other industry.</p>\n<p>A technology like this is a generational technology, something that will change the way the world works. The blockchain technology will update a 200-year-old system which makes it more reliable, secure, and transparent.</p>\n<p>The post <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/02/10/how-blockchain-is-revolutionizing-the-supply-chain-industry/\">How Blockchain is Revolutionizing the Supply Chain Industry</a> appeared first on <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com\">ReadWrite</a>.</p>\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Mon, 10 Feb 2020 16:00:01 +0000","feedId":271,"bgimg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/12/How-Blockchain-is-Revolutionizing-the-Supply-Chain-Industry.png","linkMd5":"38067ce83ceeacaf0d54f7c8c19d3e16","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx10/cdn60@2020_6/2020/08/23/15-18-26-866_f614e4b08d82cc3b.webp","metaImg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/12/How-Blockchain-is-Revolutionizing-the-Supply-Chain-Industry.png","destWidth":825,"destHeight":510,"sourceBytes":132674,"destBytes":26134,"author":"Jason Rees","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/12/How-Blockchain-is-Revolutionizing-the-Supply-Chain-Industry-300x185.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx31/cdn43@2020_1/2020/08/23/15-18-13-387_dec04b35c404c10b.webp","https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/blockchain-1024x576-1.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx29/cdn100@2020_5/2020/08/23/15-18-21-637_5fdfd2dd5b70df47.webp","https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/scm-1-1.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx31/cdn55@2020_4/2020/08/23/15-18-14-429_c91626f750f1a96c.webp","https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/blockchain-immutabiity-1.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn35@2020_5/2020/08/23/15-18-16-637_1e91a04a12923b48.webp","https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/blockchain-1-1-1024x1004-1.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx21/cdn31@2020_2/2020/08/23/15-18-20-346_baa3724f0fab7a6a.webp","https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/interoperability-1-300x224.jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx19/cdn23@2020_6/2020/08/23/15-18-22-583_ab7577a99e5e8fe1.webp","https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/EDI-1.gif":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx22/cdn44@2020_5/2020/08/23/15-18-27-662_2a0708b744f18862.webp","https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/transparancy.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx3/cdn43@2020_4/2020/08/23/15-18-14-298_19f789b92a56705a.webp","https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/stramlined-1.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx30/cdn47@2020_1/2020/08/23/15-18-09-591_75bd70f05ff01e1b.webp","https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/analytics-1-1-300x214.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx25/cdn48@2020_1/2020/08/23/15-18-18-165_0c7d32438164c14c.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598195881321},{"createdTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:52","updatedTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:52","title":"The Importance of Empathy-Based Marketing","link":"https://readwrite.com/?p=173981","description":"<div><a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/07/25/the-importance-of-empathy-based-marketing/\" title=\"The Importance of Empathy-Based Marketing\"><img width=\"300\" height=\"185\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/The-Importance-of-Empathy-Based-Marketing-300x185.jpg\" class=\"attachment-medium size-medium wp-post-image\" alt=\"empathy-based marketing\" style=\"margin-bottom: 15px;\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/The-Importance-of-Empathy-Based-Marketing-300x185.jpg 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/The-Importance-of-Empathy-Based-Marketing-260x160.jpg 260w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/The-Importance-of-Empathy-Based-Marketing.jpg 825w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px\" /></a></div><p>At one time, consumers were a captive audience. You sold it, they bought it, as long as it was a prestige brand, a household name, or was <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/05/20/complete-guide-to-influencer-marketing-in-2020/\">promoted by an influencer</a> or by a really cool cartoon animal. Here is the importance of empathy-based marketing.</p>\n<h3><strong>People have a lot more choices, nowadays, and marketers everywhere are clamoring for their attention.</strong></h3>\n<p>To stand out, you not only need to have a quality product or service, but you also need to show that you understand your audience—not even stellar content curation and content promotion can save you if your marketing isn’t hyper-targeted.</p>\n<p>Enter empathy-based marketing.</p>\n<h2><b>What is empathy-based marketing?</b></h2>\n<p>Empathy-based marketing is a strategy that calls for you to walk in your customer’s shoes for a bit. Instead of using a hard-sell approach, you consider their experience and think about how your brand can help them get what they want, which could be:</p>\n<ul>\n<li>More free time</li>\n<li>More happiness</li>\n<li>More friends</li>\n<li>Better health</li>\n<li>A more attractive appearance</li>\n<li>A career advantage</li>\n</ul>\n<p>Yes, you’re still out to make a profit, but with empathy-based marketing, your strategy is different. You need to connect with your audience on a deeper and more intuitive level by delivering an immense value that they never anticipated. In short, make them feel like you read their mind before going above and beyond.</p>\n<h2><b>Define your customer</b></h2>\n<p>A lot of businesses use <a href=\"https://www.usertesting.com/blog/customer-personas\">buyer personas</a> to direct their marketing. These personas are fictional characters that represent your ideal customers. Without them, your marketing efforts can be a bit like throwing snowballs in the dark and hoping that you blindly connect with something.</p>\n<p>To be effective, your personas need to take <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/06/24/5-product-discovery-tips-for-building-solutions-customers-will-buy/\">customer emotions</a> into account. Identify their wants and pain points, understand how these factors make them feel, and then plan your content accordingly. For example, customers who are constantly rushed for time will want a simplified usage guide while those who are buying to indulge themselves value things that make them feel extra-special, like a free gift with purchase.</p>\n<h2><b>Understand your customer</b></h2>\n<p>Who are you marketing to? Is it busy parents? <a href=\"https://www.candybar.co/blog/candybar-merchant-stories/\">Small business owners</a>? People who are passionate about the environment will pay attention. To communicate properly with them, you need to understand what they care about and how your product can give them what they want, whether it be more free time, a healthier body, or a new skill that they can use to climb the corporate ladder.</p>\n<h2><b>What motivates them to buy?</b></h2>\n<p>A <a href=\"https://smith.co/assets/docs/SMITH-POV-8-modes-of-shopping-report.pdf\">detailed study</a> by commerce experts SMITH identified eight different emotions that <a href=\"https://www.reallysimplesystems.com/blog/emotional-branding/\">influence buying</a> and shopping decisions. For example, it found that some people will only buy products that are ‘cool’ and state-of-the-art to make themselves stand out from the crowd while others are directed by opinions: they need validation from friends, family, and online testimonials before they buy.</p>\n<p>So which emotions are guiding your customers when they shop? You can get the answer by:</p>\n<ul>\n<li>Running an online poll on your website</li>\n<li>Use an <a href=\"https://www.emailvendorselection.com/mailchimp-alternatives/\">email newsletter service like MailChimp</a> to send a <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/06/02/understanding-the-role-of-ai-and-ml-in-sentiment-analysis/\">customer sentiment survey</a> to your audience.</li>\n<li>Reading the testimonials on Google and your business Facebook page</li>\n</ul>\n<p>Many businesses are even investing in artificial intelligence to collect and analyze customer data for info they can use for empathy-based marketing. <a href=\"https://emerj.com/ai-sector-overviews/ai-in-business-intelligence-applications/\">This article</a> by AI research and advisory company Emerj provides some real-life examples of how businesses like Walmart use <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/06/02/understanding-the-role-of-ai-and-ml-in-sentiment-analysis/\">business intelligence applications</a> to understand their customers.</p>\n<h2><b>Send a message that resonates</b></h2>\n<p>Empathetic content shows customers that you understand what it’s like to walk in their shoes. People feel positive about brands that can solve their problem, so send a message, <a href=\"https://www.referralcandy.com/blog/words-that-sell/\">using the right words</a>, that shows how your products address issues that matter to them.</p>\n<p>If your company website has a blog (and it should), use it to create a narrative that talks about these issues. For example:</p>\n<ul>\n<li>If your customers are busy professionals who rarely have enough time in the day to get everything done, post some tips, and share links to productivity tools that don’t compete with your products.</li>\n<li>Are your customer&#8217;s <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/07/01/mural-paintings-and-the-impact-of-colors-in-our-lives/\">young professionals or entrepreneurs</a> who are just starting out in their careers? Share some ideas for assembling a classy-looking wardrobe on a budget, or maybe some <a href=\"https://www.sociallyinfused.com/marketing/how-to-start-your-own-business-ultimate-guide/\">tips for starting your own business</a>.</li>\n</ul>\n<p>Bonus points if you use video, especially if you’re marketing to millennials. <a href=\"https://www.thinkwithgoogle.com/data/millennial-learning-statistics/\">Research presented by Google</a> shows that when they want to learn something new, this age group is nearly three times more likely to watch a video than read a book. However, the highly visual nature of video makes it a great marketing tool for all customer types.</p>\n<h2><b>Empathy-based marketing in action</b></h2>\n<p>So, what are some practical examples of empathy-based marketing? Below are two cases of well-known consumer brands taking customer service to the next level.</p>\n<h3><b>The Delta pizza party</b></h3>\n<p>Few situations are more frustrating than a delayed or canceled flight. Passenger reactions can be so extreme that they’ve been featured on countless reality TV shows.</p>\n<p>In April 2017, Delta airlines provided a perfect illustration of brand empathy when it <a href=\"https://www.cnn.com/2017/04/06/us/delta-delays-pizza-trnd/index.html\">ordered hundreds of pizzas</a> for Atlanta-area customers whose flights had been canceled or delayed due to extreme weather. The pizzas were distributed to passengers stuck on runways and waiting in surrounding airports.</p>\n<p>This move was more than simply good customer service. It presented the Delta brand as one that understands and cares about its passengers, especially when they’re in one of the most stressful situations imaginable.</p>\n<h3><b>LUSH shows how it’s made</b></h3>\n<p>The LUSH beauty brand is all about natural products, so their customers are people who want fresh, homemade cosmetics. To assure its community that they really are getting 100% natural beauty products, LUSH has a <a href=\"https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL_G_OaIbOuAmPFX8IubCXOp18_TBKyzhZ\">video series</a> called ‘How It’s Made.’</p>\n<p>Each episode shows real LUSH employees at work, explaining how they make all the soaps, lotions, bath bombs, and other products. Depending on what they’re making, you’ll see mounds of sea salt, fresh citrus fruit, and dried flowers on the counter, confirming to viewers that they’re getting what they pay for.</p>\n<h2><b>Conclusion</b></h2>\n<p>Although we’ve got millions of years of evolution behind us and are capable of both critical thinking and abstract thought, emotions still guide a lot of our decisions, including what to buy.</p>\n<p>To succeed at empathy-based marketing, you want to create a <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/06/11/how-do-you-create-an-effective-journey-map-for-your-customers/\">journey map</a> or experience/outcome that your ideal buyer can relate to, and feel good about. When you start by understanding them and then create content that delivers your brand message in an impactful way (go ahead and use a cool cartoon animal if you want!), you’ll stand out and succeed.</p>\n<p><em>Image Credit: unsplashed</em></p>\n<p>The post <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/07/25/the-importance-of-empathy-based-marketing/\">The Importance of the industry, you should be ready to work hard so that you can earn more profits with the help of the new thing called the internet. It is just like a factory for the newbies to learn how to run a business. The Best <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/02/16/8-best-digital-marketing-strategies-small-businesses-should-implement/\">Digital Marketing Strategies</a> for Startup Businesses</p>\n<p>Do you know what marketing strategies are for your startup business? There are a lot of companies that have used these strategies, yet few of them have the money to implement it.</p>\n<p>For example, your digital marketing campaign is for different businesses. The strategies for one business may not be effective for another. Complete understanding is the reason why your startup business should also look into the strategy of your competitors.</p>\n<p>For example, if you are into digital media and digital products, you should take into consideration your competitors&#8217; websites. They may already be in business and are competing for the same market as you.</p>\n<p>Furthermore, how is your company&#8217;s site relevant to the needs of the consumers. The site must be easy to use, easy to navigate, and relevant to the consumer&#8217;s needs.</p>\n<p>The best way to achieve this is to customize the design of the site. You can do this by using the navigation tools provided by the search engines.</p>\n<h2>Startup Businesses</h2>\n<p>To make it look more professional, you can hire a professional designer to look over your site. You will be sure that the website will have an attractive design, but if the designer has a creative side, he or she can give you a great design.</p>\n<p>For your online reputation, you must make sure that you have a blog for your website. By blogging, you can create a presence on the web so your customers can have an idea about your services and products.</p>\n<p>Articles are also significant for your business. Your articles should be written with accurate facts.</p>\n<p>To get more traffic, you can also put the links to your website at various directories. However, it is still essential that you keep the link to your site as prominent as possible.</p>\n<p>For your marketing campaign, you can also consider hiring expert feedback. True feedback will provide you information about what works for other companies. Email Marketing Tips for Startup Businesses</p>\n<p>These are just some of the strategies. When you consider these, you will have a better chance of success.</p>\n<h3>Email Marketing Tips for Startup Businesses</h3>\n<p style=\"background: white; margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt 0cm;\"><span style=\"font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: 'Helvetica',sans-serif; color: #222222;\"><a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/02/14/how-to-send-the-warmest-cold-emails/\">Email marketing</a> is the most cost-effective way to advertise your business. So it&#8217;s easy to see why so many companies are getting into this type of marketing.</span></p>\n<p style=\"background: white; text-align: start; margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt 0cm;\"><span style=\"font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: 'Helvetica',sans-serif; color: #222222;\">To build a list of potential customers, you will have to provide them with an email address. While this may seem like a tedious task at first, it really isn&#8217;t. It&#8217;s all a matter of knowing where to find an email address, as well as making sure that you do it right the first time.</span></p>\n<p style=\"background: white; text-align: start; margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt 0cm;\"><span style=\"font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: 'Helvetica',sans-serif; color: #222222;\">The way to get started with marketing is to go online and do some research on what other people are doing. Find out how they built their lists. You can also ask around to see what methods are working. Knowing the methods that are working can help to get you going, as well as give you great ideas on how to create your own list.</span></p>\n<p style=\"background: white; text-align: start; margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt 0cm;\"><span style=\"font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: 'Helvetica',sans-serif; color: #222222;\">One thing that you want to be careful about is giving out someone&#8217;s name and mailing address to many people that don&#8217;t care about your product or service. The more subscribers you have, the more money you can make. If you want your list to have longevity, then make sure you choose people who need your product or service.</span></p>\n<h3>Best Tips For Your Startup Business</h3>\n<p style=\"background: white; text-align: start; margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt 0cm;\"><span style=\"font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: 'Helvetica',sans-serif; color: #222222;\">After you&#8217;ve determined who you are going to market to, you will need to start planning out your next step, which will include having a monthly newsletter. Remember that emails can easily get lost in the shuffle. So, having a regular newsletter will ensure that it is picked up each month by your subscribers. You want to make sure that you use a high-quality email marketing software to allow you to know when you should send out an email.</span></p>\n<p style=\"background: white; text-align: start; margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt 0cm;\"><span style=\"font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: 'Helvetica',sans-serif; color: #222222;\">Once you have your newsletter sign up form established, you can start looking for your products or services or start building an affiliate link. Keep in mind that people are only going to join you if they have an interest in what you are offering.</span></p>\n<p style=\"background: white; text-align: start; margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt 0cm;\"><span style=\"font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: 'Helvetica',sans-serif; color: #222222;\">You will want to email these people with offers to promote your products or services and have them take action. You can do this through offers that promote your software or affiliate links, as well as offering incentives for signing up. Also, do a free trial to get their attention, and then you can offer them a discounted or even free product.</span></p>\n<p style=\"background: white; text-align: start; margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt 0cm;\"><span style=\"font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: 'Helvetica',sans-serif; color: #222222;\">While email marketing isn&#8217;t a new concept, it is only recently that many companies have begun using it. When done properly, it can result in a considerable amount of profit for your business.</span></p>\n<h3 style=\"background: white; text-align: start; margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt 0cm;\">Social Media Marketing</h3>\n<p style=\"background: white; text-align: start; margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt 0cm;\"><span style=\"font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: 'Helvetica',sans-serif; color: #222222;\">Social Media Marketing is simply marketing done through social media platforms. A marketing technique that combines website promotion, blogs, and discussion boards to connect with prospects and establish a brand. It allows businesses to connect with their customers but also promote their business via social media marketing. Helps establish business ties, generate buzz, and make an organization more appealing to potential clients.</span></p>\n<p style=\"background: white; text-align: start; margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt 0cm;\"><span style=\"font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: 'Helvetica',sans-serif; color: #222222;\">Today, companies are turning to the Internet to solve all of their marketing needs; however, traditional forms of marketing do not offer the same convenience as they once did. For many years, businesses could only reach out to their customers through visits to their office or even by sending out business cards. </span></p>\n<p style=\"background: white; text-align: start; margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt 0cm;\"><span style=\"font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: 'Helvetica',sans-serif; color: #222222;\">With <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2012/06/29/why-you-cant-escape-social-media-marketing-any-more/\">social media marketing</a>, companies can reach their customers when they need them most. If you&#8217;re looking to make your startup business more attractive to customers, consider using social media marketing.</span></p>\n<p style=\"background: white; text-align: start; margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt 0cm;\"><span style=\"font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: 'Helvetica',sans-serif; color: #222222;\">One of the most critical aspects of the startup business is to have your products and services are unique. Unlike before, now, customers can easily find out about your business, providing them with fresh information about what you do. For instance, having your website listed on various search engines and sites will help customers find you. Websites are also a great way to connect with customers and create long term relationships.</span></p>\n<p style=\"background: white; text-align: start; margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt 0cm;\"><span style=\"font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: 'Helvetica',sans-serif; color: #222222;\">Most network marketing companies are also looking to expand their reach online. Some of them have gained loyal followings because of their ability to leverage social media marketing techniques. These companies offer a variety of marketing tools for their members, including blog marketing, social networking, and more.</span></p>\n<h3 style=\"background: white; text-align: start; margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt 0cm;\"><b>Can Help Your Startup Business</b></h3>\n<p style=\"background: white; text-align: start; margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt 0cm;\"><span style=\"font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: 'Helvetica',sans-serif; color: #222222;\">Social media marketing is similar to traditional marketing. The only difference is that it provides a better way to connect with customers online. It helps to provide your audience with a sense of familiarity while providing your products and services to potential customers at the same time.</span></p>\n<p style=\"background: white; text-align: start; margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt 0cm;\"><span style=\"font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: 'Helvetica',sans-serif; color: #222222;\">Although some might consider network marketing as competition from them, it is suitable for customer support. Since the company will be relying on customers to purchase your products and services, it will be beneficial to provide your customers with free content and discounts to keep them happy.</span></p>\n<p style=\"background: white; text-align: start; margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt 0cm;\"><span style=\"font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: 'Helvetica',sans-serif; color: #222222;\">When people&#8217;s attention is brought to your site, it becomes much easier to get them to share your content with others. It makes sense to use social networking sites to connect with potential customers. Not only will you have a built-in community, but it will also give you a platform where you can further build a fan base.</span></p>\n<p style=\"background: white; text-align: start; margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt 0cm;\"><span style=\"font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: 'Helvetica',sans-serif; color: #222222;\">To reach more potential customers, you will need to implement social media marketing strategies in your marketing plan. If you&#8217;re looking to start a startup business, this is a great way to establish the name of your business and attract new customers.</span></p>\n<h3>Avoid Failure With Paid Promotions and Paid Advertising</h3>\n<p style=\"background: white; text-align: start; margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt 0cm;\"><span style=\"font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: 'Helvetica',sans-serif; color: #222222;\">The idea of <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/04/23/changing-e-commerce-landscape-global-trends-for-2019-and-beyond/\">Paid Promotions</a> to help a startup business success is simple enough, but it&#8217;s also very easy to go wrong. You may want to spend months developing your own promotions and marketing efforts, only to realize that they&#8217;re not working well enough for you to earn money from them. On the other hand, you may discover that your existing marketing efforts are working, and then you&#8217;re simply out of ideas. Here are some tips to help you avoid this situation.</span></p>\n<p style=\"background: white; text-align: start; margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt 0cm;\"><span style=\"font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: 'Helvetica',sans-serif; color: #222222;\">One reason why paying Promotions may not be as successful as you&#8217;d like them to be is because of the quality of your content. For one thing, you want to have something that will <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/03/25/how-to-create-top-performing-content-on-google-according-to-science/\">catch people&#8217;s attention</a> from the moment <a href=\"https://bloggeradvices.com/facebook-ads-placement-strategy/\">Facebook ads placement strategy</a> they come across it. </span></p>\n<p style=\"background: white; text-align: start; margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt 0cm;\"><span style=\"font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: 'Helvetica',sans-serif; color: #222222;\">For another thing, you should be writing for readers that will read what you&#8217;ve written. When you go into Paid Promotions thinking that only your own site is going to get traffic, this is not the case. A lot of articles and blogs go into Paid Promotions in a similar way &#8211; a good article or blog gets more views and traffic because people find it useful.</span></p>\n<p style=\"background: white; text-align: start; margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt 0cm;\"><span style=\"font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: 'Helvetica',sans-serif; color: #222222;\">It&#8217;s not always easy to keep in mind these things, but if you&#8217;re serious about getting your Business Online and driving traffic to your site, you need to remember that paying Promotions and Paid Advertising can help you. The success of Paid Promotions and Paid Advertising depends on the quality of the material you put out there. </span></p>\n<p style=\"background: white; text-align: start; margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt 0cm;\"><span style=\"font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: 'Helvetica',sans-serif; color: #222222;\">The less work you have to do, the better off you&#8217;ll be. It&#8217;s not always easy to write an article, but if you&#8217;re doing it well and putting out high-quality content, it will make your Paid Promotions and Paid Advertising efforts more successful.</span></p>\n<h3>Search Engine Optimization for Startup Business</h3>\n<p style=\"background: white; text-align: start; margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt 0cm;\"><span style=\"font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: 'Helvetica',sans-serif; color: #222222;\">The most effective and cost-effective SEO optimization approach that will generate more traffic to your website is Search Engine Optimization. It is mainly a marketing plan that is driven by search engines to generate relevant traffic to your website.</span></p>\n<p style=\"background: white; text-align: start; margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt 0cm;\"><span style=\"font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: 'Helvetica',sans-serif; color: #222222;\"> In this process, keywords or key phrases are associated with each page of your website to make it search engine friendly. </span></p>\n<p style=\"background: white; text-align: start; margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt 0cm;\"><span style=\"font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: 'Helvetica',sans-serif; color: #222222;\">The idea is to make your site to be easily found by the search engines and also to bring about a targeted audience to your website. The best way to attract such visitors is through the use of rich media such as graphics, videos, voice over Internet applications, and animated images.</span></p>\n<h3></h3>\n<p><a href=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/AI-Change-the-Future-of-SEO.jpg\"><img class=\"aligncenter wp-image-171572\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/AI-Change-the-Future-of-SEO-300x182.jpg\" alt=\"startup business\" width=\"506\" height=\"307\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/AI-Change-the-Future-of-SEO-300x182.jpg 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/AI-Change-the-Future-of-SEO-260x158.jpg 260w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/AI-Change-the-Future-of-SEO.jpg 825w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 506px) 100vw, 506px\" /></a></p>\n<p style=\"background: white; text-align: start; margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt 0cm;\"><span style=\"font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: 'Helvetica',sans-serif; color: #222222;\">Although search engine optimization is essential to the success of any website, this also comes with a price. To sustain this for a long time, you need to make use of the best practices of Search Engine Optimization. SEO includes the use of appropriate keywords, appropriate meta-tags, and the use of proper content on your website. </span></p>\n<p style=\"background: white; text-align: start; margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt 0cm;\"><span style=\"font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: 'Helvetica',sans-serif; color: #222222;\">The content consists of all the essential information that is related to your business, product, or service. The SEO strategies should be taken into consideration as the process of SEO is at the forefront of the competition of search engines.</span></p>\n<p style=\"background: white; text-align: start; margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt 0cm;\"><span style=\"font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: 'Helvetica',sans-serif; color: #222222;\">The first step for <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/01/27/how-will-ai-change-the-future-of-seo/\">Search Engine Optimization</a> is research. You need to have a high level of competency to conduct a search engine optimization campaign. SEO is basically to get an understanding of what is on the mind of the search engines. </span></p>\n<p style=\"background: white; text-align: start; margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt 0cm;\"><span style=\"font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: 'Helvetica',sans-serif; color: #222222;\">There are many resources available for free that can provide you with the knowledge to carry out the process of Search Engine Optimization. Some of these are those that offer training. Once you have this knowledge, then you can proceed with the process of Search Engine Optimization.</span></p>\n<h3>Content Marketing</h3>\n<p style=\"background: white; text-align: start; margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt 0cm;\"><span style=\"font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: 'Helvetica',sans-serif; color: #222222;\">If you are a blogger, marketer, or a freelance writer, you should be careful with <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/09/20/how-to-scale-your-content-marketing/\">content marketing</a>. You might be losing clients by writing lousy content for your business. There are three ways to find out what the search engines think about your content. The first is by reading the Google manual that shows you how to find out what the search engines say about your content. You will also find that there are a lot of mistakes in the content of many blogs.</span></p>\n<p style=\"background: white; text-align: start; margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt 0cm;\"><span style=\"font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: 'Helvetica',sans-serif; color: #222222;\">Another way to find out what the search engines think about your content is to have your own content analyzed. You should be aware that most content management companies do not analyze your content for you, but they do suggest improvements for you. </span></p>\n<p style=\"background: white; text-align: start; margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt 0cm;\"><span style=\"font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: 'Helvetica',sans-serif; color: #222222;\">The best way to go about this is to find a company that specializes in this and employ them to write a blog post for you. They will tell you exactly what you should change about your content.</span></p>\n<h4>Content Strategy</h4>\n<p style=\"background: white; text-align: start; margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt 0cm;\"><span style=\"font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: 'Helvetica',sans-serif; color: #222222;\">You can also use a service that will analyze the content of your business and send you an email when there is a problem with the content. It sounds far fetched, but you might find that the content management expert had seen similar issues before. </span></p>\n<p style=\"background: white; text-align: start; margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt 0cm;\"><span style=\"font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: 'Helvetica',sans-serif; color: #222222;\">The best thing about it is that you do not have to worry about the time it takes to do it yourself. You can ask them to rewrite the content for you for a little over $20 per article. Do a little research before employing a content management company. </span></p>\n<p style=\"background: white; text-align: start; margin: 0cm 0cm 7.5pt 0cm;\"><span style=\"font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: 'Helvetica',sans-serif; color: #222222;\">A third option is to do it yourself, but I am afraid you will be writing content that is never going to be seen by many people because most people have no idea what the term content marketing means.</span></p>\n<p>The post <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/07/20/the-best-digital-marketing-strategies-for-startup-businesses/\">The Best Digital Marketing Strategies for Startup Businesses</a> appeared first on <a
