1920w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px\" /></a></div><p>Blogger outreach is developing relationships and is maintaining the same with some relevant bloggers as well as offering them high-value and relevant content which their audience and readers will find useful and engaging. It can, therefore, increase your <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/04/07/is-content-driving-the-online-market/\">organic search visibility</a> when bloggers with established and trusted sites link to your website.</p>\n<p>There are a lot of companies that provide blogger outreach services. They are also responsible for building cordial relationship with <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/06/12/new-niches-for-startups-created-by-the-covid-19-pandemic/\">many high-quality blogs</a> along with other communities which are related to a website theme.</p>\n<h2>What is the job of a blogger outreach program?</h2>\n<p>These companies aim at getting good content to be posted on the sites with the required website’s URL in it. It also helps in promoting these posts via bookmarking or social media marketing thereby making them popular for generating real traffic through these for the websites.</p>\n<p>Many bloggers outreach will help in finding the best influencers having millions of followings and if they write and publish your business, then millions of audiences will be out there to watch for your brand, thereby providing good marketing.</p>\n<h3><strong>How to expose your brand through bloggers outreach services?</strong></h3>\n<p>Blogger outreach services help you to expose your brand to a proper and targeted audience. It adds a strand to your <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/03/12/how-to-successfully-automate-your-approach-to-guest-blogger-outreach/\">content or blog marketing activity</a>. This allows you to reach wider, new, and relevant audiences. If the content is in the blog format that your target customers usually read, and some new and interesting things are offered, then the potential of brand awareness is considered to be huge.</p>\n<h3><strong>What kind of service does a Blogger outreach service provide?</strong></h3>\n<p>For promoting your brand you may choose any of the blogger outreach services, who will help in promoting blogs as well as any kind of SEO project. Some of the examples are mentioned below:</p>\n<ul>\n<li><strong>Agencies:</strong> If you are an SEO or marketing agency and if you struggle to place quality link placements for the clients, then you may opt for a proper and genuine blogger outreach service. Just check whether the reports which they provide are white-label reports or not. If so then you will get the full credit for their work, which is another good point in seeking the service of blogger outreach.</li>\n</ul>\n<ul>\n<li><strong>Affiliate Marketers:</strong> If you are planning to grow an affiliate website via SEO, and require quality links, then yet again seeking the help of a blogger outreach service is a must. They help you to focus on many important aspects of your affiliate business like improving your conversions and creating content. They also help you in <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/02/27/7-ways-to-generate-backlinks-for-your-blog-in-2020/\">acquiring backlinks</a>.</li>\n</ul>\n<ul>\n<li><strong>DIY SEOs:</strong> Blogger outreach services also help you in growing your own business using SEO, if you have any such plans. You just spend some time growing your business and the blogger&#8217;s outreach will do everything for you. They will only do the link building stuff, and you just don’t have to worry about that.</li>\n</ul>\n<h3><strong>Choosing the perfect blogger outreach service</strong></h3>\n<p>It is very important to choose a blogger outreach service that will provide you with high-quality content along with better service and management and marketing. There are some points which you should keep in mind while choosing such companies:</p>\n<ol>\n<li><strong>They should surround your link with <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/05/28/how-to-tap-into-the-power-of-organic-marketing/\">high-quality links</a>:</strong> If your link is surrounded by multiple sources then this builds credibility for your blog and your backlink as well. Check whether the company place at least 2 other relevant outbound high-quality links in each piece of your content.</li>\n<li><strong>Your link should be placed within the content:</strong> The company should place your backlink within the actual body of the article which is a true contextual backlink. Your backlink must look like a natural vote/recommendation for your site.</li>\n<li><strong>Check for genuine outreaches:</strong> Check whether your chosen company uses genuine outreach or not. They must not have any control or access to any of the sites that get you backlinks on.</li>\n<li><strong>Check whether the writers are proficient in English or not:</strong> If each and every article is written by experts having proficiency in English then it would attract many foreign clients whose mother tongue is English. This will also create a huge impact on your content and will help in creating an identity for your company.</li>\n<li><strong>Whether you get the proper credit and white label reports:</strong> You should get the full credit and white label reports for your content. Their hard work should be your credit.</li>\n</ol>\n<h3><strong>How to do blogger outreach program in a proper way</strong></h3>\n<p>The practice of <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/04/09/what-to-consider-when-choosing-an-influencer-marketing-agency/\">doing work with influencers</a> online as bloggers for building a favorable network that promotes novel products is noticed and earns acclaim by a wide range of customers is known as blogger outreach. Blogger outreach has five phases- planning, establishing identity, pitching, sending and promoting.</p>\n<h4><strong>How important it is?</strong></h4>\n<p>Yes, it is extremely important. This is because any normal buyer goes through multiple reviews before finally deciding to purchase it. Maximum reviews are in the form of blog posts. While researching about certain products or services, consumers mostly rely on advice that the bloggers give them. The information given by blogs is considered reliable. Bloggers, though influences of mid-level, have an audience that is more loyal than the audience of mega influencers.</p>\n<h4><strong>Steps for developing a blogger outreach program that kisses success</strong></h4>\n<p>These steps will definitely help you in your target of developing a blogger outreach program in a proper way:</p>\n<ol>\n<li><strong>Decide your goals-</strong> It is important that you determine your objectives. If you want to make your brand popular, build brand awareness. This will definitely entice new visitors and thus, increase sales.</li>\n<li><strong>Do good research-</strong> Spend time in researching to know about the leading bloggers for getting the best out of <a href=\"https://snchatterjee.com/start-guest-blogging/\">guest post blogging</a>. You will learn about the focus of dominant bloggers and then decide whether to link building service with them will be beneficial for you or not.</li>\n<li><strong>Search for relevant bloggers-</strong> Searching for relevant bloggers is one of the most important tasks in hand. You need to find bloggers who will be useful for you as well as your brand.</li>\n<li><strong>Homework matters-</strong> Contacting bloggers of all kinds will not at all be helpful for you. Do proper homework and find out after reading the blogs, which ones you require for the brand of yours. For insights, their most common posts can be examined.</li>\n<li><strong>Engage with bloggers and build credibility-</strong> For making connections, comment on the contents written by them and also share some of their good contents on social platforms. You don’t have to be overly obsequious. When you meet bloggers, <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/05/20/3-steps-to-get-your-guest-post-pitch-accepted/\">try to be creative</a>.</li>\n<li><strong>Create a unique and tailored communication-</strong> You need to give bloggers offers that they will find unique and impressive. Link Building Service needs to be done strategically. Show respect to bloggers and try to understand their goals.</li>\n<li><strong>Give them reasons for saying yes-</strong> If link building service with an agency is one of your targets, you need to work hard on that. Show support to bloggers and by support, we do not mean you need to be overfriendly.</li>\n<li><strong>The resource has to be flexible-</strong> Present yourself in such a way so that you are considered as a useful resource. Try to help bloggers in their hour of need to build long-lasting relationships.</li>\n<li><strong>Monitoring of results-</strong> Tracking the results is extremely important for a blogger outreach program.</li>\n</ol>\n<h3><strong>How blogger outreach is useful in business?</strong></h3>\n<p>If you are opting for blogger outreach service for working on your blogging and contents and also marketing of your content, then better you look for some of the qualities of your companies before selecting them, which are given below:</p>\n<ul>\n<li>A blogger outreach uses the materials and stuff, from various formats available like the press release, social media sites, content marketing, and SEM or SEO. It gives stress on the importance of the keywords which are written in black, and also <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/11/15/a-comprehensive-guide-to-a-content-audit/\">the kind of content</a> in the blog that it leads to.</li>\n</ul>\n<ul>\n<li>The team experts of a blogger outreach service should help you with the knowledge of the criteria. You should be able to have an exact idea of your targeted audience and hence make an analytics report based on your idea. Blogger outreach should be able to make your blog dominating and influencing the audience and should also make the good promotion of your sites and brands.While you are primarily on the basis of promoting your products you’ve to brainstorm the minds of your target audience by providing and soliciting what you intend to offer. Hence it can be said that the blog must be interrelating with your brand’s scenario.</li>\n</ul>\n<ul>\n<li>If you want to build up the contact then try sending a complimentary material with the blogger. You should then be able to introduce it to the person. The company which you prefer for your job should be able to introduce you to that person. They should feature your brand and your message to that person and should let you know the details like the likes and dislikes of that person before your services are offered.</li>\n</ul>\n<ul>\n<li>The lifestyle of the targeted audience must be included in your promotional phase.</li>\n</ul>\n<ul>\n<li>Make sure, that the content which you are writing and your company is marketing should be available to the maximum number of customers, on the search engine. If a person sits on the internet for some activity related to your site, they go through various online content and sites to get the proper information and reference.Also, the company should be able to get honest feedback from the users. They must provide and insert some high-quality keywords and phrases to your content to get the traffic.</li>\n</ul>\n<p>Hence the blogger outreach service should not <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/05/10/how-iot-will-change-content-marketing/\">distract a user from the content</a> but rather the person using your site should receive the appropriate and the exact information, about the content or topic he is searching for. They should be able to build a cordial and warm relationship, between the business people and the blogger (which is you).</p>\n<p><em>Following all these steps will effectively expand your credibility among the audience.</em></p>\n<p>The post <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/06/21/blogger-outreach-the-definitive-guide-for-the-beginners/\">Blogger Outreach: The Definitive Guide for the Beginners</a> appeared first on <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com\">ReadWrite</a>.</p>\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Sun, 21 Jun 2020 15:00:08 +0000","feedId":271,"bgimg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/blogger-outreach-for-beginners.jpg","linkMd5":"9a3fbdfbcec1fc6994ceb9bf193444a9","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx15/cdn31@2020_2/2020/08/23/15-18-21-920_2be3ce83970b02d8.webp","metaImg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/blogger-outreach-for-beginners.jpg","destWidth":1920,"destHeight":1281,"sourceBytes":157435,"destBytes":145414,"author":"Debraj Chatterjee","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/blogger-outreach-for-beginners-300x200.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx13/cdn16@2020_4/2020/08/23/15-18-19-389_33fffc2a94ee6fe1.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598195875493},{"createdTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:57","updatedTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:57","title":"4 Ways to Feel Less Stressed During Quarantine","link":"https://readwrite.com/?p=171552","description":"<div><a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/05/22/4-ways-to-feel-less-stressed-during-quarantine/\" title=\"4 Ways to Feel Less Stressed During Quarantine\"><img width=\"300\" height=\"185\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/4-Ways-to-Feel-Less-Stressed-During-Quarantine-300x185.jpg\" class=\"attachment-medium size-medium wp-post-image\" alt=\"stressed during COVID\" style=\"margin-bottom: 15px;\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/4-Ways-to-Feel-Less-Stressed-During-Quarantine-300x185.jpg 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/4-Ways-to-Feel-Less-Stressed-During-Quarantine-260x160.jpg 260w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/4-Ways-to-Feel-Less-Stressed-During-Quarantine.jpg 825w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px\" /></a></div><p>When our health and that of our loved ones are threatened, it causes stress. When our source of income is threatened, and our lives have been turned upside down by coronavirus, the pressure, and anxiety feels like the new normal.</p>\n<h2>We wake up to an endless battle every day with all the COVID stuff.</h2>\n<p>Our battle begins by staying safe from the highly contagious COVID-19. We battle to keep our homes stocked with food amid a pandemic, and a battle to find the right strategies to keep our businesses afloat. It is almost impossible not to focus on the uncertain future, and that has left many of us scared, frustrated, and depressed.</p>\n<h3>Does it seem impossible to shake off stress and anxiety at the moment?</h3>\n<p>For many, it may appear impossible to <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/05/30/building-a-startup-culture-that-encourages-wellness/\">shake off stress and anxiety</a> at the moment. Experts argue that it is possible for the human mind to learn the resilience and new coping mechanism that is needed to soldier through this pandemic.</p>\n<p>According to Shevaun D. Neupert, Ph.D., a psychology professor at North Carolina State University, people need to think slightly outside the box in order to alleviate stress during the ongoing quarantine.</p>\n<p>Thinking slightly outside the box seems to be a stretch &#8212; particularly true because life as we know it has been so drastically disrupted right now. We&#8217;ve all worked <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/10/17/4-effective-ways-to-manage-work-stress/\">on stress coping strategies</a> &#8212; and they were working <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/04/30/big-data-as-a-double-edged-sword-in-the-fight-against-covid-19/\">before the coronavirus hit</a>. Is it just me &#8212; or are all the strategy is obsolete now?</p>\n<p>With that in mind, let’s explore four out-of-the-box ideas that will help you feel less stressed during the quarantine.</p>\n<ul>\n<li><b>Embrace the change</b></li>\n</ul>\n<p>Grocery shopping has been turned into a difficult, stressful, and sometimes traumatic experience. Don’t allow this change to disorient your mind. Accept that grocery shopping is no longer the ordinary errand you used to run by yourself and instead embrace online grocery shopping.</p>\n<p>Instead of freaking out because you can’t cook and restaurants have closed down, why don’t you teach yourself how to prepare simple freezer meals through online tutorials? Freezer meals mean that you will not have to cook every day. Don’t overstretch your budget with online food delivery services, especially now that you aren’t sure of your financial future.</p>\n<p>It is important to understand that we are all dealing with these changes together. No one has any tried-and-approved techniques of coping with the change, so you shouldn’t carry the burden silently. Join different communities online and try to figure out solutions together.</p>\n<ul>\n<li><b>Exercise</b></li>\n</ul>\n<p>Maintaining a stable exercise routine has worked before for your troubled mind; it will work again this time. Exercising will get you off the couch and away from the stressful news headlines. It is your one chance to kill time and maintain your health and fitness status. Secondly, working out may help maintain a sense of normalcy to your schedule at a time when everything feels uncertain.</p>\n<p>At a scientific level, exercise has been proven to facilitate the release of endorphins in the human brain. Endorphins are directly linked to increasing a person’s sense of well-being, boosting mood, and neutralizing stress hormones. These benefits are needed now more than ever because stress levels are building up unprecedentedly fast.</p>\n<p>Because many exercises can be done at home, including some that don’t require you to have any exercise equipment, there is no reason why you shouldn’t add an excellent workout to your daily routine. You can even acquire a few motorized bicycles (bikeberry.com) for you and your family members. These bikes are great because they will give you a full-body workout, get your heart pumping, and get you sweating without stressing your knee joints.</p>\n<ul>\n<li><b>Avoid the chaos</b></li>\n</ul>\n<p>Stop obsessing over endless Coronavirus coverage. Switch off your TV and stop over-researching the pandemic online. All you need to know about this virus is how to protect yourself and the people you love. The scary statistics and daily updates aren’t necessary, especially if you struggle with anxiety. If you must research, ensure that you get all your information only from credible websites such as the official WHO website.</p>\n<p>Avoiding chaos also means keeping your home organized and clean. Take this quarantine period to declutter your home and your life. Attend to your indoor plants, for example, just to make your living spaces livelier. Take better care of your pets and your loved ones now that you have the time. Use your time to improve your living condition.</p>\n<p>You will also reduce your stress levels by trying to stick to your normal routine as possible. Try not to eat in bed, for example, and instead eat at the kitchen table or the dining area as you do on normal days. Instead of working from the sofa while wearing pajamas, work at your desk or home office, and be sure to wear pants. Loosening your normal routine can mess up your mind and leave you feeling overwhelmed.</p>\n<ul>\n<li><b>Look to a positive future</b></li>\n</ul>\n<p>One thing is certain: the coronavirus pandemic will eventually end. No one knows when, but it will end. Take your imagination to places where you cannot go because of the lockdown. Project your mind to the future- a future where you will party, travel, work, and make a better life for yourself. Learn a language or skill.</p>\n<h5><b>Conclusion</b></h5>\n<p>Don’t let this indefinite isolation dim your spirits. Don’t allow information overload to trouble your mind. Putting these issues out of your mind is how you will survive the spiraling negative thoughts that coronavirus uncertainty has precipitated. We are going to be okay. We are strong.</p>\n<p>The post <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/05/22/4-ways-to-feel-less-stressed-during-quarantine/\">4 Ways to Feel Less Stressed During Quarantine</a> appeared first on <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com\">ReadWrite</a>.</p>\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Fri, 22 May 2020 18:00:06 +0000","feedId":271,"bgimg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/4-Ways-to-Feel-Less-Stressed-During-Quarantine.jpg","linkMd5":"bb5fe8c57527dd66c530c3011f8e7dd1","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx11/cdn56@2020_6/2020/08/23/15-18-26-818_5cf9ad2cb9afd71d.webp","metaImg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/4-Ways-to-Feel-Less-Stressed-During-Quarantine.jpg","destWidth":825,"destHeight":510,"sourceBytes":23520,"destBytes":16228,"author":"Elliot Rhodes","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/4-Ways-to-Feel-Less-Stressed-During-Quarantine-300x185.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn80@2020_3/2020/08/23/15-18-22-238_40e289b913799279.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598195877519},{"createdTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:56","updatedTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:56","title":"Tailoring Your 2020 Strategy to Win in the Remote Workplace","link":"https://readwrite.com/?p=171312","description":"<div><a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/06/08/tailoring-your-2020-strategy-to-win-in-the-remote-workplace/\" title=\"Tailoring Your 2020 Strategy to Win in the Remote Workplace\"><img width=\"300\" height=\"197\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Tailoring-Your-2020-Strategy-to-Win-in-the-Remote-Workplace-300x197.jpg\" class=\"attachment-medium size-medium wp-post-image\" alt=\"remote workplace\" style=\"margin-bottom: 15px;\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Tailoring-Your-2020-Strategy-to-Win-in-the-Remote-Workplace-300x197.jpg 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Tailoring-Your-2020-Strategy-to-Win-in-the-Remote-Workplace-244x160.jpg 244w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Tailoring-Your-2020-Strategy-to-Win-in-the-Remote-Workplace.jpg 640w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px\" /></a></div><p>In a survey last year, three out of four workers worldwide said they considered flexible working to be “the new normal,” according to the <a href=\"https://assets.regus.com/pdfs/iwg-workplace-survey/iwg-workplace-survey-2019.pdf\">2019 Global Workspace Survey</a>. Since then, remote work has spiked. Tailoring your strategy in 2020 will be a key factor in ensuring business success and achieving, or at least continuing to progress towards, your business goals in 2020. Fix your strategy to win in the remote workplace.</p>\n<p>A strategy that moves the needle on business objectives doesn’t need to be tied to an office space. It often checks off three important boxes that can be completed near or far: prioritizing employee experience, tracking progress in real-time to know when to revise, and finding new ways to collaborate when setting and executing strategy.</p>\n<h3><strong>Prioritizing Employee Experience</strong></h3>\n<p>With the workforce at home,<a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/04/24/why-you-need-a-data-driven-framework-to-guide-employee-experience/\"> employee experience</a> might seem like an afterthought &#8212; out of sight, out of mind &#8212; however, neglecting to prioritize employee experience would be a major blow to strategy execution. After all, as leaders carve out a way to make sure strategy is implemented effectively, it’s important to remember that execution is performed by, well, actual people.</p>\n<h4><strong>Business goal-setting lives in the world of paradox.</strong></h4>\n<p>Goal setting needs to be both ambitious but realistic, visionary yet concrete. It is essential that this balance surfaces in your overall strategy along with specific and actionable plans that help to execute your strategy throughout your organization.</p>\n<p>One way to ensure this is to slice company goals down into smaller, measurable fragments. With measurable fragments, employees, and relevant larger groups (departments and teams) are more likely to stay the course even as they’re located remotely.</p>\n<p>Specificity and quantifiability allow easier progress tracking and improve motivation, resulting in a great employee experience across all levels and teams.</p>\n<h4><strong>Focusing on transparent actions and cross-level communications.</strong></h4>\n<p><a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/03/03/5-common-strategy-mistakes-your-company-must-address-now/\">Transparent communication</a> is naturally, one of the best solutions for ensuring people in your organization feel heard. Transparency propels motivation, alignment and engagement while helping your team to better understand each other and achievement (or lack thereof) of respective goals.</p>\n<p>Transparency helps to highlight individual progress or times when an employee might need help, particularly when it is effectively integrated with communication tools, automated dashboards, and executive reporting.</p>\n<h3><strong>Tracking Progress In Real-Time to Know When to Revise</strong></h3>\n<p>While breaking <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/11/04/cognitive-automation-is-the-immediate-future-of-team-management/\">down goals and outlining how to achieve them</a> in your organization is a key foundation to a successful strategy, oftentimes leaders will “set and forget” goals &#8212; a sometimes fatal mistake for a blossoming business.</p>\n<p>Furthermore, in a distributed workforce regular checkpoints become essential for keeping projects on track, but if the goals aren’t at the forefront of day-to-day actions, execution can become unproductive or stray off course.</p>\n<h4><strong>For some teams with established communications systems, the leader’s whereabouts are nonessential to the success of the team.</strong></h4>\n<p><a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/09/03/4-office-improvements-to-optimize-your-teams-productivity/\">Track productivity and aligning remote workers</a> around unifying goals and targets in real-time is an effective way to promote strong leadership and delegate clear tasks amongst team members. It is critical to identify immediately when your strategy isn’t resonating with the people responsible for executing it.</p>\n<p>You will likely see this in a post-quarterly review, but what if you could see it on a daily basis (or even in real-time whenever you needed it)? Think of the impact that might have on redirected strategy or execution gone wrong.</p>\n<p>There are many new tools designed to automate the work that teams are doing &#8212; after all, automation is a top priority for many businesses as they seek to improve processes and expand. Some of these are one-off tools, but there are options available that allow you to automate and integrate with many existing tools that your workers already use (ex. Slack, Jira, Microsoft Teams).</p>\n<p>Using <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/10/31/g-suite-tips-to-make-workplace-collaboration-less-frightening/\">seamless integration</a> ensures that everything your employees do to progress toward company goals is automatically recorded in real-time and compiled into a simple and visual dashboard.</p>\n<p>Tracking progress automatically is the best way to ensure <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/08/07/7-tools-you-need-in-your-technology-stack/\">maximum productivity.</a> Automation can help scale activity tracking to an enterprise-level while also providing fascinating data insights into a remote worker’s performance—and the performance of the company as a whole.</p>\n<p>Using <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/04/24/why-you-need-a-data-driven-framework-to-guide-employee-experience/\">data to inform performance</a> (and, conversely, performance to inform data) highlights the human issues that sometimes lie behind organizational problems. It equips an organization to change and improve and its employees to be productive team members and contributors to the company’s cause.</p>\n<h3><strong>Finding New Ways to Collaborate When Setting and Executing Strategy</strong></h3>\n<p>Two of the biggest challenges in collaboration that may confront remote workforces are a feeling of disconnect to the organization’s goals and priorities as well as a general lack of visibility into workloads, progress, teams, and management.</p>\n<p>These are common challenges for teams meeting face-to-face as well, and they go hand-in-hand when inhibiting teams from being productive and collaborating properly.</p>\n<p>Shifting to a remote workforce completely changes the context in which teams work together, and it can make tasks and projects more difficult to accomplish. One solution to this disconnect is relying on management software to increase transparency within and across teams in an organization.</p>\n<h4><strong>Use data and communication throughout an organization via a goal management platform.</strong></h4>\n<p>Companies can encourage and illuminate ways for all employees to <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/05/09/building-creativity-into-remote-teams/\">be productive team members</a> who are all making a difference to the organization’s overarching goals. Technology like this can also help organizations make sure every teammate is aware of their responsibilities, and more importantly accountable for them so that everyone in the organization is contributing – which is a big part of being collaborative.</p>\n<p>In short, aligning <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/06/19/5-keys-to-a-successful-devops-implementation-in-your-organization/\">employees against a shared set of objectives</a> and then using data to provide a centralized, transparent tracker for each goal is a highly effective way to promote collaboration across functions, geographies and roles.</p>\n<h4><strong>Pivoting your strategy to win in the remote workplace doesn’t take much effort. </strong></h4>\n<p>Take a few simple shifts that can transform the <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/12/04/simple-branding-is-key-for-complex-tech-says-renegades-drew-neisser/\">execution of a strategic vision</a> and lead to business wins down the road. Prioritizing employee experience and how employees carry through overarching yearly strategies.</p>\n<p>The manner and frequency in which you <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/03/10/what-software-does-every-small-business-need/\">monitor progress</a> when it comes to meeting goals; and actively finding new ways to collaborate from afar when setting and executing your strategy all play a key role in determining its success and should be evaluated on a regular basis.</p>\n<p><em>Image Credit: Andrea Piacquadio; Pexels</em></p>\n<p>The post first on <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com\">ReadWrite</a>.</p>\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Mon, 08 Jun 2020 18:00:40 href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/05/17/ccpa-for-marketers-what-you-really-need-to-know/\" title=\"CCPA for Marketers: What You Really Need to Know\"><img width=\"300\" height=\"185\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/CCPA-for-marketers-what-you-need-to-know-300x185.jpeg\" class=\"attachment-medium size-medium wp-post-image\" alt=\"CCPA rules\" style=\"margin-bottom: 15px;\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/CCPA-for-marketers-what-you-need-to-know-300x185.jpeg 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/CCPA-for-marketers-what-you-need-to-know-260x160.jpeg 260w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/CCPA-for-marketers-what-you-need-to-know.jpeg 825w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px\" /></a></div><p><a href=\"https://www.tripwire.com/state-of-security/regulatory-compliance/ccpa-what-you-need-know/\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">California Consumer Privacy Act</a> (CCPA) has put restrictions and conditions on how organizations can store, process, and share consumer data in California. The <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/03/31/trends-that-will-characterize-the-ecommerce-industry-in-2020-and-beyond/\">privacy act </a>has given broad rights to the consumers over their data that organizations hold. Here is CCPA for marketers and what you really need to know about it.</p>\n<p>The CCPS allows consumers to have <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/03/09/the-top-work-operating-systems-of-2020/\">complete transparency</a> and control over all types of personal data. These regulations have been especially difficult for marketing and advertising companies. Especially those businesses that rely on sharing and processing consumer information to develop an efficient marketing plan that will reach the right people.</p>\n<p>With all these regulations in place, it begs the question. How will marketing organizations prepare marketing plans without having full control over their customers&#8217; information?</p>\n<h2>How does CCPA impact marketers?</h2>\n<p>Whether an organization collects its consumers’ information through social media or other means such as an email survey, CCPA requires them to disclose what information is being collected and how it will be used. This requirement is known as ‘right to be informed’ under the <a href=\"https://www.cmswire.com/information-management/what-does-it-mean-to-be-ccpa-compliant/\">CCPA</a>.</p>\n<p>CCPA gives broad rights to consumers on how businesses collect and process their data. Upon request by a consumer, a business that collects and processes data on California residents must disclose:</p>\n<ul>\n<li style=\"font-weight: 400;\">What it collects.</li>\n<li style=\"font-weight: 400;\">Where it collects.</li>\n<li style=\"font-weight: 400;\">Why it collects.</li>\n<li style=\"font-weight: 400;\">Whom it shared with.</li>\n</ul>\n<h4><strong>CCPA gives consumers the right to opt-out of</strong><strong> having information being sold to third-parties.</strong></h4>\n<p>For companies that earn revenue through selling data, it will be a struggle to work around this restriction, potentially putting a dent in revenues.</p>\n<h4><strong>CCPA has also had a substantial impact on digital advertising.</strong></h4>\n<p>The impact on digital advertising happens because digital advertising works on the transfer of <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/11/11/how-to-use-behavioral-data-to-inform-marketing-decisions/\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">consumer data from a data broker to the advertiser</a>. The ad-serving platform has many other layers of supported systems in between broker and advertiser &#8212; often a third-party business.</p>\n<p>If an organization is required to comply with the CCPA, it cannot transfer this data without the consumers&#8217; consent.</p>\n<p>So far, it seems like the CCPA is only having a negative impact on the marketing sector as it is restricting marketers from virtually doing anything as most of their operations rely on the <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/04/10/as-digital-identities-evolve-data-security-should-too/\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">sharing of data</a>.</p>\n<h2>What Marketers Need to Do to Comply?</h2>\n<p>Trying to comply with the CCPA can be difficult for the marketing sector. The process is not just a matter of applying the same rules throughout the organization in hopes of complying with the CCPA rules. Instead, there have to be different goals set at each level to ensure that compliance can be met efficiently.</p>\n<p>At the highest level, marketers need to make it their personal responsibility to understand how personal data at their company has been used to message and serve customers. They also need to ensure their team has a clear understanding and has proper training on the law and compliance processes. Lastly, they need to make sure that these responsibilities delegate within the organization as soon as possible.</p>\n<p><strong>On the next level of following CCPA rules, clarify the following roles:</strong></p>\n<ul>\n<li style=\"font-weight: 400;\">Dedicate an individual who has the responsibility of reviewing proposed regulations to understand how it impacts your business.</li>\n<li style=\"font-weight: 400;\">Dedicating a person who is responsible for mapping personal data and gathering notices across all internal and external systems.</li>\n<li style=\"font-weight: 400;\">Making sure these notices are presented to customers via the privacy policy page and &#8220;<a href=\"https://9to5mac.com/2019/12/30/do-not-sell-my-info/\">do not sell my info</a>&#8221; links placed on the website homepages.</li>\n<li style=\"font-weight: 400;\">Managing and carrying out online and offline consumer rights requests.</li>\n<li style=\"font-weight: 400;\">Train request handlers or assist consumers in exercising their rights under CCPA.</li>\n</ul>\n<p>Finally, <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/08/09/formulate-a-digital-marketing-strategy-using-ai/\">within your marketing team</a>, make sure if you&#8217;re providing discounts that could be perceived as an exchange for personal information, calculate the monetary value, and communicate that information in your privacy policy.</p>\n<p>You also need to understand how the CRM and marketing systems will send messages and whether these messages comply. Finally, connect with service providers and legal teams working on vendor contracts to ensure consistency when handling the rights requests you receive.</p>\n<h2>CCPA Compliance Checklist for Marketers</h2>\n<p>To comply with the CCPA, <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/10/23/biometrics-payments-and-enhanced-customer-experience/\">organizations have to incorporate</a> all the following points to wholly and efficiently comply. See how many of the following points have you checked out:</p>\n<ul>\n<li>\n<h4><b>Update Privacy Policies</b></h4>\n</li>\n</ul>\n<p>Although companies follow the strictest standards when drafting privacy policies, they need to make sure that their policies are compliant with the CCPA.</p>\n<ul>\n<li>\n<h4><b>Create Methods of Accessibility</b></h4>\n</li>\n</ul>\n<p>Establish a means for the customer to easily request data access and data deletion. This could be at minimum a toll-free number</p>\n<ul>\n<li>\n<h4><b>Verification System</b></h4>\n</li>\n</ul>\n<p>People that can verify their identification can access their information held by organizations. Verification systems will be a part of the <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/01/11/ccpa-regulation-smb-and-ad-tech-how-will-they-co-exist/\">CCPA compliance regulations</a></p>\n<ul>\n<li>\n<h4><b>Data Governance</b></h4>\n</li>\n</ul>\n<p>Prepare records, data maps and inventories of Californian’s personal data to fulfill any requests in an efficient and timely manner</p>\n<ul>\n<li>\n<h4><b>Opt-Out Button</b></h4>\n</li>\n</ul>\n<p>Adding in an opt-out button will help you stay compliant without the added hassle of manually updating that customer.</p>\n<ul>\n<li>\n<h4><b>Obtain Consent from Minors</b></h4>\n</li>\n</ul>\n<p>Minors under the age of 16 will not automatically consent under CCPA. Organizations need to develop a process by which they can obtain direct consent from those aged 13-16 years, or parents consent from minors under 13 years.</p>\n<h2>Conclusion</h2>\n<p>The CCPA has really made operations for the marketing sector, but these barriers bring with it opportunities as well. Organizations need to make sure that the regulations are <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/11/03/ccpa-do-the-penalties-fit-the-crime/\">enforced within all levels of the organization</a> to make sure that compliance is easily achievable.</p>\n<p>Regulations that are easily enforced means that there needs to be a <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/04/15/how-will-iot-improve-the-way-startups-do-business-in-2020/\">proper level of training,</a> responsibility, and tracking. As well as proper records to stay ahead of the CCPA and other global privacy regulations.</p>\n<p>Organizations might find tracking and enforcing an added task. But in the long term, these regulations are going to be beneficial for both consumers and organizations alike. Doing the right thing is only a matter of adapting.</p>\n<p>The post <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/05/17/ccpa-for-marketers-what-you-really-need-to-know/\">CCPA for Marketers: What You Really Need to Know</a> appeared first on <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com\">ReadWrite</a>.</p>\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Sun, 17 May 2020 15:00:16 +0000","feedId":271,"bgimg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/CCPA-for-marketers-what-you-need-to-know.jpeg","linkMd5":"1054f704492363ec54a74e486e8970f5","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx23/cdn24@2020_1/2020/08/23/15-18-21-904_b563a13f25fdaf19.webp","metaImg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/CCPA-for-marketers-what-you-need-to-know.jpeg","destWidth":825,"destHeight":510,"sourceBytes":41813,"destBytes":35286,"author":"Anas Baig","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/CCPA-for-marketers-what-you-need-to-know-300x185.jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx22/cdn6@2020_2/2020/08/23/15-18-09-573_951e49f960f02a3c.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598195877014},{"createdTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:59","updatedTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:59","title":"Sales Prospecting Techniques for Sales Development Reps","link":"https://readwrite.com/?p=167180","description":"<div><a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/03/06/sales-prospecting-techniques-for-sales-development-reps/\" title=\"Sales Prospecting Techniques for Sales Development Reps\"><img width=\"300\" height=\"200\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/Sales-Prospecting-Techniques-for-Sales-Development-Reps-300x200.jpg\" class=\"attachment-medium size-medium wp-post-image\" alt=\"sales prospecting techniques\" style=\"margin-bottom: 15px;\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/Sales-Prospecting-Techniques-for-Sales-Development-Reps-300x200.jpg 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/Sales-Prospecting-Techniques-for-Sales-Development-Reps-900x600.jpg 900w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/Sales-Prospecting-Techniques-for-Sales-Development-Reps-240x160.jpg 240w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/Sales-Prospecting-Techniques-for-Sales-Development-Reps-1536x1025.jpg 1536w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/Sales-Prospecting-Techniques-for-Sales-Development-Reps.jpg 1920w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px\" /></a></div><p>New sales development reps (SDRs) are born into this world inspired, energetic souls. They win a job they really don’t know much about based on the belief they’ll be able to smash through walls for the sales team. At some point, ambition meets reality.</p>\n<h3><strong>The SDRs realize sales prospecting is more about chipping away at that wall &#8212; rather than flinging themselves against it.</strong></h3>\n<p>In this blog post, you will find some successful <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/08/07/7-tools-you-need-in-your-technology-stack/\">sales prospecting</a> techniques that may be just what your SDRs need to attack <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/10/03/connected-digital-assistants-will-change-the-way-we-work/\">that wall with a sharp pick</a>, and strike it for maximum impact.</p>\n<h3>What structure should be around the SDR function?</h3>\n<p>Our primary goal with the techniques in this blog post is to put some structure around the SDR function, to help Sales better describe the SDR mission and provide guidance on the <a href=\"https://www.getcloudapp.com/use-cases/sales\">sales tools and methods </a>they should employ to get the job done.</p>\n<h3><strong>What are the responsibilities that sales development representatives?</strong></h3>\n<p>Closing leads is not one of them. Instead, SDRs find leads, connect with them, and determine whether they can turn into potential customers. An essential part of their job is finding businesses and identifying their needs. The second step is understanding how the company they represent can cater to those needs through the product they offer. Some of the next steps are:</p>\n<ul>\n<li style=\"font-weight: 400;\">Demonstration</li>\n<li style=\"font-weight: 400;\">Strategy call</li>\n<li style=\"font-weight: 400;\">Fit assessment</li>\n<li style=\"font-weight: 400;\">Consultation</li>\n<li style=\"font-weight: 400;\">Technical call</li>\n</ul>\n<h3><strong>After educating and sending resources to potential customers, SDRs decide who will become a viable customer.</strong></h3>\n<p>Then, the SDR will pass along these contacts to sales representatives, who eventually close the leads. It doesn&#8217;t have to be as complicated as Chess &#8212; but the process does require some thought and strategy to be properly executed.</p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<p><img class=\"aligncenter size-full wp-image-166792\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/How-Mastering-Natural-Language-Processing-Can-Boost-Your-Bottom-Line.jpg\" alt=\"\" width=\"1920\" height=\"1310\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/How-Mastering-Natural-Language-Processing-Can-Boost-Your-Bottom-Line.jpg 1920w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/How-Mastering-Natural-Language-Processing-Can-Boost-Your-Bottom-Line-300x205.jpg 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/How-Mastering-Natural-Language-Processing-Can-Boost-Your-Bottom-Line-900x614.jpg 900w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/How-Mastering-Natural-Language-Processing-Can-Boost-Your-Bottom-Line-235x160.jpg 235w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/How-Mastering-Natural-Language-Processing-Can-Boost-Your-Bottom-Line-1536x1048.jpg 1536w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/How-Mastering-Natural-Language-Processing-Can-Boost-Your-Bottom-Line-182x125.jpg 182w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 1920px) 100vw, 1920px\" /></p>\n<h3><b>The SDR Mission</b></h3>\n<p>From the start, make the SDR mission clear. Maybe your SDRs already know this, but it helps them focus. So, what is their primary mission?</p>\n<p>Sales development representatives should know that finding the right opportunities is the big chunk of this job. To achieve this mission, they will need to reach accounts on a monthly basis and identify leads that are approaching the sales cycle. It is also critical for <a href=\"https://www.getcloudapp.com/blog/sales-management\">sales management</a> to ensure the strategy is in place to achieve these goals.</p>\n<h3><b>SDR Goals Front and Center</b></h3>\n<p>Sales are always pretty clear on goals. Get the sale. Period. SDRs need the same clarity because their goals are a little more nebulous and diffuse. They need to support deals, generate opportunities that will become those deals and interact with enough people to make that all feasible. <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/04/17/10-ways-smart-businesses-are-leveraging-iot-and-ai-to-bolster-business-conversion-in-2019/\">So, lay it all out there nice and simple for the SDRs</a>.</p>\n<p>Some of the <a href=\"https://www.fourquadrant.com/setting-goals-for-sdrs/\">most common goals</a> for sales development representatives are:</p>\n<ul>\n<li style=\"font-weight: 400;\">Generating new opportunities</li>\n<li style=\"font-weight: 400;\">Getting introductory meetings setup</li>\n<li style=\"font-weight: 400;\">Hosting demos</li>\n<li style=\"font-weight: 400;\">Creating semi-qualified meetings</li>\n<li style=\"font-weight: 400;\">Passing fully qualified opportunities</li>\n</ul>\n<h3><b>Garbage in, Garbage Out</b></h3>\n<p>Some of the best guidance you can provide an SDR is around <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/04/11/supercharge-your-sales-efforts-with-deep-learning/\">building a strong prospecting foundation</a>. Without the right database volume or the right contacts in that database, your SDR will be set up to fail. But with regular guidance and checks on their<a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2018/09/27/how-ai-will-help-sales-representatives/\"> prospecting database</a>, you can ensure every SDR has a snowball’s chance.</p>\n<h3>Its a team effort to organize and get the most of your database.</h3>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<p><img class=\"aligncenter size-full wp-image-165863\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/in-love-with-startups.jpg\" alt=\"\" width=\"1920\" height=\"1280\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/in-love-with-startups.jpg 1920w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/in-love-with-startups-300x200.jpg 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/in-love-with-startups-900x600.jpg 900w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/in-love-with-startups-240x160.jpg 240w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/in-love-with-startups-1536x1024.jpg 1536w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 1920px) 100vw, 1920px\" /></p>\n<h3><b>Go With the Flow</b></h3>\n<p>Inbound marketing leads &#8211; a creation of content and campaigns that bring in website visitors and convert them into leads, will be an important part of your SDRs job. You need to think of them as a l<a href=\"https://www.leadfuze.com/sales-development-representative-sdr/\">iaison between your marketing and sales operations</a>.</p>\n<p>Sales development representatives must understand your marketing funnel and customer journey map to be able to connect with potential customers. On the marketing side, some of their responsibilities can be analyzing the pages their target leads have viewed, marketing <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/02/14/how-to-send-the-warmest-cold-emails/\">emails</a> they have opened, and much more.</p>\n<p>This information will allow them to learn early on how the lead flow works and how to properly handle Marketing Qualified Leads (MQLs).</p>\n<h3><b>The Proper Response</b></h3>\n<p>As SDRs interact with prospects you’ll want them to properly triage the leads. This helps keep the prospecting database clean and ensures you’re able to track the success of each SDR. You’ll want to <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/02/13/startup-essentials-stop-overcomplicating-your-processes/\">keep this process as simple</a> as possible. Resist the urge to introduce nuanced categorization of leads. You don’t want a bunch of judgment calls clouding your data and slowing down your SDRs.</p>\n<h3><b>Use BANT to Qualify Prospects</b></h3>\n<p>Before we dive into ways BANT can help your SDRs identify qualified prospects, let’s discuss what this term stands for. <a href=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/sales/bant\">BANT</a> is a sales qualification method that lets your SDRs determine whether the potential lead is a good fit based on their budget, ability to buy, need, and timing.</p>\n<ul>\n<li><strong>Budget</strong><b>. It is important that your SDRs know that the budget should not be a blocker if the potential lead fits the other important criteria. To make it work, they can offer the potential customer a more affordable monthly subscription.</b></li>\n<li><strong>Authority.</strong> When contacting a prospective lead, your SDRs should ask themselves if the person on the other end is in a position to make a decision.</li>\n<li><strong>Need.</strong> Remember &#8211; people will be interested in buying a product if it directly caters to their needs or solves their problems. Therefore, your SDRs should always be aware of the obstacles their potential leads are facing to be able to find common ground with them.</li>\n<li><strong>Timing.</strong> To be able to better understand prospective customers, SDRs should know in what timeframe they are looking to implement a solution.</li>\n</ul>\n<h3><b>How Can Your Company Benefit From an SDR Team?</b></h3>\n<p>Some people are not sure if their organization needs an SDR team, and some also assume that salespeople can carry out the responsibilities designed for sales development representatives. So, do you really need an SDR team? If yes, how can they contribute to your company’s success?</p>\n<p>To begin with, you should know that finding prospective customers and reaching out to them takes a long time. In fact, it can take <a href=\"https://blog.topohq.com/proven-framework-successful-sales-development-team/\">60-90 dials</a> to get an appointment with a prospect. Moreover, not all salespeople are trained to identify the right customers and generate interest. As a result, the<a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/12/13/ai-is-not-the-holy-grail-of-sales-at-least-not-yet/\"> productivity of your sales representatives</a> will suffer, as they spend most of their time on finding the wrong leads and not being able to close them.</p>\n<p>Having a successful sales development team means having a higher conversion rate. As a matter of fact, it has been recorded that <a href=\"https://blog.topohq.com/proven-framework-successful-sales-development-team/\">a company that has an optimized SDR team converts leads at 40%</a>. This can be explained by the fact that when employees have clear responsibilities they tend to perform better.</p>\n<p>If you already have an SDR team, the above-mentioned techniques will help your employees improve their work performance and increase efficiency. Besides these techniques, your SDRs should also keep in mind that the keys to sales success is being patient with their prospects, listening to their concerns, and offering a viable solution.</p>\n<p>The post <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/03/06/sales-prospecting-techniques-for-sales-development-reps/\">Sales Prospecting Techniques for Sales Development Reps</a> appeared first on <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com\">ReadWrite</a>.</p>\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Fri, 06 Mar 2020 16:00:12 +0000","feedId":271,"bgimg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/Sales-Prospecting-Techniques-for-Sales-Development-Reps.jpg","linkMd5":"cddb108091bc190929590834b23ab819","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx23/cdn48@2020_5/2020/08/23/15-18-23-817_43389af9b5cfc300.webp","metaImg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/Sales-Prospecting-Techniques-for-Sales-Development-Reps.jpg","destWidth":1920,"destHeight":1281,"sourceBytes":253284,"destBytes":188680,"author":"Joe Martin","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/Sales-Prospecting-Techniques-for-Sales-Development-Reps-300x200.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx12/cdn44@2020_5/2020/08/23/15-18-23-503_48cf815247621f9b.webp","https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/How-Mastering-Natural-Language-Processing-Can-Boost-Your-Bottom-Line.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx4/cdn52@2020_3/2020/08/23/15-18-18-159_cb58ddc09f1c3ae0.webp","https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/in-love-with-startups.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx/cdn15@2020_2/2020/08/23/15-18-20-487_c5fe049ede36c828.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598195879856},{"createdTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:49","updatedTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:49","title":"How Will We Talk to Machines in the Future?","link":"https://readwrite.com/?p=175919","description":"<div><a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/08/15/how-will-we-talk-to-machines-in-the-future/\" title=\"How Will We Talk to Machines in the Future?\"><img width=\"300\" height=\"200\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/Talk-to-machines-300x200.jpg\" class=\"attachment-medium size-medium wp-post-image\" alt=\"How Will We Talk to Machines in the Future?\" style=\"margin-bottom: 15px;\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/Talk-to-machines-300x200.jpg 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/Talk-to-machines-240x160.jpg 240w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/Talk-to-machines.jpg 747w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px\" /></a></div><p>Computers and other machines are fantastic tools that allow us to become more productive, learn more information, and stay connected with each other. But in order to use them, we need to “communicate” with them in some way. Historically, this has been with the manual inputs of a mouse and keyboard (or a touchscreen), using a screen to read what the computer returns to us.</p>\n<p>In the past decade or so, we’ve seen the gradual rise of a new way of talking to machines: <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/10/22/evolution-of-speech-technology/\">voice and speech recognition</a>. But will this mode of “talking to machines” persist into the future? And if so, how might it evolve?</p>\n<h3>The State of Technology</h3>\n<p>First, let’s take a look at the state of modern technology. People are still using keyboards, mice, and touchscreens for much of their daily interactions, but increasingly, they’re turning to voice-based interactions. We can run searches on popular search engines with a simple phrase. We can say out loud what we’d like to type, and our phones can translate that into written text. We can even <a href=\"https://www.visix.com/resources/blog/talk-to-your-digital-signs-using-a-voice-user-interface/\">install digital signs that can talk to our customers</a> or directly engage with them.</p>\n<p>Over the years, voice-based interactions have grown to become incredibly sophisticated. In the early days of this technology’s development, it was basically a gamble; in most cases, the system wouldn’t “hear” you correctly, or it would misinterpret what you were trying to say. But these days, the most popular digital assistants and speech recognition programs can detect and understand human speech with human-like accuracy.</p>\n<p>In line with this, human beings have gradually become accustomed to voice-based interactions. In 2010, you might have felt foolish saying something like “OK Google,” or “Hey Alexa” to one of your devices. But in 2020, this is commonplace. In fact, it’s stranger when we see someone who doesn’t frequently interact with their machines in some way.</p>\n<h3>Why Voice Has Taken Over</h3>\n<p>Why has speech recognition seen such an <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2017/07/17/speech-recognition-renaissance-disruption-dl1/\">impressive growth and development rate</a> in recent years? There are a few possible explanations. The first is that voice is simply more convenient than using your hands for everything. If you’re driving a car and you want to keep your hands on the wheel while typing a message, you can simply think “out loud” and take care of it. If your fingers are sore from a long day of typing, you can switch to voice-based inputs and give your hands a break. If you’re in the living room with no device nearby and you need to know the name of the actor in the show you just watched, you can speak your query aloud and get it addressed in moments.</p>\n<p>Voice is also low-hanging fruit when it comes to technological development. As we’ll see, there are alternative modes of machine-human communication that are much more sophisticated, and may take decades to fully develop—but we’ve practically mastered voice search in just a few years.</p>\n<p>Consumers see the benefits, and the technology keeps getting better. So it makes sense why voice-based interactions with machines have become the new norm.</p>\n<h3>Potential Issues With Voice</h3>\n<p>That said, there are some potential issues with voice-based machine interactions, even over the long term:</p>\n<ul>\n<li><strong>Data privacy. </strong>Every new technology brings <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/07/20/ai-privacy-line-ai-as-a-helper-and-as-a-danger/\">concerns about privacy with it</a>. Much of our voice-based search and speech recognition technology is with us at all times; we have a smartphone on our person and a smart speaker in the corner of our living room. Are these systems listening to our conversations when we don’t want them to? What kinds of data are they gathering and sending to their tech company masters?</li>\n<li><strong>Misinterpretations. </strong>Even with sophisticated developments in recent years, speech recognition can fail. This is especially true when people are speaking with accents, or when they can’t articulate full thoughts for varying reasons.</li>\n<li><strong>The learning curve.</strong> Accessibility may also be an issue, especially with people who struggle with speech anyway. To get the best possible results, you have to speak in a clear, direct voice and articulate each of your words precisely. This isn’t intuitive for all users.</li>\n<li><strong>Background noise.</strong> High-quality speech recognition can still get muddied if there are significant levels of background noise. This means speech recognition is only ideal in certain locations and contexts; you can’t use it at a rock concert or on a construction site, for example.</li>\n<li><strong>Psychological effects.</strong> We’re still in the early days of voice search, but long-term, we may find that speech-based interactions with machines have psychological consequences. For example, we may find it hard to talk to machines without feeling some kind of emotional attachment to them, or we may condition ourselves to interact with the world in different ways because of our interactions with machines.</li>\n</ul>\n<h3>How Voice Can Be Improved</h3>\n<p>Tech companies are continuously looking for ways they can improve their voice interactions and get an edge on the competition. These are some of the most important areas of focus:</p>\n<ul>\n<li><strong>Accuracy. </strong>Already, speech recognition systems are at least as good as human beings, with some systems exceeding human capabilities. However, there’s still room to improve in terms of accuracy, especially when it comes to fringe cases.</li>\n<li><strong>Predictive functionality.</strong> <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/07/22/predictive-analytics-how-to-turbocharge-your-digital-marketing-strategy/\">Combined with predictive analytics</a>, voice- and speech-based interactions could become even more impressive. Machines could ask us prompting questions rather than relying on our one-way inputs, and make active suggestions about things we might need.</li>\n<li><strong>Emotional context. </strong>It’s also worth considering the development of emotional context reading in digital assistants, or even mimicking human emotional content in their responses. For example, a digital assistant may be able to tell from your tone that you’re angry or afraid, and it may respond to you with a kind of technologically simulated empathy. Though the “creepy” factor may be high in this dimension, it could hypothetically lead to more natural interactions.</li>\n</ul>\n<h3>Alternatives to Voice</h3>\n<p>So will we ever move away from voice as a mode of interaction with machines? That remains to be seen, but there are a handful of contenders that could one day replace both speech and manual entry—even if they’re years away from full development.</p>\n<ul>\n<li><strong>Gestures. </strong>One of the most interesting possible developments is communication with machines <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2017/10/05/gesture-control-moves-from-keyboards/\">in the form of gestures</a>. Rather than explicitly instructing your device what it should do, you can move your eyes in a certain pattern to call up a specific function, or you can move your fingers through the air to manipulate a holographic interface. Gestures are silent and more abstract than voice, making them simpler and more accessible in many ways. However, there may still be a steep learning curve—and the technology isn’t ready to be mainstream yet.</li>\n<li><strong>Thoughts. </strong>A handful of companies are looking into the possibilities of direct brain to machine interactions; in other words, you may one day be able to control your computer with your thoughts alone, the same way you might control the movements of your arms and legs. This is a scary thought to many, since it implies the connective interaction can operate in both directions. However, this technology is still in the earliest phases, so the presence or absence of problems will be difficult to anticipate.</li>\n<li><strong>Other communication methods.</strong> It’s hard to imagine what the future of machine and human communications might look like, so we can’t rule out the possibility of other, more abstract models. Some tech innovator might come up with a novel method of direct communication that we can’t even conceive of yet.</li>\n</ul>\n<p>For now, voice-based controls and communications remain the dominant force in the ways we exchange information with machines. The technology is so sophisticated that most people can harness its potential easily. There are problems with its use, including privacy concerns and limited predictive abilities, but these may be mitigated (or eliminated) with further development.</p>\n<p>The post <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/08/15/how-will-we-talk-to-machines-in-the-future/\">How Will We Talk to Machines in the Future?</a> appeared first on <a rel=\"nofollow\" kitchen or outdoor space that most people don&#8217;t have. However, Gozney Roccbox has found a way to shrink the pizza oven to a portable size while still delivering a commercial-grade appliance.</p>\n<p>Here&#8217;s my review of the <a href=\"https://us.gozney.com/products/roccbox\">Gozney Roccbox portable pizza oven</a>, which I&#8217;m happy to say involved a lot of pizza nights in our house to see how it worked.</p>\n<h2>About the Company</h2>\n<p>Tom Gozney designed the pizza oven and started the company nearly 10 years ago. His goal was to create the perfect home-cooked pizza. Since then, he has developed many different products to help consumers enjoy restaurant pizzas at home.</p>\n<p><img class=\"aligncenter wp-image-173623\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/GozneyRoccbox-300x200.jpg\" alt=\"\" width=\"600\" height=\"400\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/GozneyRoccbox-300x200.jpg 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/GozneyRoccbox-900x600.jpg 900w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/GozneyRoccbox-240x160.jpg 240w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/GozneyRoccbox-1536x1024.jpg 1536w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/GozneyRoccbox.jpg 1920w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 600px) 100vw, 600px\" /></p>\n<h2>Portable Pizza Oven Features</h2>\n<p>Available in gray or bright green, the restaurant-grade portable pizza has a long list of features. The company came up with the design based on what restaurants use, including adding professional-grade materials.</p>\n<p>The pizza oven has a built-in thermometer, retractable legs, and detachable burner system. You can choose to use the standard gas burner or add a detachable wood burner that comes as an accessory to purchase separately.</p>\n<h2>Pros and Cons</h2>\n<p>The pros with this portable pizza oven are that fresh, homemade pizza is cooked nicely in just one to three minutes. The built-in thermometer helps to know exactly when the pizza is done. Plus, the oven is solid and durable, offering good heat distribution for even cooking. It&#8217;s also easy to set up and offers a cool look as cooking appliances go.</p>\n<p>Another standout feature was that the outer silicone skin and dense body insulation helped reduce the risk of skin burns. Of course, to be safe, I still kept the kids far away from being able to touch it.</p>\n<p>However, no matter how much I love cooking homemade pizza this fast with this portable pizza oven, there are some cons to address.  Despite the &#8220;portable&#8221; in its name, it&#8217;s heavy. The pizza oven comes in at 40 pounds, and that&#8217;s before adding the propane attachment. We also couldn&#8217;t really use the wood-burning attachment feature.</p>\n<p>Finally, it&#8217;s on the expensive side at $500 albeit that is less than building a pizza oven in the backyard. There are competitors to compare, although I have yet to try the other options because I&#8217;m fully vested in this one after the sizable investment.</p>\n<p><img class=\"aligncenter wp-image-173624\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/pizza-van-conversions-gozney-pizza-ovens-01-300x200.jpg\" alt=\"\" width=\"600\" height=\"399\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/pizza-van-conversions-gozney-pizza-ovens-01-300x200.jpg 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/pizza-van-conversions-gozney-pizza-ovens-01-241x160.jpg 241w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/pizza-van-conversions-gozney-pizza-ovens-01.jpg 800w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 600px) 100vw, 600px\" /></p>\n<h2>What&#8217;s in the Box?</h2>\n<div class=\"prd-ProductAccordion_Body\">\n<div class=\"prd-ProductAccordion_Content rte-RichText\">\n<p>Along with the oven, you get a professional-grade pizza peel, detachable gas burner, bottle opener, and manual. The pizza oven also comes with a five-year warranty.</p>\n<p>While it&#8217;s not in the box, you can find tutorials on how to use the pizza oven and delicious recipes on their website. We took advantage of both these options and found it useful to get us started with our pizza-making.</p>\n</div>\n</div>\n<h2>Where to Buy</h2>\n<p>You can buy the pizza oven through the Gozney website for $499 with free shipping and free returns. Along with the wood-burning attachment, their website has other accessories like a cover and other pizza tools for purchase. Amazon and Williams-Sonoma also carry the pizza oven.</p>\n<h2>Overall Thoughts</h2>\n<p>This Gozney Roccbox pizza oven is a fun and delicious tool to enjoy restaurant-quality pizza at home in just minutes. There is so little fuss or effort. The only downside is that we will have to make a lot of pizzas to get the return on the $500 price tag. I really love this oven and it&#8217;s nice to have if it&#8217;s in the budget.</p>\n<p>The post <a rel=\"nofollow\"
