However, the ones on the list are quite popular and have been selected based on their reviews and ratings available on different business listing sites.</p>\n<p>But there are chances that you’d still feel confused and indecisive about which live chat solution should you opt for. Well to help with that, we’ve got a small checklist ready for you which will help you decide how to choose the best live chat software for your business.</p>\n<h3><strong>1. Speed</strong></h3>\n<p>To manage multiple visitors at the same time, the one thing that will help your operators is speed. That means the experience for your operators should be seamless and enable them to offer support faster to visitors.</p>\n<h3><strong>2. More Customization</strong></h3>\n<p>The live chat software option you choose must-have customization options. A simple chat widget customization won’t work. Make sure the customization option enables the white-labeling of the chat widget too.</p>\n<h3><strong>3. Detailed Reports</strong></h3>\n<p>You not only have to see how your operators are performing but also understand how your customers feel about your services. That’s why you need detailed reporting in a live chat solution. It would help you improve your services efficiently.</p>\n<h3><strong>4. Mobile App</strong></h3>\n<p>Make sure the live chat option you choose supports mobile app use too. It either comes with a mobile app or is mobile-friendly, thus helping your operators to offer support to customers no matter where they are.</p>\n<h3><strong>5. Price</strong></h3>\n<p>Yes, it would be a great relief if the software you choose fits within your budget. But what you need to see is if the pricing is justified for the number of features you get in a package. Doing this will help you identify the best live chat software solution for your website that meets your support needs at cost-effective rates.</p>\n<h2><b>Which Live Chat Software You Should Choose?</b></h2>\n<p>Over the last few years, several service providers have made an entry into the live chat software domain. Most are here to stay as statistics report that a whopping <a href=\"https://www.invespcro.com/blog/live-chat-customer-support/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\">73%</a> of customers are inclined towards communicating via live chat platforms because they find it a more satisfying experience.</p>\n<p>Frankly, choosing a vendor can be hard but let your business needs dictate your decision. Think about your top priorities and have a system of analyzing the pros and cons of each live chat software individually.</p>\n<p>There may be instances of bad judgment. You may have to indulge in a little bit of trial and error before you make the final call.</p>\n<p>And when you do strike the perfect balance, it is a marriage made in heaven.</p>\n<p>For the time being, we have got you covered with leg work and research. The reviews on the top ten live chat software are here. href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/05/06/the-best-work-from-home-snack-box-for-remote-teams/\" title=\"The Best Work From Home Snack Box for Remote Teams\"><img width=\"300\" height=\"200\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/The-Best-Work-From-Home-Snack-Box-for-Remote-Teams-300x200.jpg\" class=\"attachment-medium size-medium wp-post-image\" alt=\"snack box for remote teams\" style=\"margin-bottom: 15px;\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/The-Best-Work-From-Home-Snack-Box-for-Remote-Teams-300x200.jpg 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/The-Best-Work-From-Home-Snack-Box-for-Remote-Teams.jpg 1920w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px\" /></a></div><p>Our day-to-day lives have shifted dramatically in the past few months. Companies are pivoting their products and marketing while passionate, innovative teams are now working remotely. The fire to stay healthy and productive is lit, but flickering. Here is the best work from home snack box for remote teams.</p>\n<h3>There are some standard creature comforts we rely on when we work.</h3>\n<p>We had these classic perks in the office &#8212; but now we’re all at home. And we’re hungry all the time. Back in the office, we’d use our break to raid the micro-kitchen to find something to get us through the afternoon slump. Now, we only have our half-empty pantries and fridges to keep us satisfied. You and your team deserve better.</p>\n<h3><strong>Enter t</strong>he remote:<strong><em> Snack from Home</em> box.</strong></h3>\n<p>There are quite a few companies adapting to a new way of business, opting to send boxes of snacks typically reserved for the office to employees at home. Two specific companies that stand out as leaders in healthy snack box delivery? <strong>NatureBox and SnackNation</strong>.</p>\n<p>Here’s a quick overview of the two services to help you choose the right company for you and your remote team.</p>\n<h2>NatureBox</h2>\n<p><img class=\"aligncenter wp-image-171109 size-full\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Naturebox.png\" alt=\"\" width=\"626\" height=\"230\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Naturebox.png 626w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Naturebox-300x110.png 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Naturebox-260x96.png 260w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 626px) 100vw, 626px\" /></p>\n<p>Known as one of the original healthy snack subscription companies, Naturebox has a membership model that allows 20-40% savings on snacks that actually taste good. While the company has been serving snacks to corporate break rooms for many years, it recently launched a <a href=\"https://naturebox.com/office\">Snack From Home program</a> geared specifically for remote employees.</p>\n<p>Naturebox touts four curated box options available like the Less Stress Box and even an allergen-free box. They also give you the opportunity to create custom snack boxes full of precisely what your team needs. In addition to curated snack boxes, you can give your employees the ability to build their own boxes from over 60 different treats to choose from on <a href=\"http://www.Naturebox.com\">Naturebox.</a></p>\n<p>One of the unique benefits from Naturebox is that they provide corporate employees a free annual membership worth approximately $50 dollars. This program allows companies to add credit to their employees’ accounts, with an option to provide a monthly stipend to spend on whatever snacks they like.</p>\n<p>When it feels like Groundhog Day every day, variety matters. From high-quality roasted, salted almonds to more out-of-the-box options like turmeric black pepper popcorn, you can count on NatureBox for treats that make you feel good.</p>\n<p>NatureBox also offers a line of wellness snacks filled with <a href=\"https://naturebox.com/products/m-adaptogenic-snacks\">adaptogens</a> &#8212; ingredients that help you reduce stress and boost energy. Both traditional and health-minded snackers want to eat wellness snacks. These hand-selected snacks are created by NatureBox, which means you won’t find random brands or artificial ingredients you don’t know or trust in your box.</p>\n<p><em>The takeaway: NatureBox offers great variety, flexible options, truly unique snacks, and great value, especially when you add in the free membership.</em></p>\n<h2>SnackNation</h2>\n<p><img class=\"aligncenter wp-image-171110 size-full\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Screen-Shot-2020-05-06-at-1.58.45-PM.png\" alt=\"\" width=\"712\" height=\"700\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Screen-Shot-2020-05-06-at-1.58.45-PM.png 712w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Screen-Shot-2020-05-06-at-1.58.45-PM-300x295.png 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Screen-Shot-2020-05-06-at-1.58.45-PM-163x160.png 163w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Screen-Shot-2020-05-06-at-1.58.45-PM-40x40.png 40w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Screen-Shot-2020-05-06-at-1.58.45-PM-60x60.png 60w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 712px) 100vw, 712px\" /></p>\n<p><a href=\"https://snacknation.com/\">SnackNation</a> is another well-known company offering remote snack boxes for teams working from home. This company’s service is a good turnkey option &#8211; easy, fast, and convenient. You have three boxes to choose from: The Snack Box, The Super Snack Box, and a smaller Snack Box + Coffee. After you choose, the curators do the rest of the work for you. Curators review hundreds of different snack options to put in their rotation.</p>\n<p>The snacks come from a medley of different brands so what you get may change each month. SnackNation is a good option if you like the element of surprise or want to try out new snacks. To those that want to pick their favorites each month, this company’s Snack from Home box experience may be frustrating.</p>\n<p>Since the boxes contain single-serve packs, this feels like a fun gift idea rather than something to get monthly. On a positive note, SnackNation is donating meals to Feeding America for every snack box delivered to remote employees. Giving back is always appreciated, especially at a time like this.</p>\n<p>The takeaway: SnackNation offers convenience and fun initial experience. This is at the expense of customization and sustainability.</p>\n<p>Two honorable mentions go to <a href=\"https://fruitguys.com/\">Fruit Guys</a> and <a href=\"https://www.ohmygreen.com/\">Oh My Green</a>.</p>\n<p>Fruit Guys offers wonderful fresh produce boxes for remote employees, but the content of those boxes vary due to availability and seasonality. Oh My Green is also a standout, but feature other brands’ snacks in their boxes rather than its own.</p>\n<h4>Conclusion</h4>\n<p>It&#8217;s a tough time right now for teams and you want to keep your team in good shape mentally and physically. You just can&#8217;t get customized, curated boxes of delicious wellness snacks delivered to your home like you can with NatureBox. For healthy office snacks to fuel your hungry teams &#8212; especially while they are working remotely &#8212; go to <a href=\"http://www.naturebox.com/office\">www.naturebox.com/office</a>.</p>\n<p>The post <a rel=\"nofollow\" 23:17:52","updatedTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:52","title":"How Can AI and ML Transform the Way We Read and Understand Data?","link":"https://readwrite.com/?p=173406","description":"<div><a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/08/02/how-can-ai-and-ml-transform-the-way-we-read-and-understand-data/\" title=\"How Can AI and ML Transform the Way We Read and Understand Data?\"><img width=\"300\" https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/Transform-the-Way-We-Read-and-Understand-Data-260x160.jpg 260w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/Transform-the-Way-We-Read-and-Understand-Data.jpg 825w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px\" /></a></div><p style=\"text-align: justify;\">Today&#8217;s business is ruled by data and data-driven understanding. How you understand the data and interpret the data into business decisions has a direct impact on your business conversion and growth. For a more precise understanding of data, today we have artificial intelligence (AI) and <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/04/27/covid-19-jobs-data-and-machine-learning/\">Machine Learning</a> (ML) technologies on our side. No doubt, these technologies that mimic human reasoning can positively transform businesses and their strategies.</p>\n<p style=\"text-align: justify;\">We need to understand the impact of AI and ML technologies have in shaping our understanding and <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/01/02/demystifying-8-core-myths-that-surround-the-internet-of-things/\">capability to interpret data</a>.</p>\n<h2 style=\"text-align: justify;\"><b>Data-Driven Personalization</b></h2>\n<p style=\"text-align: justify;\">Any business understands the importance of <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/07/13/top-10-best-live-chat-software-for-2020/\">communicating with customers individually</a>. Yes, thanks to the very nature of digital interfaces that opened up the tremendous scope of individual preferences and choices, your business communication must take into account the preferences of individual customers. The increasing importance of addressing individual choices for business conversion has forced many companies to focus on data-driven personalization measures.</p>\n<p style=\"text-align: justify;\">Not only the large businesses but also the startups and <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/02/16/8-best-digital-marketing-strategies-small-businesses-should-implement/\">small businesses</a> increasingly understand the importance of having <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/07/14/why-data-scientists-are-becoming-future-marketers/\">access to the relevant data</a> for meeting the needs of visitors. AI can dig the available user data deeper and fetch out relevant patterns and insights that can be further utilized for data-driven decision making personalization. AI can also help to scale up such personalization efforts for every individual user.</p>\n<h4>Stop the churn rate.</h4>\n<p style=\"text-align: justify;\">A superb example of how AI can allow personalization in business operations can be found in the case of Starbucks. The global coffee chain brand designed 400,000 different types of emails created based on the data of individual preferences, tastes, and choices. Such well crafted personalized communication can help brands to create more engaging communication and conversation for business brands. The brand actually AI to decipher the volumes of data corresponding to customer preferences and choices.</p>\n<h4>Data collection and data-centric.</h4>\n<p style=\"text-align: justify;\">When it comes to smaller businesses and little startups, such as AI-based data collection and data-centric personalization may be a little expensive. But small businesses can embrace similar approaches to create very specific data-oriented marketing campaigns with short duration to boost business conversion and customer engagement. Such AI-powered data-driven campaigns can also help to lift the brand image of any company.</p>\n<h2 style=\"text-align: justify;\"><b>Generating Sales Leads from Data that&#8217;s Understood<br />\n</b></h2>\n<p style=\"text-align: justify;\">For the B2B segment, business conversion highly depends on<a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/03/18/5-proven-strategies-to-reduce-customer-churn-rate/\"> generating new leads</a>. The B2B companies also need to depend heavily on tracking contact data and reaching out to them effectively through lead generation funnel. Most marketers agree to the humongous range of challenges B2B-based businesses face in doing this. This is where AI can play a great role in streamlining the process of lead generation through intelligent automation.</p>\n<p style=\"text-align: justify;\"><a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/06/19/how-will-artificial-intelligence-change-the-world-of-sports/\">Artificial Intelligence</a> (AI) powered lead generation and contact tracking solutions have the capability to make an analysis of the customer base along with important trends and emerging patterns. These trends, patterns, anomalies, characteristics, and various attributes can deliver important insights for optimizing websites and web apps. Thanks to AI-based optimization insights a website can venture to use better programming language, tools, features, and UI elements to generate more leads.</p>\n<h4>Analytics and you.</h4>\n<p style=\"text-align: justify;\">On the other hand, AI-based business data analysis can work hand in hand with big data analytics. This sophisticated and highly incisive approach to data utilization can easily help to discover ideal customers for a business. The interactions of users on web pages and corresponding data can be analyzed by B2B brands with the help of AI tools to produce the most relevant as well as actionable insights.</p>\n<h4>Analytical activities.</h4>\n<p style=\"text-align: justify;\">To make things easier for the businesses, AI, and machine learning technology for such analytical activities are now spotted in most of the leading analytics solutions across the spectrum. Simple Google Analytics can also offer highly result-oriented and precision-driven reports. Such technologies can easily know about the shortcomings and loopholes behind the decreasing motivation of traffic and readings of business conversion fallout.</p>\n<h4>Great analytics tools.</h4>\n<p style=\"text-align: justify;\">There are also great tools like Finteza that uses AI technology for monitoring website traffic on a continuous basis besides checking other crucial issues and irregularities. These tools can also improve your data security since by detecting bad traffic they automatically point out the vulnerabilities in the web app.</p>\n<p style=\"text-align: justify;\">Poor web traffic often results in DDoS attacks, manipulation of website cookies, and hackers or malicious programs impersonating computer bots. An AI-based lead generation solution can also reduce these security vulnerabilities.</p>\n<h2 style=\"text-align: justify;\"><b>Optimizing the User Experience (UX)</b></h2>\n<p style=\"text-align: justify;\">AI optimizes the scope of personalization in a data-driven manner and that is portrayed as the principal useless of AI in dealing with data. But AI is also highly effective in optimizing the web design and improving the <a href=\"https://www.cmarix.com/how-magento-2-mobile-app-builder-helps-delivering-the-best-native-ecommerce-user-experience/\">user experience</a> (UX).</p>\n<h4>User Behavior</h4>\n<p style=\"text-align: justify;\">AI achieves this optimization and improvement by analyzing user behavior and interaction data and user feedback. Machine learning programs particularly can play a very effective role in learning from user behavior and adjusting various interactive elements accordingly.</p>\n<p style=\"text-align: justify;\">AI and ML programs running behind the scene basically collect a lot of data corresponding to real user behavior so that real-time feedback about shortcomings and improvement needs can be communicated to the business owners. An ML-based program can also bring instant tweaks to the UX attributes for better engagement.</p>\n<p style=\"text-align: justify;\">Another important thing in this respect that needs to be explained is the great role of AI in improving the efficiency of A/B tests. In the A/B testing process the AI and machine learning can deliver the most important insights about user demands and preferences to take further enhancement measures for UI and UX.</p>\n<p style=\"text-align: justify;\">The most important aspect of AI in making an impact over <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2014/01/09/airlock-facebooks-a-b-testing-platform-that-helps-build-the-perfect-app/\">A/B testing</a> is that it leaves no scope for vague assessment or guessing. The data-driven insights guiding the A/B testing is more possible now as website cookies provide clear insights concerning user behavior.</p>\n<p style=\"text-align: justify;\">Based on such insights the landing pages can reduce form fields as per user interest and preferences.</p>\n<h2 style=\"text-align: justify;\"><b>Biometric Data Pushing for Enhancements</b></h2>\n<p style=\"text-align: justify;\">Biometrics data corresponding to direct interactions with a web app can help developers and marketers with a lot of actionable insights. There are many advanced online services right now available in the market that can help to understand and decipher website data.</p>\n<p style=\"text-align: justify;\">Biometrics data coupled up with AI and machine learning technology opened up new possibilities for improved <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/09/26/ai-can-impact-mobile-app-development-and-user-experience/\">user experience</a>.</p>\n<p style=\"text-align: justify;\">Among these available services for data interpretation mostly take the help of a combination of both artificial intelligence and machine learning. These sophisticated solutions can easily track the eye movements of the users.</p>\n<p style=\"text-align: justify;\">In addition, some of these services can also track facial expressions to assess user responses in different contexts. These services can extract the most organic kind of user data and generate the most valuable insights that can be used for UX design and performance optimization of websites.</p>\n<h4 style=\"text-align: justify;\"><b>Conclusion</b></h4>\n<p style=\"text-align: justify;\">As the trends stand, from this year onward the AI and ML-based data analytics and data-centric optimization of business apps will have more dominance. Thanks to these two technologies, there will be the least guesswork for all design, development, and optimization decisions.</p>\n<p>The post <a rel=\"nofollow\" of the fact that they can undoubtedly destroy your spending plan on the off chance that you don&#8217;t have the foggiest idea what you&#8217;re doing.</p>\n<h2><b>What is Amazon PPC Management? How does the Amazon PPC Auction work?</b></h2>\n<p>Amazon PPC (otherwise called Sponsored Products) is a notable promoting stage to assist dealers with enhancing their item deals on the web. Pay-per-click (<a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/10/08/19-ppc-mistakes-that-can-demolish-your-business-for-good/\">PPC</a>) promotion is where a seller pays just for the notice that a potential purchaser snaps and perspectives the item.</p>\n<p>Just when an Amazon PPC battle is made, overseen, and executed appropriately, it assists with enhancing the deals, and subsequently, improving the organic rankings as well.</p>\n<p>This strategy is likewise called CPC. PPC works uniquely in contrast to pay-per-mail promoting PPM, which is an impressions-based strategy for publicizing like Facebook employments. With PPM, the Seller pays for every 1,000 individuals who see the promotion, versus the individuals who click on the advertisements.</p>\n<p>Amazon advertisements are one of the perfect ways for a vendor to &#8220;get or purchase&#8221; the top situation of the Amazon SERPs. Since Sellers pay just when a customer taps the promotion, the idea was named – <b>Amazon Pay per Click.</b></p>\n<p>Now the Question Arises,</p>\n<h3><b>Why should brands keep running their Amazon PPC campaigns throughout the Covid-19 pandemic, plus some guiding optimization principles that should be upheld throughout the coming months?</b></h3>\n<p>Although we are going through a very critical phase of <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/11/05/open-applications-and-solving-the-future-of-platform-economics/\">economics</a>! The market is just not switched off, things are still working but in a little different manner. There are different reasons that we should keep running <strong>Amazon PPC campaigns</strong>.</p>\n<h2><b>First of All: </b></h2>\n<h3><b>Not everyone is affected by this pandemic!</b></h3>\n<p>More individuals are remaining at home and depending intensely on web-based business destinations, to be specific Amazon. Numerous Amazon accounts are as of now encountering gigantic deals <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/03/06/sales-prospecting-techniques-for-sales-development-reps/\">development</a>, like especially across Nourishment and Consumables.</p>\n<p>A forceful PPC procedure might be a need to keep contenders under control.</p>\n<h3><b>Secondly, Competitors are also down!</b></h3>\n<p>Another good to go reason for <a href=\"https://www.amzonestep.com/services/amazon-ppc-service\">Amazon PPC management</a> and campaigns is that many of the competitors are unavailable, or confronting serious calculated issues, presently is an extraordinary time to improve your natural positioning and item surveys.</p>\n<p>In case you&#8217;re a brand in an appealing class that has figured out how to maintain a strategic distance from any stock-out issues up to this point, all there are odds you have just observed extraordinary outcomes as a result of contenders briefly dropping out of the race.</p>\n<p>The excellence of Amazon PPC is that if a request begins to slide, you can alter your offers and day by day restraints whenever, so it pays to be strong now, particularly if the opposition is pulling back.</p>\n<h2><b>No. 3 &#8211; For the sake of Isolated Buyers:</b></h2>\n<p>“Customers are searching for diversion choices for buying during this time of isolation,&#8221; Amazon PPC quickly said in the event that they need to rank well in this season of phenomenal interest.</p>\n<p>Moreover, preceding Covid-19, customers on Amazon put an immense premium on quick delivery. Be that as it may, considering the unsure course of events of the present social separating rules, most customers won&#8217;t give it a second thought if their bundle shows up a couple of days late, particularly if Amazon is the main game left around.</p>\n<h3><b>Finally,</b></h3>\n<h3><b>Not only competitors but Different Selling CHANNELS are under crisis: </b></h3>\n<p>With their profound pockets and exceptionally mechanized satisfaction arranged, it&#8217;s difficult to think about a superior organization better set to climate the <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/05/05/securing-the-digital-workplace-amidst-the-covid-19-pandemic/\">Covid-19</a> tempest than Amazon.</p>\n<p>There&#8217;s a decent possibility that you would&#8217;ve just seen different deals channels languishing. As per an inside study, 37% of Coaster customers are as of now observing lower requests in DTC or discount (store) channels.</p>\n<p>Amazon will be the breadwinning channel for countless brands over the coming months.</p>\n<p><em>Image Credit: Tobias Dziuba; Pexels</em></p>\n<p>The post <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/06/21/should-amazon-sellers-go-for-amazon-ppc-campaign-in-this-pandemic/\">Should Amazon Sellers Go for Amazon PPC Campaign in this Pandemic?</a> appeared first on <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com\">ReadWrite</a>.</p>\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Sun, 21 Jun 2020 18:01:03 +0000","feedId":271,"bgimg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Should-Amazon-Sellers-Go-for-Amazon-PPC-Campaign-in-this-Pandemic.jpg","linkMd5":"838d63c2c65900aba264c349226c0e22","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx/cdn75@2020_2/2020/08/23/15-18-25-371_0873af55e9d368df.webp","metaImg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Should-Amazon-Sellers-Go-for-Amazon-PPC-Campaign-in-this-Pandemic.jpg","destWidth":1280,"destHeight":815,"sourceBytes":210263,"destBytes":103120,"author":"Aashirvad Kumar","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Should-Amazon-Sellers-Go-for-Amazon-PPC-Campaign-in-this-Pandemic-300x191.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn79@2020_1/2020/08/23/15-18-12-217_c3f71be0fcacc26c.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598195876511},{"createdTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:58","updatedTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:58","title":"Biotechnology — Benefits and Risks at a Glance","link":"https://readwrite.com/?p=169134","description":"<div><a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/04/14/biotechnology-benefits-and-risks-at-a-glance/\" title=\"Biotechnology &#8212; Benefits and Risks at a Glance\"><img width=\"300\" height=\"200\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/Biotechnology-Benefits-and-Risks-at-a-Glance-300x200.jpg\" class=\"attachment-medium size-medium wp-post-image\" alt=\"ai biotechnology benefits\" style=\"margin-bottom: 15px;\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/Biotechnology-Benefits-and-Risks-at-a-Glance-300x200.jpg 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/Biotechnology-Benefits-and-Risks-at-a-Glance-900x601.jpg 900w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/Biotechnology-Benefits-and-Risks-at-a-Glance-240x160.jpg 240w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/Biotechnology-Benefits-and-Risks-at-a-Glance-1536x1026.jpg 1536w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/Biotechnology-Benefits-and-Risks-at-a-Glance.jpg 1920w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px\" /></a></div><p>Biotechnology is a branch of science that merges biological concepts with technology for better use and advancements in the field of science, technology, and humanity. Here is <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/03/30/top-2020-wordpress-plugins-for-business-data-visualization/\">biotechnology</a> &#8212; the benefits and the risks at a glance.</p>\n<p>Biotechnology <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/04/10/ar-and-vr-set-to-revolutionize-e-commerce/\">deploys a range of technologies</a> that use living organisms or a part of them to make all kinds of useful products. These <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/03/10/is-ai-just-as-biased-as-the-humans-creating-it/\">products are as diverse</a> as renewable fuels, drugs, and therapeutics. The products are also as disparate as nutritional compounds, environment-friendly chemicals, and materials, household cleaning products, organs for transplant, and more.</p>\n<h2>What is Biotechnology?</h2>\n<p>We can say that biotechnology is the manipulation of living organisms and <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2018/05/25/how-technology-is-improving-the-environment/\">organic materials</a> in certain different patterns that meet our needs on various platforms. Or simply put, Biotechnology uses living organisms to <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/01/17/how-to-get-useful-customer-feedback-in-4-steps/\">create useful products</a>.</p>\n<p>Biotechnology may have different variations in definitions, but it has a purpose to achieve certain requirements in the field of medicines, agriculture, industries, and more, through manipulations and production.</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_169774\" aria-describedby=\"caption-attachment-169774\" style=\"width: 800px\" class=\"wp-caption aligncenter\"><a href=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/bio2.png\"><img class=\"wp-image-169774 size-full\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/bio2.png\" alt=\"\" width=\"800\" height=\"600\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/bio2.png 800w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/bio2-300x225.png 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/bio2-213x160.png 213w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 800px) 100vw, 800px\" /></a><figcaption id=\"caption-attachment-169774\" class=\"wp-caption-text\"><em>A few of the many areas that make use of biotechnology.</em></figcaption></figure></p>\n<h3>Let’s check out some of the technical definitions and terminologies of biotechnology as defined by some federations and organizations.</h3>\n<ul>\n<li><strong>Defined by the European Federation of Biotechnology</strong> &#8211; Biotechnology is the application of biochemistry, microbiology and <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/10/30/7-ways-ai-is-helping-doctors-diagnose-and-treat-cancer/\">engineering sciences</a> in order to achieve the technological application of the capabilities of microorganisms and cultured tissue cells.</li>\n<li><strong>According to the Biology Industry Organization</strong> &#8211; Biotechnology is the science of using cellular and biomolecular processes to develop technologies and products.</li>\n<li><strong>According to International Unions of Pure and Applied Chemistry</strong> (1981) &#8211;  biotechnology is the application of biochemistry, biology, and microbiology, chemical engineering to <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/04/13/digital-thread-5-ways-to-drive-value-in-industrial-enterprise/\">industrial processes</a>, products and on the environment.</li>\n</ul>\n<h3>The term Biotechnology is often misunderstood.</h3>\n<p><strong>The OECD</strong> &#8212; the Organization of Economic Co-operation and Development &#8212;  defines biotechnology as “the application of scientific and engineering principles to the processing of materials by biological agents.”</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_169778\" aria-describedby=\"caption-attachment-169778\" style=\"width: 300px\" class=\"wp-caption aligncenter\"><a href=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/bio3.jpg\"><img class=\"wp-image-169778 size-medium\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/bio3-300x147.jpg\" alt=\"\" width=\"300\" height=\"147\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/bio3-300x147.jpg 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/bio3-260x128.jpg 260w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/bio3.jpg 800w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px\" /></a><figcaption id=\"caption-attachment-169778\" class=\"wp-caption-text\"><em>Biotech is not just human&#8230;</em></figcaption></figure></p>\n<blockquote><p><em>Some people have believed the biotechnology is limited to the application of molecular biology techniques to identify genes responsible for particular traits to clone, study, characterize and manipulate, but it is not the case.</em></p></blockquote>\n<p>There are many rapid advances taking place in different fields of biotechnology like medical biotechnology, agricultural <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/03/30/the-latest-battle-for-consumer-attention-blurring-the-lines-between-retailers-and-brands/\">biotechnology, and industrial biotechnology</a>.</p>\n<h4>The four major disciplines in biotechnology.</h4>\n<p>The four major disciplines in biotechnology are medical, industrial, marine and agricultural processes and each process is represented by a specific color. These colors are: red, white, blue, and green respectively.</p>\n<p><strong>The four disciplines are known as Red biotechnology, White biotechnology, Blue biotechnology, and Green biotechnology &#8212; as per their roles and functions.</strong></p>\n<ul>\n<li><strong>Green biotechnology</strong> is used to improve the production quality of crops. Green biotechnology boosts the economy that includes the plant’s tissue culture, engineering culture, and molecular marker-assisted breeding. Green biotechnology is based on providing agricultural solutions without affecting the environment. As it specializes in <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2017/02/22/iot-farm-application-ecosystems-the-key-to-smarter-farms/\">improving agricultural processes</a>, it has obtained the obtaining of transgenic plants resistant to terrains, and adverse environmental conditions as well as resistant to diseases and pests.</li>\n<li><strong>Red biotechnology</strong> is used by <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/08/29/3-ways-video-technology-can-improve-patient-safety-in-healthcare/\">biotechnologists to find healthcare solutions</a>. These solutions include vaccines for many dreadful diseases and viruses that currently plague humanity. Also, much research work is done in gene therapy, testing genetics and in the area of &#8220;improvement diagnosis.&#8221;Red biotechnology is also used <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/03/15/decoding-the-future-trajectory-of-healthcare-with-ai/\">for medical processes</a> like obtaining antibiotics, new drugs, vaccines, and newer forms of molecular diagnosis. It has <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/03/23/can-artificial-intelligence-replace-the-role-of-doctors/\">regenerative therapies </a>and the application of genetic engineering to cure diseases.</li>\n<li><strong>White biotechnology</strong> is exclusively applied to improve industrial processes. The white biotech will continue producing services and <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/04/13/digital-thread-5-ways-to-drive-value-in-industrial-enterprise/\">products for industrial</a> and environmental processes. White biotech uses yeast, molds, bacteria, and enzymes for its research. The main aim of white biotechnology is the development of <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/03/12/how-are-sustainable-startups-like-pela-fighting-plastic-waste/\">biodegradable products</a> to earn profits and provide better services.</li>\n<li><strong>Blue biotechnology</strong> is also known as <em>marine</em> biotechnology. Blue biotechnology is the application of molecular biological methods to marine and freshwater life. It uses marine organisms, and their derivatives, to <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2016/08/30/iot-cold-supply-il4/\">increase seafood supply</a>. Blue biotechnology increases safety and controls the proliferation of noxious water-borne organisms, and develops new drugs. Blue biotechnology is responsible for the development of aquaculture, care of marine creatures, water treatment and <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2018/03/16/technology-needs-make-healthy-food-scalable-affordable/\">production of food</a> derived from the sea.</li>\n</ul>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_169779\" aria-describedby=\"caption-attachment-169779\" style=\"width: 638px\" class=\"wp-caption aligncenter\"><a href=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/bio4.jpg\"><img class=\"wp-image-169779 size-full\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/bio4.jpg\" alt=\"four disciplines of biotechnology\" width=\"638\" height=\"479\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/bio4.jpg 638w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/bio4-300x225.jpg 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/bio4-213x160.jpg 213w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 638px) 100vw, 638px\" /></a><figcaption id=\"caption-attachment-169779\" class=\"wp-caption-text\"><strong><em>The four major disciplines in biotechnology.</em></strong></figcaption></figure></p>\n<h3>Biotechnology and Artificial Intelligence</h3>\n<p>Artificial intelligence is considered the next big thing in biotechnology. Biotechnology is not the only area that artificial intelligence has revolutionized. It&#8217;s <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/05/08/ai-based-framework-for-agile-project-management/\">transformed the research and development</a> activities in many crucial areas.</p>\n<p>Almost all the leading biopharmaceutical bigwigs globally are strategically implementing AI-driven technologies in their biotech businesses. AI boost&#8217;s up the development processes and gains newer insights in <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/11/18/ai-is-the-fourth-industrial-revolution-technology/\">research and development outsourcing</a>.</p>\n<blockquote><p><em>Artificial intelligence (AI) can be described as the ability of a computer or robot-controlled computer to perform tasks that are commonly associated with intelligent creatures. Specifically, a &#8220;scientific discipline that involves building computer systems whose behavior can be interpreted intelligently.</em></p></blockquote>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_169780\" aria-describedby=\"caption-attachment-169780\" style=\"width: 740px\" class=\"wp-caption aligncenter\"><a href=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/bio5.jpg\"><img class=\"wp-image-169780 size-full\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/bio5.jpg\" alt=\"ai\" width=\"740\" height=\"400\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/bio5.jpg 740w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/bio5-300x162.jpg 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/bio5-260x141.jpg 260w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 740px) 100vw, 740px\" /></a><figcaption id=\"caption-attachment-169780\" class=\"wp-caption-text\"><em>The addition of artificial intelligence in biotech cannot be overemphasized.</em></figcaption></figure></p>\n<h4>The following are a few of the major applications of AI in biotechnology.</h4>\n<ul>\n<li><a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2018/12/19/healthcare-is-booming-hand-in-hand-with-the-technology-industry/\">Diagnostics</a></li>\n<li>Radiotherapy and Radiology</li>\n<li>Personalized Medicine</li>\n<li>Gene Editing</li>\n<li><a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2018/08/31/5-healthcare-technology-trends-to-keep-an-eye-on/\">Electronic Health Record</a> (EHR)</li>\n<li>Medication Management</li>\n<li><a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/02/20/5-emerging-technologies-that-can-help-increase-sales-conversions/\">Sales Rep Performance</a></li>\n<li>Target-based and phenotypic drug discovery</li>\n<li>Polypharmacology discovery</li>\n<li><a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2017/03/14/sweat-the-future-of-health-wearables-hl1/\">Biomarkers development</a></li>\n<li><a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/06/11/manufacturers-aspire-to-digital-twinning-and-virtual-commissioning/\">Analyzing research literature</a>, publications, and patents</li>\n</ul>\n<p>Clearly, AI can help identify drug targets, find good molecules from data libraries, suggest chemical modifications, identify candidates for repurposing and so on.</p>\n<p>Artificial Intelligence <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/03/11/ai-startups-need-data-and-the-government-needs-help/\">is transforming data into</a> drugs by its amazing technological advances. No wonder all the big pharmacy and biotech are betting big time on AI.</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_169781\" aria-describedby=\"caption-attachment-169781\" style=\"width: 760px\" class=\"wp-caption aligncenter\"><a href=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/bio6.jpg\"><img class=\"wp-image-169781 size-full\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/bio6.jpg\" alt=\"biotech and ai\" width=\"760\" height=\"578\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/bio6.jpg 760w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/bio6-300x228.jpg 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/bio6-210x160.jpg 210w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 760px) 100vw, 760px\" /></a><figcaption id=\"caption-attachment-169781\" class=\"wp-caption-text\"><em>Biotech is betting big time on AI.</em></figcaption></figure></p>\n<h3>How does Biotechnology impact our lives?</h3>\n<p>Biotechnology is an innovative, dynamic and ever-evolving cutting-edge sector. It plays a significant role in all major areas of human interests and benefits. Biotech touches all areas including economics, environment, and health. The <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2016/12/29/8-predictions-for-the-future-of-iot-in-2017-il1/\">applications of biotechnology</a> have both positive as well as negative impacts for human civilization.</p>\n<p>Biotechnologies are fundamentally oriented for improving the efficiency of production techniques in agricultural, industrial and biomedical fields.</p>\n<p>Several advanced surveys and statistics across the globe emphatically explain how biotechnology is poised to <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/10/30/7-ways-ai-is-helping-doctors-diagnose-and-treat-cancer/\">change our lives for good</a>.</p>\n<h3>The &#8220;higher purposes&#8221; of Biotechnology.</h3>\n<p>In earlier times, biotechnology’s usage was restricted to fundamental processes like making cheese, wine, bread. Today we have the advantage of superior technologies and the motive of urgent requirements to use biotechnology appropriately for many higher purposes of the society.</p>\n<p>Biotechnology is controlling a major part of our lives without us realizing its presence in our surroundings and utilities.</p>\n<h4>The four disciplines of Biotechnology are in control of our lives.</h4>\n<p>Controlling many areas, such as the <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/01/08/how-will-it-shape-up-the-future-of-the-internet/\">food we eat to medicines we consume</a>, the clothes we wear and how they are washed to the fuel we use, <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/03/30/top-2020-wordpress-plugins-for-business-data-visualization/\">biotechnology is everywhere</a>. The four disciplines of biotechnology are making its invaluable presence felt in meeting our daily needs.</p>\n<h4>Biotechnology is often being regarded more as an art than a science.</h4>\n<p>Biotech is sometimes not <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/03/10/is-ai-just-as-biased-as-the-humans-creating-it/\">thought of as a science</a>, but it should be. Because of biotechnology&#8217;s ability to touch upon people’s lives by accentuating the quality of life, it&#8217;s becoming invaluable.</p>\n<p>The solutions Biotechnology provides change results for the grand challenges of society. Solutions are found for <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2018/12/05/how-connected-devices-could-revolutionize-nutrition/\">food security</a>, climate change, energy shortages, <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/05/23/arrow-microsoft-the-new-product-lifecycle/\">healthcare choices</a>, and affordability. We find solutions for industrial processes and medical needs &#8212; even solutions in fighting with epidemics.</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_169782\" aria-describedby=\"caption-attachment-169782\" style=\"width: 760px\" class=\"wp-caption aligncenter\"><a href=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/bio7.jpg\"><img class=\"wp-image-169782 size-full\" Rees","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/Biotechnology-Benefits-and-Risks-at-a-Glance-300x200.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx7/cdn48@2020_6/2020/08/23/15-18-28-697_639608182f940fc9.webp","https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/bio2.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx23/cdn20@2020_4/2020/08/23/15-18-14-191_f05be8c9fc2ddfcb.webp","https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/bio3-300x147.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx33/cdn24@2020_3/2020/08/23/15-18-12-188_20695cb71e195070.webp","https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/bio4.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx10/cdn20@2020_5/2020/08/23/15-18-16-316_e018774a759047a7.webp","https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/bio5.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx15/cdn39@2020_2/2020/08/23/15-18-15-060_9763194b0985e092.webp","https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/bio6.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn23@2020_1/2020/08/23/15-18-14-738_8674500a75d9f79c.webp","https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/bio7.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx4/cdn96@2020_6/2020/08/23/15-18-14-534_7bb265a06cbbe9e2.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598195878479},{"createdTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:54","updatedTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:54","title":"How to Conduct a Trademark Search for a Business Startup","link":"https://readwrite.com/?p=171228","description":"<div><a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/07/09/how-to-conduct-a-trademark-search-for-a-business-startup/\" title=\"How to Conduct a Trademark Search for a Business Startup\"><img width=\"300\" height=\"185\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/How-to-Conduct-a-Trademark-Search-for-a-Business-Startup-300x185.png\" class=\"attachment-medium size-medium wp-post-image\" alt=\"trademark search UAE\" style=\"margin-bottom: 15px;\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/How-to-Conduct-a-Trademark-Search-for-a-Business-Startup-300x185.png 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/How-to-Conduct-a-Trademark-Search-for-a-Business-Startup-260x160.png 260w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/How-to-Conduct-a-Trademark-Search-for-a-Business-Startup.png 825w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px\" /></a></div><p>Trademark rights in UAE are based on the trademark’s use. Prior to using a mark in identifying a specific product or service, there&#8217;s a need to perform a clearance search. A clearance search or trademark search determines whether there’s an existing mark. If there is an existing mark that is already registered &#8212; it&#8217;s likely similar or the same as to what you want to use. Here is how to conduct a trademark search for a business startup in UAE.</p>\n<p>Similar to a trademark in the US &#8212; a Trademark search in UAE is also referred to as due diligence search. It&#8217;s a <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/04/26/how-website-design-integrates-with-the-internet-of-things-iot/\">systematic search of unregistered and registered</a> trademarks that:</p>\n<ul>\n<li><em>Are being utilized anywhere in the world or country, where applicable; </em></li>\n<li><em>Are similar or the same as the trademark that you plan on using or registering;</em></li>\n<li><em>Are being utilized for similar or the same products and/or services; </em></li>\n<li><em>Are likely to confuse consumers with regards to the source of the products and/or services </em></li>\n</ul>\n<p>It is very essential to<a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/01/24/cybersecurity-best-practices-7-ways-to-secure-your-data-in-2020/\"> keep proper records</a> of the progress and process of the trademark search (in UAE &#8212; farahatco dot com; a trademark searching service).  The date that the search has been conducted should also be noted as well as the words, codes, and terms that are used in the search. Also, don’t forget to record the database that was scanned and the trademarks that have been found from the search.</p>\n<h2><strong>Make a Trademark.</strong></h2>\n<p>Brainstorm a name for the mark or sketch a logo design. It is an excellent idea if you generate several different logos or names just in case the first choice is in use already by another person or entity.</p>\n<h4><strong>Provide a Description for the product or service that will be covered by the Mark.</strong></h4>\n<p>When applying for UAE trademark registration which is done with the UAE Ministry of Economy, you will need to identify products or services that are covered by the mark.</p>\n<p>Utilize the resources available in identifying acceptable terms which describe certain products and services.</p>\n<h4><strong>Highlight all the Related Products or Services.</strong></h4>\n<p>To make the most use of a mark, related products and services are also to be identified. Products and services will be considered as related by the authorities if they are:</p>\n<ul>\n<li><em>Used together – hockey sticks and ice skates; </em></li>\n<li><em>Sold together – underwear and socks; </em></li>\n<li><em>Made with similar materials or ingredients &#8211; butter and cheese</em></li>\n</ul>\n<h2><strong>Identify Design Codes.</strong></h2>\n<p><a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2018/12/10/how-do-qr-codes-work/\">Design codes</a> are identified for marks that have design elements in them. If the trademark incorporates a logo or design, the trademark search should include a search for designs that are confusingly similar.</p>\n<p>Utilize the resources available (e.g., the services of a local or international trademark specialist) to identify appropriate codes for every single prominent design element within your trademark.</p>\n<h4><strong>You will also want to carefully review all guidelines for every one of the codes.</strong></h4>\n<p>To give you an example, if the trademark has a penguin that is sporting a bow tie, then the search codes must be identified for penguins in costume, bow ties, ties, silk scarves, etc. You should carefully watch these design elements whether in the U.S. or any other country. Respect whichever country design codes you are implementing.</p>\n<h4><strong>Scour Registries for Registered Marks and Pending Applications.</strong></h4>\n<p>Choose a <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2018/08/30/trademark-protection-for-startups/\">trademark database</a>, then search the specific works in the mark you plan on registering. Look out for exact matches, then move on to expanding your search with the use of words which sound like your trademark. Don’t forget to include spelling variations and similar meanings.</p>\n<p><strong>Scan results you uncover for trademarks that are already registered for the same or similar products or services that you are or will be putting on the market.</strong></p>\n<p>You can also conduct a combined mark search using the mark and the products or service terms. The search may also include international class code. Especially if the mark has design elements in it, the search for design codes as mentioned earlier.</p>\n<h2><strong>Review the Trademark Status.</strong></h2>\n<p>For every relevant mark that you have uncovered along the way, check the ownership information and current status. You may catch a trademark that has already expired and is not in use any longer by the trademark holder. These elements or trademarks, you may be able to use or acquire depending on the lapse of status.</p>\n<h4><strong> </strong><strong>If Possible, Expand the Search.</strong></h4>\n<p>A <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/07/02/top-futurist-speakers/\">comprehensive trademark search</a> includes common law marks or unregistered trademarks, as well as trademarks that are registered at state or provincial levels.</p>\n<p>Resources that you can scour include:</p>\n<ul>\n<li>social media sites</li>\n<li>internet search engines</li>\n<li>domain name registries on the internet</li>\n<li>yellow pages</li>\n<li>business directories</li>\n<li>national trademark databases</li>\n<li>business name registries</li>\n<li>e-commerce sites</li>\n<li>product catalogs</li>\n<li>trade publications</li>\n<li>trade associations</li>\n<li>local shopping malls</li>\n<li>newspapers</li>\n<li>magazines</li>\n</ul>\n<p><strong>There is a need for a vast scope of search and accuracy to make sure that a trademark search performed is effective.</strong></p>\n<p>The trademark specialists in <em>Farahat &#38; Co</em> can help ensure that your search results are reliable as they utilize several different strategies and technology in conducting a thorough search.</p>\n<p>Expand your brand today.</p>\n<p>The post <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/07/09/how-to-conduct-a-trademark-search-for-a-business-startup/\">How to Conduct a Trademark Search for a Business Startup</a> appeared first on <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com\">ReadWrite</a>.</p>\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Thu, 09 Jul 2020 18:01:10 +0000","feedId":271,"bgimg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/How-to-Conduct-a-Trademark-Search-for-a-Business-Startup.png","linkMd5":"e5c81b2a611b4150725ed6863d0ad39c","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx7/cdn24@2020_4/2020/08/23/15-18-26-637_376b9648004063cc.webp","metaImg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/How-to-Conduct-a-Trademark-Search-for-a-Business-Startup.png","destWidth":825,"destHeight":510,"sourceBytes":829241,"destBytes":98416,"author":"Vinod Janapala","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/How-to-Conduct-a-Trademark-Search-for-a-Business-Startup-300x185.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx15/cdn27@2020_4/2020/08/23/15-18-14-876_a8b64c69e6702a7e.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598195874147},{"createdTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:54","updatedTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:54","title":"Airvet Showered by Investors with $14M in Series A Funding to Bring Virtual Care to Every Pet Owner in the Country","link":"https://readwrite.com/?p=173768","description":"<div><a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/07/01/airvet-showered-by-investors-with-14m-in-series-a-funding-to-bring-virtual-care-to-every-pet-owner-in-the-country/\" title=\"Airvet Showered by Investors with $14M in Series A Funding to Bring Virtual Care to Every Pet Owner in the Country\"><img width=\"300\" height=\"116\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/Airvet-Showered-by-Investors-300x116.png\" class=\"attachment-medium size-medium wp-post-image\" alt=\"\" style=\"margin-bottom: 15px;\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/Airvet-Showered-by-Investors-300x116.png 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/Airvet-Showered-by-Investors-260x101.png 260w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/Airvet-Showered-by-Investors.png 896w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px\" /></a></div><p>We’ve all seen telemedicine quickly work its way into the mainstream, giving us live on-demand<br />\naccess to dermatologists, therapists, or pediatricians virtually. In fact, with COVID-19 still<br />\nlooming, many of us have likely used it ourselves in just the last few months. But what about<br />\nour pets? We look at them the same as the rest of our family, so why aren’t we getting the same<br />\nlevel of care for them? With the Airvet app, you can.</p>\n<p>Airvet is the company behind the #1 telehealth app for pets. It launched out of Los Angeles in<br />\n2018 and just announced a $14M Series A financing to support and expand the explosive<br />\ndemand for its platform. The round was led by Canvas Ventures, with participation from<br />\ne.ventures, Burst Capital, Starting Line, TrueSight Ventures, Hawke Ventures, Bracket Capital,<br />\nMichael Stoppelman, and several major veterinary industry leaders.</p>\n<p>Airvet was built with a focus on providing a modern virtual care experience for pet owners<br />\nacross the country and quickly rose to be the #1 rated pet telemedicine app in the App Store<br />\nwith over 2,300 reviews and a 4.9/5 star rating. The company was started by a father-son duo,<br />\ncelebrity veterinarian Dr. Jeff Werber, and his son, entrepreneur Brandon Werber.</p>\n<p>When asked where the idea came from, Brandon shared that “It was simple. My dad is a veterinarian, so I’ve never had to worry about pet care. I’ve got two french bulldogs, Carlos and Denzel, who mean the world to me.</p>\n<p>Whenever I have a concern about their health or a question about their behavior, I just text or call my dad and get answers I know I can trust in seconds &#8211; it’s<br />\nextraordinarily comforting. I want every pet owner in the world to have that same feeling.”</p>\n<p>Using Airvet is straightforward and there are a couple of ways to use it depending on the situation.<br />\nOne option is their “on-demand” service for pet owners who need help right away, which can be<br />\nused by all pet parents whether or not their own vet uses Airvet yet.</p>\n<p>In these cases, pet parents can start an on-demand call 24/7 to connect with a licensed US-based veterinarian via live video or over the phone typically within a couple of minutes for just $30. There’s no time limit and cases will usually stay open for 3 full days, so pet parents can continue to access the same vet via chat for any follow-up questions or concerns.</p>\n<p>Another option is to schedule a virtual visit with a pet parent’s own vet, if their normal vet<br />\nalready uses Airvet, as thousands do. Airvet has partnered with hundreds of veterinary clinics<br />\nnationwide, enabling them to extend care virtually to their own clients.</p>\n<p>For these pet owners, virtual appointments can be scheduled to speak to their own veterinarian for various types of virtual exams and re-checks, for example. As curbside appointments have become popular, clients can even join an exam live from the parking lot while their pet is inside with the vet. Like at their office, vets set their own prices for these services.</p>\n<p>Unsurprisingly, COVID-19 gave the company quite a boost, with Airvet growing its platform by<br />\nover 7x in just the last few months. Their nationwide network of veterinarians has also expanded<br />\nto over 2,700 veterinarians in 43 states who have helped more than 6,000 pets get care last<br />\nmonth alone.</p>\n<p>Chief Veterinary Officer, Dr. Werber, pointed out that “over 70% of pet parents go to Google or<br />\nsocial media to get answers to their pet issues before even attempting to talk to a veterinarian.</p>\n<p>I’ve been in those Facebook groups and I’ve seen the forums where the information that is given can<br />\nbe terrifying. With something as crucial as the health, happiness, and well-being of our pets, we<br />\ncan’t be relying on a Google search.”</p>\n<p>As a more reliable, accessible alternative, Airvet has big ambitions to become the go-to resource for immediate and trusted pet care.</p>\n<p>While we don’t know exactly what lasting effects COVID-19 will have on our world long term,<br />\none thing we do know is that virtual care is here to stay, and with Airvet &#8212; we can all sleep a little more soundly knowing that we can access real care from real veterinarians when we need it.</p>\n<p>The post <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/07/01/airvet-showered-by-investors-with-14m-in-series-a-funding-to-bring-virtual-care-to-every-pet-owner-in-the-country/\">Airvet Showered by Investors with $14M in Series A Funding to Bring Virtual Care to Every Pet Owner in the Country</a> appeared first on <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com\">ReadWrite</a>.</p>\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Wed, 01 Jul 2020 16:07:39 +0000","feedId":271,"bgimg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/Airvet-Showered-by-Investors.png","linkMd5":"f8a7d77be994dbdd8fec562e48bb90ca","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx21/cdn43@2020_3/2020/08/23/15-18-21-315_b28a75196d8001c5.webp","metaImg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/Airvet-Showered-by-Investors.png","destWidth":896,"destHeight":347,"sourceBytes":469621,"destBytes":31834,"author":"Brad Anderson","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/Airvet-Showered-by-Investors-300x116.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx13/cdn84@2020_6/2020/08/23/15-18-16-777_45ae16a0898dd2d3.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598195874441},{"createdTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:58","updatedTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:58","title":"accessiBe Gets $12 Million To Usher an Accessible Web with Ada Compliance","link":"https://readwrite.com/?p=171342","description":"<div><a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/05/13/accessibe/\" title=\"accessiBe Gets $12 Million To Usher an Accessible Web with Ada Compliance\"><img width=\"300\" height=\"205\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Accessibe-300x205.png\" class=\"attachment-medium size-medium wp-post-image\" alt=\"\" style=\"margin-bottom: 15px;\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Accessibe-300x205.png 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Accessibe-234x160.png 234w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Accessibe-182x125.png 182w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Accessibe.png 802w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px\" /></a></div><p>Web accessibility software <a href=\"https://accessibe.com/\">accessiBe</a> announced that it has received a $12 million investment from private equity firm <a href=\"https://k1capital.com/\">K1 Investment Management, LLC</a>. The funding is expected to fuel accesiBe’s expansion, widening its reach across North America and improving its support for its partners and customers.</p>\n<p>&#8220;What excites us most about our partnership with K1 is that now, with the amazing support of our investors, we can bring accessibility to the world. Our vision is to make the internet truly accessible to everyone. By utilizing machine learning, our solution can help millions of businesses comply with legislation and avoid lawsuits on the one hand, while enabling users with disabilities to browse the internet effectively on the other. It&#8217;s a win-win,” Shir Ekerling, cofounder and CEO of accessiBe, said.</p>\n<p><img class=\"aligncenter wp-image-171343 size-full\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/accessibe-team.png\" alt=\"accessibe team\" width=\"468\" height=\"312\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/accessibe-team.png 468w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/accessibe-team-300x200.png 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/accessibe-team-240x160.png 240w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 468px) 100vw, 468px\" /></p>\n<p>Web accessibility remains sorely lacking across the internet. In a survey of <a href=\"https://accessibe.com/blog/knowledgebase/we-analyzed-10000000-pages-and-heres-where-most-fail-with-ada-and-wcag-21-compliance\">more than 10 million webpages</a>, accessiBe found that only a small percentage was fully compliant with the provisions outlined in the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) which ensure that websites can be accessed by people with disabilities. The lack of wide-scale compliance means that most websites remain unusable by people with disabilities.</p>\n<p>Because of this, the disabled are now actively looking for ways to remedy their situation, including resorting to legal avenues to push sites and businesses to comply. Laws such as the United States’ American with Disabilities Act (ADA) are now being used as bases for lawsuits against noncompliant businesses. Recently, US courts <a href=\"http://cdn.ca9.uscourts.gov/datastore/opinions/2019/01/15/17-55504.pdf\">have affirmed</a> that websites and mobiles need to be compliant and that the law can be used against organizations that do not provide equal access to their services through these digital channels.</p>\n<p>To drive change, accessiBe uses artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning (ML) to help websites achieve compliance to the WCAG and ADA easily. Site owners and developers only need to integrate a single line of code into their websites, after which accessiBe’s AI would then perform a comprehensive audit of all web content and automatically perform the necessary changes to apply the standards.</p>\n<p>Conventional accessibility audits and remediation are lengthy and tedious to perform, usually requiring expert resources. Through accessiBe, what usually takes weeks or even months to accomplish can be done within 48 hours without any need for additional human resources.</p>\n<p>The solution also readily introduces features that support disabilities including visual, motor, and cognitive impairments. An accessibility panel is automatically integrated into the website, allowing users to change visual elements such as size, contrast, and color that would make it easier for visually impaired users to read the site. accessiBe also enables an option to disable animation and other flashing visuals which could trigger seizures in epileptic patients.</p>\n<p><img class=\"aligncenter wp-image-171344 size-full\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/accessibe-software.png\" alt=\"accessibe software\" width=\"468\" height=\"475\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/accessibe-software.png 468w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/accessibe-software-296x300.png 296w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/accessibe-software-158x160.png 158w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/accessibe-software-40x40.png 40w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/accessibe-software-60x60.png 60w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 468px) 100vw, 468px\" /></p>\n<p>Founded in 2018, accessiBe is already being used by websites ranging from high-traffic commercial websites to nonprofits. Development platforms and design agencies such Digital Ocean, BigCommerce, and Volusion also use accessiBe to introduce accessibility into their clients’ websites.</p>\n<p>The new investment puts accessiBe in a strong position to work on its mission of creating an accessible internet by 2025. Aside from capital, K1’s involvement also brings stewardship and guidance to accessiBe. K1’s portfolio includes a number of fast-growing technology companies such as Apttus, Gravyty, and Checkmarx.</p>\n<p>“K1 is excited to partner with Shir Ekerling and the accessiBe team as they continue their rapid global expansion,” said Mike Velcich, Principal at K1. “accessiBe has a highly differentiated product and unique approach to solving a critical need for all businesses with a web presence. The company helps its customers create a digital presence that is accessible to all visitors and potential customers.”</p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<p>The post <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/05/13/accessibe/\">accessiBe Gets $12 Million To Usher an Accessible Web with Ada Compliance</a> appeared first on <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com\">ReadWrite</a>.</p>\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Wed, 13 May 2020 14:11:49 +0000","feedId":271,"bgimg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Accessibe.png","linkMd5":"873f5eaf2258884716f2ca289c29fdf6","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx21/cdn19@2020_2/2020/08/23/15-18-19-456_a74a4ce302d76e4d.webp","metaImg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Accessibe.png","destWidth":802,"destHeight":549,"sourceBytes":631398,"destBytes":48352,"author":"Brad Anderson","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Accessibe-300x205.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx30/cdn63@2020_4/2020/08/23/15-18-16-658_03720e23b2c49b43.webp","https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/accessibe-team.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx16/cdn67@2020_5/2020/08/23/15-18-16-794_a0be48fc1e221b15.webp","https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/accessibe-software.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx25/cdn80@2020_6/2020/08/23/15-18-12-974_0762869081dfead7.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598195878570},{"createdTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:55","updatedTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:55","title":"What Will Telemedicine Look Like in 2030?","link":"https://readwrite.com/?p=172794","description":"<div><a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/06/18/what-will-telemedicine-look-like-in-2030/\" title=\"What Will Telemedicine Look Like in 2030?\"><img width=\"300\" height=\"148\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/Screen-Shot-2020-06-12-at-10.57.22-AM-300x148.png\" class=\"attachment-medium size-medium wp-post-image\" alt=\"\" style=\"margin-bottom: 15px;\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/Screen-Shot-2020-06-12-at-10.57.22-AM-300x148.png 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/Screen-Shot-2020-06-12-at-10.57.22-AM-900x444.png 900w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/Screen-Shot-2020-06-12-at-10.57.22-AM-260x128.png 260w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/Screen-Shot-2020-06-12-at-10.57.22-AM.png 1149w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px\" /></a></div><p>The <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/06/06/the-impacts-of-covid-19-on-sustainability-and-technology/\">COVID-19 crisis</a> put telemedicine in the spotlight faster than ever thought possible. Patients are staying home, meaning nurses and doctors are using technology to administer care from a distance. </p>\n<p>The telehealth platforms currently in use may be a bit rudimentary. The coming years, however, are poised to shake up the industry in a major way. By 2030, telehealth will have completely transformed, becoming a defining aspect of the medical industry. But what will it look like? </p>\n<p>Things are uncertain, but a few aspects of telehealth are guaranteed to rise to prominence.</p>\n<h3><b>1. Greater access to products</b></h3>\n<p>A few years ago, the greatest factor in deciding which medicines you acquired was what your local pharmacy had in stock. Amid the industry&#8217;s digital transformation, companies are looking to the web to get people the medications they need.</p>\n<p>While general-use digital pharmacies aren&#8217;t yet the norm, niche providers are prospering. Leading the pack is <a href=\"https://www.innerbody.com/home-health/nurx-reviews\">Nurx</a>, an entirely online provider of birth control. Bolstered by its digital format, Nurx offers more than 100 different types and brands of birth control. That ensures that patients have access to the medication that&#8217;s right for them. The future of medicine is about patient choice, and telehealth gives patients more choices than ever.</p>\n<h3><b>2. Increased diagnosis accuracy </b></h3>\n<p>It may sound counterintuitive: How can diagnosis accuracy increase if patients aren’t in the office? All the same, it’s a reality of telehealth. While many technologies aren&#8217;t at peak performance, the coming years will see large-scale deployment of a number of programs to make diagnosis outside the office easy.</p>\n<p>Research published in The Lancet showed that artificial intelligence was <a href=\"https://www.medicalnewstoday.com/articles/326460#AI-on-a-par-with-healthcare-professionals\">just as good</a> at diagnosing patients as human doctors were — in some cases, even better. As platforms that track and record symptoms grow in sophistication and popularity, remote diagnostics will become increasingly common. Better diagnosis will allow for more specialized treatment, reduced in-person visits, and higher-quality care. </p>\n<h3><b>3. A focus on cost reduction</b></h3>\n<p>In 1960, the annual cost of healthcare for the average American was $160 — nothing compared to the nearly <a href=\"https://www.thebalance.com/causes-of-rising-healthcare-costs-4064878\">$11,000</a> it costs today. As medical expenses continue to outpace wage increases, people need ways to keep their costs as low as possible without sacrificing their well-being. </p>\n<p>Telehealth platform eVisit reports that hospitals using their service can reduce admission numbers by <a href=\"https://blog.evisit.com/research-review-does-telehealth-really-save-on-costs\">19 percent</a> and bed usage by 25 percent. These reductions could save huge sums for hospitals; doctors’ offices stand to benefit even more. From handling an increased volume of patients to lowering overhead, telehealth can completely alter a doctor’s operating costs. </p>\n<h3><b>4. More specialist availability</b></h3>\n<p>Specialists form a crucial part of any healthcare system, providing care other doctors may be incapable of performing. Specialists, relatively small in number, book themselves months in advance. They may also be prohibitively far away from patients seeking their expertise, a dangerous combination for those in need.</p>\n<p>Telehealth frees up doctors&#8217; schedules by allowing them to see more on any given day. Distance is no factor when it comes to telehealth — specialists can meet with patients anywhere in the world. With the average appointment wait time at nearly <a href=\"http://trapollo.com/can-telehealth-overcome-physician-shortage/\">a month</a> in length, telehealth platforms are needed now more than ever.</p>\n<h3><b>5. The rise of wearables</b></h3>\n<p>Wearable health devices are already a multibillion-dollar industry. Integration with telehealth will send the industry’s growth to new heights entirely. Connective healthcare company VivaLNK found that <a href=\"https://www.fiercehealthcare.com/tech/patients-will-use-health-wearables-to-reduce-trips-to-doctor-survey\">nearly two-thirds</a> of people would buy and use a wearable device if it meant fewer trips to the doctor. </p>\n<p>Even now, wearables can detect unusual heart activity and other medical anomalies, but progressions in the technology mean they&#8217;ll be able to detect even more in the coming years. That will give those who want to stay out of the doctor’s office relief while staying healthy.</p>\n<p>Just a few years ago, the idea of getting proper medical care without leaving your couch would have seemed preposterous. It’s the reality for many using telehealth today. The future of the industry isn’t entirely certain, but one thing is: Doctors <em>will</em> be making house calls again.</p>\n<p>The post <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/06/18/what-will-telemedicine-look-like-in-2030/\">What Will Telemedicine Look Like in 2030?</a> appeared first on <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com\">ReadWrite</a>.</p>\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Thu, 18 Jun 2020 14:01:00 +0000","feedId":271,"bgimg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/Screen-Shot-2020-06-12-at-10.57.22-AM.png","linkMd5":"bae7aa6cd9ecfd2c886ce888ce38daa2","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx24/cdn16@2020_4/2020/08/23/15-18-24-809_7a5a798aace405ca.webp","metaImg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/Screen-Shot-2020-06-12-at-10.57.22-AM.png","destWidth":1149,"destHeight":567,"sourceBytes":585542,"destBytes":30574,"author":"Brad Anderson","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/Screen-Shot-2020-06-12-at-10.57.22-AM-300x148.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx19/cdn67@2020_6/2020/08/23/15-18-18-844_ae2762cf7e094f94.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598195875139},{"createdTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:57","updatedTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:57","title":"6 Reasons You Should Start Buying Your Glasses Online","link":"https://readwrite.com/?p=171101","description":"<div><a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/05/20/6-reasons-you-should-start-buying-your-glasses-online/\" title=\"6 Reasons You Should Start Buying Your Glasses Online\"><img width=\"300\" height=\"218\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/6-Reasons-You-Should-Start-Buying-Your-Glasses-Online-300x218.png\" class=\"attachment-medium size-medium wp-post-image\" alt=\"buy glasses online\" style=\"margin-bottom: 15px;\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/6-Reasons-You-Should-Start-Buying-Your-Glasses-Online-300x218.png 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/6-Reasons-You-Should-Start-Buying-Your-Glasses-Online-220x160.png 220w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/6-Reasons-You-Should-Start-Buying-Your-Glasses-Online.png 723w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px\" /></a></div><p class=\"p1\"><span class=\"s1\">In these unprecedented times, &#8220;shopping online from home&#8221; takes on an obligatory meaning. However, purchasing stuff online in general, and shopping for glasses online specifically has been on the rise for quite some time. The benefits of shopping for your next pair of glasses from the comfort of your home are just too good to ignore. </span></p>\n<h4><b></b><span class=\"s1\"><b>1. Easy, Convenient Shopping From Home<br />\n</b></span></h4>\n<p class=\"p1\"><span class=\"s1\">The main thing about getting your glasses online: It<span class=\"s2\">’<span class=\"s1\">s super easy and comfortable. </span></span></span></p>\n<p class=\"p1\"><span class=\"s1\">All you have to do is go on the site, pick out a frame of <a href=\"https://www.glassesusa.com/eyeglasses-collection?affid=readwrite-lp1944&#38;utm_source=publisher&#38;utm_medium=readwrite&#38;utm_campaign=052020\"><span class=\"s3\">eyeglasses</span></a> or <a href=\"https://www.glassesusa.com/sunglasses?affid=readwrite-lp1944&#38;utm_source=publisher&#38;utm_medium=readwrite&#38;utm_campaign=052020\"><span class=\"s3\">sunglasses</span></a>, enter your prescription (if you need one), and that<span class=\"s2\">’<span class=\"s1\">s pretty much it, all without getting up from the couch. The order is shipped right to your door, without the need to fight through traffic and overcrowded stores. </span></span></span></p>\n<p class=\"p1\"><span class=\"s1\">If you head to the same brick-and-mortar stores &#8212; you&#8217;ll deal with opening and closing times. Your online shopping experience is never closed.
