Singh","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/How-to-Fix-your-Headphones-Yourself-300x185.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx16/cdn39@2020_1/2020/08/23/15-18-09-845_6116e40bc25ef744.webp","https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/Capture.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx30/cdn15@2020_1/2020/08/23/15-18-12-418_deaab5c8ded63a80.webp","https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/Capture1.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx22/cdn96@2020_2/2020/08/23/15-18-16-223_b1fae930ede08b37.webp","https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/Capture2.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn47@2020_4/2020/08/23/15-18-15-838_336752119d826fef.webp","https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/Capture3.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn35@2020_4/2020/08/23/15-18-14-951_fbca77d6ecaf0dd5.webp","https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/Capture4.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx31/cdn7@2020_2/2020/08/23/15-18-11-147_928d36adeb8bbb7f.webp","https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/Capture5.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx23/cdn30@2020_3/2020/08/23/15-18-09-638_0f317a9c60223a47.webp","https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/Capture6.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx8/cdn76@2020_3/2020/08/23/15-18-12-126_7a647db24d95bc3d.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598195878823},{"createdTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:52","updatedTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:52","title":"How Prepared is Your Business to Face Botnet Threats?","link":"https://readwrite.com/?p=172318","description":"<div><a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/07/19/how-prepared-is-your-business-to-face-botnet-threats/\" title=\"How Prepared is Your Business to Face Botnet Threats?\"><img width=\"300\" height=\"200\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/How-Prepared-is-Your-Business-to-Face-Botnet-Threats.jpg\" class=\"attachment-medium size-medium wp-post-image\" alt=\"face botnet threats\" style=\"margin-bottom: 15px;\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/How-Prepared-is-Your-Business-to-Face-Botnet-Threats.jpg 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/How-Prepared-is-Your-Business-to-Face-Botnet-Threats-240x160.jpg 240w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px\" /></a></div><p>Businesses have faced a rock slide due to the factor called “botnets.” Botnets professionals ought to know or at least have an idea of what these (Botnets) are.</p>\n<p>Botnets have the ability to deploy malware, which aids in gaining unauthorized entry to the computer or device. We all know this, I know, but do you know that if you <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2018/09/26/byod-is-more-than-a-trend-heres-how-to-encourage-it-while-still-keeping-your-network-safe/\">expect survival of your business</a>, the steps you are probably applying might not be sufficient enough to save your device?.</p>\n<p>As all businesses are linked to the internet one way or another, that is through trading actions, websites, and so, your devices are exposed to the chances of a DDoS attack. A business encountering the threats of a botnet as inevitable. Most of us take some measures, but what if these steps were not as effective as we thought.</p>\n<p><strong>Why are attacks seen as a threat to a business? </strong></p>\n<p>Botnets are controlled by the herder &#8212; the herder is the one responsible for gathering all the corrupted bots and making an army that he uses to attach the device.</p>\n<p>We know the botnet are <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/07/08/time-to-build-robots-for-humans-not-to-replace/\">robotic networks</a> used by <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/07/12/10-practical-strategies-to-secure-your-digital-life/\">cybercriminals</a> to commit crimes.<strong> </strong>The bot herder who is the one who controls the bots uses his army of corrupted bots to cause a disruption on the internet; he makes the bots overload a website, which in turn brings about a denial of entry into the website this is also called a DDOS attack.</p>\n<p>When this is done, it gives the herder the opening to do as he pleases. It also disrupts the functioning of a device and making it obey the commands of the hacker or herder if the &#8220;bots,&#8221; they can be used to defraud advertisers using fake ads which is also a route through which the botnets gain access to the computer system or device, so with one click of the fake advert on the internet the botnets gain entry of the device.<strong> </strong></p>\n<h2>Memorable attacks</h2>\n<p>The botnets have recorded some <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/01/23/how-iot-has-exposed-business-organizations-to-cyber-attacks/\">level of very memorable attacks.</a> Businesses that have been affected by botnets are Twitter and Amazon from history in October 2016.</p>\n<p>On that Friday attackers controlling a vast collection of internet devices unleashed several massive attacks on Friday that left dozens of popular websites, including Twitter Inc. and Netflix Inc., unreachable for parts of the day on that was one notable event amongst many others.</p>\n<p>The attack denied many users from gaining access to websites and also affected the owners of such websites.</p>\n<p>Businesses since the invention of botnets have faced security challenges in their operation, tendencies of being defrauded off a large sum of money, identity falsified, hacked websites, fake ads on the internet. Since this is seen as a bane of businesses, it ought to be eradicated or managed in the way that it is not able to carry out its damage.</p>\n<p>Some businesses agree that the best way to deal with &#8220;botnets&#8221; are the <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/04/22/unlocking-the-promise-of-enterprise-iot/\">precautionary steps</a>, whereby they try to avoid them from entry, but this is just like a war being fought from the outside leaving the insides unguarded if the enemies gain entry through a spot you missed they wreak havoc because within was not guarded.</p>\n<p>The precaution comes in the way whereby they are on the lookout trying to avoid entry of botnets. Although this is not a bad step, the truth is one cannot really be too careful; one way or the other, it finds its way in and gets the people or the device unprepared and could wreck its damage and bring loss for a while to such business.</p>\n<p>However, if one were to take predictive measures where they already have planned the action to take when it shows and how to deal with it, this would yield more results, precaution measures are measures that prepare the device for when the botnets attack. As stated before, precaution measures are not said to be wrong, but a more assured way is the predictive measure, which prepares the organization ahead of encountering it.</p>\n<p>So what are the steps that you are not really paying attention to? Make sure it&#8217;s a tradition upgrading your operating system. One fascinating thing about botnets is that they also upgrade themselves towards surviving your preventive measures, so an outdated operating system would soon enough outlive its immunity over the botnets’ attempt for entry.</p>\n<p>So for the fact that one could fall short in updating the OS due to forgetting or so on, you can set it on automatically updating. There you are not just safe, but you are also assured of future safety.</p>\n<p>It is important that you also know that downloading files from the internet also has a large probability of botnet attack. Botnets, usually in files and sharing services and when you end up connecting, they are given access to get into your device.</p>\n<h4>Before you download any file or receive any file, make sure it is well scanned or just look for more protected file-sharing networks.</h4>\n<p>Also, if you wanted to keep botnets out, you would avoid clicking on links that you are not totally sure of. Just as mentioned earlier, botnets hide in areas like ads waiting for that click, and with it, they gain entry.</p>\n<p>Such dangerous links that contain viruses live in places like YouTube comments, pop up ads. So you would examine the link and check its authenticity before clicking.</p>\n<p>Also, <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2007/12/11/report_spam_accounts_for_90-95_percent/\">you should avoid emails from unknown sources</a>. This also is a route through which botnets gain entry. The botnets could also be tricky and hide behind a known contact, so you should examine your emails closely in essence, scrutinize it, and make sure you are sure of its source before opening.</p>\n<p>One also ought to consider that it is vital to educate your personnel well, most are not well educated on the matter of cybersecurity, and that could be a deterring factor. Do not also give access to your computers or device to about just anyone, very important is the part that only well trained and trusted admins should manage your computer.</p>\n<p>Lastly, for solutions, you would be doing yourself a lot of harm if you operated without <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2018/10/18/five-best-open-source-antivirus-for-carefree-cyber-threat-protection/\">antivirus software,</a> am sure a lot know this. Antivirus comes in different types<strong>. </strong></p>\n<p>Also, primal is that you know that it is the most efficient way to remove botnets. Look for an antivirus capable of safeguarding your devices, which includes your phones, PC’s, and so on. Also, some of them (Antivirus) require upgrades, so try to make sure that they are upgraded.</p>\n<p>Concluding, we cannot totally be sure we are covered from botnets &#8212; they upgrade. Sometimes it takes time to get used to the various applications to keep them out, and soon enough they surpass the protective measure adopted, which is why upgrading your Operating system was mentioned. Also &#8212; check out the botnet safety service really well. The fake ones are out in force right now with the COVID stuff.</p>\n<p>A simple upgrade helps keep the device prepared for its attack. As mentioned before, we can’t be too safe, but an organization is adopting these steps and following it diligently is ensured a high degree of safety from botnets.</p>\n<p>The post <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/07/19/how-prepared-is-your-business-to-face-botnet-threats/\">How Prepared is Your Business to Face Botnet Threats?</a> appeared first on <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com\">ReadWrite</a>.</p>\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Sun, 19 Jul 2020 18:01:03 +0000","feedId":271,"bgimg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/How-Prepared-is-Your-Business-to-Face-Botnet-Threats.jpg","linkMd5":"431b41df95c551cbf98987e3f2029621","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx12/cdn46@2020_3/2020/08/23/15-18-07-746_17959b15f80a18e7.webp","metaImg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/How-Prepared-is-Your-Business-to-Face-Botnet-Threats.jpg","destWidth":300,"destHeight":200,"sourceBytes":3841,"destBytes":2446,"author":"Adedeji Adewale","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/How-Prepared-is-Your-Business-to-Face-Botnet-Threats.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx12/cdn46@2020_3/2020/08/23/15-18-07-746_17959b15f80a18e7.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598195872064},{"createdTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:57","updatedTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:57","title":"Ditch Batteries, Save the Planet with Smart Systems","link":"https://readwrite.com/?p=169372","description":"<div><a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/05/25/ditch-batteries-save-the-planet-with-smart-systems/\" title=\"Ditch Batteries, Save the Planet with Smart Systems\"><img width=\"300\" height=\"188\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/Ditch-Batteries-Save-the-Planet-with-Smart-Systems-300x188.jpg\" class=\"attachment-medium size-medium wp-post-image\" alt=\"smart home wireless power\" style=\"margin-bottom: 15px;\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/Ditch-Batteries-Save-the-Planet-with-Smart-Systems-300x188.jpg 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/Ditch-Batteries-Save-the-Planet-with-Smart-Systems-900x565.jpg 900w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/Ditch-Batteries-Save-the-Planet-with-Smart-Systems-255x160.jpg 255w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/Ditch-Batteries-Save-the-Planet-with-Smart-Systems-1536x965.jpg 1536w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/Ditch-Batteries-Save-the-Planet-with-Smart-Systems.jpg 1920w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px\" /></a></div><p>Technology is booming in the home. <em>Technology Convergence and the Smart Home</em> recently reported that US broadband households now own more than ten connected devices. A shortlist of the home connected devices include <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/01/17/gate-all-in-one-video-smart-lock-a-new-level-of-home-security/\">connected consumer electronics</a>, connected health devices, smart locks, thermostats, security cameras, sprinkling systems, and more. But long-range wireless power promises less waste and lower cost with <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/01/25/8-ways-to-keep-your-home-safe-and-secure-from-burglars/\">these smart home systems</a>.</p>\n<p>Interoperability and connectivity are two key deciding factors in purchase decisions. As the number of devices increases in the home, so does the need to keep them consistently charged and working (no one wants the smart lock on their front door to lose power).</p>\n<p>For those smart home devices that still call for the use of traditional batteries, consumers are faced with both an enormous amount of battery waste and high replacement costs. Also, because batteries only have a small total energy capacity, manufacturers are forced to sacrifice device functionality just to extend battery life.</p>\n<h3><strong>Taking <em>Charge </em>Without the Waste </strong></h3>\n<p>The proliferation of devices is driving the need for a sea-change in<em> how</em> those devices are powered. Batteries are expensive, wasteful, and often die quickly, leaving our smart home devices unusable, sometimes for days.</p>\n<p>Annually, Americans discard approximately 180,000 tons of batteries (more than three <em>billion</em> batteries), of which 86,000 tons are single-use alkaline batteries that cannot be recycled.</p>\n<p>Placed end to end, the dead alkaline batteries alone would circle the world at least six times. Much of this waste ends up in landfills, not only taking up precious land but also allowing harmful chemicals to leach into the surrounding soil and waterways.</p>\n<p>Despite advances in battery and charging technologies – like longer-lasting lithium-ion rechargeable batteries &#8212; a new Zogby report talks of, &#8220;Charging America 2019.&#8221; The Current State of <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/02/21/coway-airmega-ap-1512hhs-smart-air-purifier-and-clean-design/\">Power Options for Smart Home</a> and Mobile Device<em>s, </em>found that 40 percent of consumers have to replace smart home device batteries multiple times per month.</p>\n<h3><strong>A New Path – Long-Range Wireless Power </strong></h3>\n<p>Not only do we need a more sustainable energy delivery approach for the benefit of our planet, but consumers are also hungry for alternative energy options. They want possibilities that will give them more excellent reliability and reduce their costs associated with having to purchase a plethora of batteries continually.</p>\n<p>25 percent of consumers that are investing in smart home technology said that they would spend an additional 10 percent or more for a smart home device with long-range wireless power if that meant making the device more mobile, easier to install and less of a hassle to service on a reoccurring basis.</p>\n<h4>Long-range wireless power is the disruptive technology that is cutting the cord.</h4>\n<p>Long-range wireless power is the disruptive technology that is cutting the cord on a soon to be an archaic system of powering devices, especially in the smart home.</p>\n<p>The process? A wireless power transmitter sends safe infrared beams to a receiver (typically embedded in the devices to be powered), and a small photovoltaic cell in the receiver converts the light to electricity. The concept is similar to solar panels converting sunlight into electricity.</p>\n<p>Infrared beams can travel with little degradation over a distance, efficiently and safely providing wireless power across a room. The infrared process dramatically reducing the need for batteries, and thus decreasing the <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/05/13/3-ways-the-iot-can-offer-innovative-solutions-to-serious-environmental-problems/\">environmental footprint</a> caused by battery waste.</p>\n<h4>The infrared method of charging frees up manufacturers to create the smart home devices that consumers desire, free of the power limitations imposed by batteries.</h4>\n<p>Long-range wireless charging will turn the tide on battery waste with a more sustainable way to charge not only smart home devices, but mobile phones, tablets, wireless speakers, and industrial sensors.</p>\n<p>Long-range wireless eliminates the need for batteries and power cords altogether. It’s a win-win for consumers, manufacturers, and most importantly, our planet.</p>\n<p>The time is now for this disruptive tech to enter the entire industry. The long-range technology will innovate and prepare for a new way of charging the <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/05/17/from-smart-home-to-aware-home/\">growing prominence of smart devices</a> in our daily lives.</p>\n<p>Just like WiFi-enabled a new class of products &#8212; long-range wireless charging can usher in the next generation of powered, eco-friendly smart devices.</p>\n<p><em>Image Credit: Hilary Halliwell; Pexels</em></p>\n<p>The post <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/05/25/ditch-batteries-save-the-planet-with-smart-systems/\">Ditch Batteries, Save the Planet with Smart Systems</a> appeared first on <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com\">ReadWrite</a>.</p>\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Mon, 25 May 2020 18:00:09 +0000","feedId":271,"bgimg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/Ditch-Batteries-Save-the-Planet-with-Smart-Systems.jpg","linkMd5":"ed1fffb5b8aa21461268808efd3d361c","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx25/cdn84@2020_6/2020/08/23/15-18-20-756_f89c3a5375526358.webp","metaImg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/Ditch-Batteries-Save-the-Planet-with-Smart-Systems.jpg","destWidth":1920,"destHeight":1206,"sourceBytes":217246,"destBytes":145348,"author":"Yuval Boger","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/Ditch-Batteries-Save-the-Planet-with-Smart-Systems-300x188.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx7/cdn100@2020_5/2020/08/23/15-18-09-595_ad5878b1f572633c.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598195877213},{"createdTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:57","updatedTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:57","title":"5 Advantages Artificial Intelligence can Give Your SME","link":"https://readwrite.com/?p=169252","description":"<div><a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/05/24/5-advantages-artificial-intelligence-can-give-your-sme/\" title=\"5 Advantages Artificial Intelligence can Give Your SME\"><img width=\"300\" height=\"200\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/5-Advantages-Artificial-Intelligence-can-Give-Your-SME-300x200.jpg\" class=\"attachment-medium size-medium wp-post-image\" alt=\"AI for SMEs\" style=\"margin-bottom: 15px;\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/5-Advantages-Artificial-Intelligence-can-Give-Your-SME-300x200.jpg 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/5-Advantages-Artificial-Intelligence-can-Give-Your-SME-900x600.jpg 900w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/5-Advantages-Artificial-Intelligence-can-Give-Your-SME-240x160.jpg 240w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/5-Advantages-Artificial-Intelligence-can-Give-Your-SME-1536x1024.jpg 1536w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/5-Advantages-Artificial-Intelligence-can-Give-Your-SME.jpg 1920w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px\" /></a></div><p>How fast do trends in the market advance? Specifically with regards to artificial intelligence. Businesses are taking advantage of artificial intelligence as a breakneck pace. According to a BI Intelligence report, 80% of companies will use AI <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/05/21/prodigious-customer-service-live-chat-vs-chatbots/\">chatbots</a> by 2020. Here are five advantages artificial intelligence can give your SMEs.</p>\n<h2><strong>Artificial Intelligence is </strong><strong>a trend that makes sense.</strong></h2>\n<p>Some SMEs fear that AI is an unattainable technology and difficult to apply. Conversely, business intelligence will help SMEs save a lot of time and money.</p>\n<p>But what is artificial intelligence, and how does it relate to business? What are the advantages that artificial intelligence can give your SME?</p>\n<h3><b>Artificial intelligence and business.</b></h3>\n<p>The term artificial intelligence can be used on all tasks that solve human intelligence foibles, and they are solved, quickly, by machines. Tasks such as planning or learning languages, for example, or recognizing objects in photos, people&#8217;s voices, and feelings, can be done by AI.</p>\n<p>And the truth is that artificial intelligence has a lot of potential. It is hoped that it can help solve very diverse problems ( prevent natural catastrophes, for example), but also that it will generate many other solutions.</p>\n<p><a href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Elon_Musk\">Elon Musk</a> is a strong promoter of AI regulation. Musk believes that if AI is not regulated &#8212; it can be perilous. A recent example of this could be the GPT-2 text generator, capable of generating fake news that is too credible. Its creators (OpenIA, powered precisely by Musk) saw this generator as a threat more than anything else and decided to censor the full version — fearing the consequences. Thus, artificial intelligence has advantages and disadvantages.</p>\n<h4>Tasks machines solve</h4>\n<p>Some examples of artificial intelligence we can find in our daily life: so, when we open Facebook and see the content that appears in the &#8220;News&#8221; tab, there is a selection in what is shown to each user, and an algorithm makes that <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/10/10/is-artificial-intelligence-the-ultimate-university-stimulus/\">selection with artificial intelligence</a>. The same as when Amazon recommends a product or book. Or surely you have seen some content that Netflix suggests to you because you saw another similar one. These examples are from the machines in the form of AI software.</p>\n<p>Other examples are easier to see. Emotech&#8217;s assistant, Olly, is very similar to Amazon&#8217;s Alexa or Google Home, but has a fundamental difference: her personality can evolve &#8212; this is AI.</p>\n<p>We see that artificial intelligence is linked to business, and companies are taking advantage of artificial intelligence to do their tasks faster and at a lower cost.</p>\n<p>AI is one of the most disruptive technologies of the century, and it is helping SMEs to evolve faster, especially in the field of communications, product development, and customer service.</p>\n<p><b>Ways AI can help your business.</b></p>\n<p>The results of a Vistage survey of SME leaders make clear that the benefits of artificial intelligence are becoming very important to the business. 29.5% of those surveyed stated that, of all the new technologies, artificial intelligence is the one that will have the most significant impact on their companies.</p>\n<p>So what are the benefits that <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/10/24/10-radical-ways-iot-will-revamp-your-seo-strategy-in-2020/\">SMEs can get from using artificial intelligence</a>? The AI advantages are capable of reducing costs, optimizing the use of time, and achieving an increase in results:</p>\n<ol>\n<li>\n<h4><b> Optimize Human Resources tasks.</b></h4>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<p>One of the areas in which artificial intelligence is advancing is Human Resources. Today, it is possible to take advantage of artificial intelligence to improve personnel selection processes, as well as to receive returns from new employees on the same method (and optimize it).</p>\n<p>Among the advantages of using AI in this type of process can be the fact that it can help your company choose between lots of applicants to see precisely which ones match the search criteria. Matching the search criteria not only reduces time and costs but also enhances applicants&#8217; quality and suitability, which, in turn, saves HR time they can spend on other tasks.</p>\n<ol start=\"2\">\n<li>\n<h4><b> Automate conversations with customers.</b></h4>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<p>A chatbot with artificial intelligence is another of <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/02/24/how-ai-at-the-edge-other-iot-trends-are-transforming-every-industry/\">the most common examples in business</a> intelligence. The acquisition of chatbots by companies is, as we saw above, increasingly common and necessary for SMEs, regardless of their size.</p>\n<p>One of the most important trends in digital marketing is conversational marketing, which proposes a return to conversations and the human factor in sales.</p>\n<p>And that&#8217;s where chatbots have a lot to contribute: they can become a 24/7 customer service, and above all, capable of generating conversations. Potential clients don&#8217;t want to go through the experience of filling out long forms and then have to wait for an answer: they need immediate attention and human warmth.</p>\n<p>Many of the SMEs do not have sales teams or customer service. If this is your case, then you could find in chatbots a way to relieve the pressure of generating and maintaining lots of conversations at the same time.</p>\n<p>And if you have a sales team, using a chatbot can be a great idea. Not only does it ease the operational burden, but it helps them focus on what they really need to do: sell.</p>\n<ol start=\"3\">\n<li>\n<h4><b> Make content marketing more accurate.</b></h4>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<p>As we can see, one of the <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/12/24/3-ways-tech-startups-are-using-ai-to-revolutionize-customer-experience/\">advantages of artificial intelligence</a> is that it is helping marketing to oil their strategies &#8211; refining them, making them more effective. And one of those strategies is content marketing.</p>\n<p>Nowadays, good content is not just about composition and writing: it is also about making data-driven content. It is essential to create content from the data collected about audiences, to give them personalized content that resonates and is useful to them.</p>\n<p>In this sense, there are already artificial intelligence tools capable of helping marketing teams to make specific content. For example, there are different types of software to create algorithms that detect what content can generate interest, based on previous readings by audiences. What&#8217;s more, some algorithms can predict the content to determine its potential to generate conversions.</p>\n<ol start=\"4\">\n<li>\n<h4><b> Increase sales with CRM.</b></h4>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<p>CRM (English customer relationship manager ) are systems designed to optimize the relationship with customers. In general, these systems collect data through different platforms (mail, social networks, telephone) and streamline sales processes using the knowledge they obtain with this information.</p>\n<p>Some CRM platforms are already using AI to help SMBs analyze this collected data. In this way, they can propose lead generation activities based on information analysis, and as a result, they can speed up the process of acquiring new customers — and ultimately, sales.</p>\n<ol start=\"5\">\n<li>\n<h4><b> Boosting SEO.</b></h4>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<p>In the Google search engine, there are 67,000 searches per second. An impressive number, I must emphasize.</p>\n<p>Searching is one of the most important sources of income for the giant Google, which is determined to improve it more and more. His <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/03/10/is-ai-just-as-biased-as-the-humans-creating-it/\">artificial intelligence assistant</a>, Duplex, uses neural networks to understand and generate natural language. Its Lens program enables image searches. There is constant work at <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/09/10/4-ways-to-optimize-your-site-to-rank-on-google-in-2019/\">Google to understand what users are looking for</a> and how to give them better answers.</p>\n<p>Consequently, companies will have to pay attention to these changes to satisfy the requirements of the Google search engine. And in this field, artificial intelligence again shows its advantages, combined with SEO.</p>\n<p>Some of the <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/01/27/how-will-ai-change-the-future-of-seo/\">AI and SEO-focused programs</a> can help analyze and automate site rankings.</p>\n<p>For analytics, examining essential metrics of the operation of the site, analyzing the competition and positioning, or optimizing the site to attract more potential customers.</p>\n<p>Regarding automation, many of the SEO tasks are well known but difficult to execute, and this is where AI software oriented to SEO can come into play—automating the search for keywords, the use of links, the blogging, all tasks that take a considerable amount of runtime — an effort that can be saved with the use of AI.</p>\n<h3><b>Towards effective AI execution</b></h3>\n<p>AI is not so far from the solutions that an SME requires in its day today. By contrast, the AI implemented in those solutions is not something esoteric or utopian, and there are AI tools that can help solve business problems.</p>\n<p>Remember that the chatbot has some functions that allow effective and accessible use of AI.</p>\n<p>The conversation analysis function is one of them. The feature applies AI to the conversations companies have with their customers. Through text mining, artificial intelligence helps uncover the phrases that dominate those conversations, thereby telling companies what their customers are asking the most.</p>\n<p>AI classifies that information into unigrams (one sentence) and bigrams (two sentences), which precisely detail the topics of the conversations. With this information in hand, companies benefit in various ways:</p>\n<ul>\n<li style=\"font-weight: 400;\">They have reliable information on what are the topics of the conversations it is generating.</li>\n<li style=\"font-weight: 400;\">They can use that information to make an effective landing page.</li>\n<li style=\"font-weight: 400;\">They can configure Google Ads campaigns based on the specific demand of potential customers.</li>\n</ul>\n<p>On the other hand, there is a suggested answer function. If the previous function was used to determine what the topics of conversation were (what is most asked by users), the automatic response function suggests answers based on the recognition of the bigrams. AI works from what your clients ask to give suggested answers and thus shorten the cycles of the dialogues.</p>\n<h4>Conclusion</h4>\n<p>AI can optimize your company&#8217;s daily work. It is not something far from the reality of your SME, but it is a tool that can make significant contributions.</p>\n<p>If we dwell a little more on the example of the conversations, we can think of it this way: if you have around 100 thousand chats and you see what they ask you the most, you will probably miss a few days of work on it.</p>\n<p>An AI trained for this task can do all of this for you, saving time in the process, as well as resources that you can allocate to what you do best.</p>\n<p><em>Image Credit: LJ; Pexels</em></p>\n<p>The post <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/05/24/5-advantages-artificial-intelligence-can-give-your-sme/\">5 Advantages Artificial Intelligence can Give Your SME</a> appeared first on <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com\">ReadWrite</a>.</p>\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Sun, 24 May 2020 15:00:01 +0000","feedId":271,"bgimg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/5-Advantages-Artificial-Intelligence-can-Give-Your-SME.jpg","linkMd5":"8836f2000f21427839e1297c91363977","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx24/cdn72@2020_5/2020/08/23/15-18-22-324_c031b1f5772d7603.webp","metaImg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/5-Advantages-Artificial-Intelligence-can-Give-Your-SME.jpg","destWidth":1920,"destHeight":1280,"sourceBytes":151425,"destBytes":99780,"author":"Nabeel Ahmad","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/5-Advantages-Artificial-Intelligence-can-Give-Your-SME-300x200.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx14/cdn95@2020_6/2020/08/23/15-18-19-943_9ce7cb05ca1b867c.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598195877307},{"createdTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:59","updatedTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:59","title":"5 Signs that You are Ready to Scale Business and Deploy Innovation","link":"https://readwrite.com/?p=167090","description":"<div><a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/04/07/5-signs-that-you-are-ready-to-scale-business-and-deploy-innovation/\" title=\"5 Signs that You are Ready to Scale Business and Deploy Innovation\"><img width=\"300\" height=\"185\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/5-Signs-that-You-are-Ready-to-Scale-Business--300x185.jpeg\" class=\"attachment-medium size-medium wp-post-image\" alt=\"scale business\" style=\"margin-bottom: 15px;\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/5-Signs-that-You-are-Ready-to-Scale-Business--300x185.jpeg 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/5-Signs-that-You-are-Ready-to-Scale-Business--260x160.jpeg 260w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/5-Signs-that-You-are-Ready-to-Scale-Business-.jpeg 825w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px\" /></a></div><p>The entrepreneur&#8217;s path is challenging and exciting. It requires your full commitment and a sincere desire to scale business as you evolve too. It is a continuous process of stepping beyond your own limits and bringing innovation for the world to see.</p>\n<p>The moment when you start feeling your limits often means that you are close to your individual breakthrough and business growth. Business scaling begins with scaling yourself. The more inner obstacles you are overcoming, the more likely your idea will blossom in <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/03/04/top-15-growth-marketing-speakers/\">something genuinely innovative</a>. It is one of the <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/02/13/startup-essentials-stop-overcomplicating-your-processes/\">startup essentials</a>.</p>\n<p>The biggest challenge is to define the right moment for taking action leading to efficient business scaling, <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/01/21/the-biggest-growth-marketing-trend-of-2020-radically-inclusive-advertising/\">growth marketing</a>, and creating a successful product. The challenge is to move forward, driven by your true entrepreneurial feeling, and not to misstep.</p>\n<p>Beyond traditional approaches to business scaling, there are some emotional and psychological symptoms saying that you, as an entrepreneur, are ready to expand your business or incorporate innovation. Here we are going to talk about five of them. Of course, analytical thinking is crucial, however, many successful entrepreneurs are also talking about more subtle signs of your readiness to startup evolution.</p>\n<h2><strong>The Five Feelings that Mean You are Ready for Scaling and Innovation</strong></h2>\n<p>&#160;</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_167130\" aria-describedby=\"caption-attachment-167130\" style=\"width: 850px\" class=\"wp-caption aligncenter\"><a href=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/pexels-photo-1036936-e1582043060437.jpeg\"><img class=\"wp-image-167130 size-full\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/pexels-photo-1036936-e1582043060437.jpeg\" alt=\"\" width=\"850\" height=\"567\" /></a><figcaption id=\"caption-attachment-167130\" class=\"wp-caption-text\"><strong>The Five Feelings that Mean You are Ready for Scaling and Innovation                                    </strong><em>                    Image credit: pexels</em><strong><br /></strong></figcaption></figure></p>\n<h3><strong>DISSATISFACTION. Do you feel dissatisfied with the actual business processes since they don&#8217;t work for the company&#8217;s success anymore?</strong></h3>\n<p>You might have a <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/03/13/does-your-business-really-need-an-ai-solution/\">well-established algorithm</a> of what to do to engage new customers, deliver exceptional quality, and efficiently run internal corporate processes. However, as the number of customers, workload, and requirements are growing, the company&#8217;s structure and strategy need to be rethought.</p>\n<p>The old patterns stop working for your big ideas and goals. A business needs new professionals in a team, new approaches, and new opportunities for growth. The usual state of things does not satisfy you as a business owner anymore. It is the first sign that your venture should be scaled soon.</p>\n<blockquote><p><i>“Think of [business scaling] like driving a car. Once you reach a certain speed, the gear that got you there will not get you to the next level of speed. You need to shift gears. If you don’t, your engine will burn out.” &#8211; </i><b><i>Daniel Marcos</i></b><b><i>, Co-Founder and CEO of </i></b><b><i>Growth Institute</i></b></p></blockquote>\n<h3><strong>RESISTANCE. Do you feel the inner resistance to getting rid of old patterns?</strong></h3>\n<p>Before making a decision to <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/02/04/startups-dont-need-to-be-revolutionary-they-need-to-be-different/\">incorporate innovation into your business</a> processes or to scale them, you may start thinking that the old patterns are not so bad as they have seemed previously. &#8220;I can continue running my business in this way in the couple next years, nothing bad will happen.&#8221; However, it may.</p>\n<p>Missing the right moment and opportunity to run a business transformation, you waste your company&#8217;s time and ability to evolve faster. The opportunity that is given but not used may lead to the most unexpected outcomes for your business. This money could be saved if I took the risk at that moment. That company could become our client if we hired more area-specific professionals. And so on</p>\n<blockquote><p><i>“The lizard brain is the reason you&#8217;re afraid, the reason you don&#8217;t do all the art you can, the reason you don&#8217;t ship when you can. The lizard brain is the source of the resistance.” ― </i><a href=\"https://www.sethgodin.com/\"><b><i>Seth Godin</i></b></a><b><i>, Linchpin: Are You Indispensable?</i></b></p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_167132\" aria-describedby=\"caption-attachment-167132\" style=\"width: 850px\" class=\"wp-caption aligncenter\"><a href=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/pexels-photo-443426-e1582043205450.jpeg\"><img class=\"wp-image-167132 size-full\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/pexels-photo-443426-e1582043205450.jpeg\" alt=\"\" width=\"850\" height=\"567\" /></a><figcaption id=\"caption-attachment-167132\" class=\"wp-caption-text\"><strong>RESISTANCE. Do you feel the inner resistance to getting rid of old patterns?             </strong><em>               Image credit: pexels</em><strong><br /></strong></figcaption></figure></p></blockquote>\n<h3><strong>IMPOSSIBILITY. No, this shift is impossible for our company</strong></h3>\n<p>Yes, it seems impossible. However, was Steve Jobs thinking that the first personal computer is impossible to create? The feeling of impossibility fuels real innovation. A lamp can&#8217;t shine without any visible source of energy. The modular lighting panels can&#8217;t be stuck together on the wall without glue &#8212; those lights maybe not. But your light &#8212; may be. Think out of the box.</p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\">The ability to go beyond your own limits allows you to do the impossible things and bring innovation for others too.</p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><i>“It’s kind of fun to do the impossible.” – </i><b><i>Walt Disney</i></b></p>\n<h3><strong>FEAR. Are you afraid of making incorrect decisions and facing failures?</strong></h3>\n<p>You will definitely make them. Probably, you will make them even more than you might expect, and it is normal. Innovation requires you to experiment and make mistakes. The path to the sky-rocket <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/01/04/3-ways-artificial-intelligence-could-boost-the-success-of-your-business/\">business success</a> is made up of the mistakes, experiences, and the right conclusions.</p>\n<p>Your team may conduct in-depth product research and investigate all your competitor&#8217;s tactics. However, you are not insured against failures. You must be ready to make as many mistakes as needed to refine the market-ready product or scale business less stressfully.</p>\n<p>Fear creates only an illusion that failure is equal to possible death. Actually, it only looks like this, but it is not fatal. We are <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2018/07/09/what-business-leaders-can-learn-from-professional-sports/\">born to succeed</a> as well as to fail, make the right conclusions, and achieve even larger success in the future.</p>\n<blockquote><p><i>“From my experience, transitioning from a small business (10-30 employees) to a middle-sized company (50-100 employees) is the most stressful. Your thoughts are messing around questions, like &#8220;How to hire all these people?&#8221; or &#8220;How to control the quality and delivery process in the growing company?&#8221; </i></p>\n<p><i>After this point is overcome, business scaling happens less stressfully. You stop overthinking about coming problems; you just try to solve them. Later, you pass over other business scaling phases easier by following a particular algorithm based on your own experience or experience of people who are smarter than you. Particularly, I would recommend the book &#8220;How To Solve The Mismanagement Crisis: Diagnosis and Treatment of Management Problems.&#8221; </i><b><i>&#8211; Dima Venglinski, Founder and CEO of </i></b><b><i>Fireart Studio</i></b></p></blockquote>\n<p>You might hear a saying that laziness drives innovation. However, fear drives it even more effectively. The idea that evokes the biggest fear inside of you is likely a perfect point for your inner upgrade. It pushes you to come out of particular frames and help the rest of the world do the same using your products or services.</p>\n<h3><strong>VULNERABILITY. Are you afraid of being ashamed and vulnerable in the eyes of your customers and employees?</strong></h3>\n<blockquote><p><i>“If you are deliberately trying to create a future that feels safe, you will willfully ignore the future that is likely.” &#8211; </i><b><i>Seth Godin, Entrepreneur, </i></b><b><i>Author</i></b></p></blockquote>\n<p>An entrepreneur is like a phoenix. Phoenix never dies but revives again and again. <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/04/07/refocusing-media-operations-during-pandemic-long-term-growth/\">Stand up and stand out</a>. Real innovation also means a real risk, the likeability to fail and appear to be completely vulnerable to financial issues and a bad reputation. However, modern business needs <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/03/16/kubernetes-going-mainstream-innovative-startups-rise/\">more art and innovation</a>. They are worth risk-taking.</p>\n<blockquote><p><i>&#8220;Work hard and never give up. Don&#8217;t believe anybody who claims that it&#8217;s easy to do something really valuable. Success is not magic but hard work. Good things take time and effort to happen. All successive entrepreneurs who I know are hard-working people with the incredible ability to revive after plenty of failures.&#8221; </i><b><i>&#8211; Dima Venglinski, Founder and CEO of </i></b><b><i>Fireart Studio</i></b></p></blockquote>\n<p>It is not about making impulsive decisions that implicate taking ill-considered risks. Of course, each step in an <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/02/06/competitive-strategy-how-to-create-an-unbeatable-business/\">unbeatable business strategy</a> needs refinement, analysis, and probably in-depth research conducted by a professional team. Here, we are talking about moving away from conservative industrialism and <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/12/09/china-and-america-want-the-ai-prize-title-who-will-throw-the-knockout-punch/\">stepping closer to innovation</a>.</p>\n<p>It can be a shining and promising opportunity for success and breakthrough (not only yours but your prospective customers’ too). However, it may also be scary in its beauty and unreachability. It may irritate your eyes with its amazing shine and allure with stepping into a completely new experience.</p>\n<p><em>Image Credit: Pexels</em></p>\n<p>The post <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/04/07/5-signs-that-you-are-ready-to-scale-business-and-deploy-innovation/\">5 Signs that You are Ready to Scale Business and Deploy Innovation</a> appeared first on <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com\">ReadWrite</a>.</p>\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Tue, 07 Apr 2020 21:00:27 +0000","feedId":271,"bgimg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/5-Signs-that-You-are-Ready-to-Scale-Business-.jpeg","linkMd5":"8ec933f9f732b4af7a576298b35f7a63","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx11/cdn32@2020_3/2020/08/23/15-18-24-869_c2c86dfe84492ad7.webp","metaImg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/5-Signs-that-You-are-Ready-to-Scale-Business-.jpeg","destWidth":825,"destHeight":510,"sourceBytes":25958,"destBytes":19530,"author":"Dana Kachan","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/5-Signs-that-You-are-Ready-to-Scale-Business--300x185.jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx32/cdn44@2020_2/2020/08/23/15-18-11-012_3badf8b1246f5c9d.webp","https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/pexels-photo-1036936-e1582043060437.jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx30/cdn39@2020_3/2020/08/23/15-18-14-299_3f9a69b41a3c4a86.webp","https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/pexels-photo-443426-e1582043205450.jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx10/cdn68@2020_2/2020/08/23/15-18-19-901_1a7393675bb3be12.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598195879093},{"createdTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:57","updatedTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:57","title":"5 Benefits Attracting Tech Talent to Your Startup","link":"https://readwrite.com/?p=171690","description":"<div><a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/05/29/5-benefits-attracting-tech-talent-to-your-startup/\" title=\"5 Benefits Attracting Tech Talent to Your Startup\"><img width=\"300\" height=\"198\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Screen-Shot-2020-05-20-at-9.34.57-AM-300x198.png\" class=\"attachment-medium size-medium wp-post-image\" alt=\"\" style=\"margin-bottom: 15px;\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Screen-Shot-2020-05-20-at-9.34.57-AM-300x198.png 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Screen-Shot-2020-05-20-at-9.34.57-AM-243x160.png 243w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Screen-Shot-2020-05-20-at-9.34.57-AM.png 870w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px\" /></a></div><p>Solid tech talent is vital for any company to exceed. Unfortunately, within the next decade, companies can expect a <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/07/04/today-the-tech-talent-shortage-is-everybodys-problem/\">serious dearth of technical applicants</a> across the board. In fact, estimates put the shortage at around <a href=\"https://www.kornferry.com/content/dam/kornferry/docs/article-migration//FOWTalentCrunchFinal_Spring2018.pdf\">85 million</a> candidates by 2030.</p>\n<p>If your company has a growing or anticipated need for technology gurus, take action now to ensure you minimize the effect this shortage could have on tomorrow’s operations. Below are several recruitment strategies aimed at wooing high performers from the tech industry into your organization. </p>\n<p>Better yet, they ensure they’ll stick around for more than a year or two. The longer you retain exceptional superstars, the better positioned you’ll be to lead your industry without lagging behind.</p>\n<h3><b>1. Develop a robust top-shelf benefits package.</b></h3>\n<p>You probably already know that you should plan to pay competitively for top tech talent. Even lower-paid systems administrators <a href=\"https://www.cio.com/article/3235944/hiring-the-most-in-demand-tech-jobs-for-2018.html\">fetch nearly $70,000</a> annually. Longtime network security architects can command close to $200,000 each year. Yet savvy job seekers aren’t just looking at salaries. They’re interested in what else a company offers in terms of benefits packages.</p>\n<p>How can you boost your plan’s appeal for incoming tech folks? Add a <a href=\"https://www.guideline.com/blog/small-business-guide-offering-401k-plan/\">small business 401(k)</a> with a generous match. An average match across the board is 4.3 percent of an employee’s pay, per <a href=\"https://www.investopedia.com/articles/personal-finance/120315/what-good-401k-match.asp\">Investopedia figures</a>, but you could up the ante by going to 6 percent. Other competitive benefits to sweeten the deal include fully funded comprehensive health insurance that includes partners, extensive paid time off that’s accruable, life insurance options, and attractive personal development stipends. </p>\n<h3><b>2. Give tech personnel a voice.</b></h3>\n<p>We’ve all heard of the stereotypical tech employee who sits in a back room and is rarely seen. That’s a myth that needs to end — technology professionals deserve to contribute to the decisions made at various levels in your company. If you’ve never given your technicians the chance to add their ideas to marketing brainstorms, sales funnel conversations, new hire interviews, or other dialogues, now is the time to bring them in.</p>\n<p>When you tap into the brainpower of everyone on your team, including techies, you get an important perspective that can often be overlooked. Plus, you make all employees feel heard and valued. As a result, you may see a noticeable uptick in worker engagement, which studies show <a href=\"https://www.bamboohr.com/blog/major-benefits-employee-engagement/\">helps lower employee turnover</a>.</p>\n<h3><b>3. Consider making remote work the norm.</b></h3>\n<p>You’ve always housed technicians on site. But could they realistically perform their duties just as well remotely? In the past four years, <a href=\"https://www.flexjobs.com/blog/post/remote-work-statistics/\">statistics culled by FlexJobs</a> indicate that remote working opportunities have increased by 44 percent in the United States alone. Many analysts believe that <a href=\"https://www.cnbc.com/2020/03/23/what-coronavirus-means-for-the-future-of-work-from-home.html\">telecommuting may be the wave of the future</a>, especially after employers discovered how easily it could be done during the coronavirus pandemic.</p>\n<p>Allowing your technicians to work out of their home offices does more than just improve morale or provide flexibility. It also expands your job search reach. You can virtually roam the world looking for the most applicable fit for your technical job openings. That broadens your ability to find and onboard individuals you would otherwise have overlooked.</p>\n<h3><b>4. Support technology programs at schools and colleges.</b></h3>\n<p>Where are your future technology leaders? If they’re members of Generation Z, they’re in high school, college, or graduate school. Sure, you could wait until they graduate to approach them. On the other hand, why not make inroads with them today by turning your corporation into a visible and vocal advocate of technology and learning?</p>\n<p>From technology-related scholarships to summer internships, your company can brand itself as a tech-forward, tech-friendly organization. Ask your current tech employees what types of outreach they feel would be most appropriate. Then, get out and support young people as they work toward launching careers in technical fields. Be sure to talk about any outreach on your social media pages and blog for maximum publicity and positive messaging.</p>\n<h3><b>5. Set up mentoring opportunities for tech employees.</b></h3>\n<p>Many technical workers feel a desire to learn from others at the company, and maybe even branch out into non-linear career paths. Get to know each of your technology employees to find out what they’d like to focus on professionally so you can help them find the best mentors throughout the company.</p>\n<p>The more hands-on and personal relationships your tech employees have within the company, the higher loyalty should be across the board. And let’s face it: Loyal employees tend to stay rather than leave, <a href=\"https://www.entrepreneur.com/article/295860\">even when tempted by higher salaries</a>. In order to boost ties with technology whizzes, you have to give your time and commitment.</p>\n<p>Unless you’re satisfied with a watered-down technical team, not to mention constant employee churn, rethink your recruitment techniques. By tweaking your benefits, branding, and culture, you could turn your organization into one that appeals to some of the strongest tech prodigies poised to make their mark.</p>\n<p>The post <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/05/29/5-benefits-attracting-tech-talent-to-your-startup/\">5 Benefits Attracting Tech Talent to Your Startup</a> appeared first on <a Mattress Advanced had the right sleep stuff. Here&#8217;s my review.</p>\n<h2>Backed by Technology</h2>\n<p>The company offers a Web-based app to conduct body measurement analysis. The information serves as the basis for personalized mattress configurations that have been used in their new Airweave Mattress Advanced.</p>\n<h2>About the Mattress</h2>\n<p>Made in Japan, the Mattress Fit Airweave Mattress Advanced is one of the most luxurious among the online manufacturers.</p>\n<h2>Mattress Materials</h2>\n<p>The reason I focus on the materials here is that this mattress is unlike any other I&#8217;ve tried before. Usually, these mattresses have some type of springs or memory foam. This mattress has neither. Instead, it is entirely made of a kind of a resin fiber most often use to make fishing lines.</p>\n<p>The mattress is made mostly of polyester. The Airfiber® core is 100% polyethylene 100%. The outer cover and two soft layers are 100% polyester. Finally, the inner cover is 70% rayon and 30% glass fiber. Airfiber is the company&#8217;s proprietary technology and material. It uses an interwoven design that is intended to help with movement, weight distribution, and airflow for a more restful night of sleep.</p>\n<h2>Pros and Cons</h2>\n<p>One of the things I like best besides the sleep quality is that I could test the mattress for 100 days and return it no questions asked if it didn&#8217;t work for me. Another good thing to note about this mattress is its lightweight modular design, which makes it easy to pick up and move. You can take the top off the mattress and throw it in the washing machine, which is something you can&#8217;t do with other mattresses.</p>\n<p>When you want to replace it, again, the modular design allows parts to replace, so you don&#8217;t have to throw away the whole thing, which means it costs less in the long run and is better for the environment.</p>\n<div class=\"property-text\">\n<p>Plus, the mattress comes in three boxes. It was so much easier to manage and unpack compared to other bed-in-the-box companies. Because it comes this way, I also didn&#8217;t have to wait for the mattress to decompress.</p>\n<p>The only con for me is that it is a bit too firm for my liking. However, those are personal impressions like the pros on this list. It&#8217;s definitely worth trying since they do the body analysis before your purchase.</p>\n<p>A con for others who use an adjustable base is that they will not be able to use that with this particular mattress.</p>\n</div>\n<h2>Price</h2>\n<p>The pricing is somewhat affordable for such a luxurious mattress. The price is $2,000 for a twin; $2,200 for twin XL; $2,500 for a full; $2,700 for a queen; $3,100 for a king or California king. It comes with a ten-year limited warranty. The mattresses ship for free to all states except Hawaii. Returns are free as long as they are within 100 days, and the mattress has been used for at least thirty days.</p>\n<h2>Where to Buy?</h2>\n<p>You can purchase the mattress through the <a href=\"https://www.airweave.com/products/new-mattress-advanced?variant=31373617791074\">company&#8217;s website</a>.</p>\n<h2>Overall Thoughts</h2>\n<p>There are so many mattress-in-the-box companies, and many offer a good product. After trying this luxurious mattress out, I would recommend the Airweave mattress for anyone who likes firm support, especially those who want to sleep on their stomach. Also, if you want a cool night&#8217;s sleep &#8211;this mattress helps regulate temperature for a non-sweaty night.</p>\n<p>I would also recommend this mattress to couples because of the motion transfer and edge support. It causes the least amount of disturbance to ensure your partner gets a good night&#8217;s sleep even if you are a tosser-turner or get up frequently during the night.</p>\n<p>The post <a
