you are aware of the importance of exercise for your health, both current and future. You also probably know that in addition to moving around a lot and doing some cardio, it&#8217;s essential that you train with strength exercises. Here are the seven best treadmills for your home in 2020.</p>\n<h2>One of the best selling fitness gadgets for home: the treadmill.</h2>\n<p>Why is a treadmill so popular? Because it allows you to have the mobility that your body needs without leaving the house, and it enables intense training when the weather abroad is not adequate. With the advent of COVID-19, this gadget could be one of the best purchases you can do for yourself.</p>\n<p>If you are also thinking about buying one, then don’t forget to use <a href=\"https://mesheble.com/amazon-promo-code-20-off/\" rel=\"dofollow noopener noreferrer\">Amazon coupon codes</a> to save more on your purchase, you probably have these concerns right now.</p>\n<ul>\n<li>The treadmill you choose is of the highest quality and does not give problems in a few days.</li>\n<li>How to know what things to look for to choose the best treadmill for the use you are going to give it.</li>\n<li>Find the latest technology to take advantage of the power of Apps so fashionable.</li>\n<li>Get a design is integrated as one more element in your house.</li>\n</ul>\n<h2><b>4 things to consider before choosing the best treadmill</b></h2>\n<p><b>Size and density of the running area</b></p>\n<p>The density running area is the place where you step every time you walk or run. If you are a tall person, you want it to be as large as possible so that it contains your stride when running.</p>\n<p>Also, you must have a cushioning system so that your joints do not suffer.</p>\n<h4><b>Speed and slope</b></h4>\n<p>Depending on the intensity at which you are going to train, you want it to reach more or less speed. Some tapes go up to 20 km/h, although the normal speed is about 15 km/h.</p>\n<p>It is also vital to increase the difficulty of the training that you can vary the slope. Some allow it electronically and others manually.</p>\n<h4><b>Maximum weight</b></h4>\n<p>Find yourself a tape that has a maximum weight that they support. Most of them reach 120 Kg. That number may seem like a lot to you, but sometimes it is good for them to support that weight or more if we want to complicate the training with load (weight).</p>\n<p>If your weight is close to 100 Kg, I recommend that you choose one that supports at least 110 Kg.</p>\n<h4><b>Integration with Apps</b></h4>\n<p>It is becoming increasingly clear that Apps help improve performance by monitoring your progress.</p>\n<p>If you have the option to measure your workouts, you will likely improve and force yourself to train. Also, many current Apps allow you to compete in real-time with other users or run while watching the recording of a popular race, elements that serve to motivate you more.</p>\n<h2><b>Review of the seven best treadmills</b></h2>\n<p>After analyzing all the models and comparing information from all kinds of users, these are the seven best treadmills I have found.</p>\n<ol start=\"7\">\n<li><b> Sportstech F10</b></li>\n</ol>\n<p><img class=\"size-medium wp-image-173791 aligncenter\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/7t-297x300.png\" alt=\"\" width=\"297\" height=\"300\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/7t-297x300.png 297w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/7t-158x160.png 158w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/7t.png 507w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 297px) 100vw, 297px\" /></p>\n<p>If you are not a tall or heavy person, you want a treadmill or jogging at moderate intensity, and you like technology, the Sportstech F10 interests you.</p>\n<p>This model is designed for people who want to do maintenance workouts at moderate or low intensities. However, it is capable of daily use.</p>\n<p>According to the users who use it, its motor is silent, so you could use it at any time without fear of disturbing the neighbors.</p>\n<p>Its power of 750 W is rather low, but it allows it to reach 10 Km / h. Although the manufacturer specifies a maximum weight of 120 Kg, I recommend that you do not exceed 90 Kg, since you would notice some vibration.</p>\n<p>In addition to this, because its running surface is relatively small (101 x 34.5 cm), it is intended for people not too tall (&#60;175 cm). Of course, the five layers of padding of this surface stand out for the protection of joints and knees.</p>\n<p>It has a front panel with an LCD screen that shows the time, distance, speed, calories, and heart rate. It also includes a tablet holder and two bottle holders.</p>\n<p>Lastly, like other Sportstech models, it supports Kinomap technology to simulate real racing through a Smart TV, which tends to motivate you to train more often.<img src=\"https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/12.0.0-1/72x72/1f609.png\" alt=\"😉\" class=\"wp-smiley\" style=\"height: 1em; max-height: 1em;\" /></p>\n<p><b>The best</b></p>\n<ul>\n<li>Kinomap technology to simulate real racing.</li>\n<li>Silent, ideal to run at any time without disturbing.</li>\n<li>Multi-layered running surface to protect joints.</li>\n</ul>\n<p><b>Worst</b></p>\n<ul>\n<li>Not suitable for intense daily use.</li>\n<li>Not recommended for tall and heavy people.</li>\n</ul>\n<ol start=\"6\">\n<li><b> DeskFit DFT200</b></li>\n</ol>\n<p><img class=\"size-medium wp-image-173790 aligncenter\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/6t-300x273.png\" alt=\"\" width=\"300\" height=\"273\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/6t-300x273.png 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/6t-176x160.png 176w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/6t.png 444w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px\" /></p>\n<p>The DeskFit DFT200 is for you if you are looking for a stylish treadmill for walking or running at very low speed, that you can easily store, for low-intensity use or to walk while working.</p>\n<p>Its running surface is not very large, so it is designed for people with small strides. It is one of the most compact on the market, 17 cm wide when folded. You can store it under the sofa, bed, or even leaning against the wall, with a bracket that includes.</p>\n<p>Think that it is not designed for big races? The treadmill reaches a maximum speed of 7.1 Km/h &#8212; so its use is more in line with fast walking than running.</p>\n<p>It does not have an LCD screen, but you can connect a tablet with a specific App to see distance, calories, speed, and other data in real-time. You can place the tablet on plastic support that includes the machine.</p>\n<p>In short, it is a machine that can come in handy to use in confined spaces and to store very quickly when you finish using it.</p>\n<p><b>The best</b></p>\n<ul>\n<li>Perfect if you have little space and want to save the tape when finished using it.</li>\n<li>Modern and elegant design.</li>\n<li>Advisable to walk while you work.</li>\n</ul>\n<p><b>Worst</b></p>\n<ul>\n<li>Somewhat high price for the benefits it has.</li>\n<li>Not recommended for running at high speeds.</li>\n</ul>\n<ol start=\"5\">\n<li><b> Fit-Force </b></li>\n</ol>\n<p><img class=\"size-medium wp-image-173789 aligncenter\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/5t-300x300.png\" alt=\"\" width=\"300\" height=\"300\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/5t-300x300.png 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/5t-160x160.png 160w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/5t.png 700w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px\" /></p>\n<p>The Fit Force is for you if you want an inexpensive treadmill for daily use at a maintenance-free rate without high pretenses.</p>\n<p>The treadmill has more than adequate power and an excellent running speed (15 km/h). The running surface is enough for you to use, even if you are a tall person (&#62; 180 cm).</p>\n<p>One of the features that most highlight the users who have tried it is the low noise it emits when using it. It is ideal if you want to run very early or at night so as not to disturb.<img src=\"https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/12.0.0-1/72x72/1f609.png\" alt=\"😉\" class=\"wp-smiley\" style=\"height: 1em; max-height: 1em;\" /></p>\n<p>It&#8217;s a foldable treadmill, although don&#8217;t expect miracles. Its folding position is not too compact; it can be used to leave it in a corner so that it does not disturb but not under a bed or in a closet (unless it is very large).</p>\n<p>Its LCD screen is made of rather basic materials and measures: calories, running time, distance traveled, heart rate and running speed. Pulsations are measured by sensors on the grip horns.</p>\n<p>Keep in mind something: it is not a high-end treadmill, far from it. It is indeed of acceptable quality, but we cannot ask for the performance of others that are worth 3 times more.</p>\n<p>To highlight its assembly, suitable for the less skilled. You just have to put a few screws, and the manual comes in the US. Some users comment that it can be assembled in about 30 minutes.</p>\n<p><b>The best</b></p>\n<ul>\n<li>Affordable price.</li>\n<li>Simple assembly.</li>\n<li>Powerful and silent.</li>\n</ul>\n<p><b>Worst</b></p>\n<ul>\n<li>The console is somewhat low for tall people.</li>\n<li>Speakers may sound louder.</li>\n<li>Some vibration sensation when running at high speeds.</li>\n</ul>\n<ol start=\"4\">\n<li><b> Sportstech FX300</b></li>\n</ol>\n<p><img class=\"size-medium wp-image-173788 aligncenter\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/4t-300x300.png\" alt=\"\" width=\"300\" height=\"300\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/4t-300x300.png 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/4t-160x160.png 160w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/4t.png 512w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px\" /></p>\n<p>The Sportstech FX300 is for you if you are looking for a very compact treadmill because you have little space at home, you appreciate the sleek design, you don&#8217;t want your height to be a problem, and you have no budget problems.</p>\n<p>The FX300 is a high-end tape that convinces with its design and finishes. It is true that its engine does not make as much noise as others in the same range, but do not expect something extremely quiet.</p>\n<p>Its running surface is one of the widest on the market, which will make running comfortable regardless of your height. In addition to having 5 layers of padding to cushion the impact of the joints.</p>\n<p>It is a tape to use every day and gives it a smooth start. Although its motor is not as powerful as the F31 (it is 1500 W), it reaches the same speed of 16 km / h.</p>\n<p>If you are looking for something that makes you work at a high intensity, you have to know that this model has no option to vary the slope. This limitation has a purpose: that it is easy to fold and compact.</p>\n<p>What leaves this treadmill open-mouthed is its folding, being one of the most compact on the market (159.5 x 74.5 x 21 cm). You can store it in tight places like inside a closet, under a table, or behind the door.</p>\n<p>How about your maintenance? You have to lubricate it yourself with a bottle of Vaseline that it brings (like this one ), it is not done automatically as it happens with other models. It is applied to the sides under the tape (check the manual to make sure you do it right).</p>\n<p>As it could not be otherwise, it is also compatible with Kinomap, so you can run watching real racing simulations and even compete with other users.</p>\n<p>It is true that it is a heavy belt (about 55 Kg), but it has wheels that facilitate its movement.</p>\n<p><b>The best</b></p>\n<ul>\n<li>Super compact, ideal for storing and taking up little space.</li>\n<li>Kinomap technology to simulate real racing.</li>\n<li>5-layer running surface to protect joints.</li>\n<li>Wide running surface, ideal for any height.</li>\n</ul>\n<p><b>Worst</b></p>\n<ul>\n<li>Slope adjustment is missing.</li>\n<li>Price not suitable for all budgets.</li>\n</ul>\n<ol start=\"3\">\n<li><b>Sportstech F31</b></li>\n</ol>\n<p><img class=\"size-medium wp-image-173787 aligncenter\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/3t-300x219.png\" alt=\"\" width=\"300\" height=\"219\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/3t-300x219.png 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/3t-219x160.png 219w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/3t.png 500w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px\" /></p>\n<p>If you want a high-end treadmill for daily use, with variable slope, with technology to simulate real environments and you have no budget problems, the Sportstech F31 is a perfect option.</p>\n<p>The F31 is one of the queen ribbons in its category. The reason is that it works for almost all users (tall, short, heavy, or lighter) who want exceptional performance.</p>\n<p>The machine is prepared to give you a lot of cane (about 3000 W of power), but you will not notice excessive noise to have so much power.</p>\n<p>You can use it daily without problems at a high intensity. It allows you to reach 16 km/h, but what makes the difference isIts tilting slope! You can regulate it up to a 15% slope, ideal if you want to add extra difficulty to your career.</p>\n<p>One of the things you love the most about the tape is its Kinomap compatible App, where you can make real routes and watch recordings of other routes on a TV to do them from home.</p>\n<p>Also, for Android and IOs, you have the SmartTreadmill App with which you will collect your training data (time, calories, duration, etc.).</p>\n<p>It is not a compact machine, so there would be no point in buying it if you plan to move it around often. Dimensions are 153 x 72 x 130 cm in use and 96 x 72 x 130.4 cm folded.</p>\n<p>Another differential point is its 6-layer padding: the running area has different layers of padding to protect the joints and knees.</p>\n<p>Its 5.5-inch screen and high-quality speakers are the icing on the cake for a machine with many positive points. It measures the usual, but, in addition, the tape comes with a band to measure the pulsations.</p>\n<p>The installation is quite simple, and it will not take you more than one hour.</p>\n<p>What maintenance does it have? You just have to add a liquid that the manufacturer will give you before starting to use the tape, in case it had not been shipped from the factory. And then you should replace it every 50 hours approx.</p>\n<p>The price is considerable and not suitable for all budgets, which is why it has the benefits it has, and its after-sales service is so impeccable, they go out of their way to solve any problem.</p>\n<p><b>The best</b></p>\n<ul>\n<li>High-quality LCD screen.</li>\n<li>Kinomap technology to simulate real racing.</li>\n<li>Very quiet for the power it has.</li>\n<li>Good running surface, ideal for tall people.</li>\n<li>Impeccable after-sales service.</li>\n</ul>\n<p><b>Worst</b></p>\n<ul>\n<li>Price suitable for few pockets.</li>\n<li>Not recommended if you want to move it from one side to another often.</li>\n</ul>\n<ol start=\"2\">\n<li><b> BH Fitness iBoxter</b></li>\n</ol>\n<p><img class=\"size-medium wp-image-173786 aligncenter\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/2t-300x294.jpg\" alt=\"\" width=\"300\" height=\"294\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/2t-300x294.jpg 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/2t-164x160.jpg 164w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/2t.jpg 697w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px\" /></p>\n<p>If you are looking for a professional treadmill (lose fat, prepare a marathon), that reaches high speeds to give it intense daily use, the BH Fitness iBoxter is a candidate to consider.</p>\n<p>The BH brand is one of the most recognized in terms of gym equipment, both for stationary bikes and treadmills. Buying a BH brand tape is usually synonymous with quality and durability.</p>\n<p>If you need a top-quality treadmill and you are sure that you will give it full daily use, the BH is among the most reliable. It has an extra-wide running surface so that you can run very comfortably regardless of your height or weight.</p>\n<p>It is one of the fastest speeds (up to 20 km / h) and has an electronic slope regulation system that reaches up to 12%. If you want cane in your training, you will have it.<img src=\"https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/12.0.0-1/72x72/1f609.png\" alt=\"😉\" class=\"wp-smiley\" style=\"height: 1em; max-height: 1em;\" /></p>\n<p>Even though its motor is powerful (up to 2500 W), its consumption can be reduced with an ECO mode by up to 25%. The manufacturer does not make clear how it does it but ensures that with this function, we reduce energy expenditure to that extent.</p>\n<p>To highlight its cushioning system using its own technology: it reduces the force of the joint and back impact with the six elastic elements on the running surface.</p>\n<p>On the other hand, if what you need is a compact tape to be able to put it aside when you do not use it, and you need to move it often, the BH is not the most recommended. Folded, it still has excessive dimensions (125 x 94 x 156 cm). However, indeed, moving it is not complicated, thanks to its transport wheels.</p>\n<p>In addition to its 14 predefined programs, you can connect via Bluetooth with countless Apps for virtual races: BH by Kinomap (iOS/ Android), Run on Earth (iOS / Android), Tread Monitor (iOS) and Fit Console (Android).</p>\n<p><b>The best</b></p>\n<ul>\n<li>It reaches high speeds, perfect for intense workouts.</li>\n<li>Different Kinomap apps and technology to simulate real races.</li>\n<li>Wide running surface, ideal for any user (regardless of weight or height).</li>\n<li>Electronically adjustable slope to increase the difficulty of the race.</li>\n</ul>\n<p><b>Worst</b></p>\n<ul>\n<li>Does not include a heart rate band.</li>\n<li>Not advisable if you have little space at home.</li>\n<li>Price not suitable for all budgets.</li>\n</ul>\n<ol>\n<li><b> Fitfiu MC200</b></li>\n</ol>\n<p><img class=\"size-medium wp-image-173785 aligncenter\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/1t-300x287.png\" alt=\"\" width=\"300\" height=\"287\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/1t-300x287.png 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/1t-167x160.png 167w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/1t.png 486w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px\" /></p>\n<p>The Fitfiu MC200 is for you if you are looking for a basic treadmill, without great pretensions, to walk or to run at a trot, you are not a tall or very heavy person, and you have a low budget.</p>\n<p>Although the Fitfiu does not have as many functionalities as other tapes, it has positioned itself as one of the best sellers for 2 reasons: its low cost and the positive ratings of users who have used it.</p>\n<p>Despite its low price, it has a good 1500 W motor and reaches 14 km/h. However, it is not a machine as robust as others, so I do not recommend it if you are a large (&#62; 175 cm) person.</p>\n<p>It has a running surface 110 x 40 cm, something fair to run if you have a long stride. Something to note is that it is not a noisy machine, as long as you do not run at high intensity.</p>\n<p>The LCD screen measures the typical: speed, time, distance, calories consumed, and heart rate (monitored by the sensor on the handlebar). It comes with 12 predefined training programs, perfect if you want something programmed.</p>\n<p>Its control panel has a sound input, so you can connect your mobile, and integrated speakers. It also has a tablet or mobile holder, so you can put on the content that motivates you the most, and supports 2 bottles.</p>\n<p>The machine can be folded, although it is not too compact (110 x 60 x 50 cm). Of course, it is light, and you can move it without problems thanks to its scroll wheels.</p>\n<p><b>The best</b></p>\n<ul>\n<li>Very affordable price.</li>\n<li>Good user ratings.</li>\n<li>Powerful motor and good speed.</li>\n</ul>\n<p><b>Worst</b></p>\n<ul>\n<li>Somewhat fair running surface for tall people.</li>\n<li>Not recommended for intense training.</li>\n<li>Upgradeable speakers.</li>\n</ul>\n<p><b>Benefits of the treadmill and how to use it</b></p>\n<p>There is always talk of the benefits of exercising and that it is something that we should all do. Nowadays and more with so many things that we see on the Internet it is easy for us to fall into a sedentary life that keeps us glued to a sofa and even that we hardly go out on the street for another walk that is not going to work, class or responsibilities of daily life, a treadmill is an ideal device that helps us break that habit and acquire another that will give us health and good quality of life, but what exactly benefits does the treadmill give us ? .</p>\n<p><b>It makes us feel good and motivate us to improve ourselves.</b></p>\n<p>After exercising, we secrete three hormones, among them dopamine, a hormone linked to addictions that makes us experience a pleasant sensation after exercise. It is the one that makes us begin a habit &#8212; our body becomes addicted to this substance, and we drive to do more and more.</p>\n<p>The faster we gain an actual habit, the better and the activity will hook us. By segregating dopamine, we also reduce the concentration of tobacco, drugs, and sugar that even causes dental caries with the additional expense.</p>\n<p><b>It gives us a feeling of happiness.</b></p>\n<p>The second hormone that we secrete called endorphin, the best known of all, makes us feel happy, happy and in certain euphoric cases, it works as a natural pain reliever that reduces anxiety and stress.</p>\n<p>The release comes as soon as the exercise is finished, and it is gradually lost, it also acts as the dopamine that motivates us to want more and get on the treadmill another day.</p>\n<p><b>It helps us sleep better.</b></p>\n<p>The third is serotonin, a substance that influences our mood after exercising; it gives us a feeling of calm that makes us feel happier and helps especially against depressive states, it is <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/05/01/how-exercise-can-help-you-sleep-better/\">what makes us sleep better</a>, and let&#8217;s eat better.</p>\n<p>We have to keep in mind that you have to practice exercise a few hours before the time we go to sleep since first, we will feel a tremendous high of well-being and later our muscles will relax, the hormones will be lost, and then It is when we will notice the fatigue of the exercise that will help us sleep much better.</p>\n<p><b>It is a perfect way to lose weight and control it.</b></p>\n<p>The treadmill is very comfortable to exercise, we have it at home, and it is easy to find some free time a day to walk or run, perhaps at first, it will cost us, and some may hurt the whole body (pay attention to the warm-up).</p>\n<p>But then little by little our body will begin to segregate the three hormones mentioned in greater proportion, and it will get used to the movements, to the point that it will be a routine for us and at times we cannot do it because we are busy or not be at home and we have that monkey to be able to do some exercise.</p>\n<p>If we propose it and take a routine continuously taking care of our diet, especially avoiding binging to eat after getting off the treadmill, it is easy to lose weight naturally so that the body is able to stylize our It figures as you burn fat, thus avoiding that loose meat.</p>\n<p>Subsequently, we can increase the time or the difficulty to gain more muscle mass or maintain ourselves. The most recommended is to do it before a meal of the day, because after exercising, even if we feel more hungry, our body will be full of energy, which makes our metabolism work much faster and the body absorbs less fat.</p>\n<p><b>We will feel that we have more energy.</b></p>\n<p>One of the problems of sedentary life is feeling tired, no matter how little we do our body feels tired due to little activity, and it is something that must be stopped as it is responsible for more deaths than the overweight itself, imagine in the case of both!</p>\n<p>By developing more muscles and keeping them active, our body will have much more resistance and strength, we will tire much less, and therefore we will take better advantage of the day to do everything.</p>\n<p>They say that life is short and spending it sitting is a shame when we can do everything we like but also in a <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/09/12/how-health-literacy-is-decoding-the-human-longevity-mystery/\">healthier way and making more use of time</a>.</p>\n<p><b>It helps us prevent diseases and ailments.</b></p>\n<p>Actions such as walking on the treadmill help our body to have a much stronger immune system, which will prevent diseases, and it is enough to have a cold in the winter or every two by three, make your body more resistant.</p>\n<p>By producing <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/10/17/4-effective-ways-to-manage-work-stress/\">endorphins, we will better control stress and anxiety</a>, in addition to taking away feelings like depression. It helps us to have stronger joints and bones to avoid osteoporosis and tendinitis, in addition to preventing diabetes and heart disease by improving blood pressure and reducing cholesterol levels.</p>\n<p>Customs such as <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/05/10/silicon-valley-entrepreneurs-overworking-pain-with-backmate/\">sitting all day in front of the computer</a>, watching television or using overlockers or sewing machines, make the legs wear out due to the lack of movement and can lead to more ailments or problems even walking.</p>\n<p><b>We concentrate better.</b></p>\n<p>By giving us that <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/02/01/goplus-treadmill-foldable-smart-exercise-equipment/\">feeling of general well-being</a> and avoiding feelings such as stress or anxiety, our brain is also rewarded in a secondary way. The activity will make us be able to concentrate better on the tasks to be carried out.</p>\n<p>If a person is carrying on poor quality of life and a poor diet, it is more difficult for them to remember certain things or study and think. Generally, an athlete is rewarded with a clear mind and strong body, which will help all throughout life.</p>\n<p><b>Healthy persons like to remember to keep a healthy body to have a healthy mind.</b></p>\n<p>There are runners who do not mind going out to train in adverse weather conditions, they are always ready to go running to get fresh air.</p>\n<p>For other people, it is not so easy, so they decide not to run, preferring to run comfortably on the treadmill undercover of their homes. Many people run at home, while others prefer to go to the gym to run on a treadmill.</p>\n<p><b>CORRECT USE OF THE TREADMILL</b></p>\n<p>Did you just buy a treadmill, and before you start practicing wondering how to use it correctly? Discover the benefits of this device and follow our tips to start the practice.</p>\n<p><b>WHY USE A TREADMILL?</b></p>\n<p>The treadmill is an effective calorie-burning device. You practice at home all year round, without depending on the weather. The treadmill is:</p>\n<ul>\n<li>A not inconsiderable advantage: running &#8230; at home and at your own pace!</li>\n<li>A long-term, lasting investment</li>\n<li>A solid material accessible to all to practice in complete safety, also recommended for re-education</li>\n</ul>\n<p><b>THE RIGHT FIT</b></p>\n<p>A treadmill requires no specific adjustments other than speed and incline.</p>\n<p><b>THE CORRECT POSTURE</b></p>\n<p>To get off to a good start, focus on keeping your back straight or slightly leaning forward, reinforcing your abdominal waist. Indeed, strong and reinforced abs limit low back problems.</p>\n<p><b>THE RIGHT EXERCISE</b></p>\n<p>The treadmill offers a multitude of exercises: work as possible from the march, run at a moderate pace (jogging), or faster.</p>\n<p>The use of the incline also allows modifying the difficulty of the effort and makes some muscles work more, especially the glutes and thighs. The walk with a high incline provides greater comfort in the joints and in the back, burning up to four times more calories.</p>\n<p><b>THE TYPICAL SESSION</b></p>\n<p>To warm-up, <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2009/10/05/healthywage-get-paid-to-jog-an/\">do some leg curls and stretches</a> (quads, hamstrings, calves).</p>\n<p>The first session begins with the march at the pace (between 4 and 6 km/h) that suits you best to familiarize yourself with the treadmill, then gradually increases speed.</p>\n<p>If you want to run, always think about lengthening the stride forward of the treadmill and especially adapting the speed of the treadmill to your rhythm and not the other way around.</p>\n<p><strong>THE FIRST FEW WEEKS, START WITH A 40 TO 60 MINUTE SESSION:</strong></p>\n<ul>\n<li>10-15 minutes: warm up in fast gear or light race</li>\n<li>25-35 minutes: session body at a regular pace (approx. 70% of maximum heart rate)</li>\n<li>5-10 minutes: return to calm in fast gear or light race</li>\n</ul>\n<p>You will gradually find a comfortable rhythm and sufficient resistance.</p>\n<p>THE FOLLOWING WEEKS, CHOOSE THE VARIATION (S) THAT SUITS YOU BEST:</p>\n<p>Progressively lengthens the duration of the session body to increase the duration.</p>\n<p>Reduce the warm-up phase to 5-10 min.</p>\n<p><b>Increase running speed</b></p>\n<ul>\n<li>Use the session body fractionation method: alternation of 6-12 blocks from 30 to 60 seconds varying the running speed (running or light/moderate or fast = higher than the normal running speed)</li>\n<li>Gradually increases the number of blocks</li>\n<li>Perform two to three sessions per week with a day of rest between the two.</li>\n</ul>\n<p><b>Frequently Asked Questions</b></p>\n<p><b>Running on a treadmill, for or against?</b></p>\n<p>In order to determine whether the treadmill is good or bad, the evaluated runner&#8217;s technique must be taken into account, since such a thing cannot be said in general.</p>\n<p>If it is a runner with good technique in the race, the fact of running on the treadmill is not the best, since the impact that occurs is repetitive and on a completely smooth surface, so it is better not to use the tape if your running technique is really good. Unless there is no other option.</p>\n<p>Of course, running outdoors doesn&#8217;t compare to running on a treadmill. Outdoors the influence of the friction of the wind, the change in the terrain and the distractions are not the same, which varies the technique of every cyclist.</p>\n<p>Similarly, the running position is completely uniform throughout the treadmill workout. But in the case of not having a good running technique, it is not inadvisable to run on the treadmill to train, since training on these types of platforms also has its advantages.</p>\n<p>Among them is the ability to follow a constant rhythm, the scheduling of breaks, etc. Working with an incline and time is not a problem.</p>\n<p>There are many machines that exist in the current market that allow the athlete to create their own workouts, which can be an advantage for the runner. It also allows programming of the outputs, resulting in an improvement in technique.</p>\n<p><b>Does it have health consequences?</b></p>\n<p>The answer to this will depend on the technique and the physical condition of the athlete. Of course, the effort it takes to run on the treadmill is significantly less than that done outdoors.</p>\n<p>If a person starting to run has a running technique, the use of the treadmill is not recommended. That is, what is recommended in athletes who start in the race, must first work their technique and the force applied in the race. This is essential, but unfortunately, it is not common.</p>\n<p>When we start running and seek to improve the technique, it is frequent that the cufflinks and the soleus are heavily loaded, since the correct thing is that they do not come into contact with the ground and the heel, but with the forefoot.</p>\n<p>If it is the heel that makes contact, it has been shown in the different biomechanical studies that the impact on the knees is very high.</p>\n<p>The opposite occurs with the support in the metatarsal, in the forefoot or midfoot area that does not cause an overload in the joints, which also improves the race.</p>\n<p>However, at first, you are not used to it, and you usually load the lower part of the leg, as we have already mentioned. This will happen on the tape too. Keep in mind that the tape partially prevents reverse displacement, which causes some muscles to be used, such as the buttocks.</p>\n<p><b>Can running on the treadmill lead to injuries?</b></p>\n<p>This does not have to happen. Anyone who goes for a run if they do it with the correct technique should not be injured, both on a treadmill and on asphalt. Ideally, run on a surface that provides a certain level of cushioning, such as dirt or grass. Although not all people have this option, it would be the most recommended.</p>\n<p><b>How long should the training be on the treadmill?</b></p>\n<p>The maximum time has not been established, but the ideal is that the tape is not used for a long time, although it will depend on the needs of each one. Keep in mind that races are not on treadmills, the ideal thing is to go running and only do it on a treadmill when it is strictly necessary.</p>\n<p>Choosing the right training is necessary to achieve success in the races, establishing an adequate technique is essential. After that, it will be possible to know exactly whether or not it is advisable to run on the treadmill and, while the weather does not prevent it, the outdoor terrain is better.</p>\n<p>The post <a Bootstrap a Startup in a Post-COVID-19 World While Navigating the New Normal\"><img width=\"300\" height=\"185\" opportunity\" style=\"margin-bottom: 15px;\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Crisis-versus-Opportunity-6-Ways-to-Bootstrap-a-Startup--300x185.jpg 300w, starting up your own business? The reality is that the world as we know it has changed. And, no one really knows what the future holds. Consequently, it is understandable that people, especially those who have either had to take a pay cut or have been furloughed. Therefore, the biggest challenge, apart from not contracting the virus, is how to generate enough money to meet your monthly budget during these tough times.</p>\n<p><em>                                    <strong>  “In the midst of every crisis, lies great opportunity.” – Albert Einstein</strong></em></p>\n<p>As the quotation highlighted above by Albert Einstein states, “in the middle of every crisis, lies an opportunity.” Thus, let’s start this discussion by defining the global crisis caused by the new coronavirus, <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/05/11/5-digital-health-technologies-helping-to-stop-the-coronavirus-pandemic/\">COVID-19</a>, so that we can look forward to finding the opportunity in the crisis.</p>\n<h2>Crisis versus opportunity: Setting the Scene</h2>\n<p>It is generally accepted that <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/06/22/how-to-ensure-data-privacy-in-the-time-of-coronavirus/\">the novel coronavirus, COVID-19</a>, was first seen in Wuhan, China, during the last days of 2019. This virus is a zoonotic virus. In other words, it was first seen in an animal like a bat, and it consequently jumped from an animal host to a human host. Once in its human host, COVID-19 mutated so that it could spread via person-to-person transmission.</p>\n<p>As an aside, there are instances where it seems as though the virus has jumped back to an animal host in the form of pet dogs and cats. However, it is believed that this occurred because the pet’s owner was infected with the virus. And, this scenario is really nothing to worry about.</p>\n<p>Four months later, since the first cases observed as a consequence of human-to-human transmission, the virus has swept across the globe, causing untold health and economic damage in its wake. Current worldwide statistics as of 10 May 2020, (from gisanddata.maps) show that there are over 10 million people infected with this virus and just over 503, 500 deaths. Unfortunately, these numbers seem to be increasing rapidly without an end in sight.</p>\n<h4>One of the many challenges facing the world’s governments is the fact that no one really knows how this virus behaves.</h4>\n<p>There has never been a viral outbreak of such magnitude before. Thus, the world’s scientists, medical experts, and governments are in new territory, determining what works and what doesn’t work as each country moves through the peaks and troughs of this pandemic.</p>\n<p>There are, however, a few behaviors that the world’s scientists and medical experts have observed. The most important being that because this virus is spread via droplet infection from person to person, the best way of controlling and eradicating it is through social distancing or social isolation. In simple terms, people need to stay away from one another. Therefore, the world’s governments have issued varying degrees of lockdown or stay-at-home orders.</p>\n<h4>What this means is that the global economy has been paused while we wait for the virus to burn itself out.</h4>\n<p><strong>Secondly,</strong> this virus is highly contagious and causes a respiratory illness similar to pneumonia, resulting in the death of people who fall in the high-risk category.</p>\n<p><strong>Thirdly</strong>, people can be asymptomatic carriers. In other words, they are infected with the virus but have no symptoms, so they spread the virus to other people without knowing they are infected.</p>\n<p><strong>Consequently, this pandemic has had and continues to have a negative impact on a macro-economic and microeconomic level.</strong></p>\n<p>It has also affected people’s mental, emotional, and physical health.</p>\n<p>Governor Cuomo, governor of New York State, USA, highlighted the quintessential issue with the coronavirus pandemic in his conversation with <a href=\"https://www.governor.ny.gov/news/audio-rush-transcript-governor-cuomo-guest-howard-stern-show\">Howard Stern on 13 April 2020</a>. He stated that not only are we fighting a virus, <em>&#8220;but we&#8217;re also fighting emotions on an individual level, on a collective level. People are frightened, they&#8217;re anxious, they&#8217;re stressed.&#8221;</em> This virus is unmatched. People are trapped at home, they are not getting a salary, and they are afraid to touch another person because no one knows who is and isn&#8217;t infected with the virus.</p>\n<p>As stated above, the economic impact across the globe has been devastating. The <a href=\"https://www.forbes.com/sites/teresaghilarducci/2020/05/10/a-devastating-jobs-report-for-older-workers/#3fbcc79c1e43\">US jobs report</a> released on Friday 8 May 2020 showed that the US has hit a depression-era unemployment rate.</p>\n<p>Additionally, the <a href=\"https://www.npr.org/2020/04/23/838085670/europes-economy-was-hit-hard-too-but-jobs-didn-t-disappear-like-in-the-u-s\">npr.org</a> website stated that 26 million people in the US have lost their jobs since early March 2020. The fundamental difference between the US, EU, and the UK is that the EU and the UK governments are paying a percentage of their workers’ salaries and their jobs will be available once the respective country’s economies start up again.</p>\n<h2>Finding the opportunity amidst the crisis</h2>\n<p>Therefore, the questions that must be asked and answered are what is the new normal and how do you utilize the “new normal” to earn an income? In summary, the biggest part of this answer is to find the opportunity in the crisis.</p>\n<p>Most of this discussion up till this point has been about the crisis caused by the global pandemic. And, while the socioeconomic devastation must not be underestimated, the question that begs is, how do people find the opportunity within the crisis.</p>\n<p>The first step in finding the opportunity within the crisis is to put measures into place to survive the crisis. The next step is to position yourself for economic sustainability (openminds.com &#8212; opportunity in adversity).</p>\n<h4>Following the government’s stay-at-home orders to the letter &#8212; practicing extreme social-distancing measures.</h4>\n<p>When you have to venture out to the shops, seek medical care, or to exercise once or twice daily &#8212; follow the guidelines. The guidelines are the way to survive this bizarre crisis. Together with these measures, it is vital to apply for any unemployment benefits that the government is offering.</p>\n<p>Once you have implemented these measures, the next step is to start investigating ways to “position yourself for economic sustainability.” In other words, you must start bootstrapping an <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/04/10/a-startup-guide-to-creating-an-ideal-customer-profile/\">online startup</a>, because the future of the global business world is online.</p>\n<p>The companies that have the greatest chance of surviving the global economic shutdown are the ones that have pivoted their business processes from the brick-and-mortar model to an online model. While it is true that this statement can be seen as a generalization, it is only relevant to companies that form part of the essential services industry. Otherwise, this statement is accurate for almost all of the other business organizations.</p>\n<h3>What is a startup?</h3>\n<p>Before we look at ways to bootstrap a startup, let’s consider a comprehensive definition of what a startup is.</p>\n<p><a href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Startup_company\">Wikipedia.com</a> defines a <em>“startup company (startup or startup) is an entrepreneurial venture which is typically a newly emerged, fast-growing business that aims to meet a marketplace need by developing a viable business model around an innovative product, service, process, or a platform.”</em></p>\n<p>Additionally, <em>“a startup is usually a company designed to effectively develop and validate a scalable business model. Startups have high rates of failure, but the minority of successes include companies that have become large and influential.”</em></p>\n<h3>Ways to bootstrap a startup</h3>\n<p>Most importantly, the phrase “<a href=\"https://neilpatel.com/blog/bootstrap-startup/\">bootstrapping a startup</a>” translates into “growing your business with little or no venture capital or outside investment. It means relying on your own savings and revenue to operate and expand.”</p>\n<p>It is worth noting that while this is challenging to achieve, it is incredibly rewarding to do so. It is also important to realize that, statistically speaking, most startups become operational without any venture capital or external funding sources. And, most startup owners are also solopreneurs.</p>\n<p>Therefore, as a solopreneur (see: solopreneur institute dot com) let’s consider a case study as an example of the ways to get your startup up and running and into a profitable operation.</p>\n<h4>Let’s assume, for this article, that you are a part-time social media expert.</h4>\n<p>Consequently, you’ve decided to utilize this passion and expertise to collect and aggregate social media data from some of the popular social media platforms like Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Pinterest, CrunchBase, and LinkedIn.</p>\n<p>Your data will be ordered and structured into information based on specific niches like engineering and construction, finance, technology, and business. The &#8220;raison d’etre&#8221; (the most important reason or the purpose for someone or something&#8217;s existence&#8230;) for your startup is to track consumer behavior based on their digital footprint, including likes and shares.</p>\n<h3>Partner with a professional business services company</h3>\n<p>A solopreneur is essentially an entrepreneur who does not hire any staff. All essential business services that are not part of the startup’s core function are usually subcontracted out. Thus, in our case study, the first step is to consult with a professional business services organization that specializes in company formation in Hungary to help you register a legal company.</p>\n<h3>Seek help from a mentor or advisor</h3>\n<p>The good news is that you are not the first solopreneur, nor will you be the last person to bootstrap a startup. Many experts in this field have developed tried and trusted methods and mechanisms to succeed at an entrepreneurial venture. And, they are often very willing to mentor or advise new entrepreneurs to ensure that they do not make the same mistakes and to ensure that their ventures are successful the first time around.</p>\n<h3>Draw up a budget</h3>\n<p>As highlighted above, the financial side of bootstrapping a business can be challenging. Thus, you must manage your available finances wisely. And, drawing up a budget that contains all of your fixed expenses, will help you keep a handle on your finances and assist in stripping out any non-essential costs.</p>\n<h3>Implement the “lean startup” philosophy</h3>\n<p>Eric Ries, the founder of <a href=\"http://theleanstartup.com/principles\">theleanstartup.com</a>, states that the lean startup philosophy“provides a scientific approach to creating and managing startups and get the desired product to customers&#8217; hands faster.”</p>\n<p>It is an agile principle, with an iterative method that gets a product or service to market without spending months or years in product development without consumer approval or disapproval. Product development also occurs in small iterations or changes. It starts with a base model and then evolves into the final edition or one that gains traction amongst its target audience.</p>\n<p>It’s vital to be aware of the fact that agile iterations are not random and haphazard. They are based on a combination of customer feedback and the startup’s core mission and aim.</p>\n<h3>Invest in your brand</h3>\n<p>Brand development is one of the most significant aspects of running a successful business. <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2018/06/20/how-to-brand-yourself-through-your-dedication-and-value/\">Your brand</a> is what attracts your target audience and helps convert them into returning customers. One of the most challenging things for any company, irrespective of whether it is an established business or a startup, is to convert consumers into loyal, returning customers. Consequently, it is essential not to skimp on brand development, for your brand is your startup’s voice.</p>\n<p>The good news is that, in the digital world, brand development does not have to cost an insane amount of money. The essential starting point is a good website that is usable and user-friendly, for this is where visitors to your site will answer the site’s Call-To-Action and convert.</p>\n<h3>Attract customers through content marketing</h3>\n<p>The Content Marketing Institute defines content marketing as the“<a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/04/09/digital-marketing-coronavirus/\">strategic marketing approach</a> focused on creating and distributing valuable, relevant, and consistent content to attract and retain a clearly-defined audience &#8211; and, ultimately, to drive profitable customer action.”</p>\n<h5>The following statistics show the value that brand marketers place on content marketing:</h5>\n<ul>\n<li> 42% of brand marketers report that their content marketing efforts are successful.</li>\n<li> 60% of all marketers create or contract a content writer to create at least one article per day.</li>\n<li> Year-on-year growth metrics in unique site traffic is 7.8 times higher for content market leaders than it is for followers. Therefore, it is vital to becoming a content marketing leader, not a follower.</li>\n</ul>\n<p>By way of an example, guest post blogging &#8212; see my blog &#8212; snchatterjee.com/start-guest-blogging. My blog has some useful marketing strategies &#8211;that are designed to drive unique, authoritative traffic to the brand’s website.</p>\n<p>Your new increase in authority is one of the most highly rated signals that Google uses when ranking and indexing websites on the Search Engine Results Page (SERP). Therefore, when a consumer searches for the products and services that you offer, Google will return your brand’s website in the top three to five results on the SERP.</p>\n<h4>Final thoughts</h4>\n<p>One of the most challenging aspects of the post-COVID-19 world is that no one really knows what it will look like. There are several givens regarding the way forward. The global economy has simultaneously come to a halt. And no one is quite sure how and when the global corporate world will reopen for business.</p>\n<p>As Aswath Damodaran noted, in his YouTube chat with Noah Kagan titled, “NYU Finance Professor Explains This Financial Crisis,” the world has never been in this situation, so no one knows how easily the global economy will reboot.</p>\n<p>We will just have to wait and see what happens. Please don&#8217;t take the uncertainty as an excuse to sit back and do nothing.</p>\n<p>The takeaway phrase here should be &#8220;Carpe Diem&#8221; or &#8220;Seize the Day&#8221; and make the most of the opportunities found within the current crisis.</p>\n<p>The post <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/06/29/crisis-versus-opportunity-6-ways-to-bootstrap-a-startup-in-a-post-covid-19-world-while-navigating-the-new-normal/\">Crisis versus Opportunity: 6 Ways to Bootstrap a Startup in a Post-COVID-19 World While Navigating the New Normal</a> appeared first on <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/02/19/software-pre-launch-checklist-6-things-you-have-to-do/\" title=\"Software Pre-Launch Checklist: 6 Things You Have to Do\"><img width=\"300\" height=\"214\" pre-launch checklist\" style=\"margin-bottom: 15px;\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/Software-Pre-Launch-Checklist-6-Things-You-Have-to-Do-300x214.jpg 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/Software-Pre-Launch-Checklist-6-Things-You-Have-to-Do-900x643.jpg 900w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/Software-Pre-Launch-Checklist-6-Things-You-Have-to-Do-224x160.jpg 224w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/Software-Pre-Launch-Checklist-6-Things-You-Have-to-Do-1536x1097.jpg 1536w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/Software-Pre-Launch-Checklist-6-Things-You-Have-to-Do.jpg 1920w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px\" /></a></div><p>You’ve got a great idea, and you’re hoping to get the most money out of it. However, even with the best software package in the world, you won’t be earning much if you don’t follow a few basic pre-launch steps. Here is a software pre-launch checklist — six things you have to do.</p>\n<p>In today’s world, being well-prepared is everything.</p>\n<h3>Here is what you need to take care of in order to get the big bucks.</h3>\n<h2>Who’s Who</h2>\n<p>There are three factors you have to define:</p>\n<ul>\n<li>Your <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/02/23/ai-learning-algorithms-find-your-new-target-groups/\">target audience</a> &#8212; who is the product for? How old are they? What do they do? Why do they want it? How is it going to satisfy their biggest need?</li>\n<li>Your competition &#8212; can you learn something from them? What do you have that they don’t?</li>\n<li>Yourself &#8212; define your image and your brand. Today, a well-defined brand makes or breaks a business. <a href=\"https://articles.bplans.com/the-4-keys-to-building-brand-loyalty-with-millennials/\">Millennials</a> are the most brand-loyal generation we&#8217;ve seen so far. Sure, the quality of the product is what makes the customers stay, but you have to attract them first.</li>\n</ul>\n<h2>Early Domain Bird</h2>\n<p>Think about the ideal name for your software and reduce the options to a couple. Conduct some <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/07/26/iot-the-buzzword-for-market-researchers/\">market research</a> to find out which name resonates best with your audience. Once that is done, hurry up and get your domain and site ready and working online.</p>\n<p>You should have your domain secured and be checking it off the list &#8212; even if the official launching day is still far away.</p>\n<h2>Testing, Testing</h2>\n<p>Quality assessment can be done in several ways. For example, you can outsource to a <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/01/29/qa-testing-manual-automated-or-crowdsourced/\">software testing</a> company to conduct manual testing of your product. You might discover that you’ve overlooked some details &#8212; or your targets may praise some qualities you didn’t think of promoting in your marketing campaigns. After testing, you&#8217;ll know the right things to put in your software.</p>\n<p>Testing is just one of many <a href=\"https://www.globalapptesting.com/blog/how-to-build-the-ultimate-qa-strategy\">QA strategies</a> that you could employ, and it’s not all about the customers or parts of your software. You should establish a <a href=\"https://www.globalapptesting.com/blog/4-ways-to-create-a-quality-culture-in-your-company\">quality culture</a> among your workers as well. Find ways how to motivate the employees to dedicate to delivering the highest quality.</p>\n<h2>Train the Team</h2>\n<p>Depending on the software you’re creating, <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/12/23/ai-customer-service-will-save-you-money-but-it-might-cost-you-customers/\">informative client support </a>can represent the turning point. Some software options are taken for granted and customers mainly decide on the price and a couple of features offered.</p>\n<p>The big players, however, <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/01/13/top-25-podcasts-designed-to-make-you-think-and-grow/\">wish to know much, much more</a>. Educate your team to be able to answer all the<em> impossible</em> questions. Your team deserves to know all the details, advantages, and downsides, in order to be able to provide the best arguments.</p>\n<h2>Marketing Matters</h2>\n<p>How can you attract new clients?</p>\n<p>Think <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/11/21/best-data-visualization-tools-for-2020-reviewed/\">special offers and free trials</a> to get the word out. But first, your software package must seem appealing. Work on your logo and employ the best designers. As we have said before, branding is extremely important. <a href=\"https://edition.cnn.com/2011/10/06/opinion/apple-logo/index.html\">Apple’s logo</a> is not just a lucky coincidence.</p>\n<p><a href=\"https://fabrikbrands.com/font-psychology-and-typography-inspiration-in-logo-design/\">Font psychology</a> is nothing to be sneezed at. The shapes and colors send irrevocable messages.</p>\n<h2>Strategic Plan</h2>\n<p>Don’t wait to see how things turn out for you. Just like <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/10/16/design-product-with-consumer-privacy-in-mind/\">planning the launch</a>, you should also have a plan ready for everything that follows. Whether the sales go up or down, you should know how to react.</p>\n<p>For instance, if the sales are doing extremely well, how are you going to invest the money? Conversely, if the sales are down, you must have <a href=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/sales/biggest-ways-technology-has-transformed-sales\">new sale techniques</a> ready in advance, or perhaps calculate the time needed to make alterations to the software package.</p>\n<h4>Final Words</h4>\n<p>As you can see, there’s a lot of work ahead of you. Get down to it, and start checking things off our list as soon as possible. Make sure you check all of the items on your list. Ask other people&#8217;s opinions and consider them.</p>\n<p>Have a solid business plan and follow it. Skipping a step can only backfire. Don&#8217;t lose the game of your software in the pre-launch &#8212; even before you started playing.</p>\n<p>The post <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/02/19/software-pre-launch-checklist-6-things-you-have-to-do/\">Software Pre-Launch Checklist: 6 Things You Have to Do</a> appeared first on <a rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"https://readwrite.com\">ReadWrite</a>.</p>\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Wed, 19 Feb 2020 16:00:19 +0000","feedId":271,"bgimg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/Software-Pre-Launch-Checklist-6-Things-You-Have-to-Do.jpg","linkMd5":"4cb5735ad569d5fcaa740e9f68a2e625","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx4/cdn8@2020_3/2020/08/23/15-18-23-370_fad26e04b9eb7577.webp","metaImg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/Software-Pre-Launch-Checklist-6-Things-You-Have-to-Do.jpg","destWidth":1920,"destHeight":1371,"sourceBytes":136629,"destBytes":73058,"author":"Milos Mudric","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/Software-Pre-Launch-Checklist-6-Things-You-Have-to-Do-300x214.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx3/cdn7@2020_6/2020/08/23/15-18-11-724_6e8342898d28a97e.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598195880613},{"createdTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:54","updatedTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:54","title":"How Technology Plays a Vital Role in Small Business Growth","link":"https://readwrite.com/?p=170270","description":"<div><a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/06/19/how-technology-plays-a-vital-role-in-small-business-growth/\" title=\"How Technology Plays a Vital Role in Small Business Growth\"><img width=\"300\" height=\"185\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/Technology-Plays-a-Vital-Role-in-Small-Business-Growth-300x185.jpg\" class=\"attachment-medium size-medium wp-post-image\" alt=\"tech in small business growth\" style=\"margin-bottom: 15px;\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/Technology-Plays-a-Vital-Role-in-Small-Business-Growth-300x185.jpg 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/Technology-Plays-a-Vital-Role-in-Small-Business-Growth-260x160.jpg 260w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/Technology-Plays-a-Vital-Role-in-Small-Business-Growth.jpg 825w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px\" /></a></div><p>Do you ever think why technology is so important in small businesses? The answer is simple. Technology saves time and labor, and it increases the security of your business. As most of the business tasks nowadays depend on the latest technology; consequently, the corporate world cannot ignore the benefits of technology to businesses. Businesses need technological support to keep their work up to date. Here is how technology is playing a vital role in small business growth.</p>\n<h3>Digital tools play a vital role.</h3>\n<p>According to the study, more than 90% of all the small businesses use digital tools for communication purposes, more than 80% use these tools for internal management, and more than 40% use them for sales purposes. Above all, in the future, 70% of small businesses plan to increase the digital tools in their companies. Small businesses rely on technology as it helps them to operate daily. Technology helping businesses in many ways, such as it is providing capital to aid firms for expansion and investment. It is possible by leveraging new technology for a hassle-free process to get money.</p>\n<h3><b>List of Small Business Technologies to Consider</b></h3>\n<ul>\n<li style=\"font-weight: 400;\"><b>Data Security: </b>In today&#8217;s <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/04/04/cyber-security-modern-technology-and-business-threats/\">world of malware and breaches</a>, it is the number one technology that every small business needs.</li>\n<li style=\"font-weight: 400;\"><b>Customer Relationship Management(CRM): </b>It has used for interaction with clients, but not all small businesses like it.</li>\n<li style=\"font-weight: 400;\"><b>HR Software: </b>Administrative functions like attendance, <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2012/05/21/tracking-the-performance-of-past-tech-ipos/\">tracking long term employee</a> development, etc becomes easy with this tool.</li>\n<li style=\"font-weight: 400;\"><b>Chatbots:</b> Recent advancements in Artificial Intelligence put the <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/02/14/which-type-of-chatbots-will-have-a-positive-impact-on-your-businesses/\">chatbot in the must-have list of small businesses</a>.</li>\n<li style=\"font-weight: 400;\"><b>Cloud Computing: A</b> study said that 59% of the small businesses responded that cloud computing helps their company to become more scalable and agile. On the other side, 51% answered that it is a complex component.</li>\n<li style=\"font-weight: 400;\"><b>Mobile Applications: </b>In the coming two years, less than half of the businesses(49%) are using or plan to use mobile applications.</li>\n<li style=\"font-weight: 400;\"><b>Drones:</b> However, it is not in the must-have list of small organizations &#8212; <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/04/23/what-the-drones-of-future-can-do/\">still the drones deserve</a> a careful watch.</li>\n<li style=\"font-weight: 400;\"><b>Email:- </b>Some technologies have become a necessity; an email is one of them.</li>\n</ul>\n<h3><b>Reasons to illustrate that technology is a <em>Need</em> for Small Business</b>.</h3>\n<ol>\n<li style=\"font-weight: 400;\"><b>Efficiency Improvement:- </b>There is no reason to deny that technology increases the efficiency of the organization. Due to the rise of artificial intelligence,<a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/05/24/5-advantages-artificial-intelligence-can-give-your-sme/\"> companies can better use technology</a>. Moreover, the involvement of technology in business saves time and effort and increases productivity, which is a huge advantage.</li>\n<li style=\"font-weight: 400;\"><b>Technology Protects Against Threats:-</b> As the online attacks are increasing rapidly, so it becomes hazardous for businesses. Thus, <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/03/22/6-emerging-cyber-threats-to-lookout-for-in-2019/\">cybersecurity defense systems have been developed</a> by the developers to protect the companies from attacks. It is an era of cloud computing, so organizations need to secure their data by enhancing the security of online accounts.</li>\n<li><b>Improvisation of Communication:- </b>Nowadays, many organizations rely on various software and applications for communication with one another. Also, multiple aspects need to consider before choosing a communication channel within the organization. For instance, if you are looking for a quick response, then phone service is better. Other communication channels include video conferencing, skype, etc.</li>\n<li style=\"font-weight: 400;\"><b>Technology helps to Work Efficiently:-</b> Employees expect the latest types of equipment so that they can work efficiently and effectively. Moreover, the most recent technology equipment helps the employees to complete their work with better results and increase productivity.</li>\n<li><b>More Employee Engagement:-</b> Technology is known for more employee engagement. Also, it encourages them to communicate with one another by sharing files and data. Moreover, technology also decreases the stress level because the workload has reduced due to the introduction of technology.</li>\n<li><b>Extensive knowledge:- </b>Technology provides an endless supply of experience and valuable pieces of stuff. Conducting researches are not accessible without technology. Apart from that, technology enables you to keep an eye on your competitors. Stay aware of their next move and keep yourself up to date with the latest market trends.</li>\n<li style=\"font-weight: 400;\"><b>Technology brings Cryptocurrency:- </b><a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/08/16/10-reasons-that-demonstrate-the-importance-of-technology-in-business/\">The technology enables Cryptocurrency</a> to come into existence. Moreover, this particular technology empowers firms around the globe to give safe and reliable payments with full-fledged records. Blockchain is a digital ledger that manages all the files related to transactions.</li>\n<li style=\"font-weight: 400;\"><b>Necessary for Business Expansion:- </b>The use of the most advanced technology gives a competitive edge to the company, which makes it a better organization than others. Above all, it will increase the overall value of the organization in the market. For detailed information, you can also read: How to Value Small Company? (I liked an article, &#8220;How to Value a Business,&#8221; by Norm Tedford; https://www.upflip.com/).</li>\n<li style=\"font-weight: 400;\"><b>Increases the Capacity of Business:- </b>Technology enables more customers to reach in less time. It means more customers have served than before. Besides, the communication and information storing capacity increase with technology.</li>\n<li style=\"font-weight: 400;\"><b>Explore New Markets for Growth:-</b> Businesses can explore tons of new markets to expand their services and profitability. Moreover, technology is advancing with the introduction of modern gadgets in the market every other day. Companies can take advantage of these gadgets for their growth.</li>\n</ol>\n<p>The post <a rel=\"nofollow\" +0000","feedId":271,"bgimg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/Technology-Plays-a-Vital-Role-in-Small-Business-Growth.jpg","linkMd5":"b7c1aba785d13f5b9e742ccbe1d0ad2a","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx15/cdn79@2020_6/2020/08/23/15-18-25-424_5601399b8fa9c5e4.webp","metaImg":"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/Technology-Plays-a-Vital-Role-in-Small-Business-Growth.jpg","destWidth":825,"destHeight":510,"sourceBytes":53067,"destBytes":47196,"author":"Tripta Bhardwaj","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/Technology-Plays-a-Vital-Role-in-Small-Business-Growth-300x185.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx33/cdn16@2020_5/2020/08/23/15-18-18-739_8eea88d580bf605a.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598195874948},{"createdTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:55","updatedTime":"2020-08-23 23:17:55","title":"How Will Artificial Intelligence Change the World of Sports?","link":"https://readwrite.com/?p=170279","description":"<div><a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/06/19/how-will-artificial-intelligence-change-the-world-of-sports/\" title=\"How Will Artificial Intelligence Change the World of Sports?\"><img width=\"300\" height=\"200\" src=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/artificial-intelligence-and-sports-300x200.png\" class=\"attachment-medium size-medium wp-post-image\" alt=\"\" style=\"margin-bottom: 15px;\" srcset=\"https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/artificial-intelligence-and-sports-300x200.png 300w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/artificial-intelligence-and-sports-240x160.png 240w, https://images.readwrite.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/artificial-intelligence-and-sports.png 539w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px\" /></a></div><p>Today, the technological landscape is expanding by all leaps and bounds, and Artificial Intelligence (AI) remains in the thick of it. A technology that is one for the present and future, AI is playing a massive role in shaping businesses to the core. From healthcare and entertainment to commerce and sports, <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/12/23/5-ways-artificial-intelligence-technology-is-transforming-the-financial-markets/\">Artificial Intelligence</a> is transforming every industrial vertical for good. Here is how artificial intelligence will change the world of sports.</p>\n<h3>Sports and Artificial Intelligence</h3>\n<p>Speaking of the sports industry itself, the <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/03/04/artificial-intelligence-forecasts-for-2020/\">presence of AI today is to be seen</a> in just about every major league around the world. From NHL and NFL to NASCAR and NBA, AI has changed the way we think of the sports world today. Take an example of Northern Sports only, for instance. The industry crossed a staggering figure of $73.5 billion by the end of the year 2019.</p>\n<p>Okay &#8212; so, COVID-19 has caused a dent in the sports system &#8212; and a problem for sports. But we&#8217;ll get back on track! And, if you long to know more about how AI has impacted the sports world, here is a compiled, detailed list.</p>\n<p>It&#8217;s fun and interesting to understand how <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/01/11/evolving-relationship-between-artificial-intelligence-and-big-data/\">Artificial Intelligence will shape or change</a> the world sporting ecosystem around the world.</p>\n<h2>Ways AI will Change the Sports World</h2>\n<p>AI is changing the Sports world for good.</p>\n<h3>1. Enhancements in Recruitment Analysis</h3>\n<p>Be it soccer, basketball, baseball, or any other game, analyzing the performance data of players has been an age-long factor in determining whether a particular player will be successful at the club or not. Not only is the performance data analyzed for the recruitment of the players but also to determine the impact of a player mid-season.</p>\n<p>Now while these performance data aren’t as accurate and contain numerous loopholes, the integration of AI into this process is making it more reliable and easy. AI can now analyze all the historical data about a particular player in order to come with a conclusion about whether or not a player would have an impact on the club. This even helps in determining what should be the market value of the player in the transfer window.</p>\n<h3>2. Use of Deep Learning by AI in NASCAR</h3>\n<p>Nascar is one of the famed sports around the world watched by millions of people in the US alone. However, there’s a dark side to this sport. Since the year 1950, NASCAR has recorded an average of more than one death annually. So <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/03/10/is-ai-just-as-biased-as-the-humans-creating-it/\">in order to counter this problem</a>, AI has a vital role to play.</p>\n<p>With the help of deep learning, Artificial Intelligence is making use of the neural network that can identify a malfunction or kind of issue in the car much before the driver is at risk. Car AI is a technology that has been trained on a dataset to identify more than a thousand images of cars in multiple conditions and can be a boon in the world of NASCAR by making sure that the drivers are safe.</p>\n<h3>3. The Rise of Automated Journalism</h3>\n<p>Automated Journalism in the world of sports is now becoming a reality. Thanks to AI, an associated press like Minor League Baseball (MiLB) is now expanding its reach in journalism.</p>\n<p>With the <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/01/10/how-ai-is-transforming-the-entertainment-industry/\">help of a platform called Wordsmith</a> that uses statistics and data to come with narratives using the natural language, the press is now able to cover 13 leagues and more than 140 teams affiliated with MLB.</p>\n<p>The &#8220;sporty&#8221; platform has brought a significant rise in the number of stories that the press is now able to cover. As per a report, this rise is a nearly 12-fold increase as compared to the press’ manual ways of reporting. Today, MiLB has covered more than 1500 such stories with the help of Wordsmith and AI. If you are a sports fan, like we all are &#8212; try it out.</p>\n<h3>4. The Role of AI in Coaching</h3>\n<p>Not only is AI transforming the way we play and cover sports, but it is also transforming the way the players are trained to play on the pitch. Coaches have now begun the use of AI in analyzing the areas where a particular player or the whole team lags behind.</p>\n<p>With the help of <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/03/04/3-areas-of-your-business-where-deep-learning-can-make-a-difference/\">Artificial Intelligence, coaches around the world</a> can now analyze their own weaknesses as well. This has brought a drastic change in the way we think of traditional coaching methods. Today, there are minimal chances of any issues regarding the playing style of a team being overlooked by a coach.</p>\n<h3>5. Optimization of Fan’s Experience</h3>\n<p>Keeping the fans happy is one of the vital things for a league or club to do, and with the help of AI now, the experience of fans is bound to get better. Various teams from different leagues around the world have begun the use of <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2019/05/30/artificial-intelligence-can-improve-business-growth/\">AI-based chatbots</a> to answer the queries of fans.</p>\n<p>Similarly, Artificial Intelligence is being integrated to build algorithms that can customize the match highlights in different forms and lengths as per user preferences.</p>\n<h4>Summing Up</h4>\n<p>The world of sports offers ample <a href=\"https://readwrite.com/2020/04/18/growth-opportunities-available-during-and-after-pandemic-times/\">opportunities for technology to expand</a> its horizon. From deep learning systems ensuring the safety of players to a sports app development company (called appinventive dot com) creating apps that optimize fans’ experience. There is a lot to look forward to from Artificial Intelligence in the sports world.</p>\n<p>If you like this article and wish to share your views on the increasing role of Artificial Intelligence in sports feel free to share your views in the comments section below.</p>\n<p>The post <a rel=\"nofollow\"
